Mods list

Author: Freddy_Gwendo (aka Gwendolyne)

Maintainer: rivvers

Version : 3.9.0

Web Site â€¢ Discussion â€¢ GitHub

Introduction

Here is the list of mods for the Baldur's Gate saga available for download. To ensure that it is as accurate as possible, please feel free to indicate on the forum whether new translations are in progress, have recently been completed, or have been temporarily set aside (with or without the possibility of another translator taking them on). Please also feel free to report any problems, broken links or newer links, confirm new compatibility, or simply announce the release of new mods.

Anyone who wishes to do so may make changes and improvements to this GitHub repo. Simply open an â€˜issueâ€™ and inform us of an error, a missing or incorrect link, or missing information; or fork it and submit a â€˜Pull Requestâ€™.

Don't forget to check out the readme before contributing, as well as the guidelines.

Mods listed: 1971

Legend:

Mod quality

  • ğŸŸ¢ Quality mod
  • âš ï¸ Mod that could cause problems
  • ğŸŸ¥ Mod to avoid or obsolete

Translation state

  • âœ… Mod translated
  • â Mod partially translated
  • âŒ Mod not translated

Weidu Mod

  • ğŸ˜€ Weidu Mod
  • ğŸ˜¡ Override mod, uninstallable

âš ï¸ WARNINGS âš ï¸

  • For security reasons, all links offering direct downloads are split into two parts. The first part is in the link and the second part is in the description, under the name `File xxx.yy`. To obtain a valid link, it may be necessary to combine the two parts. For example, for the mod Runic Bladesinger Elven Kit, the link `https://baldur.cob-bg.pl/download/bg2/kits/` should be combined with `Runiczny_v2.0.zip`.

1pp: animation fixes for IWD: TotLM
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Erephine

This mod corrects certain malfunctions that appeared in the Trials of the Luremaster (IWD) expansion: it restores waiting animations during battles, corrects attack sounds and lets you use BG1 character animations in Heart of Winter and Trials of the Luremaster (IWD).

Please note: the third component is not compatible with the One Pixel Productions mod.
Almateria's IWD2 Fixpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Almateria

This mod brings many fixes to the game.
AutoDescription
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Selphira

AutoDescription is a mod, for BG2, BGT, BGEE, BG2EE and EET, developed on La Couronne de Cuivre, which automatically generates and replaces the "technical" description of items and spells.

This has several advantages:
- Descriptions are standardized, making them easier to read- The description adapts to any modifications made by mods and harmonizes them with the rest of the game- By comparing before-and-after descriptions, we can detect any bugs, errors or incompatibilities between mods and the base game.
- If untranslated mods are used, the description is automatically updated. If untranslated mods are installed, the item statistics of these mods will be automatically translated and harmonized.

Initially, this mod was designed to be used by players, being installed after all mods adding or altering items.

In fact, AutoDescription adapts to all mods installed by the user, so if the capabilities of certain items are altered, these will be updated so that their description corresponds to reality and in your original language.

In practice, it turns out that AutoDescription can also be used in mod development, at various levels...

For translators, it automatically translates the statistics contained in the descriptions of most items, thus avoiding an often tedious and redundant task.

For developers, it can highlight certain problems, inconsistencies or bugs in items by reliably translating the effects. To this end, a number of errors and warnings are logged. As the mod was not originally designed for this purpose, the list of errors reported in this way is still small, but will grow over time.
Bala's Axe Fix
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

Mortianna

This mini-mod brings Bala's Axe into line with its description and enables Magic Dissipation to be launched once a day.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Baldur's Gate Fixpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Sasha al'Therin

This project aimed to correct the various bugs and malfunctions found in BG and its expansion. Although not yet complete, this pack includes all Baldurdash fixes (created by Kevin Dorner) and some adjustments from DudleyFix for BG1.

To be used only for an original BG game, without Tutu or BGT.

Baldurdash-WeiDU
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Team

Kevin Dorner

King Diamond

Vlad

Link
Baldurdash-WeiDU is a remastered version of the classic Baldurdash (by Kevin Dorner). There are two versions:
- the classic version
- version 1.76, which is very specific to the Never Ending Journey and Tortured Souls-BP mods.
In all other cases, prefer the BG2 FixPack.

You should install version 1.76 only if you intend to use Never Ending Journey and/or Tortured Souls-BP. In this case, download the mod Vlad's Compilation which includes the latest versions of Baldurdash-WeiDU, Tortured Souls-BP and berelinde's Keldorn Romance, as well as Third Path, Slavers in Action + Improved Copper Coronet, Semi-Multiple Strongholds, Restored Twisted Rune and other fixes (improved monk class, new NPC profiles, new items...).

This mod has disappeared from http://corellon.clandlan.net/index.php?page=corellon/bgiwd/bgarreglos.
Available in ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸.
BG1 engine FIX - extending limit of maximum GLOBAL variables
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Zed Nocear

The BG engine uses variables to store various events, and their number is limited. New global variables and timers that exceed this limit are simply ignored. The game won't crash, but you'll run into serious difficulties and the plot will grind to a halt. BG+TotSC manages only 1024 global variables, and BG without TotSC is even more limited, with only 512 global variables. If you play with more than one quest mod, difficulties arise late in the game (usually in chapter 5 or later).
To avoid this problem, this mod extends the GLOBAL variable limit to 4096 by modifying the EXE file by one byte.

To be used only for an original BG game, without Tutu or BGT.

It's a set of patches for Tutu, designed to make up for the bugs that remain after Tutu's various updates.

BG2 FixPack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Multiple

The BG2 FixPack is the most complete fixpack to date. It fixes all the bugs fixed by Baldurdash (by Kevin Dorner) plus a million more, ensuring a perfectly clean game. This is the unofficial fixpack you should always install unless you have an excellent reason to install another one instead. Note that some mods require it to be installed.

Incompatible with: Improved Anvil
BiG World Fixpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Leonardo Watson

The BiG World Fixpack is a mod that applies the latest mod fixes developed by the community and not yet integrated into mods, and applies specific patches to ensure compatibility between several mods. It identifies the mods in your game directory and applies these fixes where necessary.

It must be launched before any other mod.

Many of these translations are no longer up to date; use with caution.

BWS-FR Fixpack is a compilation of patches, originally intended for Big World Setup FR, but which can also be used independently. A second component, to be run at the very end of your installation, will check various known problems, and suggest fixes if possible.

Correction de la traduction de Baldur's Gate : Enhanced Edition
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Team

lefreut

jazira

rivvers

The aim of this mod is to correct the French translation of Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition and Siege of Dragonspear extension, so as to offer a complete French version worthy of the name, both in terms of text and audio dubbing.
It takes the text, video and audio dubbing of Baldur's Gate 1 and the Mod semi-officiel de traduction partielle de BG2:EE as its base. These have been merged with the official translation of patch 2.6 for the missing part of the Enhanced Edition content and the Text Patch for Baldur's Gate 2 (and ToB) and the Text Error Patch for BG (and ToSC).
There are also a few additions, such as BG2 voice sets in French, additional dubbed lines, etc. This mod also gives you 3 options for video and audio dubbing (VF / VF + VO / VO). For more details, see readme.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Correction de la traduction de Baldur's Gate II : Enhanced Edition
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Team

lefreut

jazira

Mera

rivvers

The aim of this mod is to correct the French translation of Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition, and to offer a complete French version worthy of the name, both in terms of text and audio dubbing.
It uses the text, video and audio dubbing of Baldur's Gate 2 and the Mod semi-officiel de traduction partielle de BG2:EE as a basis. These have been merged with the official translation of Patch 2.6 for the missing Enhanced Edition content and the Text Patch for Baldur's Gate 2 (and ToB), plus tens of thousands of additional text, audio dubbing and bug fixes. This mod also offers 3 options for video and audio dubbing (VF / VF + VO / VO). For more details, see readme.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

DudleyFix for BG1
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

Dudley

Link
Dubbed Dudleyville, this fixpack is designed to correct all the bugs in the game identified and unresolved by Baldurdash (by Kevin Dorner). It contains over 700 fixes and patches (most of them minor), some of them designed to provide a game experience closer to that of the paper rules.
The patches can be found in the "Dudleyfix BG1 Fixes" section, then in "Completed Fixpack". These patches are not actually translated, but most don't need translating (they don't add or modify any text).

Use only for an original BG game, without Tutu or BGT. Don't take FixPack #2, otherwise your game will be in English!
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Enhanced Edition Fixpack
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Team

CamDawg

Luke

Argent77

DavidW

The EE Fixpack is a Weidu compilation of fixes for the enhanced editions of Baldur's Gate, Baldur's Gate II, Icewind Dale, and Planescape: Torment. This collaborative effort, which includes the work of modders from several different communities, is intended to resolve issues that remain in these games after the current official patch.

It must be installed on both BGEE and BG2EE before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
This mod is still in progress.

BGT

Ascension64

This mod made two fixes to defects in the Baldur's Gate II game engine regarding the allocation of party experience. These involved modifying the game executable, which makes them very special.

BG2

BGT

Argent77

This mod offers fixes for BG2 to correct area crashes, notably by correcting erroneous references.

This mod offers 4 components with increasing impact on the game. Install the first one, and if it doesn't fix the problem, move on to the second, and so on. Read the README carefully.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

This mod features a fix for the Legacy Of Bhaal difficulty, which adjusted save rolls to 20. This mod modifies the scripts of most creatures, allowing them to modify their own saving throws as they appear.

Icewind Dale Fixpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

CamDawg

The IWD FixPack is the most complete fixpack to date. It fixes many of the bugs and errors that remain in the game after the official fixes have been applied, ensuring a perfectly clean game. This is the unofficial fixpack you should always install unless you have an excellent reason to install another one instead. Note that some mods require it to be installed. It works with or without the Heart of Winter and Trials of the Luremaster (IWD) extensions. More info in the readme.

IWD

DavidW

It also contains 11 recruitable NPCs, created from the sound sets and portraits of the existing game. These are basic NPCs, at about the same level as BG1 NPCs. In other words, they have a recruiting dialog and not much else - no interactions, romances, quests or the like.
IWDEE compatibility fixer
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Dan_P

If you've played IWDEE with mod kits, you may have noticed that many kits are not compatible with IWDEE, even though they claim to be. The kits will generally work, but they'll be missing IWDEE abilities, or in the case of druids or paladins, they'll have completely the wrong abilities.
Jondalar Fix for BGT
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

Adul

Jondalar is an instructor at Candlekeep. Normally, you approach him and talk to him, and he launches a small training session where you fight against him and his friend Erik. However, if you decide to attack Jondalar directly instead of talking to him, his dialog triggers won't recognize your attacks, and this allows you to kill him and Erik without penalty and receive the XP reward and items they carry.
This mod corrects this behavior by adding an extra line of dialog that triggers only when you attack Jondalar before talking to him.
This fix requires BG2 to be installed in English and will cause incompatibility issues with other languages.

This mod is not necessary if you intend to install the Jarl's Adventure Pack mod.

EET

This mod includes a series of generic patches to clean up game files and avoid crashes.

Mod Kit Remover
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Idobek

This mod is not a profile mod per se. It was mainly created because The Darkest Day (EE-compatible) was filling all available profile slots while players wanted to use profiles from other mods to play it. The Mod Kit Remover removes all mod profiles from the character creation screen, with options to remove module profiles only or Bioware and module profiles. All profiles will remain installed for use by previously created NPCs and PCs. All changes made by other mods to Bioware profiles will remain intact, and profiles from other WeiDU mods can be installed and selected during character creation. In short, you can install lots of profiles while keeping the default ones selectable and intact.

Please note that this mod has been made obsolete by TobEx.
Mod semi-officiel de traduction partielle de BG2:EE
ğŸŸ¥âŒğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Team

La Voix 2 la Sagesse

Isaya

Freddy_Gwendo

Luren

Graoumf

McGregor777

N3ige

Scylla

slip

sombrepiaf

zelurker

Cruller

Leninator

As its name suggests, this mod offers a partial translation of BG2:EE. For the moment, it includes:
- texts from SoA and ToB corrected by the previous patch.
- Rasaad's quest in SoA: dialog, locations, characters (some creature names may not be translated).
- voice subtitles for the main character and for Rasaad.
- items added by BG2:EE.
- spells added by BG2:EE.
- texts added by patch 2.5, notably the Tempus priest kit.

This mod is designed to work with BG2:EE v2.3.67.3 and v2.5.16.6.
Since the release of the mod Correction de la traduction de Baldur's Gate II : Enhanced Edition, this mod has been rendered obsolete for games with patch 2.6 or later.
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

Packs de voix partielles pour BG2:EE
ğŸŸ¥âŒğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

EET

Team

La Voix 2 la Sagesse

Isaya

Freddy_Gwendo

Luren

Graoumf

McGregor777

N3ige

Scylla

slip

sombrepiaf

zelurker

Cruller

Leninator

These voice packs make it possible to play the game entirely in French, without hearing the English voices. The sound archives are designed to be extracted from the lang directory, as they contain the fr_FR folder. Because of the way the different versions of the game handle voices, there are two voice packs: one for versions 1.2, 1.3, 2.0, 2.1, 2.2 and 2.3; the other for version 2.5.

Don't get the wrong version, or you'll get a mix of voices in the game!
Since the release of the mod Correction de la traduction de Baldur's Gate II : Enhanced Edition, this mod has been rendered obsolete for games with patch 2.6 or later.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

Patch de correction des erreurs de la version franÃ§aise de Planescape: Torment
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

PST

PSTEE

mirandir

The purpose of this mod is to correct the various errors present in the French version of Planescape: Torment and Planescape: Torment: Enhanced Edition, notably by translating entries overlooked by the translators, and by correcting errors of French, consistency and nonsense that sometimes appear in the various dialogs.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Planescape: Torment Ultimate WeiDU Fixpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PST

Qwinn

This mod brings together corrections made by many modders over the years, and converted to the more compatible WeiDU format. It also adds a number of additional corrections. In addition to the new corrections made by Qwinn, corrections from three non-WeiDU mods have been integrated into this mod: Platter's Fixpack 1.37, of which Platter is the main author, but which also contains the work of several other contributors. Fixes from Fixpack Beta 1.38, again by Platter, are also included
Restoration Pack, by Cilantro, aka Kung Fu Man (which restores several spells, items and more, which had been removed from the last version of PST).
"SKARDAVNELNATE'S All-Inclusive Fixpack", by SKARDAVNELNATE.
Please note that although this mod contains only bug fixes, many of the fixes result in the restoration of content not available in the original game.
It comprises three components: the first includes the main fixes, the second English spelling and grammar corrections, the third adds subtitles to the cinematics dialogs which were previously only available as audio/sound dialogs.
Polymorph fixes for IWD:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

IWDEE

Dan_P

This mod fixes a number of bugs in IWD:EE. Notably polymorphic bugs, but also the nymph script... Read the readme to find out more.

Some components are similar to Better IWD Pregen, in which case the last installed component takes over, but generate problems.
The Patch for nymph.BCS component crashes when coupled with EEex.

Restored BG1 Casting Sounds
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

SimDing0

This mod restores the incantation sounds used in BG2 to those used in BG1. A component also restores the sounds of combat moves. If you choose to restore both casting sounds and special effects, spells like Canticle will benefit from special sounds, as in BG1, rather than the conventional casting sounds for their school. Although designed for installation on Tutu, this mod will work with any version of BG2. However, you may prefer the excellent Infinity Sounds.

EET

IWDEE

Luke

This mod corrects the malfunctioning of the sleep/reverse effects, which are managed by the same game opcode. For example, a character protected by Chaotic Orders could not be reversed by a dragon wing or earthquake spell. This mod remedies that.
Slowdown Fixes
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

IWD2

Team

Extremist

Quint

The aim of this mod was to solve the game's slowdown problems in certain areas, such as the jungle or the Dragon's Eye: movements are not fluid, seeming to stop every second or so, making the game difficult and boring.
Not everyone encounters these problems. They may be linked to hardware problems, such as the processor, chipset, type of RAM, or other. They could also be linked to the way your party members' inventory is organized...

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Worldmap
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Team

Weigo

Yacomo

King Diamond

Erebusant

Roberciiik

This mod is absolutely essential with any combination of mods adding locations to the world map (Baldur's Gate Trilogy, The Darkest Day, Check the Bodies, Shadows over Soubar, Dark Side of the Sword Coast, Northern Tales of the Sword Coast, Secret of Bone Hill, Drizzt Saga...).
It provides a single, larger and more attractive map of the world.
It must be installed at least after all mods likely to add locations to the world map. Be careful not to uninstall or reinstall this mod, as it could simply destroy your game.
It's strongly recommended that you choose the 'Original travel times' option and the small map (if you're asked). The "revised" travel times have unresolved bugs, and the large map is heavier to load without offering any advantages (but if you install a mod that requires the large map, the latter will be installed automatically, no questions asked).

Incompatible with: Baldurdash-WeiDU

Achievements!
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Argent77

This mod unlocks EE game achievements available only via the Steam client. It detects unlocked achievements and displays them in the log for any player without the need to use the Steam client. What's more, it's possible to purchase an achievements trophy that tracks the status of unlocked achievements. In addition to the official Steam achievements, the mod also unlocks a small number of unused achievements for SoD that are implemented in the game but not registered by Steam.
The mod can be installed at any time. There's no need to start a new game. Successes that have already been unlocked prior to mod installation will be detected and added to the log.

Big World Setup EE
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Selphira

BWS-EE is a complete overhaul of Big World Setup, which specialises in installing mods. In particular, it improves the interface and offers Linux compatibility. Like Big World Setup, it allows you to automatically download, extract and install mods, while managing conflicts, dependencies and installation orders. It thus offers an alternative to the Project Infinity tool. Its main features are: - It allows you to select the mods and components you want and fully automates the installation process.
- It supports mod presets.
- It automatically downloads most mods.
- It automatically extracts most mods.
- It manages the installation order.
- It alerts you to any conflicts in your selection and suggests solutions to avoid them.

This mod is still in progress.
Big World Setup FR
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Team

ALIENQuake

Selphira

BWS-FR is a fork of the now-defunct Big World Setup specializing in the installation of mods translated into French and compatible with EET (it also installs some mods that don't add text to the game). Like the latter, it lets you download, extract and install mods automatically, while managing conflicts, dependencies and installation orders. It offers a functional alternative to the Project Infinity.
Its main functions:
- It allows you to select the mods and components you want, and fully automates the installation process.
- It supports mod presets.
- It automatically downloads most mods.
- It automatically extracts most mods.
- It manages the order of installation.
- It indicates any conflicts in your selection, and suggests solutions to avoid them.
- It applies corrections to certain mods with BWS-FR Fixpack.
You can consult the Dedicated Forum for further information and access to the User Guides.

Warning: This version only supports installation with EET.
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

DLC Builder
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Argent77

Infinity Engine Enhanced Edition games since version 2.0 offer the possibility of installing extensions in the form of DLC. The best-known example is the Siege of Dragonspear expansion, available as DLC on the GOG and Steam platforms. But this feature can also be used for modding, allowing you to turn your modded games into DLC archives. This way, you don't have to go through the time-consuming and error-prone process of installing one mod after another if you simply want to reuse a known mod configuration. It can also be used to quickly synchronize multiple game installations so that they can be used for multiplayer sessions.

IWDEE

PSTEE

Argent77

This mod lets you merge DLC such as "Siege of Dragonspear" with the game's main content.

EEex
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Bubb

EEex is an executable extender for the enhanced edition of Beamdog's Infinity engine. Its aim is to externalize certain parts of the engine to give modders a greater degree of control over otherwise hard-coded mechanisms. EEex does not modify the gameplay itself, it simply enables other mods to do so.

Warning: once installed, you must launch the game with InfinityLoader.exe or EEex.exe (depending on version), otherwise the game will crash.
Incompatible with: IE:EE Game Speed Mod
EETLauncher
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

ALIENQuake

This utility is a launcher for Enhanced Edition Trilogy. It launches the correct game executable (especially if EEex is used) as well as other pages related to the use of EET.

Works only for Windows 7, 8.1 or 10.
GateKeeper
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

mud-master

Generalized Biffing
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

PST

PSTEE

the bigg

Generalized Biffing is extremely important to avoid in-game slowdowns if your installation contains a lot of mods.
It's not really a mod, but a tool written with WeiDU that installs like a mod. Its principle is to create BIF files from mod files or files modified by mods and present in the game's Override directory.
The "Biffing" technique has one main objective: to reduce in-game slowdowns. In particular, those observed when loading a game, accessing an area, etc. Indeed, the presence of a very large number of files in the Override directory causes slowdowns of varying degrees (depending on the number of files and the performance of the computer, particularly the hard disk). Each time the game searches for a file, it must first check whether it's in the Override directory, then, if this fails, search for it in existing BIF files (from the original game or from certain mega-mods). These BIF files resemble zip archives: they contain a set of files which the game can access thanks to a summary that enables it to find them. This method is more efficient, as the number of BIF files is much reduced and the game spends much less time finding them on the hard disk. In fact, this is how the game exploits the basic game files: they are all included in the BIF files of the Data, Movies, CD2, CD3 directories, etc. In fact, biffing is best reserved for those who carry out mega-installations or who install a large number of mods that modify a lot of game files, such as "Tweak" mods.
Even if Generalized Biffing allows you to uninstall mods installed before it, you need to be aware that this uninstallation can take a very long time, even hours! So it's best to use Generalized Biffing only when you're fairly certain you won't need to modify your installation.

Caution: By its very nature, it will generally be installed last, but I strongly urge you to read this topic before considering using it.
IE-EE Configuration
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Team

LionAG

MephistoSatanDevil

This is an unofficial configuration utility for Infinity Engine - Enhanced Edition games. It allows you to easily modify certain modifiable properties in the Baldur.lua file.
IE:EE Game Speed Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

LionAG

The Infinity Engine works in such a way that game speed is directly linked to the engine's rendering speed. So, if you try to double the default speed to 60 frames per second, you'll also speed up game time. This affects the time the player has to complete timed objectives/quests, as well as the duration of spells, potions, etc. This project is a game speed mod that attempts to solve this problem. Once loaded, the game runs at 60 FPS, but the time is not altered!

This requires launching the game exe with the executable thus created.
Requires: Windows
Incompatible with: EEex
Infinity Dialog
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

dark0dave

This tool has 4 features: Missing, Traverse, Discover and View.
Missing shows missing string for tra, files, ie if a string is missing for english but not in french. This can also fix by placing extra strings.
Discover shows all the strings for all languages and where they are set.
Traverse walks over a bg mod and shows you the tree of paths through the files.
View can read a collection of infinity file formats and text files involved in weidu mods.

dark0dave

The Infinity Engine Mod Installer is a tool designed to automate the installation of mods for Infinity Engine games such as Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale, and Planescape: Torment. It uses a file called weidu.log to determine which mods to install and how to install them.

IWDSpells is a tool to bring the new spells and bard songs from Icewind Dale into the Baldur's Gate series of games. While it can be used as a standalone mod, it's primarily intended as a tool for modmakers to include in their own mods. If you are not a modder and just want the IWD spells, it's probably simpler to use the IWDification mod.

Moebius Toolkit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

suy

Moebius Tookit is an application designed to help players, modders and, hopefully, developers of one of the best video games of all time, the Baldur's Gate saga (and/or the AD&D 2nd edition rules on which the game is based). It attempts to address a number of issues:
The lack of interactive tables with interesting data for game analysis.
The lack of a maintained, Linux-compatible savegame editor.
Near Infinity is both useful and slow, especially under Linux.
Near Infinity
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

PSTEE

Argent77

Near Infinity (or short: NI) is an open source cross-platform browser and editor for resources of Infinity Engine games.
Opcode deleter!
âš ï¸âŒğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

PST

PSTEE

500ì›

Link
This mod allows you to select an opcode during installation. It then patches all items/spells/creatures (not traps) to remove any occurrence of that opcode.
What's the point? Never want to have to deal with a poisoned companion again? Ask for opcode 25 to be deleted. No longer want a monster to be immune to your x-level spells? Ask for the deletion of opcode 102 (please note that this will stop the invulnerability Globe spells from working).

To reinstall this mod (and request another opcode), after installing it, open "Weidu.log" and delete the line concerning it. Save and you'll be able to re-install the mod (repeat for each new opcode you want).
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Available in ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·.
Portrait Gender Separator
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Dan_P

Portrait Gender Separator is not a mod, but a tool written with WeiDU and installed as a mod. It adds your portraits to the lists of male or female portraits available in the character creation screen. It's very easy to use: just place your portraits either in the game's Portraits folder, or in one of the sub-folders of the mod's folder. Then run the installer, which copies them into the override directory and lists their names in the .lua file used to select a portrait in the character creation screen.

This complicated-to-use tool (read the description on Github) lets you create L, M and S portraits for any IE game (old or enhanced) from any image available on the net.

Project Infinity
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

ALIENQuake

Project Infinity is a mod manager for EE versions of the Infinity Engine. Project Infinity aims to provide almost the same functionality as BWS, but without the need for constant 24/7 maintenance of the tool itself, for the cost of a few extra actions to be performed by its users.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

IWDEE

PSTEE

drake127

This program improves InfinityEngine's randomness. Indeed, when many rolls are performed, it becomes apparent that the results end up repeating themselves. Read the README for more information.

Compatible with Windows and Linux.
For original versions, use Better Random Library.
Reduce Save Compression
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Bubb

Reduce Save Compression lowers the compression level used by Beamdog's Enhanced Edition of the Infinity Engine when saving. This speeds up the saving process for late-game playthroughs at the cost of marginally increased storage size.

Only works on version 2.6 of the game.

Stutter Debug Tool
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

PST

PSTEE

Spellhold-Studios

The Stutter Debug Tool is designed to help debug malfunctioning scripts in the game. For example, if an NPC "stutters", i.e. takes only a few steps and constantly interrupts any action, or if the NPC's PID (player-initiated dialog) is repeatedly displayed, or if the game suffers a slowdown that could be caused by a script running in a loop.
Sword Coast Keeper
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Isaya

Link
Developed by LCC's Isaya, this utility lets you edit your BG and Tales of the Sword Coast saves, and is much more powerful than GateKeeper.

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Abel

This script, which you can edit yourself, allows you to change weapon sets in-game (for example, to switch from two weapons to a bow) by pressing the key you have configured. It requires the Autokey programme to function.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Widescreen
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

BGT

IWD

IWD2

PST

the bigg

This mod is a combination of patches and modifications to the game's graphical interface, making it possible to play BG (with its TotSC extension), BG2 (with or without ToB), Icewind Dale (with its HoW and TotLM extensions) and Icewind Dale 2 and Planescape:Torment in resolutions other than those imposed (for BG and PsT) or those offered by the games (for BG2, Icewind Dale with its HoW extension and Icewind Dale 2).
The term patch indicates that it modifies the game executable to force the resolution you choose during installation. As a result, the mod is only compatible with Windows (and Linux via Windows emulation). Sorry Mac users.

Une version amÃ©liorÃ©e est proposÃ©e pour BG uniquement dans le mod Enhanced Widescreen.
Requires: Windows

Baldur's Gate 2: Rebirth TC Mod for EE
âš ï¸âğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Vangerdahast

Link
Rebirth is a full Total Conversion mod set in the kingdom of Cormyr. It introduces a completely new storyline, characters, areas, and challenges within the Forgotten Realms.

This mod is still in progress.
Baldur's Gate Trilogy
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Ascension64

Do you want to complete the Baldur's Gate trilogy from Candlekeep to the Throne of Bhaal in one go? Do you want to keep your NPCs like Imoen, Jaheira, Minsc, Edwin or Viconia - or your team of six characters created in multiplayer mode - and progress them throughout the trilogy? Or do you simply want to play BG1 in 800x600, with a full journal, map notes and other BG2 enhancements, with all BG1 bugs fixed, while still being able to play SoA or ToB on the same installation? Then the Baldur's Gate Trilogy mod is for you!
Baldurs Gate Trilogie NPC Sound
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

Lokadamus

Character dubbing sound levels differ between Baldur's Gate and Baldur's Gate II. As a result, it's hard to find a setting that allows you to hear the BGII dub without having your eardrums burst by those copied from BG. This mod screens all sounds imported from Baldur's Gate and adjusts their sound level to that of Baldur's Gate II. Originally designed on the basis of the sound level of the German dub, it should also be suitable for French.
Battle of Helm's Deep
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

Elhoe

Link
Egrevyn tested this mod, inspired by the battle of Helm's Deep in The Lord of the Rings: "Besides a very annoying bug (CluaConsole mandatory), it's really fun as a mod. Difficulty-wise, it's a piece of cake, with not so much opposition. And it's very basic in terms of gameplay: at first, you just have to concentrate your bow shots on the orcs. But you'll have a great time, because it's really nice to find the atmosphere of the SdA in BG. Portraits and voices from the film integrated. Don't try to play BG with this mod, just direct the Battle of Helm. Fun".

Fichier bohd_v100.zip.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
BG1Tutu
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

Team

Japheth

Wes Weimer

This mod allows you to play Baldur's Gate with the improved engine of the second one (high resolution, choice of kits...).
It implies having Baldur's Gate 1 (optional, Tales of the Sword Coast) and Baldur's Gate 2 installed on your hard disk. The mod adapts to the language of Baldur's Gate 1 and is therefore in French if your Baldur's Gate game is in French. Only a few elements added by the mod will be in English. Works with or without Throne of Bhaal.

Don't forget to download the BG1 Tutufixpack patch: it's mandatory!
A powerful alternative is offered by the EasyTutu mod.

Sir BillyBob

Divided into a series of chapters and various additions, this mod starts the adventure at level 1 in a citadel whose evil occupants must be cleansed. This is followed by a second chapter, and the module gradually becomes more complete. It also includes numerous rules that respect the AD&D 2 system.

Epic Endeavors
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Team

Elhoe

Japheth

Isaya

This total conversion of Shadows of Amn respects the rules of AD&D 2, but mixes genres by multiplying nods to games and films.
The story takes place in an imaginary world with no connection to the Forgotten Realms. You lead a small unit of commandos on a series of missions, some of them highly original, to prevent a madman from reigning over your world. The mod adds many new creatures and items, 60 maps, 13 major quests, around 20 hours of added game time, and a final battle that looks pretty formidable, with 200 creatures to fight...

Compatible with Throne of Bhaal, which was not the case in the original version. You need a clean SoA installation with or without ToB (no other mod, just the official patch and possibly one of the unofficial patches). However, after Epic Endeavors, you can install "minor" mods affecting the game rules, such as the BG2 Tweaks Pack, but any mod adding content (NPCs, quests, etc.) will be useless and incompatible.
Glory of Istar
ğŸŸ¥âğŸ˜¡

BG2

Team

MaxTeamBG

Avenger

SimDing0

Ajoc

MAXGraphics

Link
This is a gigantic project which, in the long term, was to be the size of SoA. In this case, we're talking about a conversion, as the BG2 engine is used to create a separate adventure, set in the Krynn universe, Dragonlance, one of the worlds of Dungeons & Dragons (BG and BG2 being the Forgotten Realms), before the events described in the book series. Although the official website has now disappeared, it is still possible to download the mod.

Fichier DLTCBeta110.exe.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
This mod is still in progress.
Requires: ToB
Heart of Winter
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

tipun

Link
Icewind Dale's Heart of Winter expansion, available for BG1:EE+SoD and EET. The adventure begins after talking to Yollder in the Ulgoth's Beard.
If installed on EET, the mod must be installed after EET and before installing the Trials of the Luremaster for Baldur's Gate mod. Otherwise, the mod won't affect game files that could hinder compatibility with other mods.

This mod is still in progress.
Icewind Dale 2: Enhanced Edition
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Team

Bubb

Olvyn Churu

semiticgod

WillScarlettOhara

Grammarsalad

paladin84

Icewind Dale 2: Enhanced Edition is a compilation of improvements and fixes for Icewind Dale 2, enhancing the game in a variety of ways. Classes, spells, items, creatures and encounters are made more interesting. IWD2EE modifies over 300 spells and over 1,000 items, and adds over 90 new spells, almost 200 new items, over 30 new feats and several NPCs that can join the group. The mod fixes most of the big problems of the original Icewind Dale 2 game: you no longer need to backtrack to complete certain areas, enemies in Heart of Fury mode have interesting powers and don't just have lots of HP, and you can revise the experience system so you don't get zero experience from killing enemies late in the game.
Icewind Dale EE Reborn
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

pete_smith1229

Lore-breaking reimagination of Icewind Dale with new items, item abilities, quests, NPCs, bounties, weapons (with new ranged staves and spears), and armor-set bonuses. All new in-game texts are coloured to help players easily see new conversations (blue), responses (yellow) or descriptions (green/red). This mod is designed for a new Level 1 Party for the Heart of Fury difficulty mode.
Icewind Dale in Baldur's Gate II
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Team

DavidW

CamDawg

This mod lets you play Icewind Dale with the enhanced engine and rules of Baldur's Gate II. It requires Icewind Dale, Heart of Fury, Trial of the Luremaster and Baldur's Gate II - Throne of Bhaal.
Still in development, this mod served as the basis for the development of IWD:EE. You'll find the installation procedure on the link provided.

This mod is still in progress.
Requires: IWD-in-BG2 Fixpack/Tweaks
Icewind Gate II
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

Wes Weimer

Initiated by Weimer, this project lets you play Baldur's Gate II using the Icewind Dale 2 engine. In fact, the idea was to adapt BG2 to Icewind Dale 2, with the 3rd edition rules, interface, spells, etc., from Icewind Dale II. Many screenshots are already available. The beta version has been opened to the public following the withdrawal of its designer from the community. Installation instructions can be found at this link.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Mang0's Hip Hop Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Team

SlidMang0

Almateria

Created to celebrate the anniversary of the G3 forum, this crazy mini-mod brings a whole new hip-hop vibe to Baldur's Gate II. Irenicus, Bodhi, MÃ©lissane and the members of the hand are renamed Ice Cube, Dr. Dre, MC Ren and Eazy-E. The stone heads at the start of ToB now recite the lyrics to Gangsta Nation by Westside Connection. Le Puce becomes 50 Cent. Crossbows and tiles are also renamed.
Never Ending Journey
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

Vlad

NEJ integrates the Icewind Dale game into Baldur's Gate in an extended and improved form. This mod is a game in its own right, with no connection whatsoever to the main plot of BG2. Using the portal immediately north of the starting area in the Irenicus dungeon, the one next to Jaheira's cage, the party will travel through time and space to the town of Easthaven, some 100 years ago, and meet the heroes of Icewind Dale. Your task is to influence the conflict between the two different magic schools, and thus change future history.
Playing NEJ is different from playing BG: the main character is not your protagonist, but Hrothgar. So, if you want to play the whole mod, you have to follow it. As in the original IWD, the plot is predetermined. There's no freedom of movement like in BG. You only get the next quest if you've solved the previous one. If you've missed something, you can't go back. The only way is to reload. In short, NEJ accepts only one solution procedure and you're forced to play this mod in a predetermined way, which doesn't really correspond to the usual spirit of BG mods, and you can't leave until you've completed it.

This mod requires prior installation of the Vlad's Compilation mod, which includes the latest versions of Baldurdash-WeiDU, Tortured Souls-BP and berelinde's Keldorn Romance, as well as Third Path, Slavers in Action + Improved Copper Coronet, Semi-Multiple Strongholds, Restored Twisted Rune and other fixes (improved monk class, new NPC profiles, new items...).
Neverwinter Nights for Baldur's Gate
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

AGKanevchev

paladin84

Link
The mod follows, with minor modifications, the plot of the game Neverwinter Nights. It adds numerous locations, familiar characters from childhood, quests, stores and Lady Aribeth. To start playing the mod, the main character must have an experience level of at least 1350000 XP. When you reach this experience level, a Neverwinter messenger will approach you in any district of Athkatla and ask for your help.
Paladins of FaerÃ»n Quest Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

BGslayer

This conversion of Paladins of FaerÃ»n contains all the quests of the original Czech mod, but is not an exact copy. Numerous bugs have been corrected, and the move to WeiDU has streamlined the code.
The mod contains a major main quest "Paladins of FaerÃ»n" and two side quests, "Order and Chaos" and "Abduction and Politics". New adventures also await you in the cities of Padhiver, Baldur's Gate, Waterdeep, Targos (city center, docks), Siluvaned (elven city) and Har Al-Dur (city of priests) - each with its own urban quest, mainly to help or even save the city. In addition, there are over 20 smaller individual quests. The mod begins in the Irenicus dungeon.

Shoplifting 2
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

shoplifting2

Link
It's a strategy and infiltration video game in which a party of characters, recently cast out from the Forgotten Realms, are doomed to life underground in our contemporary world and must survive in a shopping mall. Shoplifting 2 is a total conversion of Baldur's Gate II (this game must have been previously installed), using the Infinity engine to create a completely new game. The interface has been modified to suit the new game system, and the medieval fantasy settings have been modified by others from the contemporary universe.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

This multiplayer mod requires you to create a multiplayer session, but there's nothing to stop you playing on your own.
This mod installs the modified BGmain.exe executable, which asks you to insert the extension cd when starting up.

BG2 Improved GUI
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Insomniator

This mod is a real gem: it adds new functionalities and greatly improves the display of information in the original game.
Among other things, you'll be able to : display the quick loot panel (as in the EE games) - in particular, group identical items together and retrieve them with a single click, highlight in green spell scrolls not retranscribed in the spell book, not display the "Retranscribe" button on scrolls of spells already known or from opposition schools, display hit points above the party and NPCs, display TAC0 and damage information in the inventory screen, grey out characters' portraits when dragging an item they can't use, fold and unfold quest descriptions in the journal, display the map in grayscale when the game is paused, allow weapon or shield equipment in the secondary hand (experimental), display an NPC's active effects with the right-click, specify TAC0 and damage messages, don't erase drained spells, display hit points and current action on the character's portrait...

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

GUI Switcher

HD GUI
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

ikonomov

Inspired by TWM_GUI, this GUI mod to take advantage of the essential 16:9 support and try to preserve as much of the game's graphical elements as possible in their original form.
1. All menus have been centered on their original resolution of 640x480 for all game views, except the game screen, where it is at 1280x720.
2. GUI elements at the bottom of the screen have been centered, and text and message window widths have been resized to 800 pixels for easier reading.
3. The new text and message windows (bottom GUI elements during reading) use a custom font, resembling the original font, created using a bam generator and modified to achieve correct line spacing. Small adjustments to the height of text fields using the new font have been made to allow text to be displayed correctly in all fields. All other text elements in the game are left intact and use the original fonts.
How to get transparent sidebars

SoD

Team

mf2112

AncientCowboy

If you would like transparent sidebars to give you back more of your screen real estate, this mod is for you.

There is a version directly integrated into EEUITweaks.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

LadeJarl's Tutu GUI (Original BG1 GUI)
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

LadeJarl

If you prefer the look of BG1 to the ergonomics and menus of BG2, this program is for you. Originally written for BG1Tutu, it's also compatible with BGT and replaces BG2's standard interface with one inspired by Baldur's Gate. It runs in 800*600, 1024*768 and 640*480. Here are a few screenshots: menu, character creation, main window and inventory.

Warning: It's best to avoid installing the BGT "GUI" as this mod also modifies the menus.

lefreut

This mod lets you play the entire EE saga with the same interface. It's the same as BG:EE, with a number of ergonomic improvements.

Warning: install version 4.4.2 from patch 2.6, and version 4.3.2 for earlier patches.

IWDEE

lefreut

This mod improves the IWD:EE interface with a number of ergonomic modifications. Coupled with other mods, this mod allows you to access the hlas, which doesn't offer them by default, due to the lack of interface.

Warning: install version 1.9.2 from patch 2.6, and version 1.8.1 for earlier patches.

Original-esque Spell Icons for IWD:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Olvyn Churu

In Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition, the spells in the spell selection menu have stone icons, similar to those in Baldur's Gate and other enhanced editions. But in the original Icewind Dale, the spell icons don't have this stone-like appearance.
This mod brings IWD:EE's spell icons closer to the original. Some icons are also recolored or replaced by icons closer to the original.
Pocket-play UI++
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

Pecca

This is a complete conversion of the IE:EE user interface for phones. The layout is designed for a screen resolution of around 5-6 inches. It inherits many features from the Dragonspear UI++ mod by the same author, but is graphically very different.

Reveal Hidden Gameplay Options
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Argent77

This mod modifies the new BG:EE and BG2:EE game interface introduced with version 2.0 and Siege of Dragonspear. It adds to the game interface the possibility of modifying settings already present in the Baldur.lua file but which had to be set by hand, such as the "famous" debugging panel (which exempts you from the handling indicated in the game's installation manual), several graphics and feedback settings, and many others.

Smooth Selling
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Adul

The aim of this mod is to make it easier and less time-consuming to perform common tasks in managing stores and item bags, such as selling or moving whole stacks of items. For example:
- A single click on an item in a store's Sale pane or in either pane of a bag selects the entire stack.
- The default amount for split-stack items is consistently set to 1.

There is a version directly integrated into EEUITweaks.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2018. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

TWM_GUI
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

Zed Nocear

Link
A Polish modder and Baldur's Gate expert, Zed Nocear, has set about improving Baldur's Gate's graphical interface once Widescreen is installed. TWM is a mod in development, called MotSC (Mysteries of the Sword Coast) in English, from which the author has extracted this part.
mod GUI now supports 7 resolutions, also offers a choice of three backgrounds (a map of the Sword Coast, a stone wall or a black background) that will be displayed around the game's screens, which remain at 640x480 (all except the area view). Since version 0.992, an option has been available to install a larger font size.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Unhide Chargen Options
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

BG2EE

Adul

This mod restores options unavailable during character creation that disappeared with patch v2.0. For example, if you choose the halfling race, only the 4 classes are available in the class selection, whereas previous versions had all options disabled. The following items will therefore be displayed again:
- Classes excluded by your race selection.
- Default amount of split stack items is consistently set to 1.
- Kits excluded by your race selection.
- Alignments excluded by your class selections/kits.
- Weapon skills excluded by your class selection/kit.

There is a version directly integrated into EEUITweaks.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

BGT

Kwiat_W

This mod features a new interface for BG2:ToB that completely remodels almost all the game's screens. It is compatible with Widescreen, Tutu, BGT and W_GUI, for which it features specific start screens.

Aftermotions
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod aims to make battles more animated by allowing feints, recoil of a hit character, falls and additional movement variations for certain weapons. It also allows you to control the terrain through the range of your weapon, blocking several enemies or holding them at a distance. Your characters will sometimes have to switch weapons or fight bare-handed to get close to your opponents. A few corrections to animations and damage types for weapons, particularly spears, are also available.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk.
Alternate Elven Chain?
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

Baptor

This mod proposes a modification of the elf armor to be more brilliant like the mithril armor.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Baldur's Gate Graphical Overhaul
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Team

Yovaneth

White Agnus

Weigo

This huge mod adds missing night areas in all main areas except Baldur's Gate and adds missing night minimaps in all main areas. It also corrects graphical flaws in the game's various maps (windows that display at night and not during the day - or vice versa, badly adjusted doors, flaws in night images, etc.). It gives all wall braziers their missing flames. Finally, almost all the ugly blue and purple spots have been removed from the streets. It was created in collaboration with Overhaul Studios.

Install it before any other mod that makes changes to the areas, otherwise the game will crash when you enter these areas!
The latest github link features a version for Android.
Incompatible with: BG2EE AI Denoised Areas, BGEE AI Denoised Areas

Bestial Animations
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Galactygon

This very old mod got around the constraint of the game engine, which had a limited number of creature animations it could use. It therefore added numerous animations from the IWD, IWD2 and BG1 games to BG2. However, its highly technical nature (basically, it used the weapons with which creatures were equipped to modify their appearance) made it difficult to use.

The release of Infinity Animations made it completely obsolete.

IWDEE

Team

DavidNYC

Subtledoctor

This little mod makes the visual effects of various spells (particularly abjuration spells such as Spell Deflection and Spell Return, etc.) more uniform, less jarring on the eyes, and more easily identifiable.

Please note: some components require prior installation of Item Revisions and/or Spell Revisions.

BG2EE AI Denoised Areas
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

WillScarlettOhara

This mod greatly improves the graphic quality of the game's areas. The author has subjected all the game's maps (image files) to a graphical enhancement AI, for a more vibrant and much sharper result, especially when using zoom (comparison images are available on the GitHub page or in the mod's thread on the Beamdog forums).

Due to a bug in the game engine, maps with gates and/or water areas show some artifacts (black lines) which will be fixed as this mod is maintained.
Incompatible with: Baldur's Gate Graphical Overhaul, Druid Grove Area Visual Makeover
BG:EE Classic Movies
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Sam

This mod allows you to restore BG's old 3D movies in place of those remade for BG:EE. The films have been enlarged to 1280x720, the same size as the new BG:EE films. The voices in some films will be in English.
BGEE AI Denoised Areas
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

WillScarlettOhara

This mod greatly improves the graphic quality of the game's areas. The author has subjected all the game's maps (the image files) to a graphics enhancement AI, for a more vibrant and much sharper result, especially when using zoom (Comparison images are available on the GitHub page or in the mod's thread on the Beamdog forums).

Due to a bug in the game engine, maps with gates and/or water areas show some artifacts (black lines), which will be fixed as the mod is maintained.
The last link offers an EET-compatible version.
Incompatible with: Baldur's Gate Graphical Overhaul

Multiplies the resolution by x4 for all maps in BG:EE. As it does not directly modify the ARE/WED files, this makes it compatible with the vast majority of mods.

Requires: EEex

The aim of this mod is to improve the visual appeal of the area outside the Druids' Grove, making it more attractive and thematically appropriate.

Incompatible with: BG2EE AI Denoised Areas

Fouler Weather
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Maur'Vir

Alters the fog types and weather patterns for various outdoor areas based on expected biome. Coastal forests should see more storms or fog, while inner forests should get more rain with a lower chance of fog, etc. Desert areas now have 'sand storms' with 'fog' that should match the ground color, and several special areas have appropriate fog as well (i.e. Firewine Bridge, Nyalee's Hideout, etc.)

Requires: Enhanced Edition Fixpack
Freely resizeable combat log for PST:EE

PSTEE

Argent77

This mod resizes the PST:EE battle log in all directions, which could only be resized vertically.
GhostDog's PS:T UI
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

PST

ghostdog

Combined with Widescreen, this mod enables PST to be played at an interface resolution higher than 640x480. To achieve this, it corrects numerous game screens, including the Start menu, character creation screens, journal, inventory, spells and stores, among others, as well as a number of other components, such as the optimized UI bottom bar, in-game tooltips and messages (which now display correctly), dialog and world map. It also increases the size of in-game fonts.

Infinity Animations
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

Team

Erephine

Sam

Miloch

This mod modifies Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal so that it features additional creature and character animations.
Infinity Animations supports the wide variety of animation types in Baldur's Gate I, Baldur's Gate II, Icewind Dale I, Icewind Dale II, Planescape: Torment and Neverwinter Nights. As a bonus, the mod restores all the character animations from Baldur's Gate I, and allows some animations that didn't have one to now have a paperdoll (silhouette in the character screen).
Importantly for players installing several large mods (known as "mega-mods"), Infinity Animations resolves animation slot conflicts (where several mods use the same slots for different animations, and the latest mod installed overwrites changes made by previous mods) and restores the basic animations that mega-mods have modified. Although the number of animations supported is not "infinite", as the mod's name suggests, it should nevertheless be large enough to meet everyone's current (and probably future) needs.

Don't forget to download all animation files and unzip them in the "infinityanimations/content" folder before installing the mod.
IWD2 icons for BG2 spells
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

BGT

500ì›

Link
This Korean mod replaces all BG2 spell icons with IWD2 spell icons.

Map Notes
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

Tutu

Dargor

Link
This mod names all the areas in the game to remedy the well-known problem of BG1Tutu, which displays all areas in the same color, whether or not they have already been visited by the player. Known but inaccessible areas (such as Baldur's Gate at the start of the game) will be displayed in grey, areas not yet visited (discovered by spelling a map) in blue, and visited areas in white. Two optional components allow you to display only cities (mask Ulgoth's Beard, the Festival and the Nashkel Mines. As the player isn't supposed to know about these areas, they'll have to discover them for themselves) or to display all areas (marks all map areas as visited. Strongly discouraged).

Fichier mapnotes_v102.exe.
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Moinesse's Avatars
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

IWD2

Moinesse

This mod replaces certain avatars and paperdolls with those of Moinesse: long-haired elven magicians and druidesses, human priestesses and druidesses, long-haired human fighters, human barbarians, robed human magicians, robed human magicians, male and female ninjas (replacing monks), human thieves, male and female vampires, not forgetting a new paperdoll for half-orcs.

Nostalgia Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Andrea C.

This mod is the equivalent of the One Pixel Productions mod for EE versions. It restores the graphics of the original Baldur's Gate in the EE games:
- character animations, as well as their silhouettes in the character and inventory screens.
- item icons.
- and many other details for BG1 nostalgics.
One Pixel Productions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

IWD

IWD2

Erephine

There's no denying that the graphics of certain items, women in armor and many other elements leave a lot to be desired, and are even uglier (e.g. the half-elf) than on BG1. Undoubtedly the most complete mod in terms of graphical adjustments, 1pp is the fruit of long and ambitious work carried out over almost 8 years, with the aim of offering a refined and more pleasant gaming experience to all those who felt that the graphical elements of Baldur's Gate II left something to be desired compared to those of its predecessor.
This ambitious mod aims to give a facelift (shapes, drawings, colors, graphical bugs...) to all of this in order to make viewing your inventory more pleasant. Updated and simplified in the form of a single installation program, 1ppv4 compiles in a single package the various graphic enhancement components that have accumulated over the years, and includes a number of improvements, notably to flaming swords (short and long), avatars (human, half-orc, elf, halfling, dwarf), shields (targes, rondaches and shields), staff coloring, robes...
Power Action Leprechaun Annah
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

PST

PSTEE

Mr. Spells Madman

These files modify Annah's appearance: she now wears green leather armor, a pixie hat, and is armed with clovers instead of daggers.
The files are to be extracted from the game's override directory.

It is integrated into Qwinn's Planescape: Torment Tweak Pack.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2000. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

Sarevok Animation Patch
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

AionZ

This mod simply corrects the empty animations (two-handed attacks, two-weapon attacks and incantation) of Sarevok's avatar. It's only really useful if you plan to use the animation for a PC or spell-casting character, as the in-game Sarevok never needs these animations.

BUG: When casting spells, Sarevok may occasionally turn slightly in the wrong direction. This is fairly minor and doesn't happen often.

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

Sentrizeal

This collection of mods corrects some creature animations: it corrects the archmage's dress animation files, which were missing two-handed weapon animations. Modifies the in-game appearance of elven rangers (male or female), adding a cape when wearing leather armor. It modifies the appearance of female fighters wearing chain mail and leather fighters (who now wear pants). A component for fighters in plate armor is under development.

Shader Pack: Lighting Adjustments for the Enhanced Editions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Argent77

This mod corrects the lack of brightness adjustment in BG:EE and BG2:EE. It offers some twenty presets from which to choose. Simply reinstall the mod to choose another. The mod's readme also indicates which files to modify in order to adjust the setting to your liking after installation.

Incompatible with: Sharpening filter
Sharpening filter
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Drunktiefling

This mod aims to use more consistent color operations, alternative sharpening and scaling filters via the shader files introduced in BG(2)EE.

Incompatible with: Shader Pack: Lighting Adjustments for the Enhanced Editions
Some Individuals
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

temnix

This little mod randomizes the appearance of certain types of creatures, most of which are encountered in the BG game: bandits, mercenaries of the Flaming Fist, Amnian soldiers, guardians of Candlekeep, ogres, elite goblins, swarmers, kobolds...
As he can't help it, the mod's author also modifies some of their characteristics, such as hit points or alignment; this can cause compatibility problems with other mods.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game; which proves to be wrong in this case: this mod crashes the original games... Install at your own risk.

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

temnix

Makes all snakes move straight ahead instead of waving. What's the point?

Sword Coast Map Labels
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

Miloch

This mini-mod assigns "canon" labels to all the areas in the Baldur's Gate I (Sword Coast) section of the game. If an area has no references in the PnP canon material, the mod will label it Dudleyville. Wherever possible, the labels try to avoid spoilers. See the readme for more information.
A component updates the text on marker stones in the "Dryad Falls" and "Scarlet Leaf Forest" areas to these area labels rather than "Misty Peaks", which actually start a little further south and continue east of Nashkel.
A final component corrects the map labels of saved parts.
Tchos' Planescape: Torment portrait replacement mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PST

Tchos

Link
This mod replaces in-game 3D character portraits with high-quality hand-painted ones, like those in other Infinity Engine games, such as Baldur's Gate and Icewind Dale. These replacements are made wherever they appear in the PC/PNC section of the diary, in the statistics screens and in the inventory paperdolls. Ideally, future versions of this mod will include replacements for the portraits at the bottom of the game screen, as well as replacements for the rest of the recruitable party members, and perhaps more general NPCs.
The Amazing Pocket Wardrobe Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

AionZ

The Amazing Pocket Wardrobe is a mod which allows you to freely customize your character's appearance among all the playable sprites, allowing you to change your visible gender, race, class, armor level, and helmet visibility as you please.

1pp: high quality music for IWD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Erephine

This mod replaces the in-game music with that edited on the original soundtrack CD, in higher quality, at 44.1 kHz. It affects all .acm audio files in the game, including those for the Heart of Winter and Trials of the Luremaster (IWD) extensions.
1pp: high quality music for SoA/ToB
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Erephine

This mod replaces the in-game music with the same, but higher-quality music at 44.1 kHz. It affects all .acm audio files in the game.
1pp: high quality music for Tutu/ToSC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

Erephine

This mod replaces the in-game music with the same, but higher-quality music at 44.1 kHz. It affects all .acm audio files in the game.
1pp: High-Quality Music for BGT
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

pro5

This mod replaces the old, rather convoluted procedure for automatically replacing in-game music in BGT with the same, but better quality, 44.1 kHz music. It affects all .acm audio files in the game.
You need to extract the two 1PP High-Quality Music for Tutu/ToSC and for SoA/ToB packages into your BGT directory WITHOUT installing them, then install this mod.
Its optional component which corrects music tracks in areas requires prior installation of BGTMusic, notably the Integral Music of Baldur's Gate component. This mod must be installed after all mods that add .acm audio files to the game.
Cherry on the cake, a new component restores BG2's main menu theme after the BGT transition.

This mod increases the movement speed of party members wearing boots. Basic boots can be purchased in selected stores to equip party members. This mod also adds hundreds of portraits and voices.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Disable Tooltip rustling sound
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

yummy1

This is a simple one-second blank sound file (16-bit, mono, 22050 Hz), PAPER.WAV, which allows you to suppress/deactivate the opening sound of the paper tooltip that occurs every time you move your mouse over a clickable element. For some, the original rustle can become incredibly annoying and headache-inducing after a few hours.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

BG2EE

Blue

Meet Driel: an erudite, ironic and verbose young lady with steely muscles and a comely sword. This soundset is perfectly suited to the children of Candlekeep, with elegant phrases, a deliciously purring accent and enough daring to make bondage-obsessed mages shudder.

Drows
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Daulmakan

This mod changes the portraits of the group's NPCs to dark elves after Adalon casts a metamorphosis spell on the group. The portrait change will last until she transforms you back or you kill her, or until you are discovered by either Ardulace, the Demon Lord, Phaere or Solaufein. Of course, they'll revert to their original portrayal when you reach the exit from Underdark.

Gerri's NPC Portraits Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

EET

Gerri

Link
No more engaging dialogs with faceless characters! This mod adds portraits to many of the game's NPCs, as well as to those of the main other mods if detected: Ascalon's Breagar, Assassinations, Baldur's Gate Mini Quests and Encounters Modification, The Big Picture, Dark Side of the Sword Coast, Dungeon Crawl, Jan's Quest, Northern Tales of the Sword Coast, Gerri's NPC Portraits Pack, Baldur's Gate Romantic Encounters Modification, Romantic Encounters MOD for Baldur's Gate II, Secret of Bone Hill, The Stone of Askavar, Tales of Anegh, Tales of the Deep Gardens, The Darkest Day (EE-compatible), and many more.

Warning: Although it installs perfectly on EET, the portraits have not been resized to EE format, so their quality may leave you wanting more...

High Quality soundclips for BG2:EE extended content
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Argent77

Since patch v1.3; BG2:EE contains very low-quality English-language sound files for BG2:EE-specific content, including voice files for new NPCs and for the Black Pits campaign.
This mod installs high-quality sound files taken from the original BG2:EE patch v1.2 files. They have been optimized to reduce their size by 60%, by converting stereo to mono and using a 24 kHz sampling rate for all clips. The difference in quality should not be perceptible. It also provides high-quality sound clips for Beamdog NPCs, which have been unavailable since BG2:EE patch v1.2.

Please note: most of these files are in English!

Infinity Sounds
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Team

skellytz

Tash

Formerly Sounds of the Sword Coast, this little mod for Baldur's Gate II restores many of the sound effects used in the original Baldur's Gate game for the simple pleasure of a slightly more complete "BG1 experience" that some players seem nostalgic for.
Some of the restored audio files have been cleaned of audible compression artifacts or any degree of clipping. Original spellcaster voices were particularly affected and often unpleasant to listen to.
Install it after any other mod that modifies spells.

Jaheira Recast
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AstroBryGuy

As Heidi Shannon (the original voice of Jaheira) was not available for Siege of Dragonspear, Beamdog had initially chosen a new actress for the role. In the end, they decided that the new actress' voice didn't work and left Jaheira's lines voiceless and with her original BG1 soundset. However, most of Jaheira's vocal lines and almost all of her soundset are included in the SoD files. This mod reconnects these files to the dialog lines and updates Jaheira's soundset. It comprises four components:
- Restoring the new SoD soundset.
- Using BG1 and BG2 soundsets: this component retains the original BG1 soundset, but supplements it with BG2 sounds for sounds missing from the BG1 soundset (e.g. the "SPELL_FAILED" sound).
- Dialogue voices: this component adds the voice lines available in Jaheira's dialogs (approx. 100 lines of dialogue/banter).
- Give Jaheira her BG2 portrait for BG:EE and SoD.

Blue

You've thought Jasper St. Baird was great ever since he helped your party get out of the Irenicus dungeon in record time in Dungeon-Be-Gone. Now Baird lets you enjoy his incredible power, charm and wit throughout the game!

IWDEE

Layna

This is a mod with a custom voice pack using the author's voice. She was inspired by a few of the voice packs she found online, particularly 'Red', and by one of the default Neverwinter Nights Female voices. It's intended for a female character, possibly a Mage, Sorceress, Archer, Rogue, or whoever else you think it suits.
Modification des thÃ¨mes musicaux d'IWD et IWD2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜¡

IWD

IWD2

Luren

Link
Luren has adapted music from Settlers V (thanks to their creator: Michael Pummel) to replace that of Icewind Dale, as he has never really liked the game's launch music, which he finds too aggressive or stressful, and doesn't allow you to immerse yourself in the game like a good adventure game.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

NiGHTMARE's NPC Beautification
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

NiGHTMARE

This mod installation provides alternative portraits for every recruitable NPC in Baldur's Gate II. A component allows them to be installed as player portraits on any Infinity Engine game (except PsT and PsT:EE).
In the words of the author: "All the NPCs have undergone plastic surgery, and all their wrinkles, spots, warts, scars have disappeared! Some characters have chosen to completely remove their tattoos. Oh, and the surgeons managed to rid Sarevok of his strange glowing eyes! Some characters benefited more than others. Jan, for example, has had a good 20 years removed, and the semi-orc player's portrait now looks a lot less repulsive."
No Battle Music
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

PST

Platter

This little mod removes all in-game battle music, except for the final battle.

Warning: this is an override mod, so you'll need to read the readme carefully.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Luren

Link
This mod features new french voice packs available to players in IWD and IWD2. The author has recovered and reworked those from various NPCs from Baldur's Gate (Aerie, Cernd, Jaheira, Jan and Minsc) and Neverwinter Nights 2 (Neeshka - Thief, Qara - Wizard, Bishop - Ranger, Khelgar - Dwarf), in order to expand the choice.
The installation procedure for these packs is available on the download link.

NPC Damage
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

SConrad

This graphic mod is inspired by Planescape Torment, and modifies your companions' portraits as they take damage. Modifications are made in increments of 25% of each NPC's total HP, and only apply to Bioware NPCs.

Portraits Portraits Everywhere
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Smeagolheart

bob_veng

Like the Gerri's NPC Portraits Pack and Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification mods, this mod assigns a portrait to each NPC involved in a dialog in the EE games (4617 in total!) An optional component allows you to assign portraits from a pool of random portraits to actors to whom the main component has not assigned specific portraits, essentially creatures with generic names. For example, human characters named "Thief" will get portraits from the male or female Thief pool. There are over ninety random portrait pools ranging from a few portraits to over 20.
Note: this mod brings together the series of "Minor NPC Portraits" mods for each game.

Replacement sounds for the interface
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

It's a collection of sound files designed to improve some of the game's ambient sounds, such as menu selection "clicks", level crossing sounds, tooltips, gold gathering, item equipping, music heard when approaching taverns, etc.
As it's not possible to uninstall this one, and it was primarily developed for BG:EE, install at your own risk.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case...
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
RoorenArt's Portrait Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

RoorenArt

This is a collection of 47 portraits for the NPCs of Baldur's Gate and Baldur's Gate II, original and improved editions, including an alternative portrait for Edwin when he's cursed. You can see a preview of these portraits on DeviantArt. A component allows them to be installed as player portraits on any Infinity Engine game (except PsT and PsT:EE). These portraits were created by RoorenArt, whose work can be followed on DeviantArt or on her website roorenart.com, where she also accepts commissions.

the bigg

This is a collection of portraits and sounds taken from characters in Valve games:
- Alyx Vance (from Half Life 2): a twenty-something girl with a strong character and a strong head.
- Jane Doe "The Soldier" (from Team Fortress 2): a thirty-something man, obsessed with fighting and chaotic neutral.
- The Heavy weapons guy (from Team Fortress 2): a chaotic good man who loves laughter, sandwiches, boxing and Gatling guns.

BG2EE

EET

Utopolyst

This mod installation features over 500 high-resolution portraits for both recruitable and non-recruitable NPCs in BG:EE and BG2:EE, including some for characters from mods such as Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification, Rogue Rebalancing, The White Queen, Tales of the Deep Gardens, Innershade... Because some portraits are not faithful to history, a collection of alternative portraits can replace them.

Use the Nexus download link as a priority, and choose the WeiDU version of the mod.

K'aeloree

This mod installs 12 professional-quality portraits replacing those of existing NPCs: Aerie, Ajantis, Anomen, Branwen, Cernd, Coran, Edwin, Haer'Dalis, Imoen, Safana, Xan and Yoshimo.
