A Fowl Wish
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Glittergear

A mageâ€™s apprentice accidentally give a Candle of Limited Wish to a noble to use at his pet chickenâ€™s birthday party! Itâ€™s up to Charname to get the candle back before the candle is used. Who knows what the bird would Wish for, and what havoc the magic would cause?
Crash a chicken's birthday party! Stop the Wish of a feathered biped! Get a candle of Limited Wish--use it yourself, or don't!

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Adalon's Blood
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Gandalf the white

jastey

Link
This mini-mod allows mainly good-aligned players to complete the Bridge District Murders quest without having to kill Adalon to recover his blood. Players of bad alignment can also try their luck: they will then have a small chance of fooling the silver dragon. Armed with the blood, it will now be possible to flush out the tanner's sponsors and clean the armor in a temple.

CBisson

This mini-mod is nothing but a joke. It lets you meet and chat with a legendary band, The Beatles. You'll find them in the Five Flagons Inn.
Ajoc's Mini Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Ajoc

Originally created for Baldur's Gate 2 with the mod The Darkest Day (EE-compatible), this mod has been rewritten so as not to require The Darkest Day. It adds new content: quests (some of them very short), monsters, items and new areas.
Alabaster Sands
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Alabaster Sands is a small quest mod from the Athkatlan Grounds quest mod series, which adds new areas and quests to Shadow of Amn's main city location. There is one main quest, and a few smaller ones, all oriented around the titular area, which is nothing else but Athkatla's public beach. So visit the place, help those you'll meet there, and see this brand new part of the City of Coin.
The mod adds 7 new quests that introduce new characters, items, and item graphics.
Almateria's Enhanced Smaller Locations
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Almateria

This little mod adds abandoned and unused locations while maintaining a kind of cohesion with the story. Basically, Unfinished Business, but much smaller:
- Aran Linvail's realistic checkroom: the cloak ramps are now filled with various assortments of cloaks, mostly suitable for thieves. Loot is completely random, so good luck getting the best result! Restored tent in Trademeet: a new tent is open to visitors! Located near the caravan, its contents are well worth a look.
- Kiser's bedroom restored: a guest bedroom has been added to Kiser's house, present but not used in the game. The stairs to the bedroom are located to the east of the entrance, behind the wall.

Note that much of its content has been integrated into Almateria's Quest 2 and Almateria's tweaks by the same author.
This mod has disappeared from https://almrep.blogspot.com/p/almaterias-enhanced-smaller-locations.html
Almateria's Quest 2
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Almateria

A great adventure awaits you! Kill slimes, slay dragons, plunder ancient shrines, win women... Or finish the game itself. Which will it be? The messenger who initiates the quest can be found in the government quarter, near the door at the bottom of the map (only in chapter 3).
In the author's own opinion, he's not a serious mod. No doubt that's why she took it off the net...

This mod has disappeared from https://almrep.blogspot.com/p/almaquest-2.html.

This mod offers two new options to the traditional choice of helping the Shadow Thieves or Valen's mistress. The player can opt for a group to which the paladins won't even object. The 2nd option is to ignore these 3 paths and set sail for Maztica.
Another Fine Hell for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

jastey

This mod introduces a new reason why the PJ falls into disgrace at the end of SoD and has to leave town.

Please note: this mod is in alpha and does not yet include content for BGII. The SoD game is over. In a later version, it will be possible to complete a quest given by the Dukes of Baldur's Gate in order to obtain our redemption - and help the Sword Coast rid itself of the constant threat of the Nine Hells.
Ardenor's True Power
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

Ipsissimus

This silly little mod adds some dialogue to the Bandit Camp. The author recommend that you move one party member near the Gnoll Cave and one near Taugosz. After that, you must talk to Ardenor four times for the storyline to play out.
Arszyk's Wonderful Decay
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

Arszyk is a neutral evil fighter/druid, a vampire that was sent to Icewind Dale to find a lost artifact, but meanwhile, got into some trouble and needs a hand if he's to resume his search. He comes with a few talks, interjections, items, a druid kit (Decay Overseer, also included in Of Paths and Ways released by the same author).
You may flirt with Arszyk, but the mod does not include a fully fledged romance.

This mod is still in progress.
Ascalon's Questpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Team

Ascalon

White Agnus

jastey

Link
Also called "Abbathor's Serpents Part 1 and Other Stories", this mod brings together several of Ascalon's ideas for adding quests or side stories that run parallel to the story of Bhaal's child in BG and BGII: 10 quests of different sizes. Some are humorous, others a little more tragic. Some are riddles, others are combat-related. Some require diplomatic skills, others can only be solved by certain races or classes.
Ascension
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

David Gaider

Shawne

JediMindTrix

Turambar

ALIENQuake

DawidW

Wes Weimer

Cuv

White Agnus

Miloch

agb1

This mod created by the ToB's main designer, assisted by enthusiasts from an American forum, which was then converted to WeiDU by Weimer, the latter ensuring compatibility. He changes many things in ToB: every battle with Bhaal's children is much more difficult, Bhaal's new powers are included too, Demogorgon has become a fearsome monster once more, and above all there's a completely remodeled final battle. You can enlist either Balthazar or Bodhi to fight AmÃ©lissane. AmÃ©lissane is a fearsome war machine. At her side, the Hand. Yes, the 5 children of Bhaal (except Balthazar, if you've recruited him), Yaga, Abazigal, Sendai and Illasera, are all here to fight alongside Amelyssane, and at a higher level than their original versions. Before this fight, you'll get a taste of the challenge when you take on Bohdi and Irenicus, who are fully boosted, of course, and will no doubt cause you quite a few problems.

Incompatible with: Wheels of Prophecy

Want to bring out the darkest side of your murder god's child? This mod is for you! With a dozen new quests designed to test your skills as a cold-blooded killer, you'll have everything you need to satisfy your most sinister sneak attack urges... You'll also have the option, for male characters, of romancing Lynn, a thief who will commission you to carry out your missions...
Au service d'Oghma

Thot has developed a nice little mod that adds a quest, given by a monk from the Temple of Oghma, to the Docks.

Auril's Bane
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Chosen of Mystra Mod Group

This huge mod combines the two former Project Auril and Winter's Bane mods. It adds a host of items, spells and creatures, a few quests and new features and fixes.
Avoid its IWD Fix by Grog component in favor of Icewind Dale Fixpack. The main component also has its own version of the quest The Voice of Durdel Anatha, which makes it incompatible with the Unfinished Business for Icewind Dale mod component of the same name.

Warning: Unfortunately, it overwrites more or less everything it touches, which means that it deletes many modifications to mods installed before it. So you need to install it first, even before the fixpack.
Requires: Trials of the Luremaster (IWD)

The mod begins in chapter 6 when a messenger intercepts you near the Adventurer Mart. You'll have to accompany a hooded mage to help him rescue another victim of Irenicus' experiments. The mod features additional content for Imoen and for the Xan NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate II mod.
Baldur's Gate Mini Quests and Encounters Modification
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

jastey

Link
This mini-mod adds 17 small quests to the game to spice up the adventure. They'll introduce you to the finer points of adventurous life, including babysitting! A revised version of Slime Quest, offering a small quest in Beregost, is included in this mod. According to the author, these quests add between 30 and 60 minutes to the game's length.
Install it before Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification to benefit from all its options.

oBG1 compatibility without TotSC is no longer guaranteed since v28.
Must be installed before The BG1NPC Project.
Baldur's Gate Romantic Encounters Modification
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

SoD

EET

Team

jastey

berelinde

Kulyok

Lava Del'Vortel

Thimblerig

Twani

If you're unsatisfied with the interactions available in BG1 this mod should satisfy you. It's the counterpart to its namesake, the Romantic Encounters MOD for Baldur's Gate II, and adds numerous possibilities for fleeting or more intense romance with non-recruitable characters in the game, for both men and women, sometimes with mini-quests thrown in for good measure. Please note: part of this mod is adult content.

Incompatible with: Corthala Romantique

bucketfulofsunshine

Below & Below Inn
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new place to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition - Below & Below Inn. Are you looking for a place to rest between the battles? Or perhaps you need some nice new items? Or maybe its work is what you actually need? It's all there!
To visit the new place, talk to the writer in Kuldahar. He'll inform you where you should look for Below & Below Inn. He should be there, waiting for you to speak with him.
BG1 NPC in SoA&ToB
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Smiling Imp

Arcanecoast Team

This ambitious mod adds a new area in Athkatla (Water Gardens) where all the rich and famous people of Athkatla gather. What do they do there? Chatting, relaxing and drinking. Thousands of lines of dialog that change with every conversation. Variations depending on the time of day (or night). This mod also allows modders to add components for NPCs from BG1 themselves, with new lines and sometimes even new quests or romances between them. There are also a few surprises.

This mod must be installed AFTER other mods containing these same NPCs.
BG1 Unfinished Business
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

Team

Icelus

SimDing0

Ascension64

SixOfSpades

devSin

Idobek

CamDawg

Dudley

Like the mod of the same name for Baldur's Gate II, this mod fills a number of gaps or unfinished elements in the original game. It reintroduces a number of quests, items and characters that were in the original game, but were either unused or unfinished (in particular, the reactions of recruitable characters). These include the second level of BG1's Ice Island, making Branwen recognize Tranzig, giving a use to the mysterious potion found in the mines, and so on. It also fixes a number of bugs.

Il doit Ãªtre installÃ© avant Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
Black Hearts
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

AWizardDidIt

Black Hearts is a quest mod for BG:EE and SoD that follows a storyline involving a character from Throne of Bhaal: Illasera, and a Red Wizard storyline involving a dangerous new ally who has joined Sarevok's cause. This mod repurposes fights from the Black Pits module, using those as a basis for various objectives given to players for the questline (with some modifications to them in many cases).
A second plot unfolds in SoD, as the Player pursues Caelar Argent's Shining Crusade, they uncover the trail of Sarevok as he sought new information about his lineage and the power of the Deathbringer. Accompany Sarevok's former allies as you uncover the legacy of Bhaal and the dark forces manipulating his children.

Black Hearts must be installed before Brandock the Mage and Worldmap.
Black Hearts BG1
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AWizardDidIt

Black Hearts is a quest mod for BG:EE that follows a storyline involving a character from Throne of Bhaal: Illasera, and a Red Wizard storyline involving a dangerous new ally who has joined Sarevok's cause. This mod repurposes fights from the Black Pits module, using those as a basis for various objectives given to players for the questline (with some modifications to them in many cases).

Included in Black Hearts by the same author.

AWizardDidIt

Black Pits in BGEE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Subtledoctor

Go to the Black Pits during the BG1 campaign, for BGEE, SoD and EET.

This mod adds a few lines of dialog when you first meet Baeloth in BGEE.

If you choose one of the new lines of dialog, then the story changes; Baeloth is on the surface for a recruitment campaign, looking for a group of heroes

It's highly recommended not to go to the Black Pits before level 5, or even level 7. The final battles can be particularly difficult.

Important note:
Because the mod necessarily changes the timing and story, Baeloth will not be able to join your party if you decide to go to the Black Pits.
It will therefore disappear from the BG1 campaign and will not be able to join Charname in the Siege of Dragonspear campaign, nor will M'Khiin the goblin shaman.

Blood And Faith
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

EET

Glittergear

Too often, criminals get away with their misdeeds for one reason or another. A certain Lathanderite cleric wants to change that, but she needs your help. This is a tale of blood and faith, a tale of damnation... or of redemption. A mod containing 14 quests.

Note that the mod was originally called Errant Justice.
Bridge's Block
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This project adds two interior areas inside the great wall that's part of the Bridge District. From now on, you may enter that massive block and see what's inside. There you'll be able to meet new characters and see what they're up to. You'll also be able to take a new job - an investigation, as the Block's caretaker believes she saw a strange monster roaming the halls. Is that true, or was it only a figment of her imagination?
The mod adds 4 new quests, 2 new medium-sized areas, and a few new items and spells.

Candlekeep Revisited
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AionZ

This mod adds content to the often considered tedious prologue of the first Baldur's Gate, adding "new" NPCs, longer dialogs with Gorion and your childhood acquaintances, the option for Imoen to join you on your last wander around Candlekeep, as well as many, many extra scenes, including a starting sequence based on your main character's class with various starting bonuses.

Some components are incompatible with the Reflections of Destiny, an SoD Remix Mod.
Check the Bodies
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

CBisson

Hoppy

Weigo

King Diamond

Ikki

This mod adds countless quests (24, some of them quite long) plus new class quests. New maps (15 + 160 modified), new items, new recipes for Cromwell, a new city to explore (Hlondeth), a new character to recruit (Rynn, human fighter).... In short, it's mouth-watering. The adventure begins in Candlekeep, and after a few chores, you'll become more powerful and continue the normal course of BG2, while having many quests and encounters to do.
The new version includes the add-on modules Candlekeep Chores (tutorial) and Candlekeep Chores Fast Forward.

Requires: ToB, Worldmap
Incompatible with: Dead Gardens
Cloakwood Squares
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Jason Compton

This mod is inspired by two fanfics by the author. It features a long, funny, "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?" skit featuring the game's NPCs: Keldorn as Jean-Pierre Foucault, Salvanas, Viconia, Imoen, Korgan... and many others. To attend this show, you'll need to meet a certain Caffrey near the Copper Coronet.

Critter Parts
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Shadowhawk

This mod allows you to collect items from the corpses of wild animals you encounter (bears, dogs, wolves, spiders...): meat, skins, bones that can be resold or consumed. In addition, a quest has been added for a new NPC to craft a suit of armor. In Cloakwood, another NPC is interested in spider remains.

EET

Duality

This mini-mod adds an extra encounter in the Umar Hills in Chapter 6. This is merely the pretext for a rather difficult battle against enemies of levels 15 to 20 and very well equipped. The author has provided 3 levels of difficulty: easy (already hard enough), difficult and downright insane.
Dark Horizons
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

CoM_Solaufein

Link
A powerful organization, known as 'The Section', is hunting you for reasons known only to them. They will stop at nothing to achieve their ends. They have numerous agents and influential associates throughout FaerÃ»n. Stop their leaders for the good of the Sword Coast.
This mod adds a large quest, 3 new NPCs with a few personal quests, several encounters (hostile and otherwise) and side quests, stores and new areas to explore. The former BG1 Adventure Pack and BG1 CoM Forge - Item Upgrade mods are now part of Dark Horizons.

Please note: there are several versions of the mod specific to your game: BG+TotSC, Tutu, BGT and BG:EE. Choose the one that suits you best, and TotSC is required in all cases.
Choose the github link for the EE version.
Fichier dark-horizons-3.01.zip.
Dark Side of the Sword Coast
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

Team

Sir BillyBob

Erebusant

Turambar

K4thos

jastey

Dark Side of the Sword Coast is a mod for Baldur's Gate + Tales of the Sword Coast. It adds 5 quests (more or less important) featuring new areas, new monsters (undead in particular) and 9 new recruitable characters. It also adds new spells and items scattered throughout the game, either on existing opponents, on new characters, or in stores or locations.
The BG1 (v106) version is translated into French, the BG:EE (v102) version of Red Carnelian is not.

Please note: BG, BG:EE, BGT and EET are available in separate download versions. Make sure you download the right version!
Unfortunately, when installing the BG1 version, French is no longer available...
Dark Tidings
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Acifer

Link
For thousands of years, the magical beacon of the lighthouse on Irphong has guided sailors through the Asavir Channel... Until now... Rumors have long circulated that the island is a haven for pirates, that the surrounding area is a refuge for terrible dragon turtles, and that the shallows are home to krakens.

Well! There's only one way to uncover the mystery of the Irphong lighthouse and the origin of the darkness that reigns now that its beacon has gone out: Sail to Irphong.
The adventure begins in Athkatlaâ€™s Docks District, in the tavern Sea's Bounty.
Dead Gardens
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Glittergear

An archdruid died but rose again as an undead creature. He is unable to move on due to his greatest regret in life: he saved three children from being sacrificed to Malar. He regrets (1) his interference and (2) the fact that two of the three children grew up to be terrible people. Help the undead archdruid find peace.... one way or another.

Incompatible with: Check the Bodies, Tashia NPC

This teaser contains Aurora's assistants Tomthal and Karaea, as well as a number of items that can be found at random in the game. In addition, you can meet other svirfneblin who have managed to reach the surface. And, of course, Aurora the trader herself.

This version is the one modified and adapted for EET by Roxanne.

The mod adds a new Detective Guild building in the Slums area, which can become an additional stronghold for a player of any class - if he manages to save the guild from bankruptcy in two weeks of game time. Created by the eccentric wizard Adelard the Wanderer. The quest will begin after meeting an unusual new character in the Council of Six building in the Government District.

Ding0's Quest Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

SimDing0

Wisp

This SimDing0 mod not only adds a multitude of small quests, but also modifies the AI of certain monsters, adding certain abilities (for example, mummies can now cast a kind of stun blast on you... gnark). You'll also be able to make other choices in existing quests, such as betraying Edwin, or even Renal Bloodscalp himself... at your peril.

Warning: the component New Fate for Dryad Acorns prevents access to the Firkraag dungeon until the quest has been resolved.
The latest versions include the old mod Kensai Ryu's Restored Drow Innates Abilities.

Badgert

This mod adds a new, rather difficult quest: Talk to the Utterly Insane Person in the Adventurer Mart. He will tell you a riddle, the answer will lead you to a pack of really tough battles. Those who survive will get the reward.

For an EE / EET-compatible version with integrated French, take a look at the Github version.

pro5

Erebusant

Drizzt is on his way back from the Sword Coast to the Vale of Bise. What he doesn't know is that dark times lie ahead in the Valley, and his companions will lead him, and you, on an adventure of epic proportions.
This mod features a major quest, alongside the famous character of R.A. Salvatore, which begins the moment you meet him in the game. This adventure takes place in new areas inspired by Icewind Dale, and includes numerous side quests, new monsters, new spells and equipment...
There are two versions: one for ToSC, the other for BG1tutu, BGT and BG:EE.

It must be installed before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.

A bit of humor in this brutal world seems to be the philosophy of this mod, which adds a few quests as well as new maps, apparently filled with adventurers more like "Naheulbeuk" than "Lancelot"! The mod works without Throne of Bhaal and is adapted from the US-famous comic strip of the same name.

This mod makes you fight a lot of golems, so be sure to bring blunt weapons if you don't want to end up in a pulp...

Eilistraee's Song
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

A quest mod for BG2, which triggers if you decide to spare Solaufein's life and let him escape from Ust Natha. He'll thank you after your escape from Ust Natha, and tell you about a new location, where you can ask for help in getting your soul back... The mod includes 6 new areas, 21 new items and obviously some new quests - it's up to you if you want to complete them or focus on the main quests and getting your soul back.

BG2

BGT

L`f

Link Link Link
Sometimes called The Sovereign's Song, this mod adds more than 40 new cinematics and dialogs. One night, you have a nightmare and dream of a man who wants to make a deal with you. The next morning, you wake up in bed with a parchment in your hand... This unusual story will take you from the dungeon of Irenicus to ToB.

Please note: this mod is not compatible with The Tweaks Anthology's Cinematics and Dreams from Chapters 1 and 2 Accelerated component due to its extensive use of cinematics.

Fading Promises
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

berelinde

jastey

"A grieving soul haunts the graveyard of Athkatla... Paladin mowed down by too much casualness, Aidan is doomed to wander between life and death until his ultimate quest finds resolution... Will you be selfless enough to come to his aid? "
This mod introduces Aidan, a fallen paladin from Amaunator, who has some serious issues for you to consider. One is that he's dead... and the other that he never managed to complete his last quest. Help him, and who knows? Maybe you'll instill in him the courage to face the judgment he's so often avoided.
Fading Promises is a dialog-driven mod. If you like conversations about the meaning of life, death and honor (and aren't allergic to paladins), don't hesitate to download it!
Fishing for Trouble
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Team

Yovaneth

abg1

Elminster himself assigns you to investigate the disappearance of the inhabitants of a village south of Athkatla. You set off immediately and come face-to-face with a demon who has taken up residence in the village's lighthouse. He promises to enlighten you in return for a small favor. Thus begins your adventure, announced as anything but linear, which will take you through 100 new maps (including 5 major ones) on the trail of new quests, in which you'll come across over 200 NPCs, 17 stores, 4 cutscenes... a mod to renew the BG2 experience.
Foundling: Between the Shades
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Cold and calculating, Foundling is a slave of Thaxll'ssillvia, the Shadow Dragon, who wants to free himself from his influence. He can never oppose his master on his own, but everything can change thanks to the influence of the Bhaalspawn. He's an adept of shadow magic who can't cast traditional mage spells, but has a whole range of alternatives at his disposal and he has his own HLA. The mod introduces new characters, areas, music, items, soundset etc. His quest begins as soon as his master dies.
STR 14, DEX 17, CON 11, INT 17, WIS 11, CHA 7.

ISNF is a quest mod from the Colours of Infinity mod series. This Baldur's Gate 2 mod allows you to work with Orion - a mage who has lost the sense of his life. Either help him regain what he lost or let him die without the faintest ray of hope.
This may be an excellent way to earn the money you need to advance in the game. The quest starts in the Government District.
Improved Anvil
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

el.critto

Contrary to what its name might suggest, this is essentially a mod that drastically increases the difficulty of the base game. It also features new quests, new profiles (including the Auramaster Druid Kit and the RiskBreaker), a randomizer, a new recruitable character (Sibel), and the ability to forge many items that are big-budget, but necessary to defeat equally big-budget enemies.

The mod exists in two versions: one for the original versions, the other for the EE versions.
Incompatible with: BG2 FixPack

Who wants to protect her friends, even after they've passed on. She'll only join you once she's sure her friends are safe and that nothing bad will happen to them while she's helping you. She has a series of talks, her own kit and abilities... and under the right circumstances, she may feel a connection to a male Child of Bhaal. The conditions, though, demand a certain change.

Lava Del'Vortel

After Tales of the Deep Gardens, Lava is back with a new opus in the Colours of Infinity series. Follow a path between the trees to find a very new village to visit: the village of Innershade. It's been having some problems lately: some people disappeared, and the attacker was never seen. You must stop the guilty party, if you can. Solving the problem may be not enough; getting rid of the attacker is only one of the ways to handle this. The second is understanding the motives and past that became a great burden. In the end, you may have to become a judge of sorts.

Team

Kasumi

You never fail to include Jan Jansen in your group. You enjoy his witty retorts, but his personal quest leaves you wanting more. Jan's Quest Extension offers a sequel to this original quest, in the form of two very short missions featuring typical dialogues and unexpected encounters with new secondary characters. In the background, the mod modestly attempts to shed new light on some of the city's most influential organizations.
Discover the end of the story without needing to start a new game. As the mod's difficulty is suitable for low-level characters, we still recommend that you enjoy it on a game that's not too advanced.
The mod includes 2 new missions that can be done in any order, and 2 new Jan stories.

Another version is available (Extension de la quÃªte de Jan remixÃ©e).
A version without a .bat file is available via this link, making it possible to install it on mobile phones and tablets.

This pack brings together several older mods converted to WeiDU format and offered as stand-alone components:
- Masamune sword mini-mini-quest (from ShadowDaemon): a small quest that stretches all the way to ToB will allow you to forge a hellish sword.
- Improved Anarg (from knightlight): Anarg, leader of the Fallen Paladins, has a helmet that makes him immune to many effects, making him tougher to neutralize. But the reward will be worth the risks taken...
- Extended Ionic Stone animations (from WoRm): Ionic stones added by many mods will benefit from stone animations revolving around their owner's head.
- Plus other comfort components...

Menace sur le Royaume de Diamant Ã‰ternel
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Freddy_Gwendo

You've all loved Excalibur, but have you ever wondered why the only women in it are evil? Guinevere the adulteress, Morgana the villain... Why are the Paladin Orders made up entirely of men? And what if all this is just a fable told by men to conceal the truth? This mod attempts to re-establish the truth, or at least ITS TRUTH... The adventure takes place in another dimension, in the Kingdom of Eternal Diamond, ruled by a family of paladins who are trying to overthrow a renegade paladin. The latter has made a rather special pact with some very peculiar "forces"... The Kingdom's wealth comes from its mines, and its power from the protection it has always enjoyed from Diamantor, the ("Half"?) Silver Dragon God. Here, we'll be fighting Dragons - among others - and giving them back their rightful place and many of their destructive powers...

The project is currently on stand-by.
This mod is still in progress.

Redemption
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

ladydorotea

Link
This mod is in fact a complement to Ascension and allows you to modify ToB's finale, making Jon Irenicus' redemption possible. Another unexpected facet of the mod is the appearance of your old enemy, Demogorgon, the Prince of Demons. He'll pose you a few riddles, before engaging in a new battle that it seems possible to avoid while humiliating his majesty. These riddles are largely inspired by Raymond Smullyan's books (Satan, Cantor and The Riddles of Scheherazade).

Requires: ToB, Ascension
Incompatible with: The Longer Road
Reflections of Destiny, an SoD Remix Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Subtledoctor

This mod is designed to modify, enhance and sometimes move different parts of the Siege of Dragonspear campaign - and the parts of BG1 just before and BG2 just after. The first two components focus on the final chapter of the BG1 campaign, starting with Sarevok's coronation scene. In the base game, you're teleported to the final encounter, and that's it - game over. Here, more interaction with NPCs is added, and time is allowed to complete quests in progress.

The main idea revolves around the rescue of Drizzt and his companions, and his final confrontation with Artemis Entreri. If you're of the wrong alignment, you can betray Drizzt and join forces with Entreri.

Restored Rhynn Lanthorn Quest
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Gibberlings3

This tiny mod restores the extended Rhynn Lanthorn search from the Baldur's Gate II beta, which contained a mechanism for expanding chapter 6 (the one where you search for Rhynn's Lanthorn). In addition to the Lanthorn itself, the thief stole several lenses and hid them in various areas of the game. The player was given clues as to their location and had to retrieve them before being able to use the Lanthorn to access Chapter 7. The lenses were actually placed in several of the fortress quests the player can explore in Chapter 2 (and if the player had already done all these quests, no lenses would be placed).
This extended quest was removed from Baldur's Gate II before its release (in all likelihood, because the clues leading to the objectives were a little too gnomic for casual players, and there was no time to fill in the details). But as almost the entire quest mechanism is still present in the game - the scripts that place the lenses, the lenses themselves, and even the lines of dialog that give clues to their locations - it was therefore possible to reconstruct almost exactly how it worked.
There are two installation options. The first ("classic") restores almost exactly how the original version of the quest would have played out. The second ("extended") increases the number of locations where lenses can be found, to include four additional side-quest regions in the original game that are not linked to a fortress quest. You can also customize the installation (via the dw_lanthorn.ini file in the mod folder) to deselect any lens locations you don't want to use.

This mod is by nature incompatible with the Oversight mod component, which also restore this quest, but in a totally different way.
Incompatible with: The Broken Lanthorn
Sandrah Saga I - Sandrah Appears
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Roxanne

This is a huge project designed for EET. If you like Mary Sue, then this is the mod for you. A young fighter-priestess of Mystra, originally from Waterdeep, Sandrah is the daughter of a famous figure in the Kingdoms, who emerges from her father's powerful shadow to make a name for herself and also to discover the hidden part of her family history. The plot unfolds as the PC discovers who he/she is. But make no mistake, your character's story takes a back seat to Sandrah's! The Saga is divided into three parts:- Sandrah NPC: recruitable NPCs and their link to the game's original plot, from Candlekeep to ToB.
- Sandrah RtF (Return to Faerun) continues the saga of the child of Bhaal and Sandrah, with a new plot, new and old companions, new and old areas, new and old enemies, and more.
- Sandrah ToT (Time of Troubles Revisited) is an option that lets you continue the game after RtF, while taking you back to the time before the other events. You become a witness to the events leading up to your birth in Baldur's Gate.
And finally, the icing on the cake! Sandrah Saga requires a full installation of EET with all the "big mods". Or more precisely, the version of the mega mods whose scenarios have been modified by the author to suit her heroine's story. In short, a megalomaniac mod in the extreme...

Alternative portraits are proposed in Sandrah Alternative Portrait.
Sandrah Saga II - Return to Faerun
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Roxanne

Second part of Sandrah Saga I - Sandrah Appears.
Sandrah Saga III - Time of Troubles Revisited
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Roxanne

Third and last part of Sandrah Saga I - Sandrah Appears.
Secret of Bone Hill
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

Team

Sir BillyBob

Erebusant

What is Secret of Bone Hill? Well, it's a big quest mod for BG1 (BGT required) which adapts two paper role-playing scenarios: L1 and L2 in the Greyhawk universe. The story itself takes place on the island of Lendore, near the town of Restenford. Pelltar, a mage you meet in Lathander's temple in chapter 4 (as soon as you've finished the Nashkel mines and can get to the bandits' camp), will be able to teleport you there and get you out, once you've helped the village.
The 1st part is prerequisite to unlock the 2nd, which you can reach after exiting the catacombs of Candlekeep. There you'll meet Fabio (a human bard) or Pelltar, who will ask you to return to Restenford with them, this time to solve a mysterious murder...

But don't be fooled by the quests, which require a great deal of thought.
The athkatla offers a fix.
Requires: Worldmap
Secret of Bone Hill EET
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Team

Sir BillyBob

Erebusant

EET-compatible version of mod Secret of Bone Hill.

Requires: Worldmap
Incompatible with: Framed

SoD

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds no less than 36 new quests and encounters to BG, making most of the areas you know well, and often lack interest in, even more interesting. This creates a chance for new stories to appear. That is the main purpose of this mod: to add new stories, new characters, new items, and many new chances for your party to show what they are capable of.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Shadows of Amn extended
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

AionZ

A episodic mod project to expand upon the ending of Baldurâ€™s Gate: Shadows of Amn, starting with a playable post-game, with intentions of adding a full-fledged interlude to have a better bridge between Shadows of Amn and Throne of Bhaal, featuring the elves of Suldanessellar, certain familiar faces, and a new antagonist.
Book I - Quiet Before the Storm: Irenicus is defeated. Peace has returned to Suldanessellar, and life appears to be moving forwards. At the request of the elven high priestess, the Bhaalspawn and company have remained within the elven city as saviours and honoured guests as the citizens prepare for the Festival of the Bloom, a ceremony to restore the broken spirits of the people.
Book II - Festival of the Bloom: work in progress.

This mod is still in progress.
Shadows over Soubar

BG2EE

EET

CBisson

This mod is quite gigantic and greatly modifies the story of SoA. It adds 4 new NPCs, 1 new profile, 1 new dungeon, 100 new maps, 400 new creatures, 400 new items, 20 new stores (merchants), 30 sub-quests and 2 major quests.
Shards of Ice
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Icelus

CamDawg

This mod comprises three components, including two fun new quests. The first quest, entitled The Price of Friendship, takes place in Trademeet. To trigger it, you'll need to rest at the town inn with Imoen in your party. Your half-sister disappears at the end of the night, and it's up to you to find her. The second quest, entitled Some of my best friends are Slimes, takes place in the forest of Tethyr. There, you'll have a surprising encounter with a woman who seems very fond of vases, and who will entrust you with a quest. The final component is called You could restore the Summon Cow spell, but why?. This is an in-game version of the Summon Cow spell, available from a new store in Athkatla.
Shine On Caelar
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Roxanne

Caelar Argent is an original character from SoD (Siege of Dragonspear), whose story ends with the SoD part of Baldur's Gate and whose interactions and possible solutions for the player in the original game are limited. The mod consists of two parts, one for SoD and a second for ToB (the second part is only available for EET and requires her to have survived the first encounter).

Incompatible with: Caelar's Fall

Skie: The Cost of One Girl's Soul
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

A new Skie mod from Lava. Siege of Dragonspear has given Entar Silvershield's daughter a very important role in the plot, and this mod gives the player the chance to pursue her in the BG2 part of the game. It comprises three components:
- A new quest for BG2:EE that gives the player a chance to save Skie after what happened in SoD. However, saving her comes at a price. The mod begins in the Irenicus dungeon, when you find the main quest item.
- Skie can be recruited if you manage to help her. She'll be looking for you a little later in some of the inns, so don't forget to stop and rest from time to time. On the Waukeen's Promenade, a new merchant sells items related to certain characters, places or events in SoD. This component can be installed independently of the others.

Incompatible with: Skie BG2 NPC Redone

Snowytoes Hamlet
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

There are many secrets buried under the snow of Icewind Dale, you may find a safe haven. Not just Kuldahar, but also smaller hamlets: like Snowytoes - a settlement of halflings who decided that even the freezing winds and wild animals wouldn't scare them away. Visit this place, talk to its people and see if you can help make their life a bit easier... because there is a strange power waking up under the snow in a nearby vale.
Southern Edge
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Southern Edge is a new district for our favorite BG2 city - Athkatla - available from the very start, once you talk to Gaelan and hear his offer. The mod is to make the first hours of the game more interesting, as some player might have got bored with doing the same quests over and over again. The area isn't as big as Slums or as Bridge District, but it includes a main quest introduced by a halfling name Mairo and a series of mini-quests and encounters introduced by both some new characters, and some you might have met before.

This mod offers an alternative to the classic route to Brynnlaw to free Imoen. A series of tests designed to push your mental and physical limits await you... be warned.

Zyraen

This mod adds combat and a strategic quest to the content of Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn. Help a nation of elves whose sacred burial grounds have been invaded. Fight alongside the elven army and test your tactical acumen against continually attacking hordes of orcs and even deadly, nightmarish demons, all the while keeping the elven commander alive and preserving their sacred lands.
Warning: this mod is difficult, as orcs and other creatures evolve according to your level.

Lava Del'Vortel

There are many places marked by the bitter taste of loss and death. A frozen pond, known as the Pond of the Drowned, is one such place. It screams, begging for change. Will you be the one to bring peace to that snow-covered place... or will you cause even more pain?
The mod adds a new small quest to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition. To start it, follow the main quest. Once you find a certain book, a new worldmap area will be discovered. Visit it once you're ready.

The wizard Nomoran needs your help to fight a horde of monsters near the village of Anegh. New maps, new items and two different endings depending on whether you choose to trigger the quest in SoA (Nomoran will be in Athkatla) or ToB (the wizard will be in Amkethran).
Tales of the Deep Gardens
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The last thing you remember is a mage on the streets of Athkatla, the building of the Council of Six, the trees and mansions of the Government District. Now you feel only humid air and cold ground... You try to open your eyes, but you are not sure if your senses are to be believed. You are barely able to recognize shapes around you... Crooked trees, bantam buildings, colourful mists... Your head aches. It is impossible for you to focus... Suddenly, you realize something. You hear voices and footsteps... You are not alone in this unknown place.
TotDG is a new adventure that adds new areas, encounters, items and spells.
Tangled Oak Isle
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new area to the town of Athkatla. Once an independent village located on an Isle, the Tangled Oak Isle became the part of Athkatla. As the city grew bigger and bigger, it swallowed the isle, which now can be accessed not only by boats but also by a bridge. While Isle is by law part of the City of Coin, it kept its identity, mostly because of the isle's villagers and the symbol that unite them: the Tangled Oak that grows between houses on the isle.
Also, the Cowled Wizards don't seem to be much interested in what was once called Tangled Oak Village and consider those that live there quite insignificant to Athkatla as a while, that means the islanders are on their own when it comes to solving problems and a serious one has just threatened that quiet place. Will you, the Hero of Baldur's Gate, help in restoring the isle's peace?

Terror of the Skineater
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a short quest to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition. It will lead you to a dark forest, a zone of death and despair. Will you find a way to hunt down the Skineater - a powerful monster that's terrorizing the area...? And will you uncover the truth about its origins?
In order to start the quest, talk to a man right after you enter Kuldahar - he's standing near the boxes outside the first shop. While the quest is available from the very start, you may need to gather some experience before you enter the new area.

The Arena Project
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Omni

This mod adds a little spice to your Pocket Plane. Its concept is simple: once you've earned the ability to go into your Pocket Plane, you'll notice two new NPCs inside near the exit door, the Arena Master and the Reward Giver. You'll need to complete a number of challenges inside the arena and earn a few rewards.
The bigg Quest Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

the bigg

This mod includes small quests and battles, too small to be published as separate mods. These components range from the serious to the absurd, from strict adherence to the rules to outright cheating. Among them:
- Mprolla, the spammer: If you haven't got the joke yet, this component is probably not for you. In any case, it's inspired by a guy (Mike Prolla) who used to spam and troll all the Infinity Engine modding communities a long time ago. In the mod, Mprolla is a level 25 buffoon that you can find (well) hidden in the Waukunn Promenade. When you see him, after a scene where he loses his brain, he'll start taunting you, until he fights you openly. This fight is a real panty party. All his taunts are real quotes. The optional element Mprolla, the cheat is also part of this component: it makes combat more difficult by adding cheating.
- Large-scale battle: Amn is besieged by an army of orcs and must resign itself to defeat due to their overwhelming numbers. Hooded mages and Amnian soldiers need the help of experienced adventurers to strike a decisive blow against the attackers. After accepting, you're thrown into an area no larger than a standard ambush, but containing well over a hundred orcs, with more popping up all the time until you kill their commander. On your side, you have a few Amnian soldiers and hooded mages. Who's going to win?
The Bloodied Stings of Barovia
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new dark adventure. It takes the Child of Bhaal and their party to Barovia, part of the realm of Ravenloft. In this ominous land, the player will face new enemies and formidable creatures, solve intricate riddles, and experience a gripping gothic horror story. Immerse yourself in mists, navigate dangerous forests, and confront undead creatures, all while seeking your way back to Athkatla.
The Boareskyr Bridge Scene
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

EET

jastey

Like Gorion's letter and PJ's dreams in BG, the transformation into a Slayer in SoA, and the trials in ToB, the scene at Boarskyr Bridge in SoD is an important step in PJ's journey towards his destiny. This mod therefore strives to give it greater depth and integration into the story, with reactions from NPCs and other game characters. There will be warnings before going to the bridge, and NPCs will react to the course of events, depending on the components installed. The original scene will also be expanded with descriptive text and the ability for the player to choose how to handle the divine energy blast and the resulting stat changes.
It includes four optional components, but they complement each other:
- 1. The Boarskyr Bridge scene is mentioned by NPCs: This component adds reactions to in-game characters before and after your passage over the Boarskyr Bridge. The bridge kinematics remain unchanged.
- 2. Add text describing the original Boarskyr Bridge kinematics: This component adds additional descriptive text to the bridge kinematics, based on the same style as BGII (the Tree of Life, transformation into a Slayer).
- 3. The Boarskyr Bridge sequence of events offers several choices: This component allows the player to choose how to react to the wave of energy released on the bridge. There are three possibilities: 1) the player absorbs all the pain to protect others; 2) the player diverts the energy towards the river (those close to him will be slightly affected and receive some damage); 3) the player channels the energy and projects it around him (all party members receive damage and most of the Flaming Fist soldiers on the bridge die).
- 4. modify the character's characteristics according to his choices: 1) if the character absorbs pain, his wisdom increases by 1 permanently; 2) if the character directs energy towards the river, his dexterity increases by 1 permanently; 3) if the character directs energy towards his allies, his constitution increases by 1 permanently.
The Broken Lanthorn
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Roxanne

This mod restores a quest deleted in the original game. When you return the Lanthorn to Elhan, the sages discover that some lenses are missing and that the device is not focused to reveal Suldanessellar. The party is tasked with finding the missing parts.

Prefer the much better Restored Rhynn Lanthorn Quest mod.
The Calling
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

CamDawg

This mod was the embryo of an ambitious project that sought to answer the following questions: why has no one taken control of the Gnoll fortress? Why are the only quests specific to the protagonist's class given by Narlen Marchombre? The answer was to develop class-specific quests. For the time being, only one, the Mage quest, has been completed, and is therefore open to all players until the mod is fleshed out.
Two other components allow us to peacefully resolve the conflict on Werewolf Island and install the Pack of Exotic Items component (formerly part of Sword Coast Stratagems).

This mod adds an underground den of thieves beneath the city of Beregost. It features new quests, characters, stores and items. The Grey Clan Episode I: In Candlelight
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Baronius

You've arrived at Baldur's Gate, proud to have eliminated the threat of bandits on the Sword Coast. But is it really? There may be another, darker and more dangerous threat. You'll find out in this mod, aimed more at characters of neutral or good alignment, which adds a moderately long quest, improved AI for certain opponents, new items, and the possibility of epic battles alongside the Flaming Fist. If the battles seem too difficult, you can choose to install an easier version of certain battles (choose the "lite" version on installation).
The GitHub link is a recoded version that concerns the EE and BGT games.

BWL link: there are versions compatible with BG, BG1Tutu and BGT, via different downloads. Make sure you download the right version!

The Journey to the Whin Hill
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The Journey to the Whin Hill is an IWD-style adventure for BG2EE, in which you are sent to find a man in a new area known as the Whin Hill. However beware, as the place is known to be a home for wyverns, but... that's not the only threat you will find there. Also... why would anyone live in such a place? Find out, by visiting this new area and following the path under the hill.
There is also a bonus component: the mod includes a secret optional companion you may add to your game: Afu-Zuuvi, a chaotic neutral cleric/thief. He also includes one banter talk with each BioWare NPC, a personal kit, soundset and a couple of items.

Deratiseur

This little module will introduce you to two unusual protagonists: one is an NPC ogre whom you can enlist (for the moment he's mute if hired) and the other a gnome merchant. To find one or the other, ask yourself the following questions: where could an ogre be hiding who doesn't want to be seen, and where could a merchant be?
STR 19, DEX 7, CON 18, INT 6, WIS 8, CHA 6.

Inferno

This mod increases the duration of the class quest linked to the magic sphere, and therefore the interest in playing as a mage. An additional large quest, as well as several smaller ones and a sphere populated by apprentices. There are also 39 new spells, and don't forget to install the Planar Sphere Teleporter add-on mini-mod (also known as PlanarSphere Return), which lets you teleport directly into the Planar Sphere (and back to where you were), as well as the "Pocket Plane" ability.

Here's another unofficial EE-compatible version.

Lava Del'Vortel

Kuldahar has its past and future. It also has its people. This mod's aim is to introduce the stories that are bound with this town and those that live in it. The Rediscovery of Kuldahar adds new quests, encounters and shops. These are filled not only with new characters, but new areas that present new parts of the town.
Revisit Kuldahar, see all the changes, do new quests, and enjoy your stay under the cover of the Great Oak.

The Slithering Menace
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

vilkacis

This mod adds a short quest in Throne of Bhaal. More precisely, it's triggered in Bhaal's Pocket Plane, once you've brought Sarevok back to life. For the quest to begin, Imoen must be in your party. It's your mischievous sister who will trigger it by committing one of her stupid deeds. Among other things, you'll be treated to a fight, followed by a brand-new magical item as a reward for your efforts.
The Stone of Askavar
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Red Carnelian

Link
The Stone of Askavar is a mod for Baldur's Gate I: Tales of the Sword Coast that includes a main quest and several side quests, as well as new areas, new items and spells, and many new creatures to fight. It sends you in search of a powerful gem located in an ancient elven community of Askavar. It's similar to Icewind Dale's quest for the Stone Heart gem, but here the aim is to find the gem before the members of the Black Gauntlet do. After flooding the mines of Cloakwood, your adventure begins just north of Nashkel, where you'll be attacked by knights of the Black Gauntlet.
The Vanishing of Skie Silvershield
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod makes Eldoth and Skie available the moment you leave Candlekeep. It moves Eldoth to the Friendly Arm Inn and expands his plan to kidnap / free Skie Silvershield. Follow his plan, and you will be able to get an alternative for Imoen and Safana sooner than in the original game. To make this happen, Eldoth's quest had to be expanded, but it's easy enough to make a low-level party handle everything without any problems.
To keep the balance, Eldoth and Skie both start at level 1.

Incompatible with: Sword Coast Stratagems
The War of Bloom and Rot
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The War of Bloom and Rot is a quest mod that introduces a new quest of a significant size. Explore twenty new areas and face powerful enemies as you try to return from the underground system of caves. To leave, you may need to stop a war between the myconids and another, powerful entity--hungry and with a plan of eradication of everything and everyone on her way.
The White Queen
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod is the 3rd in the Colours of Infinity series, following Tales of the Deep Gardens and Innershade. To start the quest buy a new book at the book merchant's store on the Promenade. It may guide you to one of the strange marshes where terrible events took place earlier: a place of mystery and tragedy. Explore the ruins of a forgotten village, discover what lies under the layers of the mud and meet the White Queen and her servants... The mod includes 8 new locations, some dialogues, new music, items and more. It's more combat-oriented than previous mods in the series.

Lauriel

This mod's main purpose is to augment the role-playing environment throughout the game series. To that end, it tweaks the storyline in various places.
Throne of Bhaal Revisited
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

wildgirlmods

Don't like the Throne of Bhaal expansion? Tired of having to follow a linear story with empty characters? This mod is designed to remedy the situation, and comprises four main sections: characters, non-linearity, locations and quests. Each section is independent, as are each of its components: Characters: You now have a chance to reason with Gromnir, even if it's difficult. MÃ©lissane now has a magical amulet that protects her from alignment detection spells. The Solaire, not Sarevok, opens the first challenge. If he sees an advantage, Yaga Shura will ask you to kill Gromnir and, if that doesn't break the siege, Captain Samand.
- Non-linearity: Ellesime will lead you to the clearing of the elders. Your Pocket Plane will only teleport you to places you've already visited. You can fight the Five in any order. Places: If Saradush hasn't fallen yet, you'll see a more peaceful side to the Oasis. There are many more Children of Bhaal in Saradush. In the sewers of Saradush you'll find new creatures and certainly understand better why there are so many shadows. The most precious treasures have been moved to the temple of Yara Shura for safekeeping: A priestess of Kelemvor seeks to cleanse the ruined temple of Bhaal. A capricious witch now lives in the forest of Tethyr.

This mod is still in progress.
Throne of the Mad God
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Acifer

A bard's litany puts you on the trail of a party of missing adventurers. Can you find what's left of them in this vast abandoned fortress?
Tomoyo and the Underground City
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

vira

A tribute to the manga Tomoyo After: It's a Wonderful Life, this mod adds an underground city (whose entrance is in the lich crypt at City Gates). Those not put off by a story disconnected from that of BG2 will find a series of linked maps, on which you'll face hundreds of monsters dropping a host of items, some of them extremely powerful. You'll meet and hire Tomoyo Sakagami, heroine of the Clannad manga and its continuations. However, you don't have to keep her in the party - she's mute and has no bearing on what happens next.
STR 16, DEX 19, CON 15, INT 18, WIS 13, CHA 17.

Choose the github link for the EE version in French and the other two links for the original version in Chinese.
Tortured Souls Lite
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Vlad Papper

Domi Sotto

Bill Harper

Arkie

The original designer has continued the mod's development in a stand-alone version, with numerous text reworkings. However, although compatible with Baldurdash-WeiDU 1.75 (mandatory) and Vlad's other mods Keldorn's Romance (highly recommended) and Never Ending Journey3 (mandatory), it is incompatible with most WeiDU mods including the BG2 FixPack!

Choose the github link for the EE version and the other link for the original version.
For EE versions, there's a stand-alone version of Sime: Vlad's Sime NPC.
Tortured Souls-BP
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Team

Vlad Papper

Domi Sotto

Bill Harper

King Diamond

Link
"Tortured Souls" is a generic term to encompass all NPCs who are troubled. This mod adds numerous banters, 4 new romances including one between Yoshimo and Kachiko, and a huge new quest. More specifically:
- 5 new recruitable NPCs including Sime (Aran Linvail's daughter, alongside her father if you worked for his guild in chapter 3), Kachiko (in Irenicus dungeon), Dynaheir (Sime and Minsc must be in the party), Coran (available in Tethyr forest) and Bodhi (if you chose to work for his guild in chapter 3).
A romance with Valygar for a female PJ, starting in SoA and continuing in ToB. A new, wide-ranging quest on the road to Spellhold, with Yoshimo and Kachiko as protagonists.
- A romance with Sime for PJs of both sexes. Several Sime-specific quests, one of which will lead you to face an enemy (indestructible in the 1st encounter) twice in the mod's main quest.
- Multiple class quests" component for multi-classed PJs, allowing them to complete quests for all their sub-classes.
- Slightly improved Twisted Rune combat.
- A host of new items (mostly from IWD1).
Yoshimo must be part of your party to recruit Kachiko. Similarly, Coran can only be recruited by triggering a mini-quest in the Adventurer Mart (you must enter without Jaheira in your party).
This version is compatible with The Big Picture and most WeiDU mods.

Fichier TS-BPv6.10.rar.
Incompatible with: Corthala Romantique
Tower of Deception
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Valiant

Lava Del'Vortel

It's a quest to explore a tower (new graphics according to the FAQ) that attracts some to imprison them (a bit like TotSC's ice island). It is aimed at characters of level 10-13, equipped with fairly powerful weapons (you need at least a pair of +3 weapons), as there are some pretty hefty monsters. To start the adventure, all you have to do is go and see the mage Tian at the Crooked Crane Inn (at the City Gates), and talk to him. He has a mission for you: to recover a book hidden in an old abandoned tower, the Tower of No Return... He's willing to pay a hefty sum for it. Will you rise to the challenge?

Requires: ToB
Travellers in Faerun
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Roxanne

According to its author, this mod aims to make EET even more of ONE story:
- it brings some non-joinable NPCs and a foreshadow of their story from BG2/ToB to earlier parts of the game.
- you can influence some later chapter events by decisions you make early (continuity in EET)
- you can go back with items you find later in the game to finish quests in BG1 or SoD
- you get quests for which you need to return to the BG1/SoD areas from later parts
- a randomly appearing peddler can keep items from one part of the game and give them back in a later part, but be careful, random means random...
The mod consists of many smaller encounters, shorter or larger quests, and events/decisions that have lasting effects.
Trials of the Luremaster (IWD)
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

IWD

This is the patch/extension for Icewind Dale with Heart of Winter. It installs the second free Trial of the Luremaster expansion, as well as the latest patches for the entire game. If you already have Heart of Winter, this is the only patch you'll need.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Trials of the Luremaster for Baldur's Gate
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Argent77

This mod makes the Icewind Dale expansion Â« Trial of the Luremaster Â» available to BG2:EE (2.0 or higher), Siege of Dragonspear and EET (Enhanced Edition Trilogy). The quest starts by talking to the halfling Hobart Stubbletoes, who can be found either in the Umar Hills Inn (SoA), Amkethran Inn (ToB) or in the southeastern area of the Coalition Camp (SoD). In the course of the adventure you have the opportunity to explore a haunted castle, test your mettle in challenging combat and lift an ancient curse.

Twisting With The Rune
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Roxanne

This mod gives meaning to the encounter with the members of the Twisted Rune. In EET, the story begins in the BG section. If you only play BG2:EE, you'll know what you've learned in BG and SoD. There's also a link to Balthazar in ToB that appears in the original game but was never explained (you need to own a bastion to trigger it).
There's no linear storyline, it's more of a puzzle where you find elements of the tableau as you go along, which may give you a vague idea of an organization secretly operating in FaerÃ»n. The Rune has no interest in Bhaal's offspring as such, and the mod mainly provides a link between events that originally seemed unrelated.

Vault
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

Team

Josh Clue

Erebusant

Adanedhel

Originally, this mod focused on new items scattered throughout the game (monsters, stores). Over time, it was expanded to include a number of quests accessible to groups of different levels, to bring the mod's items into line with the BG universe. The quests remain arduous, both in their resolution and in the battles that populate them. The author claims around two hours' playtime for the four quests, but you may find yourself spending more time wracking your brains to solve them.
Return to Nashkel begins when Duke Eltan teleports the party to Candlekeep. It takes you back to the mines of Nashkel, full of traps, spiders and dark elves.
The Vestibule: go to the small building adjoining Lathander's temple and talk (several times) to the priests there. The quest consists of two particularly arduous battles (level 8-9 minimum), and involves sending the demon Lestraubimat back into the abyss, where it will only appear if it's the first time you've entered a certain area (you can visit the map, however, provided you don't explore the area where the demon is to appear).
The Ogres of Gullykin, the halfling village: an invasion and big fights...
Le Caveau, or hidden quest: carefully read the descriptions of the items found, and collect the Idol of Kozah and the armor of the Cursed Knight of the Labyrinth before presenting them to Ulcaster's ghost, who gives you the Sword of the Vampire's Revenge in exchange. In combination with Sword Coast Stratagems, this mod can quickly become an impossible task, especially during the quest Return to Nashkel, in which you'll be fighting hordes of spiders.
The link concerns the BGT and BG:EE versions. The BG1-Tutu version has no French translation.
Vault
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Team

Josh Clue

Erebusant

Adanedhel

EET-compatible version of mod Vault.

Incompatible with: Framed
Vecna Artifacts
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

vecna808

Something evil has emerged from the Astral Plane, and ancient dark powers are gathering to rise again. Even the evil deities are trembling... This mod features 38 new areas, numerous new monsters and new animations. The Vecna campaign follows the events of the Die Vecne Die! mod. As its writing left something to be desired, a text patch has been released. Extract it into the Language directory of the mod and overwrite the existing files BEFORE installing the mod.

However, it is known to be buggy. Install at your own risk.
Choose the github link for the EE version and the shs link for the original versions.

Wheels of Prophecy
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

DavidW

This little mod is an attempt to bring a little less linearity and a different kind of role-playing opportunities to ToB, especially chapter 9. You no longer have to wait until you've finished with SendaÃ¯ and Abazigal before you can enter Balthazar's monastery. The dialogues of these 3 protagonists will adapt accordingly to your gameplay choices. Additional dialogs with AmÃ©lissane and Elminster have been added, and those with Carras, Saemon, Faheed, Zahee, and Le Solaire modified. Although the mod is not presented as a tactical challenge, it does add a few extra encounters during your negotiations with members of the Hand. Finally, it includes the Restored ToB Heads mini-mod (restores a conversation with the stone faces in the Northern Forest), and more generally adds small modifications to implement content that isn't in the original game (notably with the Amkethran smugglers).

Incompatible with: Ascension
Worship the Unseeing Eye

BGT

SConrad

This mini-mod gives you the opportunity to adore the Eyeless. Answer "Yes" when Gaal, the preacher of the Temple district, asks you if you want to worship him. It's that simple!
XikÃ¢sz's Grove of Chaos
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

XikÃ¢sz's Grove of Chaos is a new mod that adds a new quest to IWD:EE as well as provides players with a new possible companion, XikÃ¢sz - an elven fighter/wildmage/thief of neutral alignment.
In the mod, you will get a chance to investigate a new area near Kuldahar. An old grove near which a shady character has been spotted. Is he a friend? Or a foe? It is up to you to go there and find out. But be careful, as you may need to face some new beasts during your investigation.

Adrian NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Rhaella

Adrian Sianodel is a lawful evil 33-year-old half-Elf mage, whom you meet at the end of the Irenicus dungeon. He has a personal quest and will romanticize human or half-Elf female PJs without restriction of alignment or class. However, your PJ must have a minimum of 12 charisma. Leaf-eaters are not particularly her cup of tea.
Aeon
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lava Del'Vortel

Meet Aeon - an impulsive and young abjurer/thief - and along with him find out why a certain human can wield a Moonblade. Find him deep in the graveyard to discover why this human can carry such a weapon. Mod includes brand new relationship path for male PC - brotherhood.

This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
Afaaq, the Djinni Companion
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

This mod adds a djinn acting as a seventh member of the party. It dialogues with the main character and the members of the party (work in progress) and gives its opinion in other dialogues, just like a classic NPC. He also proposes a number of quests to discover new places. He can be likened to a fighter-mage.
STR 15, DEX 16, CON 13, INT 15, WIS 16, CHA 11.

In IWD:EE, he doesn't dialog with the NPC, but only exchanges a few words with an associated drow NPC. There are also no new locations.
Alexia: An NPC Assassin Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

CoM_Solaufein

Alexia Kalila Johara Al-Mustafa or X as she has been known to go by, claims she's from the city of Calimport from the country of Calimshan. Soft spoken and quiet, she tends to keep to herself and says little to anyone. She is a well trained assassin who can get to anyone no matter how many traps or people are protecting her target. She enjoys the challenges present to get to her target. She's not a braggart but she does excel at being the best she is. Her calling card is leaving a note with an X on the body of her target and all witnesses are generally killed. Alexia does not belong to any guilds, she works alone and takes on contracts to her liking. One such contract is killing Irenicus, which is why she wishes to join your group.
STR 14, DEX 18, CON 12, INT 16, WIS 10, CHA 8.

This mod has disappeared from https://forums.beamdog.com/discussion/40896/.
Alora NPC for BG2

Dark Raven

Link
The halfling thief from Baldur's Gate returns with this mod, much to the delight of her fans. She's just as charismatic as she was in the first installment of the saga, with her good-natured manner and friendly exclamations.
STR 12, DEX 19, CON 12, INT 14, WIS 7, CHA 15.

Fichier alora-npc-for-bg2-2.0.zip.
Amber
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

CamDawg

Meira

Ville Marttila

Link
This chaotic tieffeline can be romanticized (only by male PJs) and is quite restless, but once you get to know her better, she'll quickly prove to be a sympathetic character. She'll compete for your favors with Viconia, Jaheira or Aerie if a romance is underway. The mod also offers the possibility of romance for a second PC in a multiplayer game (player 2).
Although she's quite intelligent, she can sometimes be rather direct when communicating with others. This trait rarely wins her friends among those she meets, and the initial feeling of dislike is usually mutual. But beneath her prickly manner, she has a good heart and will do anything to help those she considers weak and in need of help.
She's a fighter/thief, and will prove very useful in combat thanks to her very high dexterity.
STR 12, DEX 19, CON 15, INT 14, WIS 12, CHA 8.

To be installed before The Tweaks Anthology.
Angelo NPC for BGII
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Sister Vigilante

Kulyok

CamDawg

Does the name ring a bell? Yes, it does! The dark brute allied to Sarevok and infiltrated into the Flaming Fist... You're now certain that you didn't kill him in your sinister fight under Baldur's Gate, and he'll make you an offer when he meets you in the Athkatla Graveyard. He has a few interactions with most of the NPCs in the base game. If you're playing a woman, you can also try to romance him. Finally, he has a personal quest that can extend into ToB.
STR 15, DEX 15, CON 16, INT 17, WIS 11, CHA 10.
Aran Whitehand
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

cmorgan

Still in beta, this mod is a little unusual in that its code is open source. Aran Whitehand has minor optional quests with a new area, but no special weapons or upgradeable items - his specialty is interacting with party members and adapting to situations. For him, work is everything, and his job is to accompany the player. He's not averse to having to carry out orders that distort morals, although he hates doing it. He'll befriend any protagonist of any race or alignment, although the way he reacts to situations will certainly let the player know how he feels. A rough man accustomed to mercenary work, Aran can be hired as a scribe, accountant or bodyguard. His language is harsh, his approach unrefined. And if you don't like him, he'll be happy to tell you exactly what your opinion is worth.
He's a human fighter, double-classifiable, so he can be handyman, tailor, soldier, spy... whatever your party needs. Basically, a human Swiss Army knife enlisted for friendship/hugs. It should be noted that this mod is designed by adults for adults and should not be installed unless you're comfortable with Faerunian swearing and the adult romance part.

This mod is still in progress.
Arath NPC mod for Baldur's Gate 2: SoA & ToB
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

K'aeloree

A new human druid, with content for SoA and ToB. This character is presented as complex in his opinions and beliefs. A hedonist, he can be interested in both male and female PJs, and is relatively direct in his manners even if he won't always get his way. He has an aversion to the undead and all unnatural creatures. A new quest (chapter 6) is also on the program, as well as a path of friendship, reactions to the PJ's quest, banters... You'll meet him during the slavers' quest in chapter 2.
STR 13, DEX 11, CON 13, INT 13, WIS 16, CHA 15.
Areen
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Boresal

Areen is a gifted wild mage who approaches his art in a very serious and academic manner. He can be recruited in Chapter 1 and is very hard to miss. Although he has well-optimized stats, he also has a problem that can be solved gradually over the course of the game. For the moment, he has few banters with other Bioware characters. It also has a few items.

Arszyk's Wonderful Decay
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

Arszyk is a neutral evil fighter/druid, a vampire that was sent to Icewind Dale to find a lost artifact, but meanwhile, got into some trouble and needs a hand if he's to resume his search. He comes with a few talks, interjections, items, a druid kit (Decay Overseer, also included in Of Paths and Ways released by the same author).
You may flirt with Arszyk, but the mod does not include a fully fledged romance.

This mod is still in progress.

Ascalon

White Agnus

jastey

Link
This mod adds Breagar of the Bardormar clan as a recruitable NPC in Baldur's Gate I and II. Aligned as a lawful good, he has his own dwarven blacksmith profile. For BGT and EET, Breagar functions as a continuous character throughout the trilogy. For BG:EE, Tutu, BGII and BG2:EE, only content corresponding to the game will be installed.
Ashar NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

Pustak Stropowy

This mod adds a new recruitable NPC, the half-orc barbarian Ashar, who stands near the entrance to the Copper Coronet, right after the death of the tavern's owner, Lehtinan. Having suffered slavery, Ashar is aggressive, plainspoken, but also a bit confused woman. Fell free to say what you will, during talks with her, there aren't any "correct" or "incorrect" answers. However, be aware, because your words and deeds may have a great impact on Ashar's character. The mod offers about 20 dialogues with the PC, a modest romance, as well as many interactions, comments, and banters with all BGII NPCs.

EET compatibility to be tested.
