ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Danzig

This mod adds a new recruitable NPC, Auden, a lawful neutral monk, whom you can recruit in the Copper Coronet, hidden in the opium den. If you don't want him to join you, ask him to tell you about Athkatla...
Aura NPC for Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

AionZ

This mod allows you to recruit the gnome Aurelia Minerva Eveline Glimmershine. In BG1, you'll find her in the center of Beregost, in BG2, you'll find her in Waukeen's Promenade right after attending an event at Jan's house. As an artificer (thief profile), Aura can modify certain magical items that the party acquires on their journey.
Gentle and idealistic at heart, she can be rather shy and socially inept when interacting with strangers, but easily becomes enthusiastic and excitable when the subject strays from her areas of expertise, being able to talk or (more likely) lecture others for hours on end. Aura is generally friendly, making at least an effort to bond with all her fellow travelers, with varying degrees of success. She approves of innovation, seeking knowledge and using her talents to help others. Consequently, she is best suited to parties of good alignment, although she can follow any PC of at least average level.
A female PC of any race can flirt with Aura. A compatible PC gains romantic dialog options during her friendship chats, but there is no romance.
D In SoD, Aura can start a romance with a non-evil female of any race with at least 12 Intelligence and 10 Charisma. She is generally affectionate and will respond amicably to a partner who is friendly, intelligent and willing to listen. On the other hand, she's quick to walk away if the PC shows no sign of interest, and blunt responses are quick to drive her away.
STR 8, DEX 16, CON 13, INT 19, WIS 14, CHA 15.
Auren Aseph NPC Mod for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

theacefes

Auren is a young human fighter of good neutral alignment from Beregost. She can be found inside the Copper Coronet, but she doesn't appear if the YP is of bad alignment, and disappears for good if she's kicked out of the group. Auren has a gay romance with Nalia if you have her on the team, and a personal quest. She starts the game with two-weapon fighting skills, longsword and shortsword. Custom voice and music mod.
STR 16, DEX 15, CON 16, INT 13, WIS 12, CHA 15.
Aurora NPC for BG2:TOB
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Bookwyrme

The famous Aurora from mod Aurora's Shoes and Boots can now join you on your quest in ToB! In ToB, you can now summon her to the Pocket Plane to fight by your side. Aurora is an enlightened fighter who will play the children of Bhaal with passion. She doesn't seem to regret being called back from "retirement" to play a more active role. The ToB version of this mod features numerous interjections, banters and dialogs with the player.

This mod is still in progress.
Requires: ToB
Autumn's Twilight for BGII
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Pol Rupes

This comprehensive mod adds new recruitable characters (including Dusk NPC for BGII), quests, new items, merchants, dungeons and more.
Avi Maya Project
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lava Del'Vortel

Link Link
This mod adds a spectral woman named Avi Maya. She's an undead bard who's eager to join your party. She has her own quests, can be romanced and has interactions with other party members. According to the author, the dialogues are written with a dark sense of humor.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Ayden Project
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

Keneth

Ayden is primarily an NPC mod, but comes with a set of additional components:
- Warlock profile for the Thief class, based on the Warlock class from D&D Third Edition.
- Ayden NPC: a recruitable NPC with her own dialogs, banter and quests.
- Shadow Walk: an ability to reduce movement speed.
- Ayden's shelter: a pocket plan where the party can rest and store items.
- Item creation: a simple system for creating items, in the form of dialog with the NPC.
- Wands for thieves: enables the use of wands for all thief profiles.
- Thief skills: all thief profiles can use maces and spears.
Azure NPC Romance
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Victor Georgiev

Azure is a druidess accompanied by her wolf, Sharo, who follows her everywhere. She has a special profile, Natureâ€™s Ally. Although still in beta, this mod is already playable and looks promising. Unfortunately, development has been at a standstill for some time.
STR 13, DEX 17, CON 14, INT 11, WIS 16, CHA 16.

This mod is still in progress.
Barbarian Companion: Overpowered Edition
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Gamemacik

As its name suggests, this mod is truly unbalanced. It lets you enlist Marcus as either a companion or a pet. The latter has abilities that make it virtually indestructible, making most battles uninteresting...
STR 18/00, DEX 18, CON 22, INT 12, WIS 15, CHA 18.
Bethany
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a new companion, Bethany Vivielle Helena Corthala, a town medium (shaman kit) who always wanted to be a hat-maker. However, she has an ability to see the dead and it's really hard to be a fashion expert, attend to all these social events, and show everyone how great you can be when you are haunted by the dead. So, she could use a little distraction and... fame, because it can be quite useful for someone who wants to open her own business when it's all over.
Beyond the Law
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Zyraen

This mod features two recruitable NPCs, Kiyone (lawful good half-elf ranger) and Kova (chaotic good half-elf mage/thief), non-separable (like Kiara Zaiya) who have a potential romance (with each other), banters with everyone, and a very interesting quest on the links between the Hooded Ones, the Shadow Thieves and the Council of Six, not to mention a bunch of fights throughout SoA (and now interjections in the Watcher's keep and several romance epilogues in ToB).
Kiyone : STR 15, DEX 17, CON 13, INT 14, WIS 15, CHA 12.
Kova : STR 14, DEX 17, CON 13, INT 17, WIS 10, CHA 11.
Brage's Redemption - Brage NPC

Link
This mod is both a quest mod for BG and an NPC mod for the whole saga. It extends Braga's quest from the first opus. By proving his innocence and recovering his real sword, he can be recruited a day later at the Temple of Heaum in Nashkel.

Brandock the Mage
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

jastey

Link
This mod adds a recruitable NPC for the entire Baldur's Gate saga. It is natively compatible with BG:EE, SoD, BGII, BGT, BG2:EE and EET. For the moment, only the BG1 content of the mod is complete.
It's a good chaotic mage you'll find on the Sword Coast, seeking help to fight an ogre in order to recover his possessions. Depending on whether or not he's in the party when Melicamp is brought to Thalantyr, he'll have an additional quest that will keep him out of the party for a while. Brandock is very interested in magic books. Every time he has time to study the magic books the party encounters in the game, it increases his knowledge score. He's friendly and helpful, but it'll be a while before he opens up and tells the PC where he's from, for reasons he'll gladly explain when he's ready to do so.
If your party already has 6 members, he can join you as a "7th member" and will follow you around in the manner of a familiar.
STR 15, DEX 13, CON 13, INT 18, WIS 12, CHA 13.
Bristlelick
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a new NPC â€“ a Gnoll Bruiser, a former bandit, who worked for Garclax, a gnoll you may also encounter in the original game during the investigation of the Bandit Camp. Bristlelick is a frontline warrior of neutral character. He enjoys battle, a fine meal, and seeks vengeance for the death of his trusted companion, Bull-Tall.
The NPC may join your party near the rocky road on the Bandit Camp area. In Siege of Dragonspear, he may join the team near the first camp.
STR 19, DEX 16, CON 18, INT 13, WIS 8, CHA 7.
Caelar's Fall
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Lassal

This is a demo of a mod designed to make Caelar Argent a reachable NPC; for Caelar Argent to join you, you must kill Belhifet before she does.

This mod is still in progress.
Incompatible with: Shine On Caelar
Caina Fighter/Brigand NPC and Zarra Ranger/Archer NPC
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

DarkDogg

This mod adds two evil NPCs to BG:EE:
- Caina is a Luskan mercenary. You can find her in Beregost, in a manor to the north where she works for Gerard Travenhurst to pay off his debts. She has the profile of a brigand. She'll only join you once she's completed her quest. She has a lot of interaction and some banter with Bioware's NPCs. If you travel with her, she'll give gifts to Edwin, Xzar and Xan.
- Zarra is a drow from the town of Sschindylryn (near Cormyr). She is a goblin-hunting archer with a pet, Auflaque. She's obviously lost and needs your help to find an item that belongs to her. You'll meet her near Nashkel (in Dorn's first quest area). She has a lot of interaction and some banter with Bioware NPCs and a personal quest. This mod includes 3 new dungeons (10 new areas), new enemies and over 20 new items.

Please note: the quality of this mod leaves a lot to be desired, and the installation procedure is rather special, to say the least.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Calin
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Kitanna

This mod adds Calin, a human Blademaster in BG2. Calin is neutral and kind, and will romance an elf, half-elf, human woman of non-evil alignment. He has banters with all Bioware NPCs; as well as a path of friendship. He has a serious problem with thieves, and his in-game comments are harsh, but he has a reason for it. He'll court female thieves, but he'll ask the PC to make a sacrifice for the romance to take place if the PC has affiliated with the thieves' guild... Otherwise, he'll leave the group.
Cassia-NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Arvendor

This mod adds a new joinable companion to the IWD:EE - the tiefling Cassia. Cassia is a young cleric of Helm who originally hails from Mirabar and has journeyed to Easthaven at the behest of her church to render what aid she can to Hrothgar's expedition. As a devout helmite, she will do everything in her power to protect the Ten Towns and to root out the evils which threaten them. But will she find herself equal to the task or will she break beneath the responsibility? Cassia is a single-classed cleric with the Helm kit and may be recruited outside the Temple of Tempus in Easthaven. She has a small quest associated with her which will naturally conclude over the course of the game and may be romanced by male dwarves, humans, elves, half-elves and half-orcs with a charisma score of 10 or higher. She will react and interject to both the main game and the expansion. She tends to get along better with good aligned characters but she will not object to following the lead of an evil player so long as they don't cross the moral event horizon.

Cassia has crossmod content with The Rediscovery of Kuldahar, Tale of Our Lady Dreamless, Below & Below Inn, Snowytoes Hamlet and Terror of the Skineater.

The portrait was created by Tomasz Chistowski.
Chloe NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lucythebeast

This mod adds a demi-goddess kensai true neutral, with a specific voice kit and weapons, who exclusively romances female characters. Interactions have been written with each character, but romance is currently only available for SoA. Quests relating to Chloe complete the package.
STR 13, DEX 25, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 12, CHA 14.

There is a non-official EE version.
Compass Of Womanhood
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

udiknedormin

Its aim is to create a varied set of interesting companions that fit well into the Forgotten Realms universe and the core games. Two companions are available. Shithri, a wandering half-orc pirate, and Caly, an elegant Calimshan courtesan (under development). Shithri has many banters and even pirate songs.
Coondred NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Aion

This mod adds a special NPC: a raccoon, a totemic druid, who was raised by a clan of half-elf druids.

Please note: it uses the same portrait as Moddie the vixen.
Requires: ToB
Corwin
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Roxanne

This mod makes Captain Corwin Flaming Fist available as a recruitable NPC as soon as you enter the town of Baldur's Gate. Scar introduces her to you when you first meet him, and you can recruit her to help you with the affairs of her hometown. However, she will leave you when you go to Amn, as she is loyal to her town, its people and the Blazing Fist, and will not abandon them. This mod contains:
- Interactions with the protagonist to flesh out the initial friendship (or not) that develops into a possible romance in SoD.
- Encounters and cinematics that enrich Corwin's story.
- A continuous Corwin: She'll follow you into the first dungeon of SoD. She will retain her original role as companion without joining you, but her dialogues and reactions will reflect the fact that she already knows you and has traveled with you. She becomes recruitable again as soon as you leave town, and will continue to play the same role as in BG1.
- SoD's original content (including the romance) is preserved, but adapted to the possibility that she already knows the protagonist before the crusade. Overall, the pre-SoD content is intended to give Corwin a deeper personality and make her actions and decisions in SoD more transparent.
Note: Corwin is a useful archer in BG1. She will therefore retain her stat gains, XP, equipment, etc., when she joins you again in SoD.
Dace NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Tess Grey

jastey

Dace Linton is a neutral, chaotic bounty hunter in her thirties. You'll find her in the lower part of the Waukeen's Promenade, where she'll call out to you as you leave or enter the area. She has content for both SoA and ToB, including a romance available to both male and female PJs without race restriction, a friendship path based on the same principle, numerous banters and interjections, new music, personal items and a small gift for the PJ in ToB.
Darian NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Tempest

A lawful good elf archer of the Avariel race, Darian finds himself in Athkatla following rumors of the imprisonment of one of his compatriots, but things don't turn out as he expected. Suspicious at first sight, especially of little people, dwarves and other lowlifes, this noble heart will be difficult to tame. Only elves, half-elves and humans of good alignment may be able to break through his shell. He will also develop a friendship with Aerie. He has content for SoA and ToB. Find him outside the Copper Coronet.
STR 12, DEX 19, CON 14, INT 11, WIS 17, CHA 12.

Choose the github link for the BG2EE/EET version.
Dendjelion
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new companion to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition - Dendjelion. He's a halfling blackguard from Westgate. A crude person and a follower of Bhaal, the infamous Lord of Murder. A man who believes death may bring a change. Strong and vengeful. He came to Kuldahar in search of Noon - a knight of Lliira that he blames for killing his brother. You may join Dendjelion in Kuldahar, on the snow-covered rock to the east from Arundel's home. There is no true romance, but those who are not interested in deep feelings and are just looking for some one-on-one fun, may say that they're up for such deal.
Drake NPC for BG:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AionZ

This mod lets you recruit the Priest of Tyr Drake Caulfield, of good neutral alignment. You'll find him at the Burning Magician's Inn in BG1 and at the Three Old Barrels in SoD. He has a companion quest in BG1 and initiates a quest in SoD without needing to be recruited. Completion of his quest in BG1 is mandatory for completion of the friendship path.
Drake is rude, sarcastic and never minces his words. Exceptionally pragmatic and cynical for a servant of justice, he nevertheless follows the ideals of the Tyrian faith, albeit often in... unorthodox ways. He prefers to live life as it is, rather than as it should be, and indulges heavily in drink and innuendo. This puts him at odds with his peers, and his outspoken personality often provokes the same with his fellow travelers. For all his apparent faults, Drake is honest, reliable and often smarter than his behavior suggests. He has a strong sense of morality and chooses to see the world as something other than black and white. He is strongly devoted to his family above all else, including the Order.
Drake can befriend any PC of non-evil alignment, and can be flirted with in the course of his various conversations by a PC of any gender and race. Although he can respond amicably, there is no romantic path in BG1. In Siege of Dragonspear, a non-evil PC with a Charisma of 16 or more can flirt with him during his friendly dialog, which can initiate a romantic branch.
Dusk NPC for BGII
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Pol Rupes

This mod features a new NPC joining to the party: Dusk, the Wizard Slayer. Ardusk Aldant, also know as Dusk, is a warrior from Cormyr, trained in the Order of the Purple Dragons. After a long journey to Athkatla, Dusk now becomes a notable Wizard Slayer who just wants to live in peace. But a dark figure attacks in the peaceful Waukeen's Promenade.

This mod was included in Autumn's Twilight for BGII by the same author.
Dusky
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new companion to IWD:EE: Dusky, a half-orcish cleric/thief of chaotic neutral alignment whom you'll find near to the cave entrance near Easthaven. May be romanced by any male character of Charisma 11 or greater, and should fit good, neutral, and evil-themed teams. The mod includes friendship talks, romance talks, a few interjections.
STR 17, DEX 18, CON 16, INT 10, WIS 16, CHA 9.

Warning: Note that the mod includes mature content, which some may consider explicit.
Dvaradime
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Dynaheir BG2EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Dynaheir BG2EE allows players to decide which of the Rashemaar companions should be available during the Shadows of Amn and Throne of Bhaal campaigns - Minsc or Dynaheir. The decision is made on a new area, to which you need to bring Minsc - there is a new door next to his cage. Free him and let him see what happened to his friend.
Ehlastra
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Roxanne

Those who have already played ToB will remember her. This berserker woman came from the north to join Yaga Shura, but was eventually enslaved and became his concubine. You may have wanted to bring her into your party to learn more about her past and the history of the Five. Give her a chance and she'll do everything to be on the winning side in the war of Baal's descendants - on your side. Help her retrieve her powerful weapon from Yaga Shura's lair and watch her take revenge on her captor. Ehlastra knows the Five and Melissane - this mod is not recommended if you're playing ToB for the first time. Installing Wheels of Prophecy is not mandatory, but highly recommended. Her story gains in depth if you have it (or Ascension) installed: if you convince Balthazar to ally herself with you, it will have a profound impact on her, and make her reconsider her own goals.
Eldoth for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

Lava Del'Vortel

Eldoth Kron is back for the Siege of Dragonspear official DLC. He's still as nasty as he used to be, but now, since he can no longer manipulate Skie Silvershield (only pester her on occasion, when they notice each other), he should have enough time to get on your nerves instead. He is still an evil bard who may now be recruited in Elfsong Tavern, inside the wine storage.
The character comes with a small quest, some timed talks, interjections, and a few banters with other companions.

This mod adds a new NPC, Elvanshalee, a chaotic good drow, priestess of Eilistraee, whom you'll find in the government district. She uses a sword that only priestesses of Eilistraee can wield.

Warning: This mod is known to be somewhat buggy, as Elvanshalee has a nasty tendency to repeat the same dialogs.

Emily, a Half-Elf Archer
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Skitia

Link
Emily is a noblewoman from Tethyr. Tired of the political struggles to determine the next heir to House Castella, she has headed north to find her birth mother. Unfortunately, the closure of the Baldur's Gate road and the presence of bandits prompted her to seek a guide to accompany her, in exchange for her martial skills.
STR 12, DEX 17, CON 14, INT 16, WIS 14, CHA 16

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Jarno Mikkola

Esriak is a Tanar'ri Neutral Evil abjurer. But don't trust appearances, he's aâ€¦ mind flayer. Find out why. He has several banters, including with Anomen.

Evandra
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Rhaella

Evandra is an absolute neutral elven illusionist and, for those familiar with the Lancedragon universe, a red-robed High Sorcery magician. Given her elven origins, her alignment in some senses represents a fall - a significant departure from what she had at one point planned in life.
She finds herself inside the planar sphere before chapter 4, trapped with the Knights of Solamnia. She can be recruited immediately. Note that the wizard's fortress option to send knights back to their home world is no longer available, although players of all classes can eventually resolve their situation.
Fade NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Mistress Elysia

Silmarien

Kai

Lava Del'Vortel

She's a Tiefflin elf, a Fey'ri, of neutral chaotic alignment, and a mono-classified thief. She is one of Aran Linvail's lieutenants, and has magical abilities due to her ancestry. Her romance can be pursued by any male character, regardless of class, race or alignment. Recruit her early on, as her romances and personal quests are relatively long. To mark the release of the ToB part, the mod has been switched back to English, and its verve is consistent: banters with Bioware NPCs and certain shadow thieves, flirtations, new protagonists, 2 main quests and a wackier quest.
STR 14, DEX 19, CON 10, INT 16, WIS 11, CHA 16.
Faldorn BG2EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod allows you to recruit Faldorn, BG:EE's Shadow Druid, in BG2:EE. However, you should remember that sheâ€™s a wild one and won't be as peaceful as most druids. On the contrary: she's the wild spark that may start a great fire.
Faldorn can join the party after her original Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn plot. Once you finish the Trademeet quests and become the town's hero, wait for a day or two, and you will be approached by another druid. He will ask you to return to the Druid Grove because something bizarre has happened.
Faldorn has 3 small quests in SoA and 1 small quest in ToB. Furthermore, she may be romanced by males and females of any chaotic alignment with a Strength of 13 or higher and a Constitution of 11 or higher. All these conditions must be met to develop a romantic relationship with Faldorn. However, keep in mind she's not exactly a warm and kind character, and it's reflected in all of her talks.
To make her even more useful, her profile includes a special ability that allows her to transform into a centipede. In this form, she can use thieving abilities, but cannot cast spells and becomes quite weak in combat.
Faldorn for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

Lava Del'Vortel

Faldorn returns as a possible companion for the Siege of Dragonspear official DLC. She may now be encountered in Baldur's Gate, near the Iron Throne building. Convince her she should join your group, and you will be able to keep her for the whole DLC. She comes with a few timed talks, interjections, banters, a small quest, and a few quasi-romantic talks that serve as somewhat of an introduction to the Faldorn BG2EE mod.
Faren
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

Miss Sakaki

"Housed" in Trademeet prison, this strict neutral fighter/thief is tight-lipped about his past. He grew up in Trademeet, was part of its militia for a time, and traveled to Luskan with a few adventurers. Female, male, of any race or class, Faren's romance is accessible to all. He also has content for players not looking for this type of relationship. Banters are possible with Chloe NPC and Fade NPC, in addition to Bioware NPCs. The mod covers the SoA and ToB parts.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 16, INT 10, WIS 12, CHA 10.
Fhaugy
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Fhaugy is a neutral half-orc monk. While there is still some anger and burdening experience he finds hard to forget, he does not want to give in to his darker side but find a way to keep things in check. He also has a sense of humor he will gladly share with you, his potential leader and friend.
The mod features a personal quest in SoA and ToB, as well as a romance with a male character. Furthermore, Fhaugy has his own custom monk kit.
You can find Fhaugy in the Umar Inn in Imnesvale.

Finch is a priestess of Deneir, a neutral gnome, a scholar and always with her nose in her parchments and books. Interactions with every character, a voice kit, plus a personal quest. And she won't hesitate to recount her hectic readings if she hasn't already led a life of adventure.

Foundling: Between the Shades
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Cold and calculating, Foundling is a slave of Thaxll'ssillvia, the Shadow Dragon, who wants to free himself from his influence. He can never oppose his master on his own, but everything can change thanks to the influence of the Bhaalspawn. He's an adept of shadow magic who can't cast traditional mage spells, but has a whole range of alternatives at his disposal and he has his own HLA. The mod introduces new characters, areas, music, items, soundset etc. His quest begins as soon as his master dies.
STR 14, DEX 17, CON 11, INT 17, WIS 11, CHA 7.

The mod adds a new companion to BG2EE: Fyalvara, a human warrioress from the distant land of Rashemen. Upon install, she can be a kitless fighter, a wizard slayer, or a totemic druid / fighter dual-class (may only level up as a fighter).
Fyalvara can be found in the docks district.

He has content for SoA and ToB, friendship dialogs in SoA and ToB, a short romance for all neutral or good female PJs in ToB, and a mini-quest.

Crevs Daak

Galileo is a halfling bard of Neutral Good alignment. He has a special skill that can be used once a day to heal party members. At higher levels, it also protects allies against fear, charm and confusion.

Gavin NPC Mod for BG2EE, EET, BG2, or BGT
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

berelinde

jastey

This mod introduces a Cleric of Lathander who can be romanced by any character, regardless of race or alignment (although he won't romanticize assassins). Gavin is talkative, idealistic, a bit of a coward, romantic, awkward and a Lathandrite. His difficult past haunts him, and his reasons for accompanying you on your adventures (apart from the usual desire for a better world) will gradually become clear to you... Find him at the temple of Ilmater.
STR 16, DEX 12, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 17, CHA 12.
Gavin NPC Mod for BGEE, EET, BGT, or Tutu
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

berelinde

This mod adds a romanticizable Cleric of Lathander for all PJs regardless of race or alignment (although it won't romanticize assassins). Gavin is talkative, idealistic, a bit of a coward, romantic, awkward and a Lathandrite. His difficult past haunts him, and his reasons for accompanying you on this adventure (apart from the usual desire for a better world) will gradually become clear to you... Banters, interjections and a little quest in Beregost. Meet him at the Temple of the Morning Song, not far from Beregost.
STR 16, DEX 12, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 17, CHA 12.
Glam's NPC Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

Glam Vrock

This NPC pack includes the Vynd mod (drow assassin) as well as four new NPCs (a dwarf, a halfling, a priest of Talos and... a dragon?), all of whom will interact with each other and the classic Baldur's Gate cast. Each includes a friendship path and a range of player-initiated dialogs, with more options opening up as the game progresses.
You want quests? You'll get them! Three of the four new characters come with their own personal missions, which must be completed to unlock all their player-initiated dialogues, as well as a final loyalty-inspired speech at the end of the game.
Want loot? You'll find lots of new, unique items, some supplied with characters, others found through their quests, or simply blind slaughter. Collect them all!
Gloran NPC
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Gloran

Link
This mod adds a good chaotic dwarf fighter, master of the halberd. Gloran can be found at the city gates. He has a few items and a few banters with the other characters.
STR 18/94, DEX 16, CON 17, INT 10, WIS 12, CHA 7.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Goblinmod Shuk
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

Genwa

Link
This mod adds the chaotic evil goblin fighter Shuk to the game, who can be summoned once a day with a goblin stone (found in the Friendly Arm tavern). He's considered a pet, which allows him to change regions and explore the map, but the player suffers no permanent damage to his Constitution when he dies. If summoned for more than eighteen hours in a row, he suffers from exhaustion.
His level is equal to half the main character's experience. His skills can be enhanced by interacting with him in certain situations and by performing tasks.
STR 15, DEX 17, CON 10, INT 12, WIS 9, CHA 14.

Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Golden Horse Mercenary Company
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

svj

This mod introduces a recruitable NPC, Revan Artecratos, with a story, new items and encounters. In addition, several minor NPCs are available for hire as mercenaries.
The character's class can be chosen by components, the choices are: Assassin/Mage, Thief/Mage or Fighter/Mage/Thief.
STR 14, DEX 16, CON 15, INT 16, WIS 15, CHA 15.
Grey the Dog NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Team

jastey

Rabain

Grey is a recruitable NPC in his own right, but remains a real dog. The only magic he has is his collar, which gives him a 1 bonus to his AC. Other items can be found in the game. He also has his own kit: the Wolfhound. If you feel like playing ba-ball or just want to talk to him, click on it. But Grey doesn't initiate dialog, so don't expect any kind of friendship, let alone romance (not even with the shapeshifters). In BG1, there are two small quests, both available at Baldur's Gate. If necessary, Grey can be asked to "search" for missing persons: in BG1, Brage and the Brown farmer's son; in SoD, the five missing refugees. However, this has been coded so as not to spoil too many quests. So don't expect too much help. He can follow you as a 7th companion.

For the moment, although compatible, the mod has no content for BG2:EE.

This mod features Guldruk, a half-orc KensaÃ¯.

BG2EE

EET

Team

berelinde

CamDawg

This mod adds a moon elf true neutral fighter. He was raised in Cormanthor, and spent his life defending it, until a wild surge teleported him to Athkatla. Will you help him adapt? The mod includes 2 banters with each of the Bioware NPCs, a short friendship track and numerous interjections. He can be found inside the Den of the Seven Vales in Waukeen's Promenade.
STR 18/92, DEX 17, CON 16, INT 11, WIS 9, CHA 9.
Helarine, Doomguide of Kelemvor

This mod adds a new NPC to the game: the priestess Helarine, Doomguide of Kelemvor. You'll find her outside the Friendly Arm Inn (BG:EE) or in the Athkatla Graveyard (BG2:EE).

Warning: Still in beta version, this mod has a rather bizarre installation procedure...
This mod is still in progress.
Helga, a Dwarven Priestess of Haela Brightaxe
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Skitia

Link
Helga comes out of retirement after years of temple duty and child caring to relive her younger fighting years. In BG1 and SoD she will gladly fight alongside a protagonist, so long as they help her protect her people or hunt her quarry. Possessing remarkable strength despite her age, she is not as durable as her other warrior kin, and should position herself carry. Able to temporarily call into her hand a powerful blade, she is still nonetheless able to rip through enemy lines.
She cares little for rules and peaceful solutions, and favors more violent, risk taking results in your choices. She is not evil, however, and overt malice will win her disapproval. She is not an available romance, but still provides a warm friendship for those who pursue it and enjoy battle as much as she.
STR 18, DEX 14, CON 15, INT 11, WIS 13, CHA 11.
Hendak le barbare
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Totonin

This mod allows you to recruit Hendak, the gladiator of the Copper Coronet. You will find him in his cell as usual. You must first complete the quest he gives you in the game in order to recruit him. Hendak is a human barbarian of chaotic good alignment. He has his own 3-act quest for SoA. A fourth act is planned for ToB. He has numerous banter lines and a fairly short friendship without restrictions on race, gender or alignment.
STR 18/48, DEX 16, CON 17, INT 10, WIS 6, CHA 12.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Requires: ToB
Hephernaan BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Lava Del'Vortel

Welcome back Hephernaan, a devil known from the Siege of Dragonspear campaign. Are you ready to make a great risk and let the evil puppetmaster into your group? Can you be truly confident about his motives and plans? Perhaps, become even stronger... but can you learn how to see through his lies and promises? Or believe that he truly wants to help or does he feel amused by all the events you wade through every single day? It's your choice.
The mod includes "friendship" talks, new areas, items, and encounters that may feel refreshing for players that are already fed up with the original BG2 content. As this mod uses Siege of Dragonspear references, it may be useful to play the trilogy.
Hommet
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

In need of a unique necromancer from different times? Meet Hommet Shaw, one of the Sword Coast Legends. Let him join your party after he lands in Icewind Dale as a result of a bizarre magic surge that sent him back in time. He isn't new to the world of adventures and has already faced powerful enemies. In the future, the villains he fought will try to invade the Sword Coast and cause problems in Luskan and its surrounding areas.
Hommet is a deadly blazing necromancer of chaotic good alignment. While he used to be neutral, he became a hero and revealed that his heart isn't as cold as those of the undead he usually summons. He'll join the party only if you decide to return to the Vale of Shadows after your main character hits 540 000 experience points.
Hubelpot the Vegetable Merchant NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

BobTokyo

SConrad

There are people destined for a great future, others filled with power and talent, and still others more sexy-than-thou. But they all need a good cook: hence the usefulness of our druid greengrocer Hubelpot. You can find him in Enge's fruit and vegetable store on the Waukeen's Promenade. Hubelpot offers some 30 jokes, none of which break the 4th wall or include the word "turnip". He interacts with all Bioware NPCs except Sarevok. In ToB, he's still pretty quiet, speaking only when called upon, with Volo and at the end of ToB. He also has a quest full of twists and turns, with an unusual reward.
STR 12, DEX 8, CON 10, INT 10, WIS 14, CHA 13.
Huple NPC
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGT

Garland

Huple is a soldier in Amn's army. He will accompany you on your journey through the mines of Nashkel, as well as on a few quests around the area. Huple has blind faith in order, justice and the law. He carries with him a symposium of laws and decrees. And, in numerous dialogues, he will confront his point of view with yours and that of your companions.
STR 17, DEX 10, CON 16, INT 8, WIS 18, CHA 17.

Available in ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

jastey

Husam is an Amnian shadow thief, who was sent into BG1 to make sure that the accusations against his guild regarding the murders turned out to be false. In the original game, he reveals himself to the protagonist towards the end of BG1 and guides the protagonist to the real culprits. He can follow you as a 7th companion.
STR 17, DEX 18, CON 16, INT 15, WIS 14, CHA 10.
In Love, Undeath
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a new series of quests in a new area, as well as a new recruitable character: XzelÃ« Melaenitt, the paladin of Evening Glory. Who wants to protect her friends, even after they've passed on. She'll only join you once she's sure her friends are safe and that nothing bad will happen to them while she's helping you. She has a series of talks, her own kit and abilities... and under the right circumstances, she may feel a connection to a male Child of Bhaal. The conditions, though, demand a certain change.
Ina
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new companion to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition. Her name is Ina. A bard and a former teacher. But there is something else that you should know about her: she is a spectre. An image of her long gone self. Will you free her from her slumber in the Vale of Shadows. Will you let her join your team and once again walk among the living?
The mod includes talks with the PC, as well as a romance for female PC. Because of her state, the relationship will differ to those between the two living.
Ina may be recruited after the main quest in the Vale of Shadows.

This mod adds a new NPC, a half-elf fighter-mage, lawful good, who can be found in the ruins of Flammevin Bridge. She has piquant interactions with most of the other characters.

Isaac NPC
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Skitia

Link
Isaac is a thief lawful evil who values honor, and though his methods are ruthless and sometimes cruel to achieve his ends, he values the systems of order and only wishes to expunge what he believes corrupts Faerun, the meddling of devils, demons, and their spawn. In balance, so must the spawn of any outsider be removed. This puts him against people like Haer'dalis, Sirene, and Emily. However, his loyalty to the PC encourages him to respect who they bring along, though displease him too much, and he may leave of his own choice. Isaac has his own kit, but he can also use the The Artisan's Kitpack Invisible Blade Kit if installed.
STR 17, DEX 18, CON 10, INT 17, WIS 10, CHA 12.

This mod is still in progress.
Ishlilka the Wizard Slayer
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

EET

WarChiefZeke

Ishlilka is a newly-trained wizard slayer who has come to this part of the Sword Coast to prove herself worthy of her father and his band of renowned mercenaries. Noble at heart, and alone against a strange enemy, she gladly takes up your cause in exchange for your help. You'll find her at the Friendly Arm Inn. The mod features a friendship path, a romance and a quest for SoD.
Isra NPC for BG
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Rhaella

A follower of Sune Firehair, a chaotic deity, Isra is an atypical paladin in that she frequents many houses with a certain cheerfulness, and therefore lacks the classic gravity typical of this character class. Like all paladins, she holds everything to do with honor, discipline and order in high esteem, but tends to esteem the code of conduct of her class more than the demands of her goddess. As a result, she will be more lax towards certain chaotic behaviors. A path of friendship is possible, and a few flirtations are also available. Her romance is planned for BG2. Isra has additional content if BG:EE is installed (banters).
STR 16, DEX 12, CON 16, INT 13, WIS 14, CHA 17
Isra NPC for BGII
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Rhaella

Freddy_Gwendo

Isra is a paladin, following Sunie Firehair, whom you can meet in the Den of the Seven Vales on the Waukeen's Promenade. You'll need to complete a few quests before she can be recruited - make sure your reputation is at least 14. Isra will romanticize good charname with charisma above 13, regardless of race, class or gender. And she won't join your party if charname is of the evil alignment.
IWD NPC Project
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

IWDEE

Kulyok

This mod lets you import 5 characters into your party at creation, who will talk to each other and intervene during the game, just like the characters in Baldur's Gate 2! It requires the Heart of Winter expansion pack. They are Nella (fighter), Korin (ranger), Teri (fighter/thief), Holvir (paladin) and Severn (bard). You can also assign alternative classes: Nella (fighter/cleric or fighter/druid), Korin (cleric/ranger), Teri (thief, mage/thief or fighter/mage/thief) and Severn (mage or fighter/mage).

For the EE version, alternative portraits are offered by the Custom portraits for Icewind Dale NPC Mod.
IWD-in-BG2 Fixpack/Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

DavidW

It also contains 11 recruitable NPCs, created from the sound sets and portraits of the existing game. These are basic NPCs, at about the same level as BG1 NPCs. In other words, they have a recruiting dialog and not much else - no interactions, romances, quests or the like.
Iylos NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

K'aeloree

jastey

A lawful good monk from Amkethran. He is a very serious man at first glance, but a second shows that he has an ironic, slightly twisted sense of humour which doesn't exactly fit with one's general idea of a monk. He fights offensively and aggressively, seeking out the weakness of an opponent before taking them out as quickly and efficiently as possible, and possesses a somewhat sour disposition. Many dialogues are included, notably with other NPCs from mods, and a little flirting is possible with the NPC if she's a lady.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 14, INT 15, WIS 12, CHA 14
Jini NPC Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

nullset

This is a prequel to another mod by the same author, Rjali Romance for BG2:EE, which sets the scene for what follows in BG2:EE.
Jini is a djinn imprisoned in the lamp who gives you the young Rjali if you are male and not evil. She provides you with the usual services of a lamp djinn and, if you're nice to her, a romance can blossom. She can provide equipment for your party members, but will only do so if you ask her nicely. She will never join your party, but she and her lamp will accompany you on your way. The mod also adds Fay, a will-o'-the-wisp who will follow you like a sort of pet. Fay will woo you as best she can, being so small. Neither she nor Jini have any problem with this arrangement.
STR 15, DEX 17, CON 17, INT 11, WIS 18, CHA 12.

Requires: SoD
Juniper and the Stone Leech
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Juniper and the Stone Leech is a new mod that introduces a new Throne of Bhaal adventure along with a new companion that will ask you to join her in the investigation of the otherworldly realm of Har'Akir, part of Ravenloft. Help Juniper and travel with her to the mysterious land. See the dark temple, located in the dark desert of Har'Akir, fight enemies, discover the halls of the temple and find the source of the disturbance that troubles your new friend.
K'Velarin Au'dayrr
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AionZ

This mod adds a recruitable character: K'Velarin. A drow Fighter/Mage/Thief of lawful evil alignment. Although you may encounter him several times in the game, he can only be recruited from chapter 5 onwards. Contrary to what his alignment suggests, you need a minimum reputation of 15 or Charisma of 18 to be able to integrate him into the group.
STR 18/78, DEX 15, CON 17, INT 17, WIS 13, CHA 8.

Requires: SoD
Kale, a Halfling Barbarian
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Skitia

Link
A storyteller of great adventures he may or may not have had, Kale is a Gullykind little person, claiming to be "heroic", with a quick smile and dashing cape. However, he seems darker than he looks, his smile hiding his frustrations at the inability to be great. Your party is offering him a chance to prove himself to himself and the rest of the world, and he'll gladly contribute his astute ability to take a lot of hits and stay on his feet.
In BG:EE, Kale is a barbarian, but in BG2:EE and eventually BG:EE, he can be equipped with a guardian kit.
In SoD, he's in the Elf's Song tavern. Since he doesn't like the idea of traveling with a goblin, he'll have to be persuaded to put up with it, or he won't leave the party.
In BG2:EE, he's outside the Copper Coronet, shortly after learning of his father's death.
Kari the Kobold
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Moongaze

Link
This human/kobold half-breed is a druidess by trade. Still in beta (her romance hasn't been written yet), this mod has created controversy on American sites. As it stands, Kari is already playable and very endearing, a kind of Aerie without the whine.
STR 9, DEX 16, CON 8, INT 13, WIS 14, CHA 15.

Fichier Kariv1-3b.rar.
Karihi NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

AionZ

This mod adds a new NPC to IWD:EE: Karihi, a neutral pyromancer fire genasi from the remote land of Frozenfar. She's a fallen noblewoman with a rather unpleasant past. As befits her fire genasi heritage, she's feisty, bossy, quick-tempered and quick to take offense, as well as self-assured and arrogant, but her skills as a pyromancer and scholar are undeniably impressive. And she'd make a powerful mage... provided you can tolerate her arrogance and endless complaints about the cold and long treks through the World's Backbone. You'll find her in Havredest, outside the Snowdrift Inn... shivering and complaining about the winter wind.
Karihi has a series of friendly dialogues throughout the game, and a human, elf or half-elven male PC with at least 9 Charisma can start a romance with her. In addition, a mage PC can learn a few pyromancy spells.
STR 10, DEX 18, CON 16, INT 19, WIS 13, CHA 13.

BGT

Team

Vlad

Senka

This mod adds friendship with Keldorn, develops his conflict with Anomen, his relationship with Maria and brings the PC into Keldorn's enclave and family castle to protect his lands from invaders.

This mod has disappeared from http://forums.blackwyrmlair.net/index.php?showtopic=5305.
Kelsey NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate 2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

K4thos

Jason Compton

This mod adds a sorcerer netral good, with whom a romance is possible, as well as interactions with other NPCs. The romance continues in ToB, but ToB is not mandatory for this to work (2 installations are possible). Kelsey also adds new enemies.

Keto NPC MOD For Baldur's Gate 2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Blue

Bons

Jason Compton

K4thos

Keto is a neutral good human bard with a penchant for the bottle and stories, whom you'll find at the Five Flagons. Very talkative, she has many dialogues with recruitable NPCs, with a myriad of passing NPCs, and comments on more than one adventure when she's not telling a tale. Considered one of the best NPC modules (two and a half years in the making), Keto also has her own personal quest and her own voice set, plus sets from several speakers (400). The fact that she has no ToB content is a plus, as she can be replaced in ToB by Sarevok or Irenicus (mods Redemption or The Longer Road).
STR 11, DEX 15, CON 16, INT 15, WIS 9, CHA 15.
Khalid BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod allows players to decide who is going to stay with them for the entire Baldur's Gate 2: EE and ToB game. It places Khalid near Jaheira's cage. Help him, and Jaheira will become unavailable as she will be the one taken away by Irenicus, and Khalid will be the one to mourn her. Help Jaheira, and Khalid will suffer his original fate. Make your choice and... well... live with the consequences.
The mod includes a new portrait, voicing, a friendship path, new versions of Baron Ployer and trouble with the Harpers quests, new items and even a chance for Khalid to get his own kit after the Underdark.
There is no romance, but instead, thereâ€™s a little new non-romantic path for male NPCs: a new take on the brotherhood relationship I once tried to write for a different NPC. It's a deep, yet non-romantic friendship triggered by Khalid's difficult relationship with his half-brothers in Calimshan and Bhaalspawn's not-very-brotherly relationship with Sarevok and their lack of a father. Female PCs get something too - a special gift Jaheira found during the times of the Crusade and gave to Khalid, hoping they would one day give it to their leader together.
Khalid for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Zireael

Link
This mod restores Khalid, Jaheira's husband, who can be found in the Harpers' headquarters. He can be installed as a fighter or as a fighter/mage.

La version sur cob est plus rÃ©cente que celle sur shs.
Kiara Zaiya
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Alan M.C.

Seifer

Jesara

This mod adds 2 new female characters, a Chaotic Good half-elven wild mage (Zaiya) and an Neutral Evil human monk (Kiara). Interactions galore, new enemies, a readjustment of the monks' high-level abilities, improved combat against the golem in the Arnise dungeon and the battles in chapters 2 and 6 against Amaralis (in the same vein as those in Tactics or Ascension for the one in chapter 6), not to mention characters with special abilities and equipment. Last but not least, the icing on the cake is a romance with Kiara that may lead to her redemption. The romances are sometimes quite daring (Zaiya romances Cernd).
Zaiya : STR 9, DEX 16, CON 16, INT 17, WIS 15, CHA 10.
Kiara : STR 14, DEX 17, CON 12, INT 15, WIS 10, CHA 16.

Watcher's keep is hidden in SoA.
Not all Valen NPC dialogs will appear.
Kido NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Deathsangel

Already in playable beta, this mod is part of a more ambitious project, "The Mod for the Wicked". A jester and Cyric worshipper (yes, yes...), Kido is a Jester with a chaotic evil alignment. He has a quest, a soundset that's outrageously unbelievable (he sings worse than a Star Academician), and numerous dialogues, including one with Ariena the Half Orc. Find him in the Five Flagons Inn.
STR 11, DEX 17, CON 13, INT 16, WIS 8, CHA 15.

Choose this link for the BG2EE/EET version. Please note that this is an unofficial version.
Killing Wolf NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

inintrag

Killing Wolf is un fighter true neutral who will join your party if you reach a certain level. He has his own store, but you won't be able to access it once he joins your party. You'll find him on the floor of the Five Flagons Inn, where he'll return if you part with him. Most of the items in his store are unidentified because they come from the Fallout game. If you know what they are, then buy them, if not, have fun discovering what they do!
STR 18, DEX 18, CON 16, INT 13, WIS 10, CHA 10.

There is an unofficial version of this mod to EE versions available here, which also offers a Chinese translation.

Incredibly beautiful, deliciously sensual... and terribly unnerving. Kim makes a detour to Athkathla. Can you tame her? This mod adds a new NPC, Kim, and a quest of her own, as well as a romance. You can find her near Renald Bloodscalp.
STR 17, DEX 18, CON 10, INT 14, WIS 7, CHA 16.

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

CoM_Solaufein

Link
This mod adds a very powerful NPC, chaotic neutral and berserker. He has a new race, a sort of half-giant of magical origin. He is unromanceable, but has a personal quest and a specific encounter. He also has numerous interactions, sounds and cinematics with the other characters. Beware of mage, bard, sorcerer and multi-classed mage characters. Kindrek will refuse to join you.

Rastor

Kitanya is a sympathetic elf magician-slayer with a pleasant, chaotic companionship, lots of interaction and romance. She can even have particularly amusing dialogues with Edwin. You'll find her around the Umar Hills. Her martial skills are focused on longsword and shield handling.

Kivan and Deheriana Companions for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Domi

Formerly Kivan of Shilmista, Kivan is finally back in BG2 thanks to this mod, along with his wife, Dehenaria (under certain conditions). He meets you at the exit of the Irenicus dungeon. For those who haven't played BG1, it's a chance to get to know one of the best NPCs in the original game, and for the rest of us, it's a chance to see what happened to Kivan and how he's changed.
STR 18/21, DEX 17, CON 14, INT 12, WIS 16, CHA 8.
Korax the Ghoul NPC Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

semiticgod

Korax is a crude, ugly monster. He's long forgotten who he was in life, but the loss of his former identity doesn't seem to bother him. Beneath his twisted, rotting face and the putrid smell of death, he's a rather cheerful and surprisingly friendly "person". Yet every time you catch him staring at you with his unblinking dead eyes, you can't shake the feeling that he's thinking of eating your flesh.
As a ghoul, Korax is immune to many afflictions but seems unable to wield a weapon, dress himself or drink a potion. His attacks, on the other hand, paralyze his opponents. He can follow you as a 7th companion.
STR 19, DEX 9, CON 15, INT 9, WIS 9, CHA 4.
Krondor
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Mike

Krondor is a surly but good-natured Dwarf who's fun to have around. He has an animal companion (Wolfie, a Worg) who factors into several of his dialogues. He encourages the PC to take the Good path in any quest, acting much like Keldorn or Mazzy. He has a heavy accent & is a bit gruff, but very likeable. Unfortunately, you never get to find out about his history, such as how'd he meet Wolfie, where they're from, why'd they come to the Umar Hills.
STR 18/00, DEX 16, CON 15, INT 13, WIS 18, CHA 10.

This mod has disappeared from https://www.insimilion.pl/plik/baldurs-gate-2,112/krondor,112.
L'anna
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

Welcome L'anna Falthisslar, an elven paladin - Mythseeker of Mythrien Sarath - and help her find the holy blade known as Mythalass-Teel. Talks to her, learn about her past and about old elven places like Myth Drannor, Myth Ondath or Myth Rhynn. Help her, and she shall help you on your mission of investigating the strange happenings Icewind Dale is struggling with.
She can strike up a romance with elven males of non-evil character. You can recruit her at the Root Cellar (the pub in Kuldahar).

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

eugene

Lena is a fallen Tieffeline fighter, despotic, sadistic, cruel and bloodthirsty. She doesn't believe in love because of her past, her childhood. So her romance is unlike any other. She'll be both jealous and contemptuous. She has her own kit.
STR 16, DEX 19, CON 9, INT 14, WIS 11, CHA 16.
Lester NPC
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

Link
You'll meet the beer-loving fighter Bons on the second level of the Irenicus dungeon. When drunk, he has special abilities - and sometimes problems with alcohol.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Lhannd
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Lava Del'Vortel

Meet Lhannd Valdove, a chaotic good fallen ranger. He hails from a once-noble Athkatlan family who lost their legacy and drowned in problems. Will you lend a hand in breaking what others perceive as a curse, or will the chain of unfortunate events continue?

The mod comprises quests that expand Athkatla's Government District, including the addition of the Valdove Estate, situated above the local prison. If you are open to offering Lhannd a sympathetic ear, you may embark on a friendship or romance path that will help you get to know him even better, and... perhaps see his other side. Both men and women may romance him, however, the player character can't be of chaotic evil alignment for the romance to start.

To find Lhannd, venture into the Crooked Crane tavern located at the City Gates. The initial encounter serves as the starting point for his first quest.
Lilarcor NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

semiticgod

Everyone loves Lilarcor. Everyone loves the Sword of Mordenkainen spell. And everyone loves NPCs. So why not make Lilarcor an NPC, the floating sword?
It's a simple mod that lets you turn Lilarcor into a member of the party by talking to the sword. He'll float around you, strike your enemies and speak his usual lines of dialog. He can only wear rings or amulets and cannot use any items. He has a number of immunities.
STR 15, DEX 10, CON 14, INT 3, WIS 3, CHA 5.
Love Conquers All
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Daniel Valle

This mod allows Corwin to be recruited in SoA, and Caelar in ToB. Players can either continue the romance they started with Corwin in SoD, or start a new romance with her after her arrival in Athkatla. The mod adds over 200 new dialogs spread across all four games in the saga. In addition, there are dozens of new items, quests and scenes to enjoy.

There are several options available
Explicit version
EE version without EET
Voice pack
Read the readme to find out more.
Lysre, dragonne de poche
âš ï¸âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Klare

This mod features a new, rather special NPC: Lyzre, a juvenile black dragoness and Tiamat's disciple (spellcaster profile). Despite her height of 60 cm, Lysre looks down on you with contempt, as if you were a smudge on her scales. She's a black dragoness, proud, arrogant and greedy. To her, you and those close to you are nothing more than vulgar, contemptible "bipeds", "fleas" whose presence she has to put up with. She puts up with you only to satisfy her quest for revenge, and is rarely pleasant. In fact, her words are nothing but insults and contempt, and no one seems to find favor in her eyes. She has personal items, a few interactions with NPCs, and a quest (still in beta) to create a temple of Tiamat.
STR 8, DEX 21, CON 8, INT 17, WIS 12, CHA 16.

This mod has disappeared from https://www.baldursgateworld.fr/viewtopic.php?t=25036.
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

This mod adds M'Khiin Grubdoubler, the goblin companion from Siege of Dragonspear, to BG2EE as a recruitable NPC. Charname can choose to get to know her or meet her again in SOA. She can be recruited in the Temple district. She has several banters, a number of interactions and a small quest.

This mod adds a new halfling tracker who travels the Sword Coast, although it's obvious she's not from the region. She likes to pass herself off as useless, shy or innocent, even if that's not quite the case. You can recruit her from the Nashkel Mines.
STR 15, DEX 17, CON 15, INT 12, WIS 14, CHA 15.

It must be installed before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
Select the GitHub version that is EET-compatible.

Mercenaries of the Sword Coast
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Lassal

The main idea of this mod is to allow the player to hire mercenaries of different races and types, who don't exist as recruitable NPCs.
For the moment, these mercenaries don't talk to the protagonist, only the hiring dialogs exist.

The mod can only be downloaded via the github link.
This mod is still in progress.
Requires: EET
Minerva NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

AionZ

For those who enjoyed travelling with Aura in Aura NPC for Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition (and for those who are waiting for the sequel to BG2), here's another companion in the same vein for IWD:EE: Minerva Gwyndoline Glimmershine, a neutral good fighter gnome. Minerva Glimmershine is Aura's paternal grandmother and a free-spirited adventurer. Confident, daring and full of spirit, she'll jump at the chance to join the party in Havredest, and will be a valuable companion thanks to her fireworks skills, knife-throwing expertise and boundless optimism. The mod includes a friendship path and a romance.
STR 12, DEX 17, CON 15, INT 19, WIS 10, CHA 16.
Mother Lost for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a new companion for the Siege of Dragonspear official DLC -- she calls herself Mother Lost, but in time you may uncover her true name. The character may join you late in the DLC, next to the Fugue Plane portal; some may therefore consider her more of a temporary character. She is looking for another character you, the Child of Bhaal, are destined to face. The character is an undead fighter and comes with only a few talks/comments. To enjoy the character more, I suggest playing IWD and IWD2 first, as the character refers to events from both games, and this mod was created to bring the two series even closer together. Be aware, it contains spoilers for both campaigns.
Mulgore and Xavia NPCs
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

Ascension64

Xavia is an evil neutral semi-elven assassin, Mulgore an evil chaotic semi-orc barbarian. Both can be found at the Inn of Ulgoth's Beard.
Xavia : STR 11, DEX 18, CON 18, INT 14, WIS 12, CHA 14.
Mulgore : STR 19, DEX 16, CON 19, INT 11, WIS 10, CHA 8.

Please note, in the words of its creator: "This mod is uncompleted! Since I'm not very experienced at the whole modding thing, ".
Mur'Neth NPC Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Andyr

This is a module adding a rather special NPC to the Nashkel mines. A servant of Ghaunadaur, god of frost, silt, gray slime and other such creatures, he too is a slime given human form by his god. He can transform himself at will, and is of neutral chaotic alignment, hence the many tensions with your team, except for Xzar (as luck would have it), for example. He has a specific kit based on that of the thief. He can speak and interact, including with Indira NPC. He can be found in the Nashkel mines.
STR 12, DEX 15, CON 16, INT 13, WIS 12, CHA 16
Nathaniel
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

Team

Miss Sakaki

Feuille

Kensai gay (only romanticizable by a male PJ) is a skilled fighter, although he suffers from a lack of self-confidence, probably due to his physical fragility. He has content for SoA and ToB. He can be found in the Docks district, and will come to you for help. Nathaniel will romanticize a human, elf or half-elven male character of good or lawful neutral alignment, provided he's not a thief. Nathaniel has content for Kelsey NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate 2 if this mod is installed.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 12, INT 11, WIS 9, CHA 14.

Choose this link for the EET version. Please note that this is an unofficial version.
Navarra
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Kitanna

This mod adds a good chaotic human barbarian to BG2. Navarra grew up in the harsh lands of Narfell. Slavery was not uncommon, and her tribe was no exception. She doesn't like slaves, but they've taken care of her since childhood. Because she grew up with slaves, she thinks men are weak-willed and unworthy of her. She knows only what she has been taught and what she has experienced in her tribe. What she has learned about men has been instilled in her over many years. Will she be able to cope with the events to come? Will a male PJ be able to help her see the truth, or even love her? To find out, go and meet her in the Den of the Seven Vales.
STR 18/91, DEX 16, CON 16, INT 10, WIS 10, CHA 10

AionZ

Link
This mod adds a lawful neutral character, with a judicial knight paladin kit. He interacts with all the characters in the group, and has lines in several quests. With a rich personality, he has personal items such as a talkative sword, as well as special abilities that make him increasingly powerful. He romances elves, half-elves, humans, tieffelines and gnomes of non-evil alignment and of a class different from that of the thief. It has content for SoA and ToB.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 15, INT 12, WIS 10, CHA 19

Halfeline, cleric of Yondalla by trade, Nephele adds a touch of humor and originality with content for BG2:SoA and ToB. This is a huge mod project by the Polish community, combining two previous mods (Project X and BG:EE 10 NPC Project). It includes:
- 10 new recruitable NPCs with their own quest, friendship path, romance and interactions.
- entirely new and original quests.
- new areas.
- over 100 new characters, including dangerous adversaries.
The authors warn that it is intended for adults only.

Ninde NPC for BGII
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Deva

K'aeloree

Rhaella

Freddy_Gwendo

Ninde Amblecrown is a young ingenue from Waterdeep. Now hunted, she's got a sharp tongue, formidable magical abilities and a huge ego. Can you stand her? Will her charms leave you cold? Events in her past life seem to have contributed to her dark temperament... Whether through romance or friendship, Ninde, a witch of evil alignment, will help you discover the darker side of her and Lassal's history. You can only find her in Bodhi's lair if you've chosen to ally yourself with Aran Linvail. Her romance is only possible for PJs with a charisma score of over 13, although there are no race/class restrictions. This mod also includes a new encounter in Athkatla, banters with Bioware NPCs and juicy exchanges with Bodhi, Lassal and Aran Linvail.
STR 9, DEX 15, CON 10, INT 16, WIS 16, CHA 15.
NPC Generator
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

Have you ever regretted that the game only lets you create an initial party consisting of the protagonist and (with some effort) a small number of additional characters? Not anymore! This mod lets you install pre-generated or exported characters as ordinary NPCs. You can meet them at predetermined locations, where you have the option of inviting them into your party or having them follow you without occupying a place in the party, at any time during the game. NPCs sent back can be instructed to wait or return to the original meeting place.
Oak-Maw
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new companion to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition - Oak-Maw, a dark fey, a hunter that to some may resemble a deer-like human. Yet he isn't a deer, nor is he a human. He is an unusual being and the son of the Stag King, best known in Rashemen. He is an outsider, someone who can make most men and women in Frozenfar feel uneasy. Will you risk your reputation and get to know him better? Will you be able to see him as someone equal to yourself? Will you trust him enough to build a possible relationship with someone so different from all the other men of Icewind Dale?
Oak-Maw may join you after finding and interacting with a special stone, marked with a glowing rune.

A self-proclaimed fighter and storyteller, she has traveled to Nashkel to help put an end to the Iron Crisis. Although she masks most of her vulnerabilities with a teasing nonchalance, she's driven by a deep desire to do good in the world and live life to the full.

Orra
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new companion to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition - Orra, a fighter/mage/cleric. She's a woman of honest heart, who came from a distant land of Kozakura. She values tranquility, truth, and companionship. Listen to her stories, talk to her, and perhaps you'll become friends.
The mod does not include a romantic path, which is explained in talks with the new companion. She may join you early in the game, in Easthaven. You'll find her standing on the wooden platform, not far from Elisia.

Recorder, a gnome lorekeeper NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Skitia

Link
Recorder is a scholarly gnome Harper born in the nation of Lantan, but who works for the Church of Oghma in Amn. Although she is less effective with weapons than other bards, her strength lies in her singing and magic, enabling her to protect her party from dangerous enchantments and to cast more magic than other bards. She has a feisty ferret named Gustav, who will bravely scout ahead if called upon.
She prefers the gentle approach, mercy and understanding where possible, and non-violent solutions, but will understand when there is no choice. She also appreciates art and music, and those who enjoy her play and are kind to her will win her friendship and affection.
She is first encountered in Candlekeep, but can only be recruited at the entrance to the ruins of Ulcaster. In SoD, you'll find her outside the Ducal Palace. In BG2, you'll find it in the Temple of Oghma, in the docks district.
Region of Terror
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Gilgamesh

Ikki

Wiskas

This rather large mod adds over 30 quests, including 10 huge ones (the list can be found here), allows you to recruit 7 "new" NPCs (Drizzt, Wulfgar, Regis, Catti-Brie, Bruenor, Entreri and Jarlaxle), adds around a hundred items, new kits, new spells and new areas.
The main idea revolves around the rescue of Drizzt and his companions, and his final confrontation with Artemis Entreri. If you're of the wrong alignment, you can betray Drizzt and join forces with Entreri.

EET

nullset

Rjali is a loving cleric/thief who won't leave your side. She will accept your other amours as long as you take good care of her. She has a full romance with the PC, player/NPC-initiated flirtations, banter with other NPCs, a number of interjections, character reactions and other dialogs. Adult content.

Saerileth is a pretty 15-year-old Paladin of Tyre. This mod is complete with content for SoA/ToB, a romance (for humans, elves and half-elves), several quests (bringing 3 new maps).
