Safana in Amn
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Roxanne

The flirtatious thief of the Sword Coast is one of the NPCs that has been considerably reworked in BG:EE, and she became an interesting character in the SoD expansion. Unfortunately, the game gives her a disappointing ending at the end of this campaign. Designed for EET, this mod modifies the end of SoD for Safana and allows her to continue with the party in Amn and Tethyr:
- a continuous NPC for the entire EET game.
- a continuous romance for a male player.
- several small quests in BG2.
- alternative solutions to a number of the game's quests that allow the player to use his talents.
- a possibility for a non-thief player to obtain MaeVar's guild if Safana is in the party.
- interjections and banters throughout the game.
- the possibility of obtaining a talented thief from the start of Amn, Safana is right next to Gaelan Bayle.
- a new ending to his relationship with Coran.
Saradas Magic for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Saradas

This mod adds a new NPC, Saradas the Archmage, who interacts in various ways with the Child of Bhaal group. In Shadows of Amn, he's a non-recruitable NPC who offers many services. He can be found in the Temple of Lathander, in the temple district of Athkatla. As well as having several exclusive dialogues that unfold as the plot unfolds, his store is well worth a visit. What's more, Saradas is an artifact collector. If you find an ancient artifact, you can bring it to him and he'll enchant it for you, conferring magical properties on the item.
In ToB, Saradas is finally a recruitable NPC! You can summon him via the Spirit of Destiny in your Pocket Plane. He's a human priest of Lathander paired with a mage.
STR 10, DEX 13, CON 14, INT 18, WIS 20, CHA 15.
Sarah NPC Romance Mod for BG2: ToB
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

theacefes

This chaotic good ranger hails from the slums of Baldur's Gate, and grew up with her uncle in Cloakwood, who taught her the ways of nature as well as the art of combat. Years later, she left the Cloakwood to explore on her own. She settled in an empty cabin not too far from Umar Hills. Sarah is a relatively shy but determined person who admits to loving nature more than people, but then again, perhaps she just hasn't found the right person yet.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 15, INT 14, WIS 12, CHA 10.
Severian de Demerya
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Coyote

Formerly known as Les Chroniques de Severian, this mod lets you enlist Severian Stark, a Halfshade outlaw (ranger kit) for your BG2: SoA and ToB games. There are men in FaerÃ»n who defend no cause but their own, ransoming and pillaging merchants and travelers daring to cross their forests. Severian is one such outlaw. Rumor has it that this reputed swordsman recently arrived in Athkatla and sometimes stays at the Inn of Good Rest, on the Waukeen's Promenade... Severian, of neutral chaotic alignment, has made a specialty of wielding bladed weapons, can make himself invisible, and is particularly fond of women. Banters, interjections and items galore, a flirtpack, a quest with plenty of combat, a tender romance and over 6,000 lines of text: that's what Severian de Demerya has to offer, from the depths of Amn to the summit of the Throne of Bhaal. Be sure to read the Readme!
STR 14, DEX 16, CON 18, INT 10, WIS 6, CHA 14.

Only the second link is compatible with BG2:EE.
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
Shar-Teel NPC for SoD
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

elminster

Not to be confused with Shar-Teel NPC, this mod allows you to recruit Shar-Teel in the Siege of Dragonspear expansion. You'll find her in one of the prison cells at the Flaming Fist headquarters, with limited dialog during the game (and all in modal form, so no highlighted text).

It must be installed before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
Sheena - The Half Dragon Tale
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Edvin

Red Knight

This mod adds a special new NPC: Sheena is a young woman... half-dragon. Yes, you read that right. She's full of passion and stories. Would you like to share your adventure with her?
She also has 5% magic resistance, 50% fire resistance and is immune to mental spells. She also has a much more powerful dragon form. Fortunately, she has a few drawbacks to compensate for this power (notably 10% less XP received). She's a multi-classed fighter/mage, neutral, good-looking and very pretty (in her human form). You can recruit her in the Firkraag dungeon after slicing up her daddy. She can have a romance with a male PJ of good or neutral alignment, who doesn't already have another romance underway, and only if Mazzy is also in the party (incidentally, the banters between the huge half-dragoness and the miniature knight, who quickly become buddies, are pretty funny).
Humam form : STR 16, DEX 12, CON 16, INT 15, WIS 10, CHA 15.
Dragon form : STR 20, DEX 12, CON 18, INT 15, WIS 10, CHA 15.

Use the Beamdog link to download the version for EE games.
This link contains the Russian translation.
This link contains the Chinese translation (EE only).
Sibel
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

el.critto

This mod introduces the character Sibel Arcanis, a young adventurer who asks for the protagonist's help in uncovering the truth behind the conspiracy that caused the death of her ancestors.

This mod is a stand-alone for Improved Anvil.
Silver Star NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Davide Carta

Seifer

Silver Star is an elven assassin Neutral Evil who can join the party in Irenicus' charming underground hole. This project recently underwent a change of direction as original creator Davide Carta decided to open the mod to the community. Seizing this opportunity, the new team decided to modify several original elements in a way that is considered more appropriate for Silver Star.
She's partly crazy and has childhood complexes: for example, she has a real obsession with sweet little lambs... And she sings and laughs. She's chronically poisonous, which explains her high tolerance to poison and her weak constitution.
She's a remorseless killer, when she's in a normal mood, and does evil things, like gambling, blackmail, murder, theft and so on. She has some interaction with NPCs in SoA, but not in ToB.
STR 14, DEX 19, CON 7, INT 16, WIS 6, CHA 14.
SimeNPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Roxanne

This mod makes it possible to recruit the thief Sime, sent by Aran Linvail to oversee your journey to Brynnlaw. But Sime has a personal reason for accessing the Asylum and seeing what's going on there. That's why she'll be in Brynnlaw even if you choose to join forces with Bodhi. You can therefore recruit her before entering the Asylum. Note that if you reject her before entering the asylum, she'll resume her role as guide as planned, but won't join you again.
She has the same characteristics as in the original game, but has more realistic equipment when she joins you. She also benefits from small quests related to missing family members or thieves.
Sir Ajantis NPC for BGII
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

jastey

Link
With this mod, Ajantis, the paladin of the Order of the Radiant Heart in BG1, can join the party after the battle in the Windspear Hills. It includes a romance that continues the one in Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification (in case of a trilogy), or a whole new one, as well as the possibility of developing a deep friendship with him. The mod assumes that Ajantis has been traveling with the PC in BG1 for some time. This is where Ajantis earned enough honor to be knighted.
STR 17, DEX 13, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 16, CHA 17.

[Ajantis Portrait Pack offers alternative portraits.
Sir Arkanis for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

Lava Del'Vortel

Arkanis, a member of the Candlekeep team and a dwarf Watcher, returns as a possible companion for the Siege of Dragonspear official DLC. He has received a promotion, and is now a paladin. The character comes with friendship talks, interjections, banters, and a possible romance with non-evil characters (gender and statistics do not matter, but you need to give him a sign or hint at least twice during the friendship path to make him notice your interest). He may join the party right after you leave Baldur's Gate.
Sir Wallace
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

CursedScholar

Wallace is a Druidic pumpkin who grew up on a farm. His metamorphosis occurred after an encounter with a wizard. Like all pumpkins, he is resistant to physical attack. His natural fondness for vegetables makes him unromanticizable, especially by humanoids with no respect for nature. Needless to say, he's a fervent defender of pumpkins of all sizes.
STR 14, DEX 16, CON 16, INT 9, WIS 16, CHA 13

This mod has disappeared from https://github.com/szaumoor/sirwallace.
Sirene NPC for BG2:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

AionZ

Sirene is a tiefeline paladin from Illmater with her own Martyr's kit, who can be found in the Radiant Heart headquarters. She doesn't get along with Dorn and Hexxat, and won't follow a character of poor alignment. The mod features friendship and romance dialogs (it's up to the player to show interest) and offers continuity with BG:EE if you've already recruited the character. It includes content related to certain NPCs in other mods, as well as to the Colours of Infinity mods.
Sirene NPC for BG:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AionZ

Sirene is a tiefeline paladin from Illmater with her own Martyr kit (but the player can choose another paladin kit) who can be met at the Temple of Lathander in Beregost. The mod is compatible with Siege of Dragonspear and enables the character to be recruited for the campaign. It includes content related to the White NPC and Verr'Sza mods by Lava.
STR 15, DEX 17, CON 15, INT 10, WIS 13, CHA 17.
Sister of Bhaalspawn
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Lassal

This mod for ToB lets you meet your sister in the Pocket Plane. Will you behave like a benevolent family member or succumb to Bhaal's call to murder her? The new NPC has 3 types of epilogues and his presence adds two more choices for the finale.

This mod is still in progress.
Skie BG2 NPC Redone
ğŸŸ¥âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

Lava Del'Vortel

Link
This is the very first mod by the prolific Lava, Skie BG2, completely rewritten and translated into English. Remember Skie, the rich and spoiled daughter of Entar Silvershield? This neutral human thief is now available as a recruitable NPC in BG2.
The mod features new interactions and conversations with Charname, her original set of sounds from the first part of the saga, as well as optional alternative portraits. Skie can start a romance with the main character - it must be an elf, human, half-elf or tieffelin. New items have been added, old ones modified, all scripts rewritten and a third epilogue added. Searching for items has been made easier and is now linked to a small romantic quest.

Fichier SKIEv.5.1.zip.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2009. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Incompatible with: Skie: The Cost of One Girl's Soul
Skie: The Cost of One Girl's Soul
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

A new Skie mod from Lava. Siege of Dragonspear has given Entar Silvershield's daughter a very important role in the plot, and this mod gives the player the chance to pursue her in the BG2 part of the game. It comprises three components:
- A new quest for BG2:EE that gives the player a chance to save Skie after what happened in SoD. However, saving her comes at a price. The mod begins in the Irenicus dungeon, when you find the main quest item.
- Skie can be recruited if you manage to help her. She'll be looking for you a little later in some of the inns, so don't forget to stop and rest from time to time. On the Waukeen's Promenade, a new merchant sells items related to certain characters, places or events in SoD. This component can be installed independently of the others.

Incompatible with: Skie BG2 NPC Redone
Skitia NPCs pack for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Skitia

This pack brings together the BG2 adventures of Skitia NPCs originally developed for BG:EE: Emily, a Half-Elf Archer, Helga, a Dwarven Priestess of Haela Brightaxe, Kale, a Halfling Barbarian, Recorder, a gnome lorekeeper NPC and Vienxay, an Elven Shadowdancer Mage.
Solaufein NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Wes Weimer

Sometimes called Weimer's Solaufein, this mod adds a recruitable Dark Elf fighter/mage NPC whose alignment depends on yours (chaotic good if your character is good or neutral, chaotic neutral if he's bad)... This is Ust Natha's Solaufein, whom you hire as you leave the city...
Note that he's very pleasant, has several challenges (difficult battles), rewards (which I'll let you discover) and a romance (no restrictions on gender, race or even other ongoing romances). Finally, it adds two scripts, Solo auto buff and Party auto buff (one for solo play, the other for party play). This makes enemies attack, healing potions drink, traps detect and allows mages, clerics, bards and druids to cast all their defense spells in a fraction of a second (if no enemies are present).
STR 18/21, DEX 18, CON 10, INT 18, WIS 10, CHA 16.

Choose the github link for the EE version (untranslated) and the other link for the original versions. The EE version is not official.
Solaufein's Rescue - jastey's Solaufein NPC mod for BGII
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

jastey

Link
Written by jastev, this mod is an alternative to Weimer's famous Solaufein NPC, and is compatible with the original BG2 games (with ToB), BGT, BG2:EE and EET.
Before you can recruit him, you must free Solaufein from the driders' chambers. This quest can be played independently of whether he joins the party or not (this is not Weimer's Solaufein NPC mod). Solaufein can also follow you as "7th party member" if your party already consists of 6 people. For more details, please read the readme file.
Solestia NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Sasha al'Therin

This little mod adds a special NPC to the game: Solestia De'Luna. Originally from Gullykin, this bretter has the appearance of a human but is in fact part halfling. Her armor is a family heirloom and she won't part with it (a little trick to prevent the game from changing her animation to halfling when she changes armor). You'll find her in the Copper Coronet with her two halfling cousins, Shorty and Slinger, who make wine deliveries. You'll have only three chances to recruit her: in your first initial conversation, and two more on subsequent visits to the inn. Considering every rejection of her offers of service insulting, she and her cousins will eventually turn violent.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 12, INT 12, WIS 8, CHA 14.

This mod adds a new recruitable NPC: the notorious seagull-hating halfling from the Pont district. This neutral chaotic fighter/thief will have banters, interjections, a friendship path and quests. He has content for SoA and ToB.
STR 14, DEX 19, CON 16, INT 13, WIS 8, CHA 10
Sub-zero
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Gamemacik

Sub-Zero is an assassin from the Lin Kuei clan. Kuai Liang possesses the power of ice and cold. As his name suggests, this character is clearly inspired by the Mortal Kombat character of the same name, and has his own distinctive style. He can follow you as a 7th companion.
STR 18/00, DEX 18, CON 18, INT 18, WIS 18, CHA 18.

This link) is compatible with EET.
Mod Mods_Tweaker makes the character's characteristics more RP.

Bri

Lord Ernie

This mod adds a new NPC, a young elven sorceress neutral good from the far north, straight out of the Spine of the World, with a possible romance with a male NPC. What's more, this romance continues in ToB. There are 3 different epilogues for this romance at the end of Throne of Bhaal, depending on the choice you make.
STR 11, DEX 19, CON 15, INT 15, WIS 14, CHA 12.

Tenya Thermidor
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

Insomniator

Although in her early twenties, Tenya is very powerful for her age, thanks to her mother's training for the glory of Umberlie. And she's very angry about her mother's murder... She has a mini-quest that will allow her to use her bowl of elemental control, and possibly pick up one or two other items along the way. She is a cleric of Neutral Chaotic alignment with an innate talent for the element of water. She makes up for her fairly average stats with effective items.
STR 9, DEX 16, CON 14, INT 12, WIS 16, CHA 13.

The mediafire link allows you to download a version for BGT.
It must be installed before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
Incompatible with: Garrick: Tales of a Troubadour

jmaeq

This mod adds an elf enchanter/thief and a hidden NPC. You'll find Minyae Beaurin outside the Inn of the Crooked Crane at the city gates. It includes personalized portraits, a friendship path for Minyae and the hidden NPC, numerous jokes and interjections, encounters and quests, a voice for both NPCs (only Minyae has a full set), a romance with a Bioware NPC...
STR 11, DEX 19, CON 12, INT 17, WIS 12, CHA 16.

The Heart of Baldur's Gate
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

ahungry

A powerful artifact has been discovered beneath the town of Baldur's Gate - "The Heart of Baldur's Gate". Rumor has it that this artifact is responsible for protecting Baldur's Gate from the forces of evil. The heart is said to be powerful enough to cast a multitude of spells, from arcane to divine, as well as summoning beings, including dragons. The soothsayers deduced that the holder of this artifact (even a peasant) would be more powerful than Jon Irenicus or Bhaal himself (and potentially as strong as MÃ©lissanne). A triangular power struggle begins - a race to obtain this artifact (currently guarded by the Keeper of the Heart, a sorcerer of immense powers and indeterminate origin). Accompanied by 5 characters with complementary powers, you'll attempt to triumph.

Only the characters seem to be created. Characters, story and dialog have been generated by AI.
This mod is still in progress.
The IWD2 NPC Project
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Domi

This mod adds loquacious new NPCs with banters, NPC interactions and daring romances, unless you don't recruit Salomeya and Sir Wind Nord. You can make up a ready-made team of 6 characters, or create your PJ and add 5 new NPCs from the 10 available (5 men and 5 women): Diriel (a bad neutral elf druid), Hildury (a good chaotic half-orc barbarian), Jaemal (a good neutral aasimar sorcerer), Nikosh Bracegirdle (a strict neutral halfling rogue), Sir Wind Nord (a lawful good human paladin), Peony (a neutral chaotic gnome illusionist), Prachi (a lawful neutral human nun), Rizdaer (a lawful evil drow fighter), Salomeya (a chaotic evil half-elf bard) and Valeero (a good neutral human priestess of Lathander).

This mod is also compatible with Icewind Dale 2: Enhanced Edition.
The Journey to the Whin Hill
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The Journey to the Whin Hill is an IWD-style adventure for BG2EE, in which you are sent to find a man in a new area known as the Whin Hill. However beware, as the place is known to be a home for wyverns, but... that's not the only threat you will find there. Also... why would anyone live in such a place? Find out, by visiting this new area and following the path under the hill.
There is also a bonus component: the mod includes a secret optional companion you may add to your game: Afu-Zuuvi, a chaotic neutral cleric/thief. He also includes one banter talk with each BioWare NPC, a personal kit, soundset and a couple of items.
The Longer Road
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

ladydorotea

Link
Finally, Irenicus becomes a recruitable character right from the start of ToB! This mod adds quests, dialogues and a breathtaking finale. Beware: your answers will have a major influence on your relationship with Irenicus, and the contract you fulfill with him by integrating him into your team will also have negative repercussions.

Requires: Ascension
Incompatible with: Redemption
The Luxley Family
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Miss Sakaki

Feuille

This mod adds two recruitable NPCs, Sebastian and Andrei Luxley. Sebastian is a chaotic neutral playwright with a rather special sense of humor who seems to take great pleasure in introducing his cousin Andrei to the world outside their family home. Andrei is a polite, lawful and neutral young monk with a strong sense of self who has led a rather sheltered life until now. Throughout your journey with them, you'll discover that their family isn't what it seems. You may have to make some tough decisions - and the path you choose will have repercussions. Note that this mod is packed with adult content.
Sebastian : STR 10, DEX 13, CON 13, INT 15, WIS 15, CHA 17.
Andrei : STR 16, DEX 16, CON 14, INT 12, WIS 9, CHA 12.

Shi woo

The mod adds a new quest after the original Xzar & Montaron quest is finished. Finishing the quest allows you to join the necromancer and the fighter/thief and learn more about their aspirations and plans. The mod also introduces two fully-fledged companions, timered talks, scenery talks, banters, interjections, mini-quests/encounters, items... and, hopefully, some fun.

In addition to the Solaufein NPC mod for recruiting the famous drow in Ust Natha, here's the continuation of the romance available for completion, with many ideas compiled in this completed mod, including the possibility of helping him with his choices (he leaves Underdark after all to follow you...).

The Sword of Chaos
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Roxanne

This mod adds Tamoko, Sarevok's former love, as a recruitable NPC at the end of BG:EE and during SoD. After defeating Sarevok in the underground city, and leaving the palace to hunt down his remaining followers, you meet Tamoko and can recruit her (unless you've killed her first). She has the same stats and equipment as the original character. She's an evil neutral priestess. No longer willing to be a victim of her past, she hopes, by joining you, to have perhaps a third chance to change things after the two tragic failures she has suffered. She will stay with you during the SoD campaign until she meets her destiny...

This mod adds two NPCs, Callisto T'sarran (evil neutral female elf berserker) and Ninafer (lawful neutral elf fighter/mage). New encounters related to Callisto's quest (formerly Desecration of Souls), seven new stores, three new quests, banters and interjections are also on the program.

Tipps
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new companion to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition. His name is Tipps Rattletattle; a halfling geomantic sorcerer. Turned to stone some years ago, he now may return to the world of the living and join the party lead by the Hero of Icewind Dale.
The mod includes some friendship talks, situational discussions, interjections, new items and a romance for short races: if your main character is a halfling, gnome or a dwarf, something more than friendship may emerge. While this may be triggered by all PC's, the romance may be slightly easier for female characters, however a charismatic or wise male can also pursue a serious relationship (if racial restrictions are met).

Requires: Geomantic Sorcerer Kit
Tortured Souls Lite
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Vlad Papper

Domi Sotto

Bill Harper

Arkie

The original designer has continued the mod's development in a stand-alone version, with numerous text reworkings. However, although compatible with Baldurdash-WeiDU 1.75 (mandatory) and Vlad's other mods Keldorn's Romance (highly recommended) and Never Ending Journey3 (mandatory), it is incompatible with most WeiDU mods including the BG2 FixPack!

Choose the github link for the EE version and the other link for the original version.
For EE versions, there's a stand-alone version of Sime: Vlad's Sime NPC.
Tortured Souls-BP
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Team

Vlad Papper

Domi Sotto

Bill Harper

King Diamond

Link
"Tortured Souls" is a generic term to encompass all NPCs who are troubled. This mod adds numerous banters, 4 new romances including one between Yoshimo and Kachiko, and a huge new quest. More specifically:
- 5 new recruitable NPCs including Sime (Aran Linvail's daughter, alongside her father if you worked for his guild in chapter 3), Kachiko (in Irenicus dungeon), Dynaheir (Sime and Minsc must be in the party), Coran (available in Tethyr forest) and Bodhi (if you chose to work for his guild in chapter 3).
A romance with Valygar for a female PJ, starting in SoA and continuing in ToB. A new, wide-ranging quest on the road to Spellhold, with Yoshimo and Kachiko as protagonists.
- A romance with Sime for PJs of both sexes. Several Sime-specific quests, one of which will lead you to face an enemy (indestructible in the 1st encounter) twice in the mod's main quest.
- Multiple class quests" component for multi-classed PJs, allowing them to complete quests for all their sub-classes.
- Slightly improved Twisted Rune combat.
- A host of new items (mostly from IWD1).
Yoshimo must be part of your party to recruit Kachiko. Similarly, Coran can only be recruited by triggering a mini-quest in the Adventurer Mart (you must enter without Jaheira in your party).
This version is compatible with The Big Picture and most WeiDU mods.

Fichier TS-BPv6.10.rar.
Incompatible with: Corthala Romantique
Tsujatha Melalor
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Sillara

CoM_Solaufein

Link
This mod adds a fictional character, Tsujatha Melalor, an elven necromancer neutral evil from the kingdom of Gilalion, located on a plane other than Toril. His psychology is particularly well-developed, not least because of his personal quest (his ambition and his father's betrayal have made him an outcast in his kingdom). The romance is long and the interactions numerous, enough to delight those looking for an alternative to the ever-present Anomen. Please note that although Tsujatha is a character of bad alignment (but can be redeemed), he will only romanticize female human, elf and half-elf characters of good alignment. You'll find him in the Planar Sphere. Get there as soon as you can, as there are plenty of banters.
STR 17, DEX 12, CON 12, INT 19, WIS 16, CHA 14.

Choose the github link for the BG2EE/EET version.
Fichier Tsujatha-17.1.zip.
Tsuki BG2
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lava Del'Vortel

Tsuki is a neutral, bisexual chaotic mage/thief, one of FaerÃ»n's worst scum. His parents were an elf from Waterdeep and an oriental Kara-Turan girl. That mixture of genes gave life to a true bastard. He's crafty. Tsuki shouldn't be trusted. He's like a weasel which is trying to get the prey. Hiding in her pit, waiting for bird to leave the nest. He always want to be on the winning side...that's why he entrusted Mistress Bodhi...

This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
Turald NPC
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Sinaherib

Still in beta, this mod adds a new NPC to IWD:EE: Turald Ironfist, a neutral good dwarf fighter/cleric. This itinerant priest of Marthammor Duin views events in the Val de bise from a dwarf perspective. As it stands, the mod includes dialogs with the main character, interjections, player-initiated discussions and content with NPCs from other mods, but no romance. You'll find it in the Temple of Tempus in Havredest.

This mod is still in progress.
Tyris Flare NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Grim Squeaker

Argent77

CamDawg

Meet Tyris Flare, a red-haired amazon who can kick ass and hurl fire! Sound familiar? In fact, the author drew inspiration from an old Mega Drive game (Golden Axe, released in 1989). Once in your party, Tyris will banter with all BioWare NPCs and can be romanced by any human/elf/half-elf male PC.
STR 15, DEX 17, CON 14, INT 17, WIS 10, CHA 12.
Uldar NPC
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Sergiond

Uldar is a half-orc barbarian who can join your group. He can be found at the Copper Coronet. In ToB, he can be summoned in the Pocket Plane. The mod has no romance, but provides plenty of dialog and interaction, almost always with several response options.

Available in ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸.
Urchin
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new and unusual companion for Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition - Urchin. He is an unusual creature, creation of a Night Hag. He comes with his custom kit - Hag's Varmint. Its mechanic is similar to Wilson, the bear paragon from Baldur's Gate 2: Enhanced Edition. He won't be able to use most of items, but instead will get stronger and much more powerful with each level. That should also become a chance to play Icewind Dale a bit differently. Some will consider Urchin strange, others will think he's got some bizarre charm.
To join Urchin you must find a new location: a Night Glade. Need a hint? Search the areas somehow connected to the mill near Kuldahar. The mod also includes a really tiny new shop with few new peculiarities.
Valen NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Wes Weimer

This mod adds a new vampire NPC, a fighter-thief neutral evil, who is very effective in combat - too much so for some. She's formidable at night, but becomes very weak during the day. This mod adds plenty of interaction with NPCs, but no romance. She can't stay on the team with Mazzy, Keldorn, Anomen or Aerie, at the risk of... violent quarrelling. She also has a specific quest (of unprecedented difficulty).
Human form: STR 18/75, DEX 17, CON 9, INT 16, WIS 10, CHA 15.
Vampire form: STR 22, DEX 21, CON 9, INT 20, WIS 10, CHA 19.

Use the github link for EE versions.
Valerie NPC for BG
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Team

Tempest

K'aeloree

If you've ever wanted to find out more about the mysterious Hooded Mage organization, this mod is for you. Determined to investigate rumors of the presence of demons in the vicinity of Nashkel, Witch Valerie awaits brave companions in the town to unravel the truth from falsehood in the mines and perhaps beyond. Banters, interjections, friendship and flirtation are all on the agenda.
STR 10, DEX 14, CON 8, INT 16, WIS 14, CHA 13.
Valkrana NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Sailor Cat

Link
Bring the multiverse's most awkward skeletal necromancer to your party. This full-fledged companion includes her own voice, character quest, custom scripts and much more. As a skeleton, she has resistance to cold, and immunity to poison and level absorption.
STR 8, DEX 10, CON 14, INT 21, WIS 16, CHA 7.

Character portraits by Sitigatu. Voiced by Sailor Cat.
Compatibility with EET not tested.
Vampire Tales
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Dark Raven

The mods Miriam (vampire NPC with less gruff stats than Valen NPC, but seemingly just as moody and violent) and Dark Ritual (adding a merchant with quite a few new items from Icewind Dale 1 and 2, originally translated by Panaka) are now combined in this mod, which also improves the Eyeless quest, the encounter with the Harpers, and adds a new encounter in the Firkraag dungeon.
Miriam : STR 18/75, DEX 17, CON 11, INT 16, WIS 9, CHA 15.

Requires: ToB
Vanim NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

maus

Link
Vanim is an neutral evil assassin who would be perfect for a game in this alignment. You'll find him in the temple district, near a statue. He hasn't been developed for years, but he's recruitable and has a few banters and a small quest.
STR 15, DEX 18, CON 12, INT 14, WIS 7, CHA 12.
Varshoon
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new, rather unusual evil NPC: an illithid! Driven by a thirst for knowledge, Varshoon doesn't really have a romance planned, or a friendship to speak of... but something approaching that is possible. In dialogue, Varshoon is curious about the culture of surface beings. He has his own kit of Psionic Enforcer. Varshoon is a mental warrior. Who uses his mental abilities to stun, weaken and confuse his enemies. He has his own special equipment that cannot be replaced with any other items. This mod also modifies the normal quest area of the Illithid Tunnels in the Underdark.
STR 13, DEX 18, CON 9, INT 19, WIS 15, CHA 13.
Verr'Sza
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod brings back Verr'Sza, the rakshasa companion, to Baldur's Gate 2. It's a continuation of the mod Verr'Sza, written by the same author. However the mods was written to allow the continuation of the partnership between the Child of Bhaal and Verr'Sza, it is possible to start a brand new relationship with Verr'Sza, instead of continuing BG1 content.
Verr'Sza is an evil malee ranger; a man who's not always much concerned about the law of the men. He is practical and follows rules set by himself and his idea of how things should be done. Yet he is also interested in learning. He's not crude. He's not reckless, even though he's not an example of patience, he understands some matters need different kinds of actions and attitudes.
Mod includes romance (for both male and female Bhaalspawns), which may differ slightly, depending on if you're continuing your romance from BG1 or not.
Note that due to NPCs attitudes and language, the content of the mod may be considered explicit. The mod was written with adult players in mind.
Verr'Sza
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Verrâ€™Sza is a rakshasa hunter of bad alignment who can be recruited at the Friendly Arm inn. The mod is compatible with Siege of Dragonspear and features content specific to that expansion, as well as related to the Sirene NPC for BG:EE mod.
The mod includes some go-and-kill quests, as well as a romance for both male and female characters (the only condition is not being of Lawful Good alignment). Although it's technically a romance, Verr'Sza isn't a very romantic character. It's more a matter of making him respect you and not trying to bind him in any way. He may be protective in his twisted and blunt way.
Note that due to the attitude and language of the NPCs, the content of the mod can be considered explicit. The mod was written with adult players in mind.
Vicril
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

Ruffle_truffle

Link
Vicril is a mysterious character, multi-classed F/M/T. He has a specific weapon (which must be found), a mini-quest and some banter.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Vienxay, an Elven Shadowdancer Mage
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Skitia

Link
Difficult to live with, Vienxay is a neutral evil, elf-magician who has been banished from her homeland. Falsely accused of murder, or so she claims, she wanders the Sword Coast, first in quest of vengeance, then of purpose, then of home. In the saga, you can help or hinder each of these stages, as you see fit, although she'll complain if she doesn't agree.
Her alignment can lean towards absolute neutral in BG1 and SoD, as well as in BG2. As her alignment is not memorized when she switches to BG2, she will fall back into old habits and dangerous choices in BG2, and will need the protagonist's advice and friendship or love to overcome her own darkness.
You'll find her outside the Friendly Arm in BG1, and in a cell in SoD. In BG2, she's on the Promenade just outside the Adventurer Mart, about to be arrested. You can then intervene and recruit her, or find her and recruit her later in the prison.
STR 15, DEX 17, CON 10, INT 18, WIS 10, CHA 11.
Vito
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new companion: Vito, a neutral kenku diviner (mage). He can join the party once you reach Kuldahar Pass. Vito has foreseen his own death, and youâ€”the avalanche survivorâ€”may be the key to changing a future heâ€™s unwilling to accept. The mod includes a small quest, a friendship path, a set of romantic dialogues, new spells, and a few new items.

Vynd
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

Glam Vrock

Vynd is a drow assassin, recruitable at the Burning Wizard tavern in Beregost. Although he's of bad alignment, he won't leave the party because of his reputation (note: this doesn't work with BG:EE). He has dialogues with the main character, Bioware NPCs and Enhanced Edition NPCs, as well as numerous out-of-party interactions and player-initiated dialogues.

This mod is obsolete since its integration into Glam's NPC Pack by the same author.
Walahnan
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Walahnan is a powerful neutral chaotic chronomancer who suffers from germophobia. But worry not, he can prove to be more than useful. While his ambitions do not overwhelm those around, he certainly has some aspirations that inspire his studies.
The mod doesn't include a romance.
To give Walahnan the chance to join you, complete Nalia's quest and check the rest of De'Arnise Hold area. He should be near the rocks to the east of the keep.
To keep Walahnan in your team, you'll need to complete his personal quest.
STR 17, DEX 16, CON 11, INT 18, WIS 11, CHA 11.
Walahnan
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

Walahnan is a powerful neutral chaotic chronomancer who suffers from germophobia. But worry not, he can prove to be more than useful. While his ambitions do not overwhelm those around, he certainly has some aspirations that inspire his studies.
The mod does not include a romance, however, you may get an option or two to show you like him. To join him, visit Ulgoth's Beard and accept to help him with his personal quest. The mod also includes some content for Siege of Dragonspear.
STR 17, DEX 16, CON 11, INT 18, WIS 11, CHA 11.

White NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a level 2 human barbarian (so it's advised to recruit him early in game) who can also be a good hunter. You can recruit him near the entrance to the Ulcaster ruins. Male PJs, regardless of race, with at least 11 Charisma and 12 Strength can try to romance him. Flirtations, interjections and banters with all NPCs (including the 3 from BG:EE) are also on the program.

It must be installed before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
Will of the Wisps
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod brings extensions for the shaman, in particular a fortress he was deprived of in Shadows of Amn. It includes a new location with a quest accessible to all, as well as elements specific to the fortress aspect. It also adds Will, a recruitable undead shaman character, a shaman kit (Witchlight Shaman) and items for shamans and the undead (such as Will and Hexxat). Originally designed for BG2:EE, it is also compatible with BG:EE and IWD:EE, although not all its components will be installed.
STR 17, DEX 15, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 16, CHA 10.
Willie Bruce NPC Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Nethrin

Link
This mod is a stereotypical bully, so Willie Bruce is rude, sexist and racist. Willie's opinions in no way reflect those of the coder or authors. Willie Bruce is a basic, entry-level fighter who likes to hang out in bars, watch soccer on TV and fight. This mod can be offensive, not to be taken at face value.
STR 16, DEX 12, CON 18, INT 8, WIS 6, CHA 8.

Fichier WillieBruceV31.rar.
Worgas NPC
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Flysoup

Worgas is an elven entropist whose great intelligence hides behind a mind corrupted by his magical research. He often speaks, or rather mumbles, in incomprehensible riddles, which can turn into howls of madness and rage. He travels with a levitating eyeball with many eyes on it (a gauth!).
STR 8, DEX 14, CON 8, INT 18, WIS 9, CHA 8.

This mod is still in progress.
Xan NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate II
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Kulyok

Sister Vigilante

jastey

Remember this cheerful, optimistic character from BG (irony inside for those in the know)? Well, he's back in BG2. Our depressed magician has plenty of interaction with all BG2 characters, a few cinematics and a voice kit. He even offers a two-way romance if your character is a pretty elfette. If you wish, you can install Xan's French Soundset for BG2. In this case, you'll need to install it after Xan BG2.
XikÃ¢sz's Grove of Chaos
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

XikÃ¢sz's Grove of Chaos is a new mod that adds a new quest to IWD:EE as well as provides players with a new possible companion, XikÃ¢sz - an elven fighter/wildmage/thief of neutral alignment.
In the mod, you will get a chance to investigate a new area near Kuldahar. An old grove near which a shady character has been spotted. Is he a friend? Or a foe? It is up to you to go there and find out. But be careful, as you may need to face some new beasts during your investigation.
Xulaye
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

K'aeloree

Lava Del'Vortel

Xulaye Despana - sister to the insidious Phaere and daughter of the fearsome Matron Mother Ardulace. Will you help her in her ascent to power? Betray her? Attempt to turn the woman from her dark ways? Xulaye joins your party at the beginning of the Ust Natha section of the Underdark. But watch your back; she is Drow to the core, and not unintelligent. Arrogance, ambition, cruelty and ruthlessness dominate her dark heart. Recruiting Xulaye will allow you to modify your stay in Underdark: a new quest, new interjections, 1 to 3 banters with Bioware NPCs, and a new ending in Underdark.
STR 11, DEX 15, CON 13, INT 16, WIS 13, CHA 14.
Yasraena
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

Team

Sillara

Nethrin

Link
This mod adds a drow NPC with specially designed banters, voices and items. She's a pure fighter, chaotic good, with two swords of her own and an amulet. You meet her at the end of the Irenicus dungeon (note that if you ask her to leave, you'll never find her again). She'll fit in well with your group, provided it's defending worthy objectives (Good or Neutral characters), and has a special voice allotted to her.
Note that she has one extra attack per round; which is abusive, to say the least...
STR 18/97, DEX 18, CON 12, INT 13, WIS 12, CHA 16.

Fichier Yasraena_v16.zip.

Yeslick will try to establish himself as the group's father figure. His steady hand will make him a warm, unfailing companion to the YP right to the end.

Askaria Npc and Quest & ChaosKnight Kit and Npc
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Shi woo

This is a pack of two Korean mods for BGT (translated into English): install the profile first, since Askaria needs it.
- Chaos Knight kit: this mod adds the Chaos Knight profile and Jacob, a recruitable NPC near the manor of Beregost, inspired by Dota in WoW3.
- Askaria Quest NPC: On the second floor of the Feldpost Inn in Beregost, Askaria asks for help against bandits. Once they've been eliminated, she'll join you to find her parents.

The EE (and translated) version is available via the github link.
Only the kit is BG2EE compatible.

Biff the Understudy - Tutorial NPC for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

jastey

This mod is designed as a tutorial for modders on how to script the basic structure needed for a SoD NPC. Biff is a "fighter" with FOR 9, DEX 9, CON 9, INT 9, SAG 9, CHA 9, no items, no portrait, and no soundset. It's not meant to be played, but knock yourself out! The mod should definitely work in SoD.

Branwen NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

aWoundedLion

Link
This mod adds Branwen (the NPC from the original Baldur's Gate) to the Irenicus dungeon at the start of Baldur's Gate 2, as if she'd traveled with you from the Sword Coast. She has a new portrait (taken from Icewind Dale), is a fighter-priestess (whereas she was a priestess in BG), and her characteristics have been modified so that she can survive in BG2. If you fire her, she'll return to the North. Unfortunately, this mod is not yet complete and its content is very limited: few dialogues, very few interactions, no romance, no quests.
STR 17, DEX 15, CON 15, INT 10, WIS 18, CHA 12.

Fichier Branwenv13.7z.
Incompatible with: Branwen NPC for BGII, Perils of Branwen, BG1 NPC in SoA&ToB

jastey

This mod is intended as a tutorial for budding modders wishing to create an NPC, and therefore includes a complete NPC with content for SoA and ToB, banters, interjections, a friendship path, etc...

Incompatible with: Branwen NPC, Perils of Branwen, BG1 NPC in SoA&ToB
Britt, the One-Hour Unjoinable NPC
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Team

St. Josephine

Jason Compton

The result of an hour-long collaboration, Britt is an enthusiastic young woman who says she wants to be an adventurer. She has her own voice. Except it never really seems to work... To save time, they started with Nalia's character, who has some of her skills.
STR 25, DEX 25, CON 25, INT 25, WIS 25, CHA 25.

Author's note: It's not a good mod..
Bruce, the Cockney Barfighter
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Bons

This mod was the item of a one-day NPC creation contest on the Pocket Plane Group forum. Different authors, armed with nothing more than the character's name, worked to develop the ultimate man. To date, three Bruce have been published, which you can find by clicking on the download link.
Cassius
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Gabrielle

Link
Cassius is a mysterious, human scalde bard who doesn't reveal much about his past. What we do know is that he has traveled extensively from Baldur's Gate, Waterdeep, Calimshan and other places without ever staying too long. He's always looking for adventures to tell the great stories they've encountered. He recently stopped off in Amn to gather information on the great stories of the adventurers who pass through there. Rumor has it that he is an agent of the Harpers.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 13, INT 16, WIS 9, CHA 15.

Choose the github link for the BG2EE/EET version.
Fichier Cassius_v105.rar.
Chiara NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

octavian

This mod adds a vampire fighter with special abilities. If you help her, she can be an extraordinary asset to the group. If you let her down, she becomes an unpredictable enemy! You'll find her in the sewers beneath the temple district. Contents for SoA and ToB. She's equipped with a life-draining sword and a mithral harness. Her characteristics change according to the environment (light/dark). Note that she must eat at least once a day or risk becoming a berserk.
STR 18/47, DEX 18, CON 18, INT 12, WIS 11, CHA 11.

She is fully vocalized in German.
Coran NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate II
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Kulyok

jastey

Coran is an NPC created over a weekend for players who, like the mod author, couldn't get enough of the company of this excellent archer and womanizer, having played with him in Baldur's Gate. Now, Coran will keep you company in SoA and ToB with some light banter with all the Athkatla barmaids, and a bottle of Elverquisst! He'll be carrying on friendly conversations with the main character, player-initiated dialogues and dialogues with all the Bioware characters. You'll find him near the entrance to the gates of Atkatla. In ToB, you can summon him using the Spirit of Destiny.

BGT

Cliffette

Created in 4 days for a modding contest on the theme of "History", this mod adds a lawful good bard who sings worse than an unsuccessful American Idol contestant! Interactions with everyone and a specific kit. Beware, his stats are pitiful: are you prepared to put up with him?
STR 11, DEX 18, CON 18, INT 8, WIS 4, CHA 5.
Gemma
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Zyl

A follower of Umberlie, Gemma isn't really the kind of dwarf who spends her time singing happy songs, mug of ale in hand. No, she's all about using rhetoric to hit the unexpected heretic head-on. When rhetoric is hammered home, people are more receptive (and dead). Gemma sits quietly (no) on the Athkatla Docks.
STR 18/05, DEX 13, CON 19, INT 7, WIS 14, CHA 8.

Choose the github link for the BG2EE/EET version.
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

Jason Compton

It's a human fighter/mage Lawful Neutral. He's a former Cowled Wizard who has grown disenchanted with their ironhanded rule & is willing to help the party take them on. It's provided for an One Day NPC because he has 20 banters and a voice kit.
STR 11, DEX 15, CON 17, INT 15, WIS 11, CHA 13.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

The only NPC to be a floating eye! Gozaloth (Goo to his friends) is the ideal companion for Jan, if you want to see him replicate in an even tastier way! You'll find him in the Planar Sphere. Note that the Alternate Goo Portrait mod allows you to modify his portrait.
STR 17, DEX 7, CON 20, INT 15, WIS 9, CHA 4.

Mod v6 directly integrates the Alternate Goo Portrait mod.

Immortality

Henanigan

This mod adds a wolf, your faithful companion. Depending on your game, you can find Haiass in the Candlekeep inn (BGT), on the Waukeen's Promenade (SoA) or call him in the Pocket Plane (ToB).

Note that this is not strictly speaking a recruitable NPC, but rather a "7th member" who will follow you around like a familiar.
Requires: ToB

Badgert

Jazon the revenant
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Deratiseur

Jazon the revenant is a mute undead warrior who can follow you as a 7th member of the party. He is level 8 and will never progress, but he types hard and resists everything (strength and constitution 19, undead immunities, 75% resistance to everything and fast regeneration). His weapon is not magical at first, but evolves as the protagonist progresses. If he's killed, he drops his heart, which you can use after a night's sleep to re-invoke him. You'll find his heart in a tomb: in the Athkatla Graveyard District in BG2, in the Valley of Shadows in IWDEE.
STR 19, DEX 10, CON 19, INT 8, WIS 8, CHA 6.

This mod adds a half-elf fighter / mage / thief, who can be recruited at the Feldpost inn. He is fully vocalized, but has little dialog. He has bracelets to protect himself and enhance his spellcasting ability.

Gilbertus sells a semi-mechanical spider that will follow you around like a 7th companion. Expect lots of gold coins. If you really plan to spend a lot of gold and are persuasive, you may be able to buy 'more'.

Larsha NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Marcin Kijo

Link
Larsha is a dryad in search of her tree, with which she will unite to gain great power in the form of a very interesting spell. Romance is also possible. You'll find her in the Windspear Hills. She has a bow that shoots its own arrows and improves with experience, as well as a tiara that gives her free action, improved haste and +1 weapon protection. She also acquires new abilities as she levels up.
STR 16, DEX 19, CON 10, INT 15, WIS 18, CHA 25.

Choose the github link for the EE version (translated into French and English) and the other link for the original Polish version.

Malthis is a chaotic good Swashbuckler who can be found near Cromwell. He's not like the others and carries a dark secret. His characteristics and alignment will depend on you. Will you be able to adopt him and help him in his war against a dark organization?
As the site hosting the mod has disappeared (rosenranken.org), the link goes to a temporary hosting GitHub account.

Swylif Thicc
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lava Del'Vortel

Created over a weekend, Swylif is a svirfneblin sorcerer living in Saradush. You'll need to hire and pay him, as he's a mercenary, and put up with his insolence and madness, being of an evil nature. The mod includes banters, a quest, a few new items, a small area, but no lettuce, since Swylif hates lettuce. In short, this mod doesn't take itself too seriously.

This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
T'viy
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a brand new, one-weekend companion to Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition. His name is T'viy. He's a chaotic evil gnome, a little bit insane follower of Urdlen, The Crawler Below. This mod is more like a weekend project, so while he has dialogues with the PC, the friendship path is shorter than that of most other IWD NPCs. However, it's still an option for all those teams that need an evil cleric... and some insanity.

Thael NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Sergiond

Nightfarer

This mod adds a new NPC: a mage/thief elf. It features dialogs with Bioware NPCs, with the NPC, and a main quest that begins in SoA and continues in ToB. Thael can be found on the Waukeen's Promenade, close to the circus. He possesses a mysterious short sword, Velvevlos, acquired under no less unusual circumstances; this powerful artifact has a great influence on him.
Thael has undergone several mutations as a result of contact with the terrible magical energies contained in Velvelos. One of these, "Mutant Power", is very useful in combat. You can access it in the special abilities section.
STR 16, DEX 20, CON 16, INT 18, WIS 9, CHA 10.

The BG2/BGT version can be downloaded from the shs forum. The BG2EE/EET version can be downloaded via the GitHub link.

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Deratiseur

This little module will introduce you to two unusual protagonists: one is an NPC ogre whom you can enlist (for the moment he's mute if hired) and the other a gnome merchant. To find one or the other, ask yourself the following questions: where could an ogre be hiding who doesn't want to be seen, and where could a merchant be?
STR 19, DEX 7, CON 18, INT 6, WIS 8, CHA 6.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Badgert

Not to be confused with the mega mod Tortured Souls-BP, this mod adds a little quest, at the end of which you get a brand-new item that lets you summon Baenwuld the Wizard Slayer at will. He can be freed from his slavery to join your group. To start it, use the wand 'dropped' by a new adversary in one of the crypts of the Athkatla Graveyard.
STR 19, DEX 17, CON 19, INT 12, WIS 15, CHA 17.

Choose the github link for the EE version and the other link for the original version.

Therrin NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Jonathan Phipps

Link
Therrin is an elf ranger of neutral evil alignment, exiled from Suldanessellar. He can be found at the inn on the outskirts of Athkatla. His enemy race is the rakshasa. He has no voice and content only for SoA, although he is tested on a fully patched SoA+ToB installation of BGII. It has minimal dialog and an amulet.
STR 18/75, DEX 17, CON 17, INT 13, WIS 14, CHA 10.

Tiergebleiter
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Genwa

Link
This mod allows you to recruit two animal pets to Havredest, as 7th companions:
- Copper the squirrel is a level 1 thief who can be recruited independently of the player's class, and can rise to level 10
- Grace the she-wolf, who has been locked away by Apsel in his warehouse, can only be recruited by a ranger or druid. To do so, she must first be charmed. She has the ranger class and also starts at level 1, and can also progress up to a maximum of level 10.

Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.

Rabain

Touchstone is a wild elf fighter who seems only able to express himself in the common language with effort, but who will nevertheless try to bond with you. No romance though, he's advertised as sociable, even if he apparently doesn't interact much with the game's characters. You'll find him on the Athkatla Docks.
STR 16, DEX 17, CON 14, INT 12, WIS 12, CHA 12.

The github link is EE-compatible and is an unofficial version.

To use this mod, you'll need to rename its directory and weidu.exe to "Uzilnpc".
This mod installs a TLK file in English.

Yikari
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Shed

This mod adds a new NPC, a monk lawful neutral who comes from Kara-Tur. He has with his own quest and interactions with each character. He's under a vow of silence until he succeeds, so your initial meeting involves an interesting bit of charades. Whether or not he has Celestial Fury, version +3 or +5, affects his reactions. Without Celestial Fury, he won't join the team. Some of his characteristics: FOR 16, DEX 18, CON 14, INT 8, SAG 18 and CHA 4.
NPC (misc)

Aerie in BG:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Insomniator

This little mod brings Aerie into BG1. If you already know her from BG2, you already know where you're most likely to find her. If not... well, it's at the Nashkel Fair (in BG2, she says the circus used to go there...). She can't be recruited, but you can carry out small quests for her, at the end of which she'll move into Benta's tent and provide her services (temple and store).

Since version 2.0, only the github version seems compatible with EET.
Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

jastey

Link
This mod adds a romance and a friendship path with BG's famous paladin.
Depending on your type of installation, the added content will be different: with original BG, the mod adds the romance from Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification and the friendship path; with BGT, Tutu, BG:EE and EET, the mod adds the friendship path and more content for the romance from Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification. This mod is in fact considered an extension of Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification, but can be installed and played without it. In this case, the friendship path is immediately available.

[Ajantis Portrait Pack offers alternative portraits.
BG without TotSC is no longer supported since version 21.

All Things Mazzy
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Team

Ratatoskr

BCaesar

This is a collection of NPC mods created by BCaesar and Ratatoskr that can be installed independently of each other:
- All Things Mazzy: friendship path, romance, interactions with NPCs...
- Keepable Clara NPC: rescue Clara from Hexxat and recruit her.
- Darkside Anomen.
- Minsc
- Neera Romance.
- Flying Aerie.
- Dorn
- HaerDalis Romance
- Jaheira
- Wilson Romance
- For The Evil!
- For The Good!
- And many other small components...

It exists a lite version without content for adults: Living Clara.
Incompatible with: Living Clara

Badgert

This mod allows you to take on a fairy dragon as your pet, which is a little stronger and, above all, closer in spirit to the original AD&D dragon: it has quite a lot of potential for pranks and tricks. You're sure to have fun, but your opponents will have much less... This pet will only appear for a good chaotic magician, if of course he doesn't already have a pet.

Use the shs link for the BG2/BGT/TuTu version and the github link for the EE version.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Jason Compton

Kish Moore

Blue

Ghreyfain

jastey

Looking for new dialogs and interactions to add depth to your game? This mod is for you. New stories from Jan, new jabs from Imoen and an even more cynical Edwin - it's all good stuff.
berelinde's Keldorn Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

berelinde

jastey

Faithful. He's brave. Is he single? Life is an uncertain thing, and changes happen when you least expect them. This mod offers a chance to romanticize Athkatla's newest... and most reluctant... bachelor. All relationships take work, and this one takes more than most, but the rewards are great, for those patient enough to endure the trials.
This romance isn't for everyone, and certainly not one for the hurried. When it begins, Keldorn is grieving after the collapse of his marriage of 20 years, and it takes him a long time to recover. It deals with mature themes, the real consequences of rejection and recovery, and some players may not want to go through all that, no matter how much the potential love interest becomes in Throne of Bhaal. It's also very, very long, with over 35 discussions in Shadows of Amn, although they're closer together to compensate for this.
To begin the romance, you must allow Keldorn and Maria to reconcile. He will only consider himself free if his marriage to Maria is legally over, and imprisoning Maria will only separate them, not divorce them. Moreover, Maria's incarceration could present child custody problems that would be impossible to overcome.
The mod also features a quest for all PCs, romanced or otherwise, although this too requires a reconciliation between Keldorn and Maria.
Berserker Minsc
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

Drew

Link
This mod gives Minsc a custom-made Berserker profile that prevents him from attacking the party when he's in a fury.

Fichier Berserker_Minsc.zip.
BG1 NPC in SoA&ToB
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Smiling Imp

Arcanecoast Team

This ambitious mod adds a new area in Athkatla (Water Gardens) where all the rich and famous people of Athkatla gather. What do they do there? Chatting, relaxing and drinking. Thousands of lines of dialog that change with every conversation. Variations depending on the time of day (or night). This mod also allows modders to add components for NPCs from BG1 themselves, with new lines and sometimes even new quests or romances between them. There are also a few surprises.

This mod must be installed AFTER other mods containing these same NPCs.
BG1 NPCs at Beginning
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Anomaly

This mod brings together 11 NPCs far from the direct route to Nashkel (Ajantis, Alora, Coran, Eldoth, Faldorn, Kivan, Quayle, Safana, Shar-Teel, Tiax, Viconia) to make it easier to recruit them at the start of the game, so as to increase team variety. More details can be found here.
If you wish to install Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification, Sword Coast Stratagems and/or The Tweaks Anthology, please install these modules before BG1 NPCs at Beginning. This will prevent the latter from offering to move NPCs that have already been moved by one of these 3 mods before it, if you have chosen to do so.

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Llewren

Link
This mod aims to add depth to the companions in the game with all new interparty banter, quests, expansions to existing quests, interjections, and player-talks.
Currently, content for Ajantis and Coran is being added.

This mod is still in progress.

Cernd Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod adds a romance path for Cernd, the druid involved in solving the Trademeet problems. Cernd Romance includes ~25 talks with Cernd throughout Shadows of Amn and Throne of Bhaal, as well as a new small quest, romantic events, and commentsâ€”all to allow the main character to know the shapeshifter better and to let them create a bond.
Chatty Imoen
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

AstroBryGuy

Imoen was a late addition to the original Baldur's Gate. Unfortunately, this means she has no dialog or interaction with other characters. Her audio cues are also limited. This mod adds audio cues to Imoen, drawing on BG1 and BG2 files, as well as dialogues with other recruitable characters.
Classkits for NPCs
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

tommy

This mod assigns profiles to the game's recruitable NPCs.

In the words of its author: For safety, save the game before you enter the area where the joinable is waiting...
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
This mod is still in progress.
Convenient Enhanced Edition NPCs
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Argent77

The new recruitable characters introduced in BG:EE and BG2:EE are not to everyone's taste. This mod offers several options for adapting them to your liking. You can make their first appearance in the game less intrusive, allowing you to control whether and when you accept to make first contact. Alternatively, you can permanently disable all NPCs in the game, or just some of them. In this case, you can also decide to make their personal items or those obtained in their quest usable by anyone. These can be found either in stores or on corpses. Additional components allow you to enhance their portraits and customize their classes and/or profiles, as you see fit.
Coran's BG Extended Friendship Talks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

EET

Domi

This mod develops friendly exchanges with Coran, when romance is not active, through 18 conversations. If Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification is present, these new conversations will only take place after the others.
It is compatible with Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification but also works without it.
Corthala Romantique
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Domi

Caetlyn

jastey

Beyshaliban

Meira

This mod adds a romance for female PJs of good or neutral alignment (not chaotic neutral) or druidesses. To pursue romance, reputation must be higher than 13. It also provides friendship discussions for the SoA part of the game for PCs who don't meet the romance criteria. For ToB, all added dialogs are reserved for romance.
Banters with other NPCs and interjections are also added, for both romance and non-romance cases in SoA. An optional component introduces a quest for the sphere to be guarded or sealed forever by Valygar's friend Leonora.

Incompatible with: Baldur's Gate Romantic Encounters Modification, Tortured Souls-BP
Crossmod Banter Pack for Baldur's Gate II

BG2EE

EET

Team

Grim Squeaker

K'aeloree

berelinde

Smiling Imp

This mod adds dialog between NPCs added by mods (Fade NPC, Goo the Disembodied Floating Eyeball, Tsujatha Melalor, etc). An opportunity to learn a little more about their characters, but also to see how they react in the event of a romance conflict!
Custom NPC Kits
âš ï¸âğŸ˜€

BG

aquadrizzt

A mod that assigns a kit to the various NPCs in BG1, a la NPC Kitpack but with a greater distinction between NPCs that are a little too similar in the game. In particular, when certain NPCs have traits that are a little too similar (like Imoen and Alora in BG1), it gives them a second wind or a new interest.

This mod has disappeared from https://forums.beamdog.com/discussion/20240/.
de'Arnise Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Jason Compton

Kulyok

jastey

Finally, the real possibility of romancing the thieving aristocrat of Shadows of Amn! The old version (Nalia Romance) was so buggy that it left fans of the young redhead wanting more. Now, with this SoA-only version of the mod, you'll be able to shake the beautiful Nalia to her core.

A sequel in ToB is proposed in Nalia At Last.
Incompatible with: Arnel Nalia Romance Revision
Delainy/Durlyle Same-Sex Romance Options
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

amyae

This is a mini-mod that allows a pseudo-homosexual romance with Delainie and Durlyle without Balduran Island by modifying the script to make Delainie appear for female PJs and/or Durlyle for male PJs.

Dorn Romance Expansion
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Team

trinit

Paula Migrate

This mod is an extension of Dorn's romance that brings its content to around 29 interviews in SoA and 6 in ToB, including some interjections in ToB. The extension adds new talks, extends and modifies existing ones, and sometimes changes their order. It adds Bodhi's abduction and new/modified epilogues for Dorn's romance. Some of Dorn's unused vocal lines from BG2:EE and a few vocal lines from other games (BG:EE and SoD) have been added to make discussions more lively.
This mod was written for Dorn who has freed himself from his boss's grip. Otherwise, it wouldn't make much sense...
Drizzt is not stupid
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

Team

Macready

Xicloing

Link
This mini-mod is designed to make Drizzt more resistant to deception, without turning him into a god. Everyone knows that stealing from him, or even attacking him, can do no good... You won't be able to take his weapons. What's more, even if provoked, he now offers the player a non-violent alternative if the party meets certain requirements.

Use the SHS link for BGT and the other for Tutu.
EasyTutu NPC Kit Selection
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

Macready

Link
Long dreamed of turning Imoen into the assassin she was always meant to be? Wanted Khalid to fulfill his destiny as the terrifying stammering barbarian of the Sword Coast? Here's your chance. The EasyTutu NPC Kit Selection add-on lets you select kits for most of the NPCs reachable in Baldur's Gate (you do NOT have to choose a kit for every NPC - you'll be asked to do so for all of them). This add-on is intended to directly replace the kit selection function that is part of Tutu's conventional installation process.

Glittergear

An Edwin Friendship Mod that features a "barely-tolerated-acquaintances to True Bros" friendship arc. Several dialogs are present, with the possibility of evolving Edwin's alignment.

Eternal Imoen
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

nullset

In BG2:EE, the Imoen you start playing with in the Irenicus dungeon is not the Imoen you find in Spellhold. This is very annoying. This mod transports the Imoen from the beginning into Spellhold with an XP upgrade on reintegration.

Felinoid

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Filipe_FR's All NPCs at the Beginning
ğŸŸ¥âŒğŸ˜¡

BG

Filipe_FR

This mod changes the location of some recruitable characters so that they can be met (and therefore hired) in the early chapters of the game. Works with Baldur's Gate and Tales of the Sword Coast. On this page, you'll also find a version compatible with Dark Side of the Sword Coast.

The mod has its own installation program. As it moves most of the NPCs to the Friendly Arm, we advise you to use Anomaly's excellent BG1 NPCs at Beginning mod, which is more flexible and, what's more, compatible with BGT and BG:EE.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

Icewind Dale Crossmod Banter Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Multiple

As in its BG2 counterpart, this mod adds dialog between NPCs added by mods (the 5 characters from IWD NPC Project; Minerva NPC and Karihi NPC from AionZ; Dendjelion, Dusky, Ina, Oak-Maw, Orra, Tipps, T'viy, Urchin, L'anna, XikÃ¢sz's Grove of Chaos, Bethany and Hommet de Lava Del'Vortel), as well as quarrels due to conflicts of interest and romance. An opportunity to learn a little more about their characters, but also to see how they react in the event of a romance conflict!

The mod installation follows the mods of the NPCs concerned.
IEP Extended Banters
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

K'aeloree

Lava Del'Vortel

This project aims to enhance the realism and interest of Bioware's NPCs by adding interjections, dialogs, banters and friendly relationships. 13 mods have already been developed as part of this ambitious project. They are :
Cernd Friendship, Dorn Friendship, Haer'dalis Friendship, Hexxat Friendship, Imoen Friendship, Jaheira Friendship, Korgan Friendship, Mazzy Friendship, Minsc Friendship, Sarevok Friendship, Valygar Friendship, Viconia Friendship and Yoshimo Friendship.

Incompatible with: Banter Accelerator for Enhanced Edition games
Imoen 4 Ever
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

jastey

This mod aims to make Imoen a stable companion throughout the BG saga. As the story content linked to her is taken into account, Imoen will be temporarily absent from the party to reflect the most crucial events of the original game. This mod brings her back into the game after such incidents, so she can be considered a true traveling companion in SoD and BG2.
In BG2, it brings Imoen back in chapters 2 and 3, just after the first dialog with Gaelan. The player can then explore and complete all the quests without any time constraints or moral dilemmas concerning a friend to rescue. The game's original content resumes after arrival in Brynnlaw: Imoen is kidnapped and Yoshimo can be recruited from the tavern.
Once installed, this mod should be installed before any NPC mods or other mods that add dialog to BGII chapters 2 and 3.
As it is designed for BG2:EE and SoD, and is compatible with all BGII games (BGII, BGT, BG2:EE, EET), this mod will offer to install its various components according to the game.

Incompatible with: Imoen Is Stone
Imoen Can Die
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Subtledoctor

This mod allows those who don't like Imoen not to save her in Spellhold, but to choose the option that she won't survive Irenicus's experiments and will die immediately after being saved. This will be commented on by party members (those BG2:EE NPCs) (lines are prescribed for everyone except EE NPCs).
Imoen Friendship
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

K'aeloree

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a series of dialogs with Imoen, the PJ's sister, expanding on her experiences and Imoen's struggles.
Imoen Is Stone
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

jastey

This mini-mod petrifies Imoen during combat on the Waukeen's Promenade. The idea is to ease the NPC's conscience in order to complete all the quests in Chapter 2, bearing in mind that Imoen doesn't suffer - and can be brought back to life like Branwen in BG1 - once in Spellhold. She will still be captured by the hooded mages, and Irenicus will have her depowered for his experiments until the PC arrives in the asylum. None of the content of the original scenario has been altered.

Incompatible with: Imoen 4 Ever
Imoen Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Lord Mirrabbo

Vanatos

Sarevok08

T.C. Dale

theacefes

Link
This mod allows you to have a much more privileged relationship with your little sister. This can be friendship or romance, regardless of the PJ's gender. The dialogs are particularly extensive, and the mod includes a host of new music. Requires ToB.

The version for EE games is a complete reworking of the original mod (with content for ToB) and is not available in French. At the bottom of the page, choose version 1.202 Full translated for original games (SoA content only).
Imoen the Bard
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

NiGHTMARE

This mod turns Imoen into a bard or an arcane thief. It also features a number of new items, and a revision of the progression of mage spells, armor and shields that is closer to the original games. It also allows you to delete the first SoA cinematic and continue the game after the final battle with Irenicus.
Jack Of All Planes - Play as a Fighter/Mage/Thief
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PSTEE

aquadrizzt

This mod has just one function: it reworks The Nameless One's progression to make him a Fighter/Mage/Thief. He can wield any weapon, use thief skills and cast arcane spells, all without having to change classes with one of the class trainers.

Level One NPCs
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Team

Nythrun

Azazello

erik

cmorgan

Miloch

CamDawg

So-called because all NPCs will be at level 1, with a surplus of experience points, when you meet them. When they join your party, you can then level them up and choose their skills, abilities and choice of weapons, up to the same level as if they'd joined your party without this mod installed. You can even choose classes and profiles for them that are different from those they use in the game. The monk Cernd, the kensai Jaheira and Valygar the flame preacher are just a few examples. Indeed, profiles from other mods will be available even for NPCs! Optional components also modify certain NPC characteristics and weapons usable by classes. This is the best - and simplest - mod for allowing clerics and/or mages to use all weapons: a mage with a bow is cool ğŸ™‚ .

This mod has been superseded by NPCs Enhanced... um, for Everyone!.
Incompatible with: NPCs Enhanced... um, for Everyone!
Living Clara
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

MephistoSatanDevil

This mod focuses exclusively on Clara's NPC content, allowing you to save Clara when facing Hexxat. This is an overhaul of All Things Mazzy, removes all content unrelated to Clara from the original mod.

Incompatible with: All Things Mazzy
Lower Level NPCs
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Erg

This mod allows you to recruit NPCs always at their lowest available level (e.g. Rasaad at level 1, Viconia at level 2, Skie at level 4, etc.), but with enough XP to immediately upgrade to the level they should normally have. This mod only supports official NPCs and will not modify NPCs added by other mods.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
M'Khiin Friendship
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

bucketfulofsunshine

This mod introduces a short friendship path with the shaman named M'Khiin during the Siege of Dragonspear. It includes four discussions, additional conversations responding to key moments in the story, and expanded interjections where necessary.

An expansion is planned for BG2.
Mazzy Friendship
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

K'aeloree

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a series of dialogues for any eligible PJ, allowing you to learn more about, and befriend, the valiant little person. Mazzy isn't the most talkative woman in the world, but she certainly has her opinions and will state them if she sees fit - likewise, if she has any questions, she won't hesitate to ask.
Mazzy Romance
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

AionZ

This mod adds an extensive romantic path with Mazzy, the lovely halfling knight.
Contents include 20 timer-based talks as well as a variety of event-based talks in Shadows of Amn, 8 talks in ToB, a romantic epilogue with small variations depending on your personal choices and circumstances, and the usual romance-related events.
The trigger for activating the romance, should you prove eligible (non-evil alignment) is having a reputation of 15 or above.

This mod is still in progress.

the bigg

This mod offers Mazzy a quest to become a true paladin.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

EET

Team

Lava Del'Vortel

AionZ

This mod adds a series of dialogs to Minsc, the famous lurker, and expands on his experiences and difficulties.
Mod NPC
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

Abel

This mod lets you enlist interactive NPCs and create your own group. You can modify any recruitable NPC from pre-generated characters (which you create from the game menu). It is of course possible to customize these changes. The default configuration changes everything except what makes the NPC unique, including gender, race, portrait, soundset, dialog, innate abilities and items. A second component removes the prerequisites for using NPC-specific items, so you can turn Jaheira into a Priestess/Ronkess with custom skill points, or Minsc into a true Berserker.
Multi NPC Mod
âš ï¸âŒğŸ˜€

BG

BGT

Durendal

Link
This mod changes Xan's class to Fighter/Mage or Cleric/Mage and Dynaheir's class to Cleric/Mage in BG1:TotSC. It also changes the weapon skill required by Xan's Moon Blade to suit his new class.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Nalia At Last
