BG2EE

EET

Skitia

Link
Finally, the continuation of Nalia's romance for ToB. This mod is compatible with de'Arnise Romance even though the latter is not mandatory. It adds several dialogues, flirtations and additional banters with other Bioware characters.
Nalia Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

the bigg

This mod modifies Nalia's class to differentiate her from Imoen: she is no longer a mage/thief, but a thief/mage who upgrades her thief class during the game. From now on, you'll have a thief worthy of the name in BG2!
Neera Banters
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AstroBryGuy

Would you like Neera to interact more with her companions in BG:EE? Then this module is for you! It adds interaction between Neera and other recruitable and non-recruitable NPCs in BG:EE.
No content has been added for the SoD campaign, but the mod is compatible with SoD.
Neera Expansion
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

K'aeloree

The purpose of this mod is to add a little more content to Neera - dialogues, PJ-initiated preliminary flirtations, additional romance dialogues - and to remove the gender restrictions on Neera and Rasaad's romances.
NPC Kit and Proficiency Randomiser
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

jaypee

This mod promised to give all companions in the game a random kit (relative to their class, race, alignment, etc.) and/or assign them random weapon skills (which can give strange results, such as "spear" and "one-handed weapon" skills). In fact, it only modifies Imoen.
NPC Kitpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Idobek

This mod allows you to modify the profiles of your NPCs, so that they are closer to their thoughts. For example, Anomen becomes a Priest of Helm when he successfully completes the Order of the Radiant Heart, and a Berserker if he fails, Imoen and Nalia become adventurers (thief profile) or mages, Edwin a Red Wizard, Korgan an Enraged (fighter kit), Sarevok a Sower of Death, Mazzy a Paladin of Arvoreen, Minsc has his kit name changed to Rashmenian Ranger, and so on.

Please note: contrary to what the readme indicates, it seems that BG1Tutu compatibility has been removed from the installer.
NPC lvl 1 with DSotSC/NTotSC
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

BGT

Zed Nocear

Link
This mod allows you to recruit the NPCs Edwin, Jaheira, Khalid, Kagain, Kivan, Minc, and Xan at level 1 when charname is also level 1. Use in conjunction with mod Dark Side of the Sword Coast or Northern Tales of the Sword Coast, which sets these characters to level 4.

Fichier NPC_1.lvl_w_NTotSC.zip.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
NPC Renamer
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Erg

This mod allows companions to be renamed via an easy-to-use text menu. Using the text menu, you can rename several NPCs, or the same NPC several times (e.g. to correct a typo), simply by selecting their corresponding number(s), until you're fully satisfied with the changes and ready to proceed with installation.

Renaming companions can be fun, but there's a catch: all dialogs refer back to the original names. For example, if you rename Imoen to "Chipie", her name will be Chipie, but all texts will refer to Imoen.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
NPC Tweak
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

andrewas

Mike1072

Orion's Stardom

This mod corrects a number of inconsistencies in the game, such as Cernd's choice of profile as a shapeshifter, or the fact that Anomen retains his family shield even though his father is driving him out of his home. As for Nalia, her thieving skills better reflect her habit of leaving the family castle unseen (60 points in lock-picking, 15 in trap detection and 40 in silent movement).

Incompatible with: The Darkest Day, The Darkest Day (EE-compatible)
NPCs Enhanced... um, for Everyone!
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Subtledoctor

This is intended to be a successor to the fantastic Level One NPCs mod, which was never updated for EE games as its author is no longer active. It offers class and profile choices for all recruitable characters. For each, the choice is limited to what the author felt was relevant, but it also includes profiles from the mods The Divine Remix, Song and Silence: A Mod for Bards and Thieves, or Scales of Balance (by the same author), provided they are installed first. It's not as complete and flexible as L1NPCs, but it does have one major advantage: you can change the profiles of each NPC thanks to an innate special ability you can use in-game. This ability is for one-time use only, so choose wisely! It triggers a dialog that gives you the option of adopting any kit for that class... This includes any mod installation you may have done. Make Minsc a fighter in the WeiDU installation, then use this ability to make him a Barbarian! (Barbarian is in fact, technically, a fighter kit).

Incompatible with: Level One NPCs
PrzywrÃ³cenie brakujÄ…cej (Safana dialog Fix for SOD)
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

Jolan

Link
This mod restores the unused parts of Safana's romance in SOD so that it is no longer interrupted after the 4th dialog. Works with all languages.

AionZ

This mod gives Minsc a Rashemi Berserker profile (inspired by the Frenzied Berserker prestige class) and adds upgradable skin armor to the Hammer Forge.

This mod is obsolete since it has been included in the mod The Artisan's Kitpack by the same author.

A small mod to restore Minsc's original SoD line "Ethics in heroic adventuring" - now you can find out what caused the "political" outrage at launch! Activate the scripts and press S to discover his line.

Western Paladin

Thimblerig

Not happy with the fact that you can only romanticize a few recruitable NPCs? This mod adds no less than 50 romance opportunities with various non-recruitable NPCs throughout the game, for both male and female NPCs, with possible feedback from an original game NPC you're romancing (but official romances will never be automatically cut off). Please note that part of this mod has "adult" content.

Sarevok related tweaks
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Crevs Daak

This mod makes Sarevok more powerful in Baldur's Gate. It comprises two components, each with two installation options:
- Restore Sarevok to his BG1 non-TotSC version: an option allows you not to reduce his saving throws.
- Give Sarevok either a +2 two-handed sword, or the one from the final battle of Ascension (if the Ascension mod is installed and only in BGT and EET).
Sarevok Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Rebbeca

Aeryn

Lava Del'Vortel

K'aeloree

Sarevok Anchev has been many things. Once a murderer, deceiver and despised enemy, he has become the unlikely ally of a protagonist facing an uncertain future. While many of the facts about his past and former plans are common knowledge, little is known about his current motivations, now that life has been restored to him. Has death shaken his perceptions, or simply strengthened his resolve to ruthlessly seize all the power he can get his hands on? Is it possible for mortal enemies to become more than reluctant allies?
Sarevok Wiederherstellung
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

NicolasP

Link Link
In the original ToB, Sarevok lacks the equipment known from Baldur's Gate, which gives him his characteristic demonic appearance. This mod restores his magical equipment from the start of Throne of Bhaal, meaning he's already wearing it when the party meets him: a helmet, armor and a two-handed sword.
Two optional components give him alternative portraits, and one adds three lines of sound to Sarevok Necrophage.

Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.

The BG1NPC Project
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Team

Blucher

Andyr

cmorgan

Kish

Domi

AstroBryGuy

This mod provides character interaction on a par with Baldur's Gate II. Due to the different technical capabilities of Baldur's Gate and its little brother, the mod can only work with Baldur's Gate II, making it mandatory to install BG1Tutu or Baldur's Gate Trilogy in order to enjoy it, or an EE game.
It develops relationships between the main character and his teammates or between members of the party for all Baldur's Gate recruitable characters, as well as romances for Ajantis, Branwen, Coran, DynahÃ©ir, Shar-Teel and Xan. To take full advantage of this, you'll also need to download and install the BG1 NPC Project Music Pack mod (to be installed after BG1 NPC Project).

The Vanishing of Skie Silvershield
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

The mod makes Eldoth and Skie available the moment you leave Candlekeep. It moves Eldoth to the Friendly Arm Inn and expands his plan to kidnap / free Skie Silvershield. Follow his plan, and you will be able to get an alternative for Imoen and Safana sooner than in the original game. To make this happen, Eldoth's quest had to be expanded, but it's easy enough to make a low-level party handle everything without any problems.
To keep the balance, Eldoth and Skie both start at level 1.

Incompatible with: Sword Coast Stratagems
Totemic Cernd
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Cirerrek

CamDawg

This mini-mod assigns Cernd the profile of shaman (totemic druid) rather than shapeshifter. In the process, his physical stats have been slightly enhanced to make him a reasonably attractive alternative to other clerics or druids, such as Jaheira or Anomen.
Ulrien of Cormyr, SagaMaster
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Rabain

This mod adds a non-recruitable NPC to the Auberge du Bonrepos, on the Waukeen's Promenade. This is Ulrien de Cormyr, a self-proclaimed Master of Sagas, who travels the Sword Coast sharing his collection of poetry and prose with anyone who'll listen. He has no notion of what constitutes a good, bad or mundane story, let alone how well written it is. So expect to find anything and everything in his repertoire. Meet him at the Bonrepos Inn on the Waukeen's Promenade and engage him in conversation to draw from his repertoire.

Fichier Ulrien-SagaMaster.zip.
Undivided: Keeping NPCs Around
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PSTEE

aquadrizzt

This mod turns Vhailor and Ignus into companions rather than party members. It allows players to have all seven companions present as they progress through the game. They will follow the party, always intervene and be identified as party members by scripts and dialogs, and will progress in levels at the same time as Nameless.
However, for technical reasons, this mod suffers from a few limitations detailed in the download link.

This mod adds a series of dialogs for any male or female PJ who has repelled Viconia. It tries to give something to sink your teeth into for anyone not interested in romance. But keep in mind that Viconia isn't an easy person to talk to, let alone befriend. She has a mind of her own, and even if she agrees to travel with you, she may not wish to become your confidante.

The added dialogue maintains the style of the original game: bears have their own language!

An improved version of the original Coutelier mod, this mod adds content for Aerie:

Within Amnesia

This mod is designed to make Xan more fun to play, with useful items and a chance to realize his potential on the Sword Coast. Mulahey's chest therefore contains a customized +3 Moonblade and new magic items that will enable him to take part in combat more effectively, as well as crucial early-game spells that are perfectly suited to Xan the enchanter and his limited spellbook.
Yoshimo Friendship
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

EET

Team

Shadowhawke

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a series of dialogs with Yoshimo, our favorite charming scoundrel who we meet in the Irenicus dungeon at the start of the game. Spanning the time he spends in the group, Yoshimo Friendship develops the humorous thief, expanding his backstory and offering the player a fresh perspective on the character.
Yoshimo Romance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a new kind of romance with the infamous bounty hunter. Available to human, elf, half-elf and tieffeline female PJs with at least 13 charisma, this particular romance fits perfectly with SoA's main storyline. Although you might think it would all end with Jon Irenicus's encounter at Spellhold Asylum, the mod also features content for ToB.
This mod is compatible with Yoshimo Friendship and Tortured Souls-BP, but some dialog may be affected by the presence of these mods.

Incompatible with: Keeping Yoshimo
Yoshimo's Remorse
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

jmaeq

Lava Del'Vortel

Was this really the end of Yoshimo's adventures with the Child of Bhaal? This mod makes Yoshimo a playable character in Throne of Bhaal. However, he's not what you'd expect... So get ready for more adventures and discussions with the infamous bounty hunter, a tormented soul who's left nothing but regrets. Listen to him, for this may be his last chance to find peace.
Yoshimo's Remorse is compatible with Yoshimo Romance, but if such a relationship took place in SoA, it will not appear in ToB, and the content of the Yoshimo Romance mod will occur instead.

Incompatible with: Keeping Yoshimo

Aelar's Emporium of Magical Wares
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BG2EE

EET

ShadowfireAngel

Having travelled a long way from the Northern lands of Faerun, Aelar has now set up shop within Athkatla at Waukeen's Promenade! During the day, he can be found renting out Maheer's store located one level up on the western side. During the night, he will retire to rest before returning the following day to peddle his wares once more!

Aurora's Shoes and Boots
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Bookwyrme

Miloch

Sampsca

If you've ever dreamed of buying pink boots in Imoen, catching up on the latest gossip from Athkatla's merchants and learning more about daily life in the town, this is the mod for you. Aurora's Shoes and Boots adds over 2 dozen pairs of boots, as useful as they are stylish. Add to this the presence of Aurora, a retired fighter in her own right, who will pique your curiosity with the latest gossip from nobles and other common folk. You'll also meet Tomthal, a gnome afflicted with a mysterious ailment, and Karaea, his beloved sister, both of whom are also vendors. Several items are also randomly scattered throughout the game.

Choose the last github link for the EE version.

This mod adds 5 new bard profiles, each with a special war chant (Abettor of Mask, Dancer, Deathsinger, Storm Drummer and Troubadour), as well as a new merchant selling bard items.

Belm ring
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

cdx

You meet a djinn at Trademeet that can convert each of the three speed weapons (Belm, Scarlet Ninja-To, Kundane) to +APR rings (ring vary in quality, not all three rings have full +1APR). The aim is to make use of two-handed weapons more interesting and to avoid having to use speed weapon in the off-hand for optimal builds.
BG1 CoM Forge - Item Upgrade
ğŸŸ¥âğŸ˜€

BG

Created for BG with its Tales of the Sword Coast expansion, this mod adds a new blacksmith located at the Friendly Arm Inn: Thorengrim Poingmarteau. He sells new items and, like Cromwell, can improve 11 others. In addition to its merchant aspect, this mod adds 3 new encounters: ogres in the Bandit Camp, a duergar and his menagerie in the Nashkel mines, and drunken sailors trying to rob you at Baldur's Gate.

This mod is no longer available, having been integrated into the Dark Horizons mod.
Boards O' Magick Item Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

olimikrig

This mod is first and foremost a tribute to two illustrious members of the now-defunct Boards o' Magick forum, immortalizing them in BG2. It adds two new characters, the imp Bion and the merchant Taluntain, who will give you access to previously rather mundane items... You'll find them on the Waukeen's Promenade in the SoA part of the game, and in Amkethran in the ToB part.

Use the Polish link for an original game, and the other for an EE game.

Sir BillyBob

This mod adds monsters (with scripted encounters and a rather amusing nod to the "Hammer Brothers" - for those who know Nintendo... this mod is made with humor), spells, scripts, items, 2 stores and a new quest, plus a new inn to explore in Athkatla. In short, a fun new gaming experience.

Enhanced BG2
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Nastian

Link Link
The content of this mod was originally intended to be part of a larger project, but was never completed. It brings several changes to the game, intended to make it more attractive. It contains several components:
- on the Waukeen's Promenade, the traveling merchant Alyoud sells 7 powerful magic items.
- addition and modification of character interactions.
- addition of tomes and manuals in empty or uninteresting containers.
- Irenicus dungeon: it is now possible to negotiate with the genie to obtain Balduran's cloak.
- addition of new portraits for your character.
- restoration of missing item descriptions (Plate Mail +3: 'The Practical Defense', Sling +3: 'Arla's Dragonbane').
- Item set bonuses: a character equipped with all Wormsor-forged draconic items or Balduran equipment receives additional bonuses. 5 new enemy races added: gnoll, skeleton, wiverne, yuan-ti and zombie.
- 10 new profiles have been added, including some from the AD&D3 prestige classes: fighter (Knight, Duelist, Gladiator, Legionnaire), ranger (Globe-trotter), paladin (Crusader, Lich Terror, Dragon Slayer), thief (Silent Slayer) and cleric (Priestess of Aurile).
- various minor changes to the Dungeon of Irenicus.

Fichier Enhanced_BG2_v1.1.rar.
Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Food and Herbal Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

belladonna

Link
This mod adds 5 new stores (3 in SoA and 2 in ToB) featuring herbal mixtures for a variety of effects.

Fichier Foodmod_v103.7z.
ForgeIt-IWD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds a set of 8 new powerful artifacts to your IWD:EE game. But you don't just find them and put them to use. First you have to find all the needed elements and return them to their former glory: just like the Wave or The Equalizer in BG2. Elements of the new items are scattered throughout the whole game, including HoW and TotL campaigns.
An optional component enhances Icasaracht's scale armor.

Herbs and Potions Add-in for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Baronius

This mod adds herbs that can be made by an herbalist who runs a store on the Waukeen's Promenade. Herbs can also enchant weapons.

Warning: if you have the BG1 version of this mod in a BGT installation, do not install the BG2 version!!!!

ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

Link Link
This mod adds:
- 6 new profiles: Demon Slayer, Mistaken Knight, Priest of Sunie, Priest of Kelevmor, Priest of Gargauth and Silencer.
- 6 new non-recruitable NPCs to talk to.
- new portraits, mainly for NPCs.
- 2 new stores (one in the graveyard) and the merchant Lisz.
- around 20 new items (some to be bought in stores, others to be found).
- several original characters will have their own portraits.

Icewind Dale II Bonus Merchant
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Wes Weimer

This mod adds a new merchant to IWD2. This is Ribald Barterman, who sells several items taken from BG2. You'll find him in Targos (Galaway trading post) and in Kuldahar (Conway blacksmith), where you can buy some very hard-hitting weapons at very high prices: the Eternity Scourge, Solaufein's Moonblade, the Equalizer, Jan's armor, Keldorn's armor, Valygar's armor, Valygar's katana, Gesen's shortbow, Arvoreen's short sword, etc. All available in IWD2. All available in IWD2, adapted to D&D3 rules.

Remember the PST tattoos? They're the same, and lots more. You will find the merchant:
- BG2: outside the thieves' guild, south of the dark shroud
- Black Pits 2: away from the merchant's circle

Improved Anvil
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

el.critto

Contrary to what its name might suggest, this is essentially a mod that drastically increases the difficulty of the base game. It also features new quests, new profiles (including the Auramaster Druid Kit and the RiskBreaker), a randomizer, a new recruitable character (Sibel), and the ability to forge many items that are big-budget, but necessary to defeat equally big-budget enemies.

The mod exists in two versions: one for the original versions, the other for the EE versions.
Incompatible with: BG2 FixPack

The items in this mod are very powerful indeed, so be warned.

EET

Shohy

This mod adds the merchant Jamella, who sells 108 Diablo 2 items. You'll find her on her boat after leaving Spellhold or in the March Mountains (ToB). So as not to unbalance the game, you'll only be able to buy one item, and it will cost you half your purse. Make the right choice!

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2010. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

Rzabon

This mod adds a new bonus merchant named Jarnip to the Adventurer's Mart. Like his colleagues Joluv and Deidre, Jarnip sells a variety of unique magical items to aid you during your adventures in Amn.
KurosaÃ¯ the combiner
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Deratiseur

Kurosai is a pnj who, for a lot of gold, can combine three +x items into one +x+1 item. This works for almost all '+x' items, from weapons to armour to jewellery. He can thus combine items up to +6. He appears in Trademeet after the Daos have left. Later in the game he will move to Saradush, and disappear with the destruction of the town.

ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2EE

IWDEE

Deratiseur

L'interplan is a store selling a wide range of original items and over a hundred new spells. It can also combine several dozens of potions. It can be found on the Waukeen's Promenade in BG2, and is accessible via an item in the Yetis Cave in IWD:EE.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.
La MÃºsica de los Reinos
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Eslizon

This mod adds a new musical instrument store to the Waukeen's Promenade. You'll find a flute, the lute of valor and horror, a lyre of progression, the harp of fortune, Bernad's battle horn and more. If you wish, you can accept a musical challenge by meeting the black cantor, at night, on the Waukeen's Promenade. If you're interested in the power of music and magical instruments, this mod is for you.
Light of Selune
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Crucis

In addition to bringing many new items (around 145) and 4 new merchants (two in Targos, one in the Itinerant Village and one in Kuldahar), the mod updates the ranger and bard classes to match edition 3.5 of the AD&D rules (used for IWD2), improves almost all original armor and shields, as well as correcting bow damage handling and adding a Strength prerequisite to use them. Finally, traps have been improved to be tougher and more pernicious (increased damage).

Mortis Mini mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Mortis

Seifer

This mod adds two stores (one in the Irenicus dungeon behind Jaheira's cell and the other in the shadow ruins - Amaunator's temple) that sell potions allowing you to transform into various creatures: silt, vampire, minotaur, spectator... This is a dark mod based on undead, liches, etc. Potions can only be used by humans of fighter, cleric, mage or thief class.

To install the mod on an EE game, use the second link.
Read the readme carefully before indulging in potions of all colors.

In addition, Trademeet's blacksmith is looking for rare components to forge the legendary Phoenix Spear and Mithril Defender. And Cromwell can forge a new item...

Nanstein
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Mhoram

Nanstein is a new blacksmith who appears opposite Cromwell on the docks. He can transform legendary items into others that might be more useful depending on play style, or at least more original. For example, red dragon armor is transformed into a mage's robe that protects against fire. The flail of eternity could be changed into elemental arrows. I wouldn't advise you to attack it, as you won't get any of the items it forges... and you'll die.

The github link allows you to download an EE-compatible version with new items created by Deratiseur.

Ohlo's Miscellany Store
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Truman

The mod is a combination of two mods. One half of the mod is a store and the other half is the stories the owner tells. The items in the store are a little overpowered and way too expensive, to balance out the overpower. Four stories are interwoven with purchases made in the store.
Oops the magician
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Deratiseur

Oops is a very special character: he has the ability to change a spell scroll into a special ability. In concrete terms, bring Oops the scroll of the spell you'd like to have as a special ability 1x/day, pay him 10,000 po per level of the desired spell, you lose the scroll but you gain a new ability. You'll find Oops next to the Watcher's keep, to the south-west. It is designed to be accessible in both SOA and TOB.
The mod also handles grimoires drawn from other mods like L'interplan, Semi Multi Clerics, Wild Mage Additions.

Osvald, Icewind Dale's dwarf, crashed at the Nashkel carnival. He sells potions for travelers.

Warning: As this mod overwrites the graphics files of the Carnival map, it may be incompatible with other mods.

Recargador
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Ancalagon el Negro

Your visit to the Waukeen's Promenade wouldn't be complete without meeting Victor Cacgomval, a cleric mage capable of recharging magic items before they turn to dust, as is possible in the P&P manuals.

Warning: this mod has been known to shamefully exploit a flaw in the game's engine. Selling wands to it, then buying them back or stealing them refills them...
Rolles Safyer
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Serdrick

Rolles Safyer is a vendor on Athkatla's Waukeen's Promenade. While he sells many items - and quite a lot of money - (including a few of those famous books that increase stats), his main function is as a blacksmith of magical items. Like a Cromwell or Ruad, he will analyze your inventory to see if any of your weapons or items can be improved or combined with other items. The result can be powerful, if you pay the price, which can be substantial...
Ruad Ro'fhessa Item Upgrade
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Moonfruit

Freddy_Gwendo

This mod adds a dwarf blacksmith to SoA, then ToB, capable of assembling items in the manner of Cromwell. Unlike the Item Upgrade mod, most of the items in question require some sacrifice, such as Yoshimo's heart or Vague's handle.
Rupert the Dye Merchant
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

vilkacis

This mod adds a new merchant selling various dyes and new outfits. Dyes work like potions. These can be used by anyone and will permanently change the user's colors as specified by the dye: there are separate options for primary and secondary colors, leather (belts/boots/straps), armor, decorative items (such as belt buckles/amulets) and hair. All these changes are purely cosmetic: you don't gain or lose any abilities by using anything purchased from Rupert.
Saradas Magic for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Saradas

This mod adds a new NPC, Saradas the Archmage, who interacts in various ways with the Child of Bhaal group. In Shadows of Amn, he's a non-recruitable NPC who offers many services. He can be found in the Temple of Lathander, in the temple district of Athkatla. As well as having several exclusive dialogues that unfold as the plot unfolds, his store is well worth a visit. What's more, Saradas is an artifact collector. If you find an ancient artifact, you can bring it to him and he'll enchant it for you, conferring magical properties on the item.
In ToB, Saradas is finally a recruitable NPC! You can summon him via the Spirit of Destiny in your Pocket Plane. He's a human priest of Lathander paired with a mage.
STR 10, DEX 13, CON 14, INT 18, WIS 20, CHA 15.
Saradas Magic for BGEE / EET
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

EET

Saradas

This mod adds a new NPC, Saradas the Archmage, who interacts in various ways with the Child of Bhaal group. He is from the Friendly Arm. As well as having several exclusive dialogues that unfold as the plot takes shape, his store is well worth a visit. What's more, once you've defeated Davaeorn, he'll teach you an epic spell corresponding to your magic school.
Semi Multi Clerics
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

Team

Bob Tokyo

the bigg

JohnBob

Deratiseur

This mod adds a merchant, the Lady of Mysteries, worshipper of Mystra, who sells a magic manual giving access to some thirty divine spells, including one never seen before. Only profane spellcasters can benefit from this at the cost of -2 in Dexterity and Constitution. In other words, thanks to this mod, you can become a multi-class sorcerer/cleric, bard/cleric, fighter/mage/cleric (fighter/mage base class and reading of the book resulting in a substantial XP gain), kensai/mage (cleric), sorcerer (cleric) or scalde (cleric), for example... and the very famous fighter/mage/thief/cleric. Please note, however, that there are some restrictions: all the info is in the readme. You'll find it north of the Adventurer Mart on the Waukeen's Promenade, and in the Pocket Plane. In BGEE and IWDEE, the seller can be found near Orrik's tower or in Firebeard house or at the Sorcerous Sundries.

The github link is EE compatible.
Shohy's Modern Military Store
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

Here's an anachronic merchant mod that sells some modern firearms (e.g., assault rifles, sniper rifles), military supplies (e.g., bulletproof vests, tactical grenades), and advanced gear. Players with sufficient combat strength can challenge the merchant for rare rewards.
You can find him to the Second floor of Sorcerous Sundries in Baldur's Gate. In SoA, he's at the TradeMeet. In ToB, he's at the Oasis.

Install this mod after other equipment mods, as it modifies all armor in the game.
Sir Renal
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Eslizon

Lollorian

This mod adds a merchant, Sir Renal, responsible for negotiating transactions carried out by the Order of the Radiant Heart. In addition to the usual temple services, he possesses a number of useful items for fighting the forces of evil. You'll find him in the Order's headquarters.

Only the github link is compatible with EE versions.
Standard Awesome Modpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Standard Awesome

A collection of mods designed to help flesh-out the city of Baldur's Gate and add some spice to full EET runs. A secondary goal is to provide a worthwhile gold-sink for later in the game.
The major component adds a merchant offering balanced permanent modifications at a high monetary price. Some books require completing minor fetch quests.
Store mod for IWD2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

CoM_Solaufein

Link
This mod adds a new merchant to IWD2. This is Shi'nayne Xiltyn, who sells several items taken from BG2 and IWD, as well as new ones. You'll find her in Targos (at the Weeping Widow Inn) and Kuldahar (at Conlan's blacksmith shop).

Fichier IWD2Store211.rar.
Sword Coast Customs
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

cgordon

Baldur's Gate I features two powerful weapons with +2 enchantments and elemental damage: the Varscona longsword and the Ashideena warhammer. This means that longswords and warhammers are the two most powerful skills in the game, and it's difficult to defend the choice of another weapon skill.
The aim of this mod is to allow a wider choice of weapons without affecting balance and difficulty.

To achieve this, it gives players the option of ordering a weapon from TaÃ«rom Fuiruim at the "Grondemarteau" forge in Beregost, then upgrading it with damage from Thalantyr the mage of Haute-Haie and Toubazar Drin at the Baldur's Gate Sorcerous Sundries. This will give the player the possibility of creating a halberd of cold, or a ninja-to acid, among others.

There is an additional and optional component, although it is highly recommended, allowing Ashideena and Varscona to be removed or moved later in the game, so that the addition of another weapon inflicting elemental damage does not unbalance the game.

CoM_Solaufein

Link
This mod installs dwarf merchant Kurtz Goldenaxe on the Waukeen's Promenade. He sells colorful armor and very expensive, magical new armor.

Please note: Contrary to what is stated in the readme, this mod is incompatible with the original versions of the game.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

IWDEE

Deratiseur

This mod adds an anachronistic merchant who sells more than 200 Morrowind and Arcanum items. Note: as the mod's raison d'Ãªtre is to anachronistically offer all items from other games, it makes no distinction between useless, balanced and overpowered items. Install it with full knowledge of the facts. If you're looking for balanced items, check out L'interplan.

Riojano2002

Volo is not the only one who knows stories worth telling. There are many troubadours and bards who travel all over FaerÃ»n risking their lives in order to brighten up the taverns we visit. This mod adds a very special troubadour, who, for a few gold pieces, will tell you unheard stories and even the origins of certain characters, such as the mysterious Riojano, or Artemis Entreri. You can find him in Waukeen Promenade. It also adds a shop with curious objects.

Vampire Tales
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Dark Raven

The mods Miriam (vampire NPC with less gruff stats than Valen NPC, but seemingly just as moody and violent) and Dark Ritual (adding a merchant with quite a few new items from Icewind Dale 1 and 2, originally translated by Panaka) are now combined in this mod, which also improves the Eyeless quest, the encounter with the Harpers, and adds a new encounter in the Firkraag dungeon.
Miriam : STR 18/75, DEX 17, CON 11, INT 16, WIS 9, CHA 15.

Requires: ToB

Wares of the Planes
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Argent77

This mod introduces a large number of weapons and accessories from the Planescape universe into the Baldur's Gate series. Several items from Planescape: Torment have been slightly modified to fit in better with the BG series, as items from the Planescape universe are generally more powerful and unique than their counterparts from the Forgotten Realms.
Spell and item

Mod

Compatibilities

Adventurer's Miscellany
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This slightly muddled mod adds a number of items to vary the game's pleasures: you can light torches, juggle apples, use oil flasks, dress up, etc. The author decided not to add any new items. The author has decided not to reveal how they work, leaving you to find out as you play.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk.
Akun's Gear
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Incrementis

It's an item mod containing 2 enchanted katanas and 1 Wizard's Slayer armor. All items can only be equipped by a level 4 Wizard Slayer.

Items can be purchased from the merchant Erdane in the Durlag Tower area. The merchant sells items directly from stock (no dialog options). The price is several thousand PO per item.

As it dynamically writes a new category of items into the system, we recommend installing this mod last.
Altered Knock spell Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

sotona

This small mod modifies the 2nd-level mage spell Knock to allow it to also disarm traps within a limited range.
Ammo belts and bottomless bags
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Tioma

This little mod adds six ammunition belts that can hold arrows, bolts, marbles and darts; as well as bags of almost unlimited capacity.

Unfortunately, the latest store-installed components overwrite .sto files, making this mod incompatible with others. Install at your own risk.
Animus Weapon
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Team

Tome

Alkalurops

Eleandor

This mod adds a new telepathic sword to the game: Animus. Unlike Lilarcor, Animus is reasonably intelligent and capable of holding a real conversation. It's a +1 weapon with no particular benefits, but once you know a little more about your heritage, it can be upgraded to a +2 longsword with a few extra benefits, at the cost of its ability to converse. You can buy it for a reasonable price in Nashkel's general store.

BG2EE

EET

Team

Alexander12

tipun

This mod adds 60 new items to the Baldur's Gate series, many of which are intended for mages, placing them in stores, containers and enemy inventories.
Arcane-Divine Spell Pack
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Marv

Link
Originally designed to make spells conform to their descriptions (duration, range, damage...), this mod has gradually evolved to modify them to make them more interesting to play.
It has been rendered obsolete by many more recent mods, including Spell Revisions.

Fichier ADPack_v11.rar.
Armors and robes for PST
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PST

Razfallow

Link
This mod adds a few armors and robes to the game, which you can find in stores or in enemy inventories: leather armors, besantines, chain mail, fire resistance, cold resistance, electricity resistance, trickster and traveler robes. Note that wearing them does not alter the character's animation.
Arrows of Magic Missile
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

Choix

This mod adds a new arrow that splits into 10 magical projectiles.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Auril's Bane
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Chosen of Mystra Mod Group

This huge mod combines the two former Project Auril and Winter's Bane mods. It adds a host of items, spells and creatures, a few quests and new features and fixes.
Avoid its IWD Fix by Grog component in favor of Icewind Dale Fixpack. The main component also has its own version of the quest The Voice of Durdel Anatha, which makes it incompatible with the Unfinished Business for Icewind Dale mod component of the same name.

Warning: Unfortunately, it overwrites more or less everything it touches, which means that it deletes many modifications to mods installed before it. So you need to install it first, even before the fixpack.
Requires: Trials of the Luremaster (IWD)

BGT

hlidskialf

This mini mod adds a potion box and an ammo belt to Deirdre's shop in the Adventurer Mart.
Bags of Torment
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PSTEE

Argent77

This mini mod adds a few containers to the game, which can be purchased in different stores: the Imp leather bag, the modrone storage crystal and the pocket singularity. An optional component enables the game's containers to store over 32,000 items.

BG2

ronin69hof

Link
Totally useless if ToB is installed, this mod lets you cheat by importing BG items into Irenicus Dungeon to make SoA easier to play.

This mod does exactly the same thing as the Import more items into Shadows of Amn component of BGT Tweak Pack.

BG1 Adventure Pack
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Chosen of Mystra Mod Group

Link
This mod adds a merchant who sells items of ToB-like power, and also equips certain enemies with items of similar power. These items are droppable.

Please note that the "more powerful enemies" component replaces creatures rather than patching them.
This mod has become obsolete since its integration into Dark Horizons.
Fichier bg1adventure1_06.zip.
BGEE/SOD Item Replacement
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

gattberserk

The aim of this mod is to improve the game experience by replacing all the unique items duplicated in BGEE & SOD with something different. This is done by importing reasonable magic items from other infinity games such as BG2EE, IWDEE as well as new items created by the author.

Book of Legal Possibilities
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

Abel

This infinite magic book (C:CreateItem("BLBOOK01")) allows you to summon and recruit any BGEE/SOD companion, gain any of Bhaal's powers, and buy any normal or magic item available in the game at the unbeatable price of 1 gold coin.
Books and Boots
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Pufuc

This mod that adds new items (mostly jewerly, books and boots) it advances characters through books, rather than relying solely on additional levels and equipment
Money sink - new books cost a lot, so now player has a reason and a place to spend their riches
Boots of speed - now there is enough of them for whole party
Smoother lore and carry weight advancement - every new point of wisdom, intelligence and strength makes a difference
Some women now have new jewelry in their possession(like Silke for example). It may make a few fights a tiny little bit more difficult

Brendan Bellina BG2/BG1Tutu enhancements collection
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Brendan Bellina

Link
These 7 mini-mods equip the Baldur's Gate game with bags of content not found elsewhere, as well as a special graveyard. Brendan Bellina Book Bags (BBBKPG-BG2): 9 book bags; Brendan Bellina Potion Cases (BBPBAG): 9 potion cases; Brendan Bellina Quivers (BBQUIV-BG2): 9 arrow quivers.
- Brendan Bellina Crossbow Bolt Quivers (BBQUIVB-BG2): 9 ammunition cases (bolts) Brendan Bellina Ammunition Belts (BBQUIVC-BG2): 9 ammunition belts (marbles and darts).
- Brendan Bellina Scroll Cases (BBSCCS): 9 scroll cases.
- Brendan Bellina Scimitar of the Arch-Druid, "Sif's Gift" (BBSCARDR-BG2) : Scimitar of the Arch-Druid +3 "Sif's Gift" The first link is the official website, the second an alternative download.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Brendan Bellina IWD2 enhancements collection
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Brendan Bellina

Link
This is a collection of mini-mods for importing BG2 items into IWD2: containers (quivers, ammo belts, book bags), unique weapons (katanas, swords, daggers, staffs) and unique helms. As well as a few unique items: strangling rope, planar rest crate (?!), pocket transmutator, teleportation ring, fusion cloak.

This mini mod adds a new version of the Balduran Butterknife in Deidre's shop (Adventurer Mart). It's a +1 dagger that can slow down its target with each blow.

Consumables
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

RoyalProtector

This mod provides a variety of consumable items for use in the game, enhancing gameplay and offering new strategies for players. Many are taken or inspired by other games and media such as BG3, NWN, and The Witcher. The mod distributes the items among vanilla stores as well as manually placed on some NPCs and automatically in the loot of some enemies randomly.
Convinient Ammunition
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

Freche

This little mod adds in-game bags of content: a quiver, a holster, a bag of plenty, and an ammo belt in Grondemarteau's Forge in Beregost.

In BG2:EE, he's supposed to add his items in Irenicus Keep and at the arrow merchant on Waukeen's Promenade, but the code hasn't been written...
Creature Summoning
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Penguincha

This mod adds a new pack of 9 creature summoning spells for wizards. Each spell summons either a few monsters with a number of life dice equal to the spell level, or many monsters with two life dice less than the spell level.

If you play a multi-class character, we strongly recommend you install EEex before this mod.
Creslyn's BG2 Custom Items
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

BGT

Creslyn

This mod adds numerous items to the game. Some are a little too powerful, however, and will be difficult to obtain (such as the Gorgon's staff in Illithild City) or prohibitively expensive.

This mod has been converted to WeiDU and integrated into The Sorcerer's Place Collection.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Pecca

00zim00

This mod's archive contains two parts:
Pre-started characters with bios and portraits to import when you create your character.
Trinket the bear, who replaces your pet if you're neutral good or lawful good.
Crusader Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Corayo Raumoheru

Link
This mod adds three new profiles
Champion of Torm: +3 bonus to saving throws, +3 to damage and thac0 for 5 rounds, one additional Laying on Hands per day every 4 levels. Cannot use ranged weapons.
Energist: 5 special skills, CA +2 every 10 levels. Cannot use ranged weapons or wear armor.
Adventurer: 20 bonus to Picking and Trap Detection. Knowledge +30. Also adds three new items to the game.

The mediafire link offers version 4.3.
Fichier Crusade_v4.rar.
Cursed Items Revision
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Salk

This mod slightly modifies the characteristics of some cursed items, adds a few new ones and modifies some descriptions in a more or less humorous way. As the author recommends revealing as little as possible, we won't say more...

This mod is compatible with all other WeiDU mods that do not alter the content of cursed item files. More information in the README.

D2 Weapon
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Dan_P

This little mod adds a pack of 11 weapons inspired by FromSoft's Dark Souls trilogy, plus 4 more. These can be purchased at various in-game shops. Some are balanced, others have very extreme advantages and disadvantages that set them apart from the base game weapons.
Dancing Sword mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Aaron Kummer

This mod creates an item that summons a dancing sword of Mordenkainen once a day.

If the second team member is named Elric, Stormbringer appears and steals the item before disappearing.
This mod has disappeared from https://github.com/AaronKummer/DancingSwordMod.
Dark Ritual
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Dark Raven

Link Link
Now included in Vampire Tales, this mini mod added the Asgrim merchant to the Temple of Talos, along with quite a few new items from Icewind Dale 1 and 2. It also improved the Cult of the Eyeless and the Harpers' building. The 26 new items were mainly located in Asgrim's store and on Lilith's body.

Fichier Dark_Ritual_v1.01.zip.
Daulmakan's Item Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

Daulmakan

This little mod adds around 45 items inspired by the Icewind Dale and Planescape: Torment series, scattered around stores and on the bodies of your enemies. It also modifies a few existing items (graphical enhancement to make them more distinguishable...), adds a new merchant to your Pocket Plane, brings Deirdre and Joluv to Amkethran's inn, lets Cromwell and Cespenar forge new items...
In Baldur's Gate, it adds 13 items, a bag of contents in Winthrop's store; a ring from Ulcaster Academy...
Preferably installed after all mods that add or modify spells.

Use the github link for EE versions.
Requires: ToB
Dee Summoning Spell
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Crevs Daak

This mod is nothing more than a big prank that summons one of Beamdog's moderators into the game. You'll find the summoning spell in Lazarus's shop in Saradush.
Demon Summoning Ritual
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Tin

Also called Unholy Gate Opening Ritual Book, this mod adds a book for summoning a random demon. It is in the possession of Tolgerias in the planar sphere. Its use is dangerous.

Please note: it refuses to install after mods that modify mages (such as Sword Coast Stratagems).
Detect Magic/Intimidation
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This little mod adds the Magic Detection spell: magicians and priests will be able to "assess" the strength of magic items possessed by creatures, and priests will know if they are cursed. In addition, it grants the special ability Intimidation to most fighters and all half-orcs, enabling them to ward off intruders.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
DGItems
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Daniel Goodrich

Here's a mod that, in exchange for a few gold coins, will give you items, ammunition, weapons and armor for your BG2ToB and BG2EE games, including a very effective armor set and a powerful scimitar.

The items in this mod are very powerful indeed, so be warned.
Dimension Gate: Or How TV Bunny searched TV Remote Control
ğŸŸ¢âğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Gamemacik

The main aim of this mod is to add teleportation capabilities to players, enabling them to travel to all official BG2 and ToB maps. It also adds many other spells to the game. Please note: it must be installed in conjunction with the [SpellFix Visual Effects] mod (https://www.shsforums.net/files/file/1271-spellfix-visual-effects/).
Divine Intervention
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

Macready

Link
This mod aims to bring some of NWN's divine spell rule system into Baldur's Gate: longer duration, more useful low-level spells, etc. As a result, protection spells last longer, while attack spells can be cast more quickly. Optional components can be used to radically modify certain spells.

BG

Eudaemonium

This mod features two weapons: the first for Edwin (EBNLSH), a black ebonite whip that cripples and dominates opponents. The second for Xzar (HDSHND), a cold dagger that casts Necromancy spells. Both items can only be accessed via the console.

Enchant the Missile Launchers
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Dee

This mod uses the projectile caster's enchantment value, not the projectile's, to determine which type of target to hit, unless the projectile is more powerful than the caster. An optional component allows the use of arrow quivers, with limited capacity, which recharge after each rest.
Evermemory for BG2EE
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Graion Dilach

This mod introduces the Arcane Ring to BG2EE in Ribald's store, doubling the number of slots for the wearer's level 1 spells.

The repo has been read-only since March 2024.
This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
Evilness
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Riklaunim

This mod reduces the power of certain magic items (for example, Celestial Fury becomes a +3 katana, Karsomir no longer gives resistance to magic and no longer dispels magic when touched). Certain other items have disappeared (e.g. Gaxx's ring). Note that these items retain their code so that they can be recognized by blacksmith mods.
Other components allow you to modify certain aspects of the game, such as elven chainmail with no class restrictions, new NPCs in the Dungeon of Irenicus...

Although the mod is WeiDU-compatible, it is an override mod.
Exnem's Addon
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Sir BillyBob

This mod includes all Exnem's spells and items in WeiDU format, i.e. 21 new spells and 88 new items. The first component installs the items and spells, a second distributes some of them to the inventories of existing creatures, and the third distributes the others to various game containers.
FindIt-IWD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod adds thirty new items to IWD:EE. You'll find them in the inventories of certain creatures, sold by merchants or left in containers.
First Aid
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mini-mod gives the "first aid" ability to all characters, who can heal anyone wounded in the previous three rounds by 2d4 hit points. It also cancels unconsciousness effects, slows down the effects of poison and restores absorbed constitution points. However, it cannot be applied to oneself.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
Foebane +3 and +5 improvement mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

elminster

This mini mod corrects the damage inflicted by the Sangplan sword against extra-planar creatures. From now on, it will do the same extra damage against solars, planatars, elementals, githyankis, imps, genies and tieflings.

Ã‰crase SW1H62.itm et SW1H63.itm.

Rughalt

This mod adds new grimoires to the game that function like tomes, giving players permanent bonuses.

This mod installs the Forgotten Realms Campaign prestige class, the Harper Agent, in two versions: one for thieves, the other for bards. It also adds a number of items related to Harpers.

Heart of the Wood
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Tin

This mod adds a magic druidic wand that summons some powerful forest monsters and creatures (with some new ones from the monsters compendium) to aid your druid in combat, although the overall HD of the summoned creatures is limited to 13. This item can be acquired from Kyland Lind (Druid Grove). You must kill him first for it of course.
Holy Avenger Kit + Extra
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Ellderon

This mod adds the Holy Avenger paladin profile. Very rare, these are the most feared fighters in paladin orders. The mod also adds a few items: 4 elven swords, 3 two-handed swords, 1 helmet, 2 plates, 1 magician's robe and 2 rings.

The last two optional components overwrite some of the game's .cre files: install with full knowledge of the facts!

This crazy little mod allows you to obtain the Holy Grenade if you still have the Stone of Light when you leave Underdark. It's a formidable weapon against certain creatures...

sffrrrom

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
iiItem
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

igi

This mod adds dozens of new items to the game, focusing on lesser-known item types (such as potions, bracelets, arrows, etc.). It does not add upgradable items, item parts or blacksmiths. Items are scattered throughout the game world and added to creature inventories and stores. Unique" items (those with a specific individual story) are only added to stores.
iiItems should be installed after mods that add new creatures or stores, to ensure that new items are evenly dispersed throughout the game, and not just added to the game's core files.
PLEASE NOTE: Installation makes extensive use of randomness, meaning that items will not always be available in the same places, or in the same quantities. The use of randomness means that there is a very small chance that not all items will be added to the game for a given installation.
Improved Cloak of Non-Detection.
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

Tresset

This mod makes the cloak of non-detection useful in the game. It now protects against all illusion-dissipating spells (True Vision, Oracle, Illusion Detection...).

Ã‰crase CLCK06.itm.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Improved Comet and Improved Meteor Swarm
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Tresset

This mod attempts to make the Comet spell much more different than Dragon's Breath. It now inflicts 10d10 points of fire damage and 5d10 points of blunt damage, overriding the target's resistance to magic. Similarly, the Meteor Shower spell now inflicts 4d10 points of fire damage and 2d10 points of blunt damage, overrides the target's resistance to magic, and lasts 5 rounds.

EET

Team

Cirerrek

CamDawg

This mini-mod upgrades the berserkers summoned by the three Valhalla horns. Only the creatures and their items are modified. The horns themselves remain unchanged. Berserkers have improved weapons and skills, and are constantly in a state of rage (like the Berserker kit).

Incompatible with: Item Revisions
Instant Trap spells
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Tresset

Are you tired of your Skull Traps, Glyphs, and Symbols taking forever to explode? Do you ever place one of these traps where you know your enemy is going to walk only to have them walk right past it without it blowing up? Then after you kill your enemy do you have to disarm the trap that failed to blow up before you move on by sending your tank in to sit on it until if finally decides it will blow up? If you answered yes to any of these questions then this is the mod for you! With the Instant Trap Spells mod these problems are no more!

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Demivrgvs

Mike1072

Ardanis

This mod rebalances items in a variety of ways, and you can choose whether or not to install them from among 20 or so components. Mind you, it's not noted in the readme, but the main component makes some items unavailable or changes their location.

The subtledoctor version is more up-to-date than the G3 version.

Item Revisions Revised
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Bartimaeus

This mod brings fixes or modifications to Item Revisions. You'll find the list here.

Extract it over Item Revisions. Specifically, the IRR item_rev folder should overwrite the normal item_rev folder - confirm to overwrite the folders and any files it requests. Check the settings.ini file in your item_rev directory to customize the installation. Then install the mod as normal.

Link

Items of the Planes
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PSTEE

aquadrizzt

This mod modifies many of the various items (weapons and equipment) in PST:EE in the manner of Item Revisions, with the aim of making equipment selection and combat management much more interesting. It standardizes the damage inflicted by weapon type, makes certain weapons conform to their description, and rebalances the power of items according to class (for example, in PST, mages were more likely to get good AC than fighters!).

SoD

EET

Grammarsalad

This mod carries all the divine spells from IWD:EE into BG:EE and BG2:EE, adds others and modifies some of them.

Unless you have a good reason to install this mod, you'd be better off with the Sword Coast Stratagems component or the IWDification mod, which are actively maintained!

For those still on the quest for new items in BG2, this mini-mod adds 12 items from IWD and IWD2 to the wares of the Copper Coronet's bonus merchant, Joluv. Each item can be installed separately. Beware, some are really unbalanced (grosbill).

For BG2:EE, use the github link. This version contains the fix to stop items turning to gold.

Knights kits
ğŸŸ¥âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Knight

Link
Originally a mod for BG, this mod has since been rewritten for BG2 and BGT. It greatly modifies the rules of the game to bring them as close as possible to those of AD&D, particularly with regard to the character, his equipment and the magic system:
- modification of classes and races.
- reorganization of the priest magic system.
- New divine and profane spells. Over 100 new profiles from official AD&D sources. Modification of weapon power according to opponent size and addition of 6 new weapon types. Modification of the armor system and addition of a new armor type.

By its very nature, this mod is virtually incompatible with any other mod adding or modifying profiles, divine spells, weapons or armor from the original game.
Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.
Konalan's Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Konalan

This mod offers a collection of adjustments. It is modular and contains profile fixes, item fixes, fun additions and rule changes. Please read its readme carefully before installing its components.
It includes the old mods Butter Knife of Balduran, Rod of Refuge and Konalan's Wizard Slayer Enhancements, by the same author.

Some people have managed to install it on BG2:EE, but it wasn't coded for. So, if you try it on an EE game, do so at your own risk!

IWDEE

Deratiseur

L'interplan is a store selling a wide range of original items and over a hundred new spells. It can also combine several dozens of potions. It can be found on the Waukeen's Promenade in BG2, and is accessible via an item in the Yetis Cave in IWD:EE.

ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

Ian

This mod adds 3 special abilities to the player to make the game a little easier: Raise Dead, Sanctuary and Cure Serious Wounds. To obtain these spells, you need to drink the purple potion on the shelf at the Candlekeep inn.

It erases ar2616.are. Avoid as much as possible.
A version for BG2EE exists: Lore Friendly Easy Mod BG2EE

Lore Friendly Easy Mod BG2EE
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

Ian

This mod adds 3 special abilities to the player to make the game a little easier: Raise Dead, Sanctuary and Cure Serious Wounds. To obtain these spells, you need to drink the red or blue potion on the table next to the cells in the dungeon of Irenicus.

It erases the dialog.tlk (in English) and ar0602.are. Avoid as much as possible.
A version for BGEE exists: Lore Friendly Easy Mod

Lost Crossroads Spellpack
âš ï¸âğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Galactygon

This mod improves certain spells in-game, to bring them closer to their AD&D paper version or simply give them more logic (for example, Otiluke's Sphere can be cast on an ally or the mage himself without him having to fail his saving throw). It also considerably improves their graphic effects.

This mod is still in progress.

Made in Heaven: Spell Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Angel

This mod is part of the "Made in Heaven" series (with items, tweaks and quests). It adds new spells to Baldur's Gate 1 and 2, as well as a few options for paladins. Most of them come either from the Player's Manual or from official Forgotten Realms sources. A few are the author's own creations.

Incompatible with: IWDification, Spell Revisions
March Arrows
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod modifies projectiles so that they strike anyone in their path between the launcher and the intended target.
Moreover, it tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game; which often proves to be false... Install at your own risk.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. It turns out that this mod does not install correctly on a non-English game.
More Scrolls For Icewind Dale
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

semiticgod

Mages have always had it tough in Icewind Dale. Scrolls are extremely rare (so much so that there is only one copy of many scrolls in the game) and high-level scrolls are only available late in the game. This mod fixes that. Orrick now sells a single copy of every scroll in the game, as well as all its normal items.
More Style for Mages
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Pecca

Originally, this mod was designed to improve the appearance of magicians by equipping them with wands capable of launching magical projectiles, headbands and modifying their robes. The author then moved on to customizing pets. Since then, he has regularly added new modifications (wizard sticks, containers, etc.).
Najebawszy
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Yarpen

Link Link
This mod corrects and improves some of the game's items, but also weakens a few. One component limits the number of unique magic items that can be found easily (they are replaced by items of the same magic level, with a few exceptions). Finally, other components add several profiles.

Fichier Najebawszy,_wersja_1.exe.

This mini-mod modifies ankheg armor into ankheg plate armor (non-magical, AC = 2, bonus of 1 against slashing, piercing and projectile damage) or ankheg +1 armor (magical, AC = 1, bonus of 2 against slashing damage), which cannot be worn with other protective items.

Remove Equipment Colors
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

Tresset

This unpretentious mini-mod removes the colors of all armor equipment in the game so that only the character's basic colors are used. On installation, you can choose the type of equipment you'd like to see affected. The choices are: All armor, All shields and All helmets. You can set the basic colors (i.e. armor, leather and metal) of a character in Near Infinity or EE Keeper. Once this operation has been performed, these colors will be displayed regardless of the equipment worn.

As this mod modifies ALL armor, helmet and shield equipment in the game, including that worn by NPCs, it will probably cause noticeable visual changes to creatures/NPCs.
Although developed for EE games, nothing in its code makes it incompatible with the original game versions.
Return to Trademeet Item Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

al47

This mod features 51 new items from the Return to Trademeet mod, grouped together at a single vendor: Ribald, at the Adventurer Mart. Some items, powerful enough to send Gaxx's ring back to oblivion, will be offered to you on leaving Underdark, in the "improved" stock Ribald offers for a fee.

For an EE game, use the github link.

This mod adds items to the world of BGEE and BG2EE. Each item is completely optional on installation. Like only one? Install just one.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Shed

Link
This mod brings together a collection of items and spells created in the days of TeamBG and its weekly competitions. Three of the items or spells presented have won these competitions. Most of the items in this pack are serious, although one or two are jokes or overpowered. You'll need to visit the Shadow Thieves Guild entrance, the Order of the Radiant Heart and the Council Building to experience this mod.

Fichier Shed's+Mods+1.03.exe.
Short Sword of Backstabbing (PnP)
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Greener

This mod corrects the sneak attack Short Sword to match its pnp characteristic. It becomes a +2 weapon that applies extra bonuses if carried by a thief: +2 extra to touch and +1 to sneak attack modifier.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Sigil

Link
Funnily enough, this mod adds a new amulet to your inventory that lets you summon one of the 12 famous personalities from the Sigil forum. Each of them will give you an effective buff if you're out of combat, or cast a powerful offensive spell if you're in combat.

Choose the github link for the EE version and the other link for the original version.
Fichier birthdaymod.rar.

Spell 50
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

Team

Wes Weimer

CamDawg

This mod allows you to heavily favor wizards in the game, but consequently also liches or your enemies. In fact, all spells such as Abi-Dalzim's Wither, which take character level into account, can exceed the legal limit (20) up to level 50 (you can easily reach this level solo with the XP Cap remover or Throne of Bhaal)... This can result in some pretty monstrous damage, such as 25d8....

Warning: the first link is not recommended, as it is incompatible with most other spell-modifying mods.
The second link leads to an up-to-date, compatible EE version.
Spell Changes to: Shocking Grasp, Aganazzar's Scorcher, Cone of Cold

Spell Revisions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Team

Demivrgvs

Mike1072

The aim of this mod is to correct/modify/improve BG2's profane and divine spells, bringing them closer to their paper versions. The most powerful spells have been reduced, while minor spells have been significantly improved. The improvements affect all spell parameters (sphere, range, duration, area of effect, saving throw and sometimes even level, which has been changed).

Incompatible with: Deities of FaerÃ»n, The Divine Remix, Made in Heaven: Spell Pack
Spell Revisions Revised
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Bartimaeus

This mod brings corrections or modifications to Spell Revisions. You'll find a list here.

Extract it over Spell Revisions. Specifically, the SRR spell_rev folder should overwrite the normal spell_rev folder - confirm to overwrite the folders and any files it asks you to. Check your settings.ini file in your spell_rev directory to customize the installation. Then install the mod as normal.
Spell Weapons
âš ï¸âğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

Team

Subtledoctor

Duns Scotus

Also called "Make the Zerth Blade Useful", this mod gives you a 60-second window after unequipping the Zerth Blade sword, to re-equip it without losing your extra spell slots. It also works on similar weapons in IWD:EE, such as mage daggers and sanctified warhammers.
As it requires features added to the EE engine in patch 1.4, it can only be used with games benefiting from these patches, or later.

This mod has disappeared from https://github.com/UnearthedArcana/spell_weapons.

Kevmus

Taunt Spell
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

temnix

This mod adds a small enchantment spell present in the 1st edition of AD&D, taken from a 1983 issue of Dragon magazine. The effect is similar to that of the PsT spell. It forces affected enemies to pursue the caster for three rounds, ignoring the rest of the world. The mod also includes a no-save version of Charm, available to spellcasters: it transforms targets into allies.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. Install at your own risk.
Teleport Spell
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Razfallow

This mod adds a 7th-level spell to Dame Yurth's stockpile at the back of the Adventurer Mart and to Lazarus Librarus' stockpile in the Arcane Archives, enabling teleportation to all previously visited areas. Unfortunately, it doesn't work for areas introduced by mods.

The EE version, which is up to date, can only be downloaded via the github link.
For EE versions, it is possible to use Revisit The Old Haunt, which allows teleportation of other mods.

Team

shadowlich

Max Schnur

Horred the Plague

Hoppy

Minto

King Diamond

This gigantic add-on adds 10 new NPCs (some from BG1), 180 new items, 170 new spells, some 40 additional creatures, 78 new kits, 5 major quests and a gigantic quest. You need to have Throne of Bhaal installed.

This version is for EE games: you must first download and unarchive the original The Darkest Day WITHOUT installing it. Then run Setup-TDDz.exe to install the mod on your EE game.
Requires: Baldur's Gate Graphical Overhaul, The Darkest Day
Incompatible with: NPC Tweak
The Divine Remix
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Andyr

NiGHTMARE

CamDawg

Originally called "Cleric Remix", this mod aims to rebalance and change certain aspects of the classes using divine magic (clerics, paladins, druids and lurkers) in BG (through BGT, BG1Tutu and BG:EE) and in BG2.
Firstly, it completely overhauls the spell system for priests, druids, lurkers and paladins. The list of spells to which clerics have access has been modified thanks to a more detailed system of divine spheres of influence; from now on, priests will have access to the spells of spheres related to the attributions of their divinity. Clerics of Lathander, for example, will have access to spells focusing on healing and fire, while those of Talos will have privileged access to spells of destruction. The same applies to Druids, Rangers and Paladins, who now have access to a more appropriate selection of spells for their class. A host of new divine spells have also been added, including wounding spells (as opposed to healing spells), detection of good and several spells straight out of Icewind Dale. Forget divine spellcasters who all look the same and whose spells reflect nothing of their personality, and add a slightly more tactical dimension to priests and druids!
Secondly, it adds 22 new profiles, mainly for lurkers and clerics, to give you a wider choice, such as Selune's Silver Star cleric profile, Shar's Cloak of Night, Red Rider's Divine Strategist, Tempus' War Chaplain, Ilmater's Noble Martyr, Kossuth's Adept of Flames, Iyachtu Xvim's Tyrant, Oghma's Guardian of Knowledge, Sunie's Heartguard, Corellon's Fairy Protector, Cyric's Master of Conflict; the druid profile of Master of Vases, and the ranger profiles of Sylvan Archer, Wild Ranger, Woods Runner, Avenger and Wild Runner.
Finally, it allows Viconia and Branwen to be assigned a class profile corresponding to their divinity: Priestess of Shar for the former, and of Tempus for the latter.

Incompatible with: Deities of FaerÃ»n, Spell Revisions
The Forgotten Edge
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

Secretum Nexum

The Forgotten Edge restores and expands upon Perdueâ€™s forgotten short sword, turning it into a meaningful weapon path that spans both games. What begins as a modest blade in BG1 can later be reforged by Cromwell in BG2 into a deadly weapon of acid and shadow.
The mod is designed to feel like a natural extension of existing content, without disrupting balance or narrative flow.
The Four
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Sikret

This mod adds 4 items to the game, each protected by a group of tough enemies. The items are powerful, but also impose malus to balance them out.

Requires ToB and Improved Anvil v5 or higher.
Requires: Improved Anvil

Gibberlings3

A mod to train budding modders. A recommended thing to do first is an item pack. This allows you to gain some experience in creating items, creatures and stores, as well as writing scripts and dialogs. That's what you'll find here. A mod in the form of a live tutorial and collaborative project.

The Planar Sphere Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Inferno

This mod increases the duration of the class quest linked to the magic sphere, and therefore the interest in playing as a mage. An additional large quest, as well as several smaller ones and a sphere populated by apprentices. There are also 39 new spells, and don't forget to install the Planar Sphere Teleporter add-on mini-mod (also known as PlanarSphere Return), which lets you teleport directly into the Planar Sphere (and back to where you were), as well as the "Pocket Plane" ability.

Here's another unofficial EE-compatible version.

Creslyn

This mod adds six new kits created by Drizzt1180 (Sylvan Mystic Kit, Blade Master, Death Knight, Wushi Ninja, Archer of Sylvanus, Arcane Fist), as well as new items (Creslyn's BG2 Custom Items) from existing stores. The Workshop Kitpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Dan_P

This is a kitpack currently contains 17 kits + 11 multiclass variants. Also adds 30+ items, including 6 Hunter Badges, 12 Caryll Runes, and 17 other misc items. Heavily inspired by FromSoft's Soulsborne games and probably other sources.

NOTE: The abilities tables for these kits are made at install time. Every kit clones the table of the base class (if it exists). This means that any class revisions installed before this mod will be included with these kits.

This mod features several original and rather cool kits!

SConrad

This mini mod changes the Stop Time spell into one that, instead of stopping time, injures anyone who tries to cast it. As a result, neither you nor your opponents will be able to stop time!

Incrementis

This mod is fanfiction! It contains encyclopedias of in-game history book series to eliminate searching for the history book parts. In addition, the encyclopedias have a 'Reading-Sequence' (like the Dream- or Chapter-Sequence) which is accompanied by music and voice
Ultravision
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod replaces the infravision effects of the spell and certain items to see beyond walls and obstacles. All warm-blooded creatures within a large 120-degree cone will be detected.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk.
Unbiased Ir'revrykal
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Crevs Daak

This mod modifies the properties of Carsomyr and Ir'revrykal (its evil counterpart introduced in BG2:EE) so that they can be worn by the opposite alignment (e.g. Carsomyr by an evil one). But in this case, the wearer suffers damage and has his or her resistance to magic reduced every two rounds.
The download link can be found in the last posts of the thread.

Unfortunately, the latest version of the mod (1.5) won't install, due to an error in the script.
Unique Artifacts
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Magus

Have you always felt that the BG saga was overloaded with magic items? The descriptions of many magic items indicate that they are unique. And yet, you often find several copies (such as Boots of speed, Ring of protection +2, etc.). While this problem is moderately apparent in the original game, it is severely exacerbated by numerous mods that add more and more copies of various items, with little regard for whether this makes sense. So this mod is for you! Its sole purpose is to reduce the amount of magic equipment available in the game.
Unique Containers
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Miloch

This cosmetic mini-mod lets you assign specific colors to the containers in the original game, as well as to those in the mods you've installed (and when they add more). So every gem bag, every scroll pouch, every ammunition belt... has its own specific color to distinguish it from another. It also adds new containers and fixes a few store/item bugs from other mods.

Prefer the Unique Containers component of the mod The Tweaks Anthology, which, what's more, is compatible with EE games!

This mod removes the exclusion schools from certain spells to allow all magicians to use them. The BG saga is notorious for its lack of weasel-specific items! Lava couldn't let this oversight go unpunished, so we've put it right.

Wild Mage Additions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Magus

This mod adds an entropist profile, the Spellweaver, who combines the talents of a sorcerer and a mage, benefiting from the sorcerer's spontaneity of incantation, without being penalized by the restriction on the number of spells memorized. He is, however, limited by the number of spells that can be cast in 24 hours, and by his speed of progression. To this end, the mod adds 27 new spells (3 for each level), and the whole thing looks like a lot of fun.

Only the GitHub version has been updated and is EE-compatible.
YLItems pack
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

teno_yl

This mod adds a merchant to the Five Flagons (SoA) and Lazarus Archives (ToB). This merchant sells powerful items, but your reputation must be very high to gain access. Note that this merchant will present his wares to you only once. A few additional components are also available.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³.

Ce mod ajoute une cape Ã©trange qui permet Ã  son porteur d'amÃ©liorer grandement sa capacitÃ© Ã  se camoufler dans les ombres et d'esquiver une partie des attaques de projectiles. En contrepartie, le charisme du porteur est rÃ©duit mais surtout, il peut Ã  tout moment rentrer dans un Ã©tat de grande panique. Des potions permettent de soigner de cet Ã©tat, encore faut-il trouver un moyen de faire boire une potion Ã  un personnage paniquÃ©â€¦

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
