Ce mod a Ã©tÃ© inclus dans Derat's Absolute Wacky Adventurers Pack du mÃªme auteur.
A Frosty Journey: The IWDEE Kitpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

elminster

This mod adds 34 new profiles:
- fighters: Breachgnome, Mercenary, Myrmidon and Tunnelrat.
- rangers: Giant Killer.
- paladins: Knight of the Mystic Fire, Walker of the Forest and Holy Warrior of Suffering.
- monks: Brothers and sisters of the Pure Flame, Child of the Passive Voice, Disciple of the Changeless Face, Disciple of the Phoenix, Disciple of the Salamander, Disciple of the White Rod, Disciple of the Yielding Way, Monk of the Old Order, Monk of the Order of the Long Death, Monk of the Shimmering Wind, Monk of the Shining Hand, Monk of the Weeping Friars, Zealot of the Written Word.
- thiefs: Pest Controller, Scout, Tumbler, Vermin Slayer.
- clerics: Earthwalker of Grumbar, Iceguardian of Ulutiu, Icepriest of Auril, Leaftender, Priest of Luthic, Shaman of Gruumsh, Treetender.
- druids: Hivemaster.
Acid Elementalist Kit
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Tioma

This mod adds a fighter kit specializing in acid-damage weapons and spells. It also adds weapons adapted to this kit.
Adventurer-Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Greener

An adventurer is a jack-of-all-trades who is master of none. They use their broad knowledge base and diverse skills to create their own opportunities. They are often preferred by many adventuring groups, as they know the value of trust and cooperation, and are less likely to steal from or betray their own companions.
Alchemist kit for mages
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

semiticgod

This mod adds a new mage profile: the alchemist. He has fewer spell slots than other mages, but can create unique potions very different from those found in the original games, as well as several types of highly volatile grenades. This mod adds 34 new items with never-before-seen effects, from a sickening healing potion in the form of vampire milk to an adorable foam ball that can resurrect the dead, as well as more bizarre things like elf tendon wands, snake lymph, bone drops, blood nectar, fairy oil and 100kg apocalyptic war machines. All the icons are taken from Icewind Dale 2 to give them a unique look.
The alchemist is a unique support character who can do a variety of different things, but getting the most out of his items costs hundreds of gold at the start of the game, and thousands, if not tens of thousands of gold by the end of the game. But it's worth it.

This mod has become obsolete since its integration into the Expanded Classes and Kits mod.
Alsaahir kit for BG2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

TotoR115

Like a snake charmer, this bard has studied the vibrational sensitivity of demons and the undead. However, dealing with evil is a dangerous game, and those who survive never return unscathed, physically or mentally. This path requires wisdom, mastery of the art of illusions and better fighting skills than a bard, to the detriment of his natural versatility and dexterity. His singing also enhances the martial skills of his allies against demons and the undead.
Amazon Fighter kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Hansoo

Link Link
This mod adds a fighter profile, the Amazon (very) loosely adapted from that in the Complete Warrior's Handbook, and available for a human, half-elven or half-orc character. It also features a portrait based on a photo of Keira Knightley that you can use for your character.
They have a movement speed bonus, two-weapon combat mastery, Animal Charm, certain immunities are gained over levels.
In return, she can only specialize in the longbow, spear and axe, and cannot wear metal armor.

To download the first link, you need to register on the arcanecoast forum.
The second link allows you to download the mod without registering.
The first link should offer a Russian version, while the second should be the same mod.
Animal Companion: Leopard
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Adul

This mod adds a somewhat special ranger profile, the Leopard, intended as a sidekick for the protagonist (or someone else in the group). Strong, agile and silent, he's not suited to being the protagonist, given his inability to speak or use items.

If you intend to use him, start a multiplayer game and create a Leopard companion, but especially not for the first character.

Arcane Fist
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

BGT

Drizzt1180

Link
This mod is part of a series of eight profiles created on the old IE customization & add-ons site: Apprentice, Arcane Fist, Crusader, Dragon Dancer, Elementalist Kit, Ethereal Blademaster, Gambler and Undead Warrior.
The Arcane Fists are an ancient order of wizards in Faerun, and are seldom ever seen. They are not quite the masters of unarmed combat nor are they the masters of the arcane arts, but they become a fearsome foe with the combination of both. They are taught at an early age the skills required for unarmed combat and also learn to wield mystical powers. They are typically loners, only assembling in groups with their own kind, or in times of great danger they will group up with 'outsiders'. There are three sects of The Arcane Fist: The Order of Light, Bakur's Brotherhood, and Death's Law.

This mod has been converted to WeiDU and integrated into The Sorcerer's Place Collection.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Archimage
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

samurai0775

Link
A prestige kit for sorcerers. To access it, you need to be at least a level 10 Sorcerer and drink a potion (which you can get from the console or ShadowKeeper). Advantages: priest spells, new spells, accelerated casting, hlas in special abilities. Disadvantage: loss of all xp, then reduction of xp received.

Available in ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·.
Armiger Kit for BG2: ToB
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Yarpen

This mod installs a fighter kit, the Armiger. He's a defensive combat specialist. Relying on his armor, he benefits from an armor class and enhanced abilities that rely on counter-attacks. While other fighters rely on speed or clever parries to defend themselves, the Armiger creates his own protective equipment and improves it over time. He can stand before dozens of opponents, confident that his armor will protect him from blows.

Team

Ascalon

White Agnus

jastey

Link
This mod adds Breagar of the Bardormar clan as a recruitable NPC in Baldur's Gate I and II. Aligned as a lawful good, he has his own dwarven blacksmith profile. For BGT and EET, Breagar functions as a continuous character throughout the trilogy. For BG:EE, Tutu, BGII and BG2:EE, only content corresponding to the game will be installed.
Ashes of Embers
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Ghreyfain

This mod brings together some of the ideas from the projects of a mod finally abandoned, "Embers of Empires". It introduces the following changes to the game:
- All character classes can use any type of weapon (e.g. a priest can use a sword, but only a paladin can use Carsomyr).
- Stone/Iron Skin duration reduced.
- 7 new profiles: 6 priest profiles (from gods other than FaerÃ»n: Priest of Cathoun, Priest of Lahan-Riyashal, Priest of Oron, Priest of Thieron, Priest of Uulix and Priest of Yathar) and one fighter kit (Tunnel Fighter).
- New armors (scales, stripes, war harness) available from a merchant on the Waukeen's Promenade, and weapons (bolas, katars and javelins).
- Assign new martial specializations to Anomen (longsword, spear, crossbow), Keldorn (spear replaces crossbow) and Viconia (crossbow, flail, one-handed weapon style, scimitar and shortsword).
Askaria Npc and Quest & ChaosKnight Kit and Npc
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Shi woo

This is a pack of two Korean mods for BGT (translated into English): install the profile first, since Askaria needs it.
- Chaos Knight kit: this mod adds the Chaos Knight profile and Jacob, a recruitable NPC near the manor of Beregost, inspired by Dota in WoW3.
- Askaria Quest NPC: On the second floor of the Feldpost Inn in Beregost, Askaria asks for help against bandits. Once they've been eliminated, she'll join you to find her parents.

The EE (and translated) version is available via the github link.
Only the kit is BG2EE compatible.
Askii's Kits
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Askii

This mod contains 4 kits: The Captain, a charismatic fighter who uses his authority to optimize his team's performance or break his opponent's morale, with high stamina and protection against confusion.
The "Arrow Thrower" is a clever, devious thief who likes to drink, and is capable of diverting the attention of his opponents and throwing bombs that are literally intoxicating. The "Priest of Mystra" benefits from a bonus on spell casting times, and can drastically increase the enchantment level of a weapon for one turn. The Virtuoso is a mage as talented as he is specialized, which is to say unfit for anything other than casting spells (but let's leave other less important tasks to less important people?). He has a bonus on spell casting times and a bonus on mage level, as well as being able to memorize more spells than his fellows. On the other hand, he has a penalty on his armor class and on his saving throws (which increase with level). He cannot learn to wield a weapon, and suffers a 4-point Wisdom penalty.

This mod adds a fighter kit who, for some unknown reason, "reacts" very well to teleportation magic, and is able to travel between planes with great ease. With time, he can teleport over short distances.

Battlerager-Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Greener

The battler occupies a special place in dwarven society and culture. He is a fearless fighter, capable of creating within himself a mad rage that enhances his fighting ability and deforms his physical features. When enraged, his face contorts and his teeth grind. Spittle escapes from his mouth and runs down his beard. His eyes enlarge, swell and become bloodshot. His size increases as his muscles swell and his body expands. His fighting ability becomes impressive, enabling him to fight longer and harder than any other dwarf. In his rage, he's almost impossible to stop. A dangerous foe, he's a threat to friends and foes alike.
The mod also modifies Korgan to make him a Battlerager.

Blood Rager fighter kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

Allbrother

Until their first battle, there is nothing special about the Blood Rager. Upon first delivering a deathblow however, something primal awakens within - something that revels in the bloodshed and immediately craves more. Henceforth the smell of blood and thrill of the kill excites them into a state of hyper focused aggression, mistakenly assumed to be some barbaric frenzy by others seeing it in action.
Bushi-Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Greener

Bushi are masterless fighters, men with no ties to a lord, temple or monastery. They are generally mercenaries, highwaymen or vagabonds, making a living as best they can. They can be found in the service of samurai, protecting the court or swelling the ranks of armies. A few may be fallen kensai. Most, however, are men of low birth who have chosen the path of the fighter to advance in the world.

Nightfarer

Gertwenger

This mod adds a new fighter kit for elves, a kind of special fighter/mage/cleric... Bladesingers are a caste that consist of highly trained fighters who combine a perfect mastery of their weapon with the ability to use powerful spells. A potent combination. The Bladesinger knows how to manipulate the flow of magic around him to protect himself and augment his abilities. In addition, he is also able to mold magical energy to his will to cast spells.

ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Corayo Raumoheru

Link
This mod adds three new profiles
Champion of Torm: +3 bonus to saving throws, +3 to damage and thac0 for 5 rounds, one additional Laying on Hands per day every 4 levels. Cannot use ranged weapons.
Energist: 5 special skills, CA +2 every 10 levels. Cannot use ranged weapons or wear armor.
Adventurer: 20 bonus to Picking and Trap Detection. Knowledge +30. Also adds three new items to the game.

The mediafire link offers version 4.3.

Death Knight
âš ï¸âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Drizzt1180

Link
A Death Knight is created when a fallen paladin dies. This is a very rare occurrence of resurrection. When this happens the newly risen Death Knight will become evil with many evil related abilities. Instead of being half-fighter and half-cleric like a paladin, they become half-fighter and half-necromancer instead. They gain necromancy spells as innate abilities in place of their regular priest spells.

The download page also includes a download of lifedret.spl. This is a corrected spell to be placed in the mod's "spell" folder before installation.
Available in ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·.
DeathKnight
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

HybridGame

A paladin who does not respect his honor is cursed by the gods and becomes a DeathKnight. His strong will to hate evil keeps him in a state of chaos, although he has not become completely evil. He has 18/00 strength, 75% protection from magic, immunity to fire and immunity to death or level drain effects. He also has access to a few profane spells. On the other hand, he has a Neutral Chaotic alignment, can only master long, bastard or two-handed swords and cannot use Paladin abilities (except Repel Undead).

Available in ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·.
Deities of FaerÃ»n
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Raduziel

The purpose of this mod is to import all of FaerÃ»n's deities into EE games, assigning each of them a profile as close as possible to their P&P version. It uses a system of 25 spheres and currently offers 53 profiles. Optional components allow you to assign them to recruitable NPCs from the game and mods.

Incompatible with: The Divine Remix, Faiths and Powers, Spell Revisions

shadowword

As a druid of draconic bloodline, you gain attribute bonuses, extra spells, and the power to summon dragons as you level up, and you may even multiclass into a dragon sorcerer.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³.
Dragon Shape for Dragon Disciples
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

AendaeronBluescale

This mod allows the Dragon Disciple to metamorphose into a red dragon once a day.

Drake NPC for BG:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

AionZ

This mod lets you recruit the Priest of Tyr Drake Caulfield, of good neutral alignment. You'll find him at the Burning Magician's Inn in BG1 and at the Three Old Barrels in SoD. He has a companion quest in BG1 and initiates a quest in SoD without needing to be recruited. Completion of his quest in BG1 is mandatory for completion of the friendship path.
Drake is rude, sarcastic and never minces his words. Exceptionally pragmatic and cynical for a servant of justice, he nevertheless follows the ideals of the Tyrian faith, albeit often in... unorthodox ways. He prefers to live life as it is, rather than as it should be, and indulges heavily in drink and innuendo. This puts him at odds with his peers, and his outspoken personality often provokes the same with his fellow travelers. For all his apparent faults, Drake is honest, reliable and often smarter than his behavior suggests. He has a strong sense of morality and chooses to see the world as something other than black and white. He is strongly devoted to his family above all else, including the Order.
Drake can befriend any PC of non-evil alignment, and can be flirted with in the course of his various conversations by a PC of any gender and race. Although he can respond amicably, there is no romantic path in BG1. In Siege of Dragonspear, a non-evil PC with a Charisma of 16 or more can flirt with him during his friendly dialog, which can initiate a romantic branch.
DreamWalkerShamanKit
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Ulb

This mod adds a new shaman profile: the Dream Surveyor.
Druid Kit Enhancements
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

phordicus

This mod allows druids to metamorphose three times a day by choosing the desired form, and regain 15 hit points when reverting to their human form. Each form has its own specific bonus and penalty: Wood Wolf, Black Bear and Grizzly Bear. Vigilantes benefit from three additional forms (Sword Spider, Baby Wiverne and Troll). Totemic druids choose their totem animal at first level (ferret, panther snake and fairy), each with specific innate abilities. The shapeshifter is rebalanced by limiting its non-transformation abilities (limiting the number of spells) and werewolf forms have been revised.
Druidic Sorcerer Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Constant Gaw

This mod adds a new Druid profile, the Druidic Sorcerer. Wielding both the natural abilities of a druid and the mysterious powers of a sorcerer, this is one of the most powerful classes you can play.

Requires: ToB

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

kensai

Studying arcane incantation techniques, the Duskblade combines profane knowledge with a fighter's hand-to-hand combat skills. While elves were the first to be able to cast spells in armor, the secrets of Duskblade have been passed on to other races over the millennia, and today any race can become a Duskblade.

The first link contains the BGEE/BG2EE version. The second link contains the IWDEE version.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

Abdel_Adrian

MindTyrant

Inspired by the Complete Elf Manual, the Elves of Eternal Encounter and other AD&D2 manuals, this mod adds 15 profiles to the EE games: Abyssal Warrior (fighter), Bladesinger (fighter/mage or bard), Collector (fighter/mage/thief), Eldritch Knight (fighter/mage), Elven Minstrel (mage/thief), Herbalist (cleric), Huntsman (fighter/thief), Infiltrator (fighter/mage/thief), Priest of Mystra (cleric/mage), Priestess of Lolth (cleric), Spellfilcher (mage/thief), Undead Hunter (paladin), War Wizard (fighter/mage), Wilderness Runner (ranger) and Windrider (fighter).
An optional component allows several Ionic Stones to be worn at the same time.

This mod has been taken over by MindTyrant to add EET compatibility.
See Eldritch Magic Reborn.

Enhanced BG2
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Nastian

Link Link
The content of this mod was originally intended to be part of a larger project, but was never completed. It brings several changes to the game, intended to make it more attractive. It contains several components:
- on the Waukeen's Promenade, the traveling merchant Alyoud sells 7 powerful magic items.
- addition and modification of character interactions.
- addition of tomes and manuals in empty or uninteresting containers.
- Irenicus dungeon: it is now possible to negotiate with the genie to obtain Balduran's cloak.
- addition of new portraits for your character.
- restoration of missing item descriptions (Plate Mail +3: 'The Practical Defense', Sling +3: 'Arla's Dragonbane').
- Item set bonuses: a character equipped with all Wormsor-forged draconic items or Balduran equipment receives additional bonuses. 5 new enemy races added: gnoll, skeleton, wiverne, yuan-ti and zombie.
- 10 new profiles have been added, including some from the AD&D3 prestige classes: fighter (Knight, Duelist, Gladiator, Legionnaire), ranger (Globe-trotter), paladin (Crusader, Lich Terror, Dragon Slayer), thief (Silent Slayer) and cleric (Priestess of Aurile).
- various minor changes to the Dungeon of Irenicus.

Fichier Enhanced_BG2_v1.1.rar.
Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.

This is a compilation of the profiles created by semiticgoddess:
- Fighters: War Hulk Kit, Universal Archer, Shapeshifter, Simplified Psionicist, Sword Dancer.
- Paladins: Universal Archer, Kensai, Revolutionary.
- Monks: Kensai, Stalker, Assassin, Simplified Psionicist, Flare Dancer, Sky Dancer, Fighter/Monk.

- Sorcerers: Red soul and Green soul Kits.
- Clerics: Cleric/Druid, Seer, Healer.
- Druids: Seer, Healer.
- Thieves: Seducer Kit for Thieves, Universal Archer, Kensai, Shapechanger.
- Cleric/Mage: Druid/Mage, Cleric/Druid/Mage.
- Mage/Thief: Druid/Thief.
- Fighter/Mage/Thief: Fighter/Cleric/Druid/Mage/Thief
- Ranger: Wildhaunt
- Bard: Folkherder.

Far Realm Seer Kit
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Ulb

The Far Realm is a plane of madness situated very far from the planes of the standard cosmology. This maddening realm has many alien and twisted inhabitants, some even as powerful as deities. Some shamans have a mythical connection that transcends the spirit world and allows them to extend their sight into the far corners of the cosmos. Of those that manage to retain their sanity a select few decide to embrace the maddening realm and harness its power for themselves.

Caedwyr

CamDawg

This mod is largely inspired by the Druidic Sorcerer Kit and is loosely adapted from the 3rd edition D&D prestige class: the Geomancer. The profile combines the sorcerer's spells and casting methods, with druidic spells, abilities and characteristics. In addition, he uses his own spells and HLA. The mod also features options for selecting specific portraits for the Geomancer, as for the shapeshifters he'll be using: bear, cat, dog, leopard, moose, panther, rat, snake and wolf.

Hexblade
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

DarkDogg

The Hexblade is a Bard combining the dynamic powers of martial prowess and arcane might, the hexblade presents a deadly challenge to opponents unaccustomed to such an adversary. The hexblade balances its fighting and arcane skills. Although capable of melee combat, the hexblade relies on the opportunistic use of its spells and special abilities to reinforce its role within the group. A hexblade with the right skills can make a good party leader that feels comfortable with its style.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Hidden Kits
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Zyraen

This mod adds 7 profiles that you can obtain by multi-classing at level 12: Archmage (mage), Eldritch Phantom (thief), Prelate (cleric), Shadow Blade (thief), Spell Steel (mage), Sylvan Justiciar (ranger) and Sylvan Warden (druid).
The experience required to complete them is considerable, but their benefits are commensurate. They also require certain prerequisite skills. In addition to the advantages and disadvantages of each, their most important feature is the ability to increase your inactive class as you level up.
Other than the NPC, 12 Bioware NPCs will benefit from these mysterious kits: Aerie the Archmage, Anomen the Prelate, Imoen the Eldritch, PhantomJaheira the Sylvan Warden, Jan the Eldritch Phantom, Korgan the Shadow Blade, Mazzy the Prelate, Minsc the Sylvan Justiciar, Sarevok the Spell Steel, Valygar the Sylvan Justiciar, Viconia the Prelate, Yoshimo the Shadow Blade.

Ellderon

This mod adds the Holy Avenger paladin profile. Very rare, these are the most feared fighters in paladin orders. The mod also adds a few items: 4 elven swords, 3 two-handed swords, 1 helmet, 2 plates, 1 magician's robe and 2 rings.

The last two optional components overwrite some of the game's .cre files: install with full knowledge of the facts!

Improved Archer Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

Kania Blade

The original Archer profile doesn't match the level progression very well. While it appears very powerful at the very start of the game, it becomes much less useful later on, compared with other ranger profiles. This mod strives to rebalance it so that low-level archers do not outperform other classes, while allowing high-level archers to stand comparison with other ranger profiles. Additional components add archer-inspired profiles for fighters, paladins and thieves, or add a set of powerful bows and ammunition to the game.

mirado

Shohy

This mod allows you to upgrade monks, kitted or not (with a choice of components). The monk gains new skills as he levels up, such as the ability to heal, to use Glittering Dust or Great Curse, to become invisible... At high level, this monk can learn and use Balthazar's skills.

This mod is included in Minor Kit Improvement by the same author.

Inventor
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Ruffle_truffle

This mod introduces a new kit for the thief. It is slightly inspired by the game Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura. Inventors are thieves who have dedicated themselves to the study of science and craftsmanship. With experience, they can create and develop increasingly complex inventions, which can be described as synthetic and avant-garde given the realities of the kingdom. Often inspired by Gond's doctrines, they can create veritable technical masterpieces from anything they come across on their travels. Only gnomes can become inventors.

Keenmarker
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Ä°lhami

Keenmarkers are unique lurkers, specializing in bows and arrows. They spend most of their time training and educating themselves, both in combat and in wisdom. They can become grandmasters of bow or crossbow.
+1 to thac0 and ranged damage every two levels.
CA -1 every 6 levels.
Immune to Fear and Morale Break at level 7. Critical Hit at 18...
Ability to create arrows.
In return, suffers a malus of 1 to saving throws against spells every 6 levels.
Malus of 1 to Tac0 every 5 levels for melee weapons.
Readme to find out more.

Link
This Fighter kit allows the character to transform into mustard jelly. It offers a number of advantages, including immunity to poison, sleep and mental attacks, as well as bonuses to saving throws. Kit Mule kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Dan_P

The Accumulator (for Infinity Engine games)

Information
This kit will learn all the special abilities of the classes and kits present in the game, including high-level abilities as well as those added by mods.
The ability table is built at the time of installation and is based on your current installation.
Can be installed on Enhanced Editions and original BG2

This kit installs for the following 3 classes:
Fighter, Bard and Druid

File "config.ini" file in the mod directory:
- set maximum level / columns to be checked in kit tables (default = 20)
- enable or disable analysis of clab, hla or mod files
- enable or disable installation of fighter, bard or druid kits
- The "level" parameter will accept values from 1 to 50. Any other number will default to 20.

Based on the same concept as Item Revisions and Spell Revisions, this mod modifies the game's kits and classes to rebalance them and make them more interesting.

This mod is still in progress.
Knight Defender
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

HybridGame

The KnightDefender stands on the front line of battle, sacrificing himself to protect his allies. This kit, inspired by the Dwarf Defenders, offers a powerful cleric alternative for humans of good or neutral alignment.

Available in ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·.
Knights kits
ğŸŸ¥âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Knight

Link
Originally a mod for BG, this mod has since been rewritten for BG2 and BGT. It greatly modifies the rules of the game to bring them as close as possible to those of AD&D, particularly with regard to the character, his equipment and the magic system:
- modification of classes and races.
- reorganization of the priest magic system.
- New divine and profane spells. Over 100 new profiles from official AD&D sources. Modification of weapon power according to opponent size and addition of 6 new weapon types. Modification of the armor system and addition of a new armor type.

By its very nature, this mod is virtually incompatible with any other mod adding or modifying profiles, divine spells, weapons or armor from the original game.
Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.
Konalan's Wizard Slayer Enhancements
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Konalan

This mod revisits the Wizard Slayer kit. In particular, it increases its magic resistance, its saving throws against spells, and adds new HLA. Its item restrictions have also been revised.

Included in Konalan's Tweaks.
Laphysique Kit Pack for Baldur's Gate - Enhanced Edition
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Wisp

This repo contains 5 separate kits:
Cruiser: a mage who focuses on firing enhanced magic missiles.
Priest of Sun Wukong: a cleric for smaller races who focuses on stick-fighting skills.
Grenadier: a bard focused on darts, meteors and energy blades.
Pyroheretic: a sorcerer focused on fire magic.
Monk HLA which reworks skills at monk level.

Compatibility to be checked: EE minimum.
Legion of Hell
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Leonardo Watson

This mod adds five new profiles from the Forbidden Chapters (D&D 3rd Edition): Disciple of Dispater (fighter), Disciple of Mammon (thief), Disciple of Mephistopheles (fighter), Disciple of Beelzebub (thief) and Disciple of Asmodeus (priest).

Warning: As this mod overwrites the ANIMATE.ids file, it is incompatible with all mods that use creature animations.
Lion Warrior kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

vilkacis

Formerly known as the "Zulu kit", this mod adds a ranger profile that combines deadly combat skills with wilderness survival skills and a strong connection to nature. He can't wear armor or bracelets and can't use trait weapons, but makes up for it with great mastery, 2 extra spells per level, minor bonuses to AC, touch and damage, and can metamorphose at level 13 into a VERY EVIL lion.

Use the second link to download the translated version, which is also compatible with EE games.

IWDEE

Zupsky

This mod adds a new Druid kit, the Fallen Druid, taken from the Complete Druid Manual. It features 6 new spells (from level 1 to level 6). He can also summon a Dread Wolf from level 6.

The Russian translation is available on the post but has not been integrated into the mod.

BGT

Luiz

This mod features a new fighter kit, the Blackguard ("Black Knight"), and new portraits. You can also modify the appearance of Vecna's Robe, move the Bag of Holding to the beginning of the game and use AI scripts for your group. All components can be installed separately.

This mod adds the profile of Lyrique, a poetic bard adept at persuasion. Although less able to cast spells than other bards, he can use his mastery of words to affect nearby enemies.

Stealth Walkers: companions of the shadows, these masters of concealment excel in the art of operating in the dark. Shaping events to their liking and striking only when the odds are most favourable: such is the true art of the stealth walker. Thanks to their cunning stratagems, extraordinary skills and mastery of deception and concealment, stealth walkers excel at theft, murder, espionage and assassination.

Morituri Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Aroc

Link
One of the most unique melee warrior classes Morituri are fighters who have abandoned the need to use armor or any magic item in order to enhance their capabilities. Their hard and longlasting training has given them the ability to combine the specific skills and feats of the lethal Kensai, the enduring Barbarian, the battlerager Berserker and the lighting fast Monk. Morituri fight toe to toe with their enemies never retreat always seeking victory or death. Although they lack the support of an armor or any magic item at all, their superhuman physical abilities, the perfect control of their Ki energy plus their unstoppable determination makes them formidable adversaries and worthy upholders of right and justice in the entire Faerun. Morituri who manage to survive long enough to reach their full potential bear the honoring title of the Light Bringer, having become a true force of Right and Justice. Presently only humans are being accepted as candidates in the Order of the Morituri.

Fichier morituri-kit-5.2.zip.
Morrow Gate
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

aWoundedLion

This is a compilation of existing profiles and profile modifications, based largely on priest classes (lurkers, druids). It includes Natural Selection, which modifies druid profiles and adds a new one, the Sombrelian. The Arcanic Archer and Hellion Fighter profiles are also included in this mod, along with changes for fallen paladins and clerics, druids and a quest for the fortified tower of Kalah for evil characters. This list is not exhaustive, as this mod also includes adjustments to the old Twist Pack mod, so be sure to read the readme to familiarize yourself with all its components.
Multi-class Multikit Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Crevs Daak

FlameWing

Ever wanted to play an Anti-Paladin/Necromancer/Assassin? A Kensai/Transmutator/Bounty Hunter? A Berserker/Priest of Talos? Or perhaps even a Barbarian/Entropist/Adventurer? Well, now it's possible, and you can play a multi-class character with multiple kits.
Inherited from FlameWing's Multikit mod (SHS link), this mod creates as many multi-kits as you like from the kits you select during installation. Once in the game, activate Party AI and apply the multi-kit to your character by pressing the "K" key.
It should be installed after all mods that add new profiles or modify their abilities. This ensures that all the profiles you've installed can be used to create multi-kits, as well as ensuring that their abilities match.
The icing on the cake is that the multikits.tp2 file created during installation can be used by modders to add multi-kits to their mods.

Please note: Only the GitHub version is compatible with EE games.
Multiclass Kits
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

This mod allows you to install all kinds of true multiclass kits from any combination of single-class kits which allows unusual combinations such as Kensai/Assassin or Berserker/Wild Mage/Swashbuckler. Custom kits from mods are considered as well if detected.

IWDEE

AionZ

This mod adds a new paladin profile, the Knight of Mystic Fire, following in the footsteps of Mystra, the goddess of magic. They are proficient in martial combat as well as arcane magic. Aside from traditional virtues of paladinhood, Mystic Fire Knights devote part of their lives in the discovery and study of ancient magic.

Please note: this mod is obsolete since it has been included in the mod The Artisan's Kitpack by the same author.

This mod corrects and improves some of the game's items, but also weakens a few. One component limits the number of unique magic items that can be found easily (they are replaced by items of the same magic level, with a few exceptions). Finally, other components add several profiles.

Orcish Scout Kit
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lord Jyssev

Link
These orcs are generally used as scouts and require a high level of intelligence to remember what they collect, dexterity to hide when someone is looking in their direction, and strength to dispose of their enemies when they are seen. These orcs are deadly and tough.

The mod is compressed in .ace, and there are online converters that will allow you to open it.

Yarpen

Link Link
Stemming from the eponymous Czech mega mod project, this mod adds no fewer than 18 profiles (3 in each of the fighter, paladin, ranger, thief, bard and druid classes), generally taken from the paper versions and retouched by the designer.

Warning: as it stands, it removes access to the original profiles during character creation.

Phase Spider Kit
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGEE

BG2EE

semiticgod

The Phase Spider kit is a very strange kit available for any basic class. Essentially, this kit transforms your character into a Phase Spider, who can cast Dimensional Gate at will. The Phase Spider kit comes with a variety of other bonuses (including a constant Chaining effect!), but also suffers from some very severe drawbacks to balance it out (including immunity to the casting speed bonuses of Amulet of Power and Robe of Vecna).

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Pirate Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Huxaltec

An original creation by Huxaltec, this thief's profile (very well documented and inspired) is reserved exclusively for the main character and allows you to play the role of a pirate from the Sword Coast. A regional gift, depending on the pirate's geographical origin (chosen when installing the kit), grants him certain advantages. Like any self-respecting pirate, he has his own parrot (capable of fetching random treasure once a day) and stores his treasure in a chest that he takes everywhere.
PlagueWielder
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Arunsun

A magician's kit that uses disease to get rid of enemies. He can only access spells from the schools of Alteration, Abjuration and Illusion. He has a panel of spells accessible only to him. Over the course of levels, he becomes immune to these various effects: disease at level 5, poison at level 7 and level absorption at level 10. The effect of contamination increases with the level of the magician and is influenced by the CON of the targets.

semiticgod

This mod adds two new profiles, for both mage and sorcerer. Spells cast by Red Soul inflict 50% more damage at the cost of half the duration, while those cast by Green Soul last 50% longer, but inflict 50% less damage.

Retaliator
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Adul

This mod adds a new fighter kit. He's an executioner in light armor who loves the offensive. He's got the ability to ignite enemies by spitting fire at them, or to hide in the middle of combat and come up behind the enemy line, stabbing them in the back. In short, he's a very nasty guy and a lot of fun to play.
Revised Battles
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Erebusant

A remix of Improved Battles, this mod increases the difficulty of a number of battles (Drizzt, Firkraag, etc.), as well as increasing drops. It also adds four new fighter kits:
Bastard: immune to sneak attacks, he gains skills that boost him temporarily.
Demon Knight: immune to fear and immobilization, he also has 40% resistance to fire and a resistance to magic that increases with level.
Weapon Master: improves Tac0, damage and AC over levels, can use Kai and has a slight movement speed bonus. Arcane Avenger: has a high Tac0 and damage bonus against mages and sorcerers, as well as to saving throws against spells. He also has two spells enabling him to dispel invisibility and deflect spells for several rounds.

The Enhanced Firkraag component is incompatible with the Super Firkraag mod, while the Enhanced Dungeon component is incompatible with the Enhanced Ilyich component from Tactics.
The EE version is available via the second link.

BG2EE

Arunsun

A Monk kit that charges up with Ki to attack or defend. It has several fighting styles.

Sikret

An agile fighter, master of speed. Light and free in his movements, he can rush to strike with lightning speed while slowing down his enemies. However, this fighter sacrifices all armor and heavy protection to retain his exceptional mobility.

The original version of this profile was included in the latest versions of the Improved Anvil mod.

Alvarez

Link Link
This mod installation features the Knight of Light paladin profile. He can achieve great mastery with longswords and bastard swords. âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

tRuffus

This mod adds a new druid profile to the game. Some Druids are born murderers. They most often inherit the predatory instincts of their ancestors, but sometimes brutal life in the wilderness has awakened a tendency to bloody victims. Despite their evil temperament, nature gives them the same power as other priests, for it is probably its darkest side that they manifest.
Samurai Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Maurolava

Samurai are professional fighters, members of the noble class, trained in the arts of war. They are not only trained for their role in society, they are born into a system of allegiance, loyalty and honor that influences every stage of their lives. A samurai detached from this system is no longer a samurai; he's an ordinary fighter, a ronin with no honor and no status in society.

LaughingMan

Seducer Kit for Thieves
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

semiticgod

The Seducer kit allows the player to charm literally EVERYTHING in the game. But as with my other kits, this powerful ability is counterbalanced by prohibitive disadvantages, namely a total inability to perform normal party thief tasks, and the worst defenses of any class in the game.

This mod has become obsolete since its integration into the Expanded Classes and Kits mod.
Shadow Magic
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

AionZ

This mod adds a new magic school: the Shadow Web, created by Shar. You'll be able to play a Shadow Adapte with over 100 special spells. Remember that while shadow magic is more powerful than ordinary magic, it's also dangerous, draining the user's life force.
The main component installs the Shadow Adept (mage), Shadow Disciple (spellcaster) and Night Singer (bard) profiles, as well as magic school spells and exclusive pets.
He also has several optional components:
- Install Shadow Monk profile (physically weaker than an ordinary monk, he can stab in the back, drain hit points with melee attacks and cast a limited selection of Shadow Web spells).
- BG:EE: adds several encounters against Shadow Adepts and a new store selling items usable by Shadow Adepts. BG2:EE: modifies the Shadow Lord, who has a new ability for Shadow Adepts hungry for power and Shadow Web spells to make the encounter more difficult.
Shadow Ranger
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Esprit

This mod adds a new ranger kit, reserved for humans, elves and half-elves of lawful evil or neutral evil alignment. Shadow rangers are a secret sect of wanderers intimately affiliated with Shadow druids. They advocate the usage of powers of darkness and the shadows that inhabit them. They do not hesitate from resorting to Machiavellian schemes to achieve their goal. They usually pay homage to the dark goddess, Shar, and rumors say they whisper her name when they slit their target's throat in the darkness of the night. Shadow rangers are dangerous fighters who are able to call the shadows to their aid.

Singing Mage
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

HybridGame

This mod offers a mage kit. The bard is an intermediate class between the thief and the mage. Singing Mages are both Thieves and Mages, but they always sing bardic songs.

Available in ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·.
Six's Kitpack
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

SixOfSpades

Based on the observation that in-game classes and profiles are less powerful than matchmaking or multi-classing, this mod strives to redress the balance by improving them a little (martial specializations like 3 stars for paladins, high-level abilities, use of items...).
Optional components allow you to modify Archer's profile and install 7 others: Bowman and Shieldbearer (fighter), Martyr and Mystic Marksman (paladin), Huntsman of Silvanus (druid), Spellshafter (bard) and Sniper (thief). The mod was originally intended to offer 22 new profiles, but has long since been discontinued...

Warning: this mod is known to be extremely buggy and may corrupt your games. Install at your own risk.
Requires: ToB
Song and Silence: A Mod for Bards and Thieves
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

Andyr

NiGHTMARE

Grim Squeaker

CamDawg

Mike1072

Do you like bards and rogues? If so, you'll be delighted with this little mod, which adds several new profiles to your now classic Blademaster and Assassin: Acrobat, Dirgesinger, Chorister and Gypsy (bards); Adventurer, Burglar, Shadow Dancer, Lamesprit and Sharpshooter (thieves); and an inquisitive and ever-welcoming old gypsy, Raoul, who will suggest new items for your favorite characters. The designer's creation of the items is strongly geared to their use by bards and thieves, but there's nothing to stop you equipping other characters with them, unless they're unusable by the class you're playing, of course.

Spiritwalker - A Shaman Shapeshifter Kit
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Ulb

This mod enables a new character profile to be played, a shapeshifting shaman, the spirit bearer, who maintains a closer, more personal bond with a small, select but powerful number of animal spirits. When he calls on these spirits during his Shamanic Dance, he doesn't ask them to fight for him, but invites them into his own body to help him shapeshift directly into the form of the chosen animal spirit (yak, tiger and crane).
Storm Caller Shaman
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Ulb

This mod allows you to play a new character profile, a shaman mastering the power of the storm. With their ability to evoke terrible storms and summon lightning on their opponents, these shamans are powerful enemies and allies, even if they know less about the ways of the spirit world than others of their kind. Their shamanic dance does not summon spirits, but lightning bolts from the elemental plane of the air, which they hurl at their enemies.
Sun Soul Monk kit
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

EET

Everyone'sFailGeek

The monks of the Order of Sun Soul believe that they each harbor a small fragment of the divine essence of the sun, long absent from the realms, and are trained to tap into the "spiritual light" within them and manifest it outwardly. Their training brings with it some disadvantages in their melee skills.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Sword and Fist
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

IWDEE

Team

Andyr

CamDawg

NiGHTMARE

Originally intended as part of a larger project, "Lands of Intrigue", this mod revises the monk class to bring it closer to its paper version in AD&D 3rd, but also adds fighter kits:
- Occultist Champion: evil cross between a fighter and a wizard, and notorious for casting curses.
- Duelist: a quick-witted, intelligent fighter who disdains heavy armor in favor of a better command of dodging, reflexes and combat in general.
- Fist of Order: a brutal, evil fighter who is nonetheless effective and loyal.
- Black Knight: a fighter with a background and skills opposed to those of the paladin.
- Magelame: a fighter who has learned to cast profane magic spells in armor.

Team

shadowlich

Max Schnur

Horred the Plague

Minto

King Diamond

This gigantic add-on adds 10 new NPCs (some from BG1), 180 new items, 170 new spells, some 40 additional creatures, 78 new kits, 5 major quests and a gigantic quest. You need to have Throne of Bhaal installed.

This version is for EE games: you must first download and unarchive the original The Darkest Day WITHOUT installing it. Then run Setup-TDDz.exe to install the mod on your EE game.
Requires: Baldur's Gate Graphical Overhaul, The Darkest Day
Incompatible with: NPC Tweak
The Divine Remix
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Andyr

NiGHTMARE

CamDawg

Originally called "Cleric Remix", this mod aims to rebalance and change certain aspects of the classes using divine magic (clerics, paladins, druids and lurkers) in BG (through BGT, BG1Tutu and BG:EE) and in BG2.
Firstly, it completely overhauls the spell system for priests, druids, lurkers and paladins. The list of spells to which clerics have access has been modified thanks to a more detailed system of divine spheres of influence; from now on, priests will have access to the spells of spheres related to the attributions of their divinity. Clerics of Lathander, for example, will have access to spells focusing on healing and fire, while those of Talos will have privileged access to spells of destruction. The same applies to Druids, Rangers and Paladins, who now have access to a more appropriate selection of spells for their class. A host of new divine spells have also been added, including wounding spells (as opposed to healing spells), detection of good and several spells straight out of Icewind Dale. Forget divine spellcasters who all look the same and whose spells reflect nothing of their personality, and add a slightly more tactical dimension to priests and druids!
Secondly, it adds 22 new profiles, mainly for lurkers and clerics, to give you a wider choice, such as Selune's Silver Star cleric profile, Shar's Cloak of Night, Red Rider's Divine Strategist, Tempus' War Chaplain, Ilmater's Noble Martyr, Kossuth's Adept of Flames, Iyachtu Xvim's Tyrant, Oghma's Guardian of Knowledge, Sunie's Heartguard, Corellon's Fairy Protector, Cyric's Master of Conflict; the druid profile of Master of Vases, and the ranger profiles of Sylvan Archer, Wild Ranger, Woods Runner, Avenger and Wild Runner.
Finally, it allows Viconia and Branwen to be assigned a class profile corresponding to their divinity: Priestess of Shar for the former, and of Tempus for the latter.

Incompatible with: Deities of FaerÃ»n, Spell Revisions

The Shieldbearer
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

Lafein

Shieldbearers are trained from an early age in the often underestimated use of shields. While some fighters might abandon it in favor of a second weapon or a larger blade, the Shieldbearer stays true to his path. For his perseverance and dedication to the art, he is rewarded with the knowledge needed to transform a simple shield into an invaluable, and often deadly, extension.

Not to be confused with the Shieldbearer from the Six's Kitpack.

This mod adds six new kits created by Drizzt1180 (Sylvan Mystic Kit, Blade Master, Death Knight, Wushi Ninja, Archer of Sylvanus, Arcane Fist), as well as new items (Creslyn's BG2 Custom Items) from existing stores. The Workshop Kitpack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Dan_P

This is a kitpack currently contains 17 kits + 11 multiclass variants. Also adds 30+ items, including 6 Hunter Badges, 12 Caryll Runes, and 17 other misc items. Heavily inspired by FromSoft's Soulsborne games and probably other sources.

NOTE: The abilities tables for these kits are made at install time. Every kit clones the table of the base class (if it exists). This means that any class revisions installed before this mod will be included with these kits.

This mod features several original and rather cool kits!

IWDEE

semiticgod

Here's an Archer kit, but available for fighters as well as paladins and thieves.
Two major differences from the ranger kit:
Damage bonuses continue to increase beyond level 18 (and up to level 50).
Archers can specialize in slings, darts, bows and crossbows.

This mod has become obsolete since its integration into the Expanded Classes and Kits mod.
Can be replaced by Improved Archer Kit from Argent77.

semiticgod

This mod adds a fighter kit. This is an undisciplined, savage, fierce fighter. While most fighters develop their skills in the martial arts, the War Hulk is all about brute force. He eschews strategy and tactics, preferring to concentrate all his energy into a single massive blow.

Way of the Assassin
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

AionZ

Way of the Assassin is a feared profession, and rightly so. A master of the art of killing, the assassin is distinguished by his ability to kill a living man with a single calculated blow or the slightest cut with a poisoned blade. No man alive is capable of killing a target in as many ways as an assassin, and once an assassin has marked a chosen target, his fate is often sealed. While the act of assassination requires speed and cunning, an assassin's most important skill is patience; the patience to analyze his target, observe its weaknesses and find the most effective way to kill it and slip away unseen.

This mod is obsolete since it has been included in the mod The Artisan's Kitpack by the same author.

Wild Mage Additions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Magus

This mod adds an entropist profile, the Spellweaver, who combines the talents of a sorcerer and a mage, benefiting from the sorcerer's spontaneity of incantation, without being penalized by the restriction on the number of spells memorized. He is, however, limited by the number of spells that can be cast in 24 hours, and by his speed of progression. To this end, the mod adds 27 new spells (3 for each level), and the whole thing looks like a lot of fun.

Only the GitHub version has been updated and is EE-compatible.

Will of the Wisps
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Lava Del'Vortel

This mod brings extensions for the shaman, in particular a fortress he was deprived of in Shadows of Amn. It includes a new location with a quest accessible to all, as well as elements specific to the fortress aspect. It also adds Will, a recruitable undead shaman character, a shaman kit (Witchlight Shaman) and items for shamans and the undead (such as Will and Hexxat). Originally designed for BG2:EE, it is also compatible with BG:EE and IWD:EE, although not all its components will be installed.
STR 17, DEX 15, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 16, CHA 10.
Will to Power
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Subtledoctor

This mod strives to add a psionic system inspired by AD&D2 rules and four profiles that can use it: a psionic thief (Psionicist), a psionic warrior (Soublade), a psionic fighter (Psypher) and a psionic mage (Cerebremancer).
However, as the game engine wasn't designed for it, this mod is still experimental, even though it's being actively maintained. But it should enable you to play a character with new types of abilities. So don't hesitate to give it a try!

Wizard Slayer Overhaul
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Wizard Slayer Rebalancing
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

aVENGER

This mod is largely inspired by other previous Wizard Slayer rebalancing mods, most notably Grey Acumen's Kit Improvements, Konalan's Tweaks, Ashes of Embers and "Kitanya's fixes" (by SixOfSpades). This version is a little more classic and tries not to stray too far from the profile's original concept. In short, it tries to emphasize the strengths of the Wizard Slayer while adding some of the best features of the mods mentioned above. In the end, the profile should be a little more balanced and fun to play, while remaining essentially faithful to Bioware's original concept.
This mod revisits the Wizard Slayer profile with the addition of new anti-magic abilities, two new HLAs (Spell Reflection and Arcane Scourge replace Magic Resistance and Battle Cry) and the ability to let your Wizard Slayer use more magic items than usual.
Wolf Lord: Shapeshifter Upgrade
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

aWoundedLion

This mod replaces the shapeshifter profile with that of the Wolf Lord. This type of druid has voluntarily sought out and contracted lycanthropy. Intensive study and training enable him to harness the power of the Lycanthrope form without losing his self-control. He can transform at will and speak in wolf form. He can also retract his claws at will, whatever his form.

"Don't Delete my gear" script
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

AendaeronBluescale

This mod allows characters to keep their equipment and gold at the start of the game.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
3.5e Pathfinder Thac0 Progression
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

Reddbane

This mini-mod modifies the TAC0 progression table to match those of A&D 3.5e and Pathfinder. Warriors' TACs remain unchanged, but Thieves' and Priests' TACs advance by one point per level for 3 levels, then remain stable the following level, and so on, until they reach a ceiling of 5 at level 21 (N1 = 20 - N2 = 20 - N3 = 19 - N4 = 18 - N5 = 17 - N6 = 17 - N7 = 16...). The mage table now advances by 1 every two levels until it reaches a ceiling of 5 at level 21 (N1 = 20 - N2 = 20 - N3 = 19 - N4 = 19 - N5 = 18...). The THAC0.2da table extends to level 50.

This is an override mod that overwrites the THAC0.2da file.
3.5e Pathfinder Universal (All Classes) Constitution Bonus
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

Reddbane

This mini-mod ensures that all classes (not just fighters) gain the full hit point bonus for a higher Constitution, whereas in the game (and 2nd edition), a mage, thief or cleric with a Constitution of 19 would have the same hit point bonus as one with a Constitution of 16. From now on, Constitution is closer to the way it works in 3rd edition, granting the same bonus hit points for all classes.

This is an override mod that overwrites the HPCONBON.2da file.
3.5e Weapon Style Rebalance
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Reddbane

This mod rebalances the four "weapon style" skills to make them more in line with their operation in AD&D 3.5 and Pathfinder, and to correct the rather large imbalance between weapon styles in BG2, in which investing 2 stars in any style other than "2 weapons" was rather pointless and dual wielding almost always the optimal build for a fighter. It offers the following 5 optional components:
- Combat style rebalancing (3.5 Edition): two stars are enough to achieve maximum specialization, almost all classes can place at least one skill point in each style.
- Extended weapon styles for non-fighters: allows thieves and bards to invest 2 points in the two-weapon style and the one-weapon style.
- Sticks can't perform sneak attacks.
- Rangers don't have a left-hand touch penalty.
- Montolio's cloak update: to be in harmony with the previous component.

Il Ã©crase les fichiers STYLBONU.2DA ainsi que CLCK32.itm en passant sa description en anglais.

Here's a mod that offers subraces for characters.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

Mod incompatible with a version of the game prior to patch 2.5.

A Few Less Master Areas and Something for Traps
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BGEE

SoD

EET

temnix

This little mod has two components:
- The first removes "main area" status from certain maps, removing the need to reunite the party to go elsewhere. Note that this also disables automatic registration when changing areas. This concerns Tazok's tent in the bandit camp (combat inside can be continued outside, with enemies pursuing characters if the inside area is still active - there's always a party member inside). The Thieves' Maze becomes an extension of the Thieves' Guild upstairs, and you can lead difficult monsters to the Thieves' Swords. You can also take your party in and out of the Friendly Arm Inn separately (Tarnesh can chase you there). Ditto for the Temple of Bhaal in the Underground City (you can lure Sarevok and his henchmen outside).
- the second modifies all detectable traps on the ground so that they also react to the passage of enemies and NPCs, not just to the party: free to plan ambushes.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. By his own admission, it's not very reliable...
A Hero Rises, A Text Adventure
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

Mr2150

This inhabitual mod proposes a new interface for books. You can read and live new adventures that you are the hero.
To start, go to Winthrop to buy a new book called A Hero Rises.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
This mod is still in progress.
AC's Miscellaneous Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Andrea C.

This mod is the result of adjustments and modifications made by Andrea C. to her BGT installation. Over time, it has been enriched with numerous components and is now compatible with all Baldurs Gate games, original and EE. It includes many components that restore BG1 icons for items in that opus, restore original icons for all bonus merchant items in SoA if 1PP is installed, restore original portraits for new recruitable NPCs in EE games, correct dragon breaths, offer the use of character sound sets in classic games... In short, take a good look at the mod presentation available via the download link, and you're sure to find what you're looking for.

Please note: many components restore English text.

Gives the protagonist the ability to be a silent hero.
Ahungry's Deletefier
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

ahungry

Removes many items from creatures/stores/areas - actually tries to "demote" all special item types to their basic form according to a certain probability (0 to 100) which is chosen when the mod is installed.
Author's note: on a megamod (200+ mods), I like 90 to 95 - it makes acquiring gear exciting again.

Warning: Some quest items may be affected.

AionZ

Almateria's Enhanced Smaller Locations
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Almateria

This little mod adds abandoned and unused locations while maintaining a kind of cohesion with the story. Basically, Unfinished Business, but much smaller:
- Aran Linvail's realistic checkroom: the cloak ramps are now filled with various assortments of cloaks, mostly suitable for thieves. Loot is completely random, so good luck getting the best result! Restored tent in Trademeet: a new tent is open to visitors! Located near the caravan, its contents are well worth a look.
- Kiser's bedroom restored: a guest bedroom has been added to Kiser's house, present but not used in the game. The stairs to the bedroom are located to the east of the entrance, behind the wall.

Note that much of its content has been integrated into Almateria's Quest 2 and Almateria's tweaks by the same author.
This mod has disappeared from https://almrep.blogspot.com/p/almaterias-enhanced-smaller-locations.html
Almateria's Restoration Project
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Almateria

This mod can also be installed independently of Unfinished Business, but its purpose is to restore content not exploited by the latter; in this sense, it's worth pairing it with Unfinished Business.
Almateria's tweaks
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

Almateria

Link Link
This mod adds gold or experience costs to certain profane and divine spells, changes the cost of resurrection to be closer to either the D&D 3.5 or 4 version, modifies racial bonuses, paladins can be fallen after certain evil actions...

Although WeiDU, this mod overrides the spells concerned.

Ulb

This little mod allows lurkers (and druids if you wish) to obtain a companion animal that will follow them throughout the game (a bit like a pet). From level 3 onwards, they can set off in search of it.
Possible animal types: bear, wolf, panther, leopard, dog, spider, wiverne, marmot, rabbit.

Archive of Icendoan
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

BG2

Icendoan

This mod brings together 3 small mods created by Icendoan:
- #!Stoneskin (Elemental Damage Only): applies a permanent stone skin to every character in the game, making gameplay rather strange and... interesting since it renders most weapons and a large number of spells useless.
- #!Lightening: a crazy component that installs a wand behaving like a bag of holding... And yes, spelling mistakes suck...
- #!Brage (Brage's Penance): adds Brage as a recruitable NPC in BG. He's completely silent, but has a small quest. This mod was created in 40 minutes to celebrate BG1's 10th anniversary.
Ashes of Embers
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Ghreyfain

This mod brings together some of the ideas from the projects of a mod finally abandoned, "Embers of Empires". It introduces the following changes to the game:
- All character classes can use any type of weapon (e.g. a priest can use a sword, but only a paladin can use Carsomyr).
- Stone/Iron Skin duration reduced.
- 7 new profiles: 6 priest profiles (from gods other than FaerÃ»n: Priest of Cathoun, Priest of Lahan-Riyashal, Priest of Oron, Priest of Thieron, Priest of Uulix and Priest of Yathar) and one fighter kit (Tunnel Fighter).
- New armors (scales, stripes, war harness) available from a merchant on the Waukeen's Promenade, and weapons (bolas, katars and javelins).
- Assign new martial specializations to Anomen (longsword, spear, crossbow), Keldorn (spear replaces crossbow) and Viconia (crossbow, flail, one-handed weapon style, scimitar and shortsword).

Backstab on the Copper Coronet
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

JohnBob

This mod adds a vendor on the roof of the Copper Coronet, where you can purchase thieves' tablets for a few gold coins. They allow you to modify the constraints of stealth attacks.
- Stealth Tablet: No need to attack from behind when you're invisible.
- Sneaky Tablet: No need to be invisible to attack treacherously.
- Villain Tablet: No need to be behind someone or invisible to perform a sneaky attack.

Available in ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡µ.

Holic75

This mod attempts to replace the rules of the EE games (AD&D2) with those used by D&D 3.5 (with some Pathfinder elements) within the limits of what the engine allows.

Probably incompatible with many kit mods, since they are based on AD&D2 rules rather than 3.5.

Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition Trilogy Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

K4thos

This mod offers a collection of adjustments for IE games. Although originally designed for EET, some of these components are universal and can work with BG1, BG2, IWD, IWD2, Tutu, BGT, CA, IWD-in-BG2, BG:EE, BG2:EE and IWD:EE.
It allows, among other things, to harmonize the appearance of recruitable NPCs during the trilogy or to modify the XP limitation. Read the readme for more details.

Some components are taken from the BGT Tweak Pack and are therefore redundant if you wish to install the mod...
Bank of Baldur's Gate
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Lassal

This mod was written in recognition of the fact that players sometimes find themselves without money. Next to the Iron Throne headquarters is a locked building teeming with ogre mages. This is the ducal bank at Baldur's Gate, which was out of commission following a robbery by ogres. Return to the building a day after killing the ogres, and the bank will be operational again. Go upstairs and open an account with Manager Billboo. After the Siege of Dragonspear campaign opens, he'll be waiting for you by the bank, so you can withdraw your money if you wish.

Please note: in the BG2 campaign, you'll need to install another mod that allows you to return to Baldur's Gate to collect your money from the bank.
Bard Song Switching
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

This mod allows Bards to change their song as in IWD. As kit vocals cannot change, they have been enhanced to compensate. The effects of different songs can be cumulated. One component even allows the same songs to be used several times if several bards form a choir. He adds new songs, some of which are from Icewind Dale: The Ballad of the Three Heroes, Tymora's Melody, Song of Kaudies, The Tale of Curran Strongheart, etc.
Bardic Appraisal
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

CamDawg

This little mod adds an ability to bards (including all profiles) that allows them to assess the value at will of any identified item in the group's possession. Note that the prices indicated by the skill will probably not reflect the real value at which you can sell an item due to various factors linked to the game engine, such as merchants' margins, the bonuses or maluses of your charisma and reputation, the number of charges of items...

Some components require Item Revisions or Spell Revisions.

Better Initiative
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

MindTyrant

This mod modifies the Baldur's Gate initiative system into something that roughly parallels PnP. It does so through a few 'under the hood' adjustments concerning initiative. These minor, and sometimes counterintuitive, changes make the game a little more familiar and quite possibly more fun as well!

This mod is still in progress.

Better Stat Drain
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

semiticgod

This mod reintroduces the ability to defeat enemies by absorbing their characteristics, a feature removed by the EE versions to avoid accidentally killing characters important to the storyline. From now on, you won't be able to kill them, but you will be able to bring them down to one hit point and trigger the script or dialog provided for when they are defeated.
BG More Faster Better
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

Eirinjas

This mod increases the movement speed of party members wearing boots. Basic boots can be purchased in selected stores to equip party members. This mod also adds hundreds of portraits and voices.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
BG1 Level Cap Reinstator for BGT
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

Adul

This mini-mod restores the original experience limit of Baldur's Gate: Tales of the Sword Coast to 161,000 XP. This limit only applies to the Baldur's Gate 1 part of the game, and you'll be free to advance further after moving on to the Baldur's Gate 2 part.
BG1 Tweaks Pack
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Methuselah

Link
This mod allowed you to make a thousand and one small adjustments to the game. You could make purely aesthetic changes (such as masking helmets on avatars, using Icewind Dale's visual incantations...) or rule changes (removing the XP limit, changing experience tables, casting spells in armor) and make certain game mechanics more flexible (unlimited ammo stacking...).

Overwrites game files. Now obsolete, it has been replaced by The Tweaks Anthology.
Fichier BG1Tweak.rar.
BG2 Improvements
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Victor Georgiev

This mod adds 2 new profiles (the Faithful Thief and the Burning Man, a fighter kit), a new store (accessible via a scroll found on the Waukeen's Promenade), modifies several rules (race characteristics, weapons usable by all...), improves the Irenicus Dungeon, adds a few new encounters and a mini-quest at the end of SoA.
BG2 Tweaks Pack
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

Team

CamDawg

Idobek

This mod compiled several other mods: the G3 Tweak Pack, Tutu Tweak Pack and Wes Weimer's Ease of Use. It allowed you to make a thousand and one small adjustments to the game. You could make purely aesthetic changes (such as masking helmets on avatars, using Icewind Dale's visual incantations...) or rule changes (removing the XP limit, changing experience tables, casting spells in armor) and make certain game mechanics more flexible (unlimited ammo stacking, multi-romance...).
It is now obsolete and has been replaced by The Tweaks Anthology.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2012. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
BGT Spawn Tweak
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

skellytz

This little mod for Baldur's Gate Trilogy lets you change the spawn point settings in the area to change the difficulty of encounters.

Incompatible with: BGSpawn System, BGT Tweak Pack
BGT Tweak Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

Ascension64

This BGT-specific mod is the official companion to the game, allowing you to modify certain game behaviors, particularly in the Baldur's Gate and Legend of the Lost Isle sections. In particular, you can automatically explore towns, randomize traps in the Pirate's Cave, add sacks on the Sword Coast, add more bandit scalps, modify the effects of iron scarcity on breakable items, restore BG2 XP for lock picking, trap defusing and spell learning, add exotic weapons in Taerom's forge, import more items from Baldur's Gate to Shadows of Amn...

If you're planning to install BGSpawn System, don't install BGT Tweak Pack's "Modify Random Enemy Creation" component, as both modify the same thing.
Incompatible with: BGT Spawn Tweak

Blink Dogs and Phase Spiders
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

temnix

This mod modifies the Phase Spider so that it disappears after each attack, and the Dodge Dog so that it can summon other Dodge Dogs (these can also summon other dogs, so you can have a horde to face).

The module searches for these two creatures by their English names and patches them. It therefore has no chance of working on a game in a language other than English.
Books and Boots
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Pufuc

This mod that adds new items (mostly jewerly, books and boots) it advances characters through books, rather than relying solely on additional levels and equipment
Money sink - new books cost a lot, so now player has a reason and a place to spend their riches
Boots of speed - now there is enough of them for whole party
Smoother lore and carry weight advancement - every new point of wisdom, intelligence and strength makes a difference
Some women now have new jewelry in their possession(like Silke for example). It may make a few fights a tiny little bit more difficult
BP-Balancer
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

Manduran

This mod reduces the impact of several major mod installations during the course of the game. You can reduce the experience points earned for learning spells, disarming traps and pickpocketing. Likewise, you can remove certain overly powerful items from the Dark Side of the Sword Coast, Northern Tales of the Sword Coast, Secret of Bone Hill, Drizzt Saga.
Bubb's Auto Loot
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Team

Bubb

Daniel Valle

This mod aims to make loot collection easier, to reduce the amount of items the player misses and leaves on the ground, especially small piles of gold. You can filter auto loot by critical item, weapon enchantment level, gold, price and price by weight. For the moment, automatic looting only applies to items on the ground.

The github link offers an EET-compatible version.
Buckler reversion
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Dunderdon

This mini mod allows mages and spellcasters to wear shields weighing less than 5 pds. It does not modify item descriptions.
Cal-culator
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Japheth

This zany mod allows you to count the number of creatures you kill during the game, according to their type. To do this, you'll need to summon a goblin (named Cal) using his ring, which you'll find in the Waukeen's Promenade. The calculation takes place as soon as you slip the ring onto the finger of one of your characters, which means you can use this mod during the game.
Can I stab you?
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

RoyalProtector

This mod is a highly modular response to your preferences regarding immunity to sneak attacks. A common complaint is that many enemies, including those in ToB, can't be stabbed with sneak attacks, which reduces the power of Thieves (especially single-class Thieves), who are already underpowered, when these moves are one of the main, if not the only way to excel and make a major contribution to combat.
Caravans of FaerÃ»n: A Better Way to Travel
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

AionZ

This mod adds a new way to travel through the Sword Coast, adding Caravan Masters you can hire to take you to certain places on the map with only half the travel time and without the risk of random encounters. You'll arrive well-rested, with your spells and abilities restored, saving hours or even days of play. However, this kind of service isn't free, as you have to pay 10 gold per hour of travel for each member of the group. Travel costs aren't cheap, after all.
Cast find familiar, and choose any
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

StrixO

This small mod allows you to choose the familiar of your choice once the Find Familiar spell has been cast.

EET

IWDEE

PSTEE

Bardez

A meta mod that enables you to copy spells between mage books, write scrolls or prepare potions, among other things. Read the documentation to find out more.
cbisson's Familiar Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

CBisson

This mod lets you summon stronger, more powerful pets: spotted lion, panther, brown bear, snow wolf, dryad or snake.
Cerberus
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Jarno Mikkola

If you wish, this mini-mod allows you to retrieve dogs from specific locations: they can help adventurers with thieving skills (detecting traps, illusions or secret doors). This SoA mod is compatible with BGT and, in principle, with all other mods (although it's best to install it after mods that modify the world map).
Charmed, I'm Sure
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

temnix

This mod deals with mind control spells and their consequences. It is intended to prevent charmed creatures from becoming systematically hostile when the spell expires (except for domination spells). It also includes a few optional components.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
Check the Bodies
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

CBisson

Hoppy

Weigo

King Diamond

Ikki

This mod adds countless quests (24, some of them quite long) plus new class quests. New maps (15 + 160 modified), new items, new recipes for Cromwell, a new city to explore (Hlondeth), a new character to recruit (Rynn, human fighter).... In short, it's mouth-watering. The adventure begins in Candlekeep, and after a few chores, you'll become more powerful and continue the normal course of BG2, while having many quests and encounters to do.
The new version includes the add-on modules Candlekeep Chores (tutorial) and Candlekeep Chores Fast Forward.

Requires: ToB, Worldmap
Incompatible with: Dead Gardens

Constitution bonuses for everyone above 16
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡
