Gotural

This mod allows all characters with more than 15 Constitution to benefit from additional health points.
This mod overwrites the HPCLASS.2da and HPCONBON.2da files, and cannot be uninstalled. In addition, as a component of SubtleD's Stat Overhauls does the same thing, you should use the latter.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Corrected Calendar
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

According to the author, in the first Baldur's Gate we're clearly in early autumn, but the game starts on 2 Myrtul (the equivalent of May). The sequel takes place in an indeterminate but verdant season, most likely spring or summer of the following year. The SoD campaign should therefore take place during winter in the North. Technically, the second game also begins on the 2nd of Myrtul, but this is clearly an oversight, simply an uncorrected date.
This mod therefore modifies the calendar for both games to better reflect the coherent sequence of events. CHARNAME will leave Candlekeep on the 10th of Marpenoth (September) and find himself in Irenicus' dungeon on the 25th of Flamerule (July) the following year.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
Coup de Grace
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod allows fighters to kill defenseless enemies in a single blow. Creatures that are unconscious, immobilized or asleep (if they don't wake up as a result of hit damage) have a 50% chance of being killed if hit with a melee weapon. Skeletons and mindless zombies, on the other hand, cannot deliver lethal blows, even when carrying weapons. The mechanism now takes into account the type of weapon damage: targets immune to the damage a weapon inflicts will not be finished off by it. Immunity to blunt damage also protects against fisticuffs.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
Crossing Paths
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

This mod offers an alternative way of resting: each member of the party can rest whenever he or she wishes, but then leaves the party for 8 hours to return in full form.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk.
Custom dll Fixes And Tweaks
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Mindchild

This mod brings rule changes to IWD2: Mystra paladins can multi-classify as mage and sorcerer, Helm paladins as Helm Cleric, monks can wear robes and retain their wisdom bonus to AC, cheat codes are implemented, ability to save skill points between level-ups... For more information, read this. You can customize the installation by modifying the parameters in the config.txt file.
Deities of FaerÃ»n
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Raduziel

The purpose of this mod is to import all of FaerÃ»n's deities into EE games, assigning each of them a profile as close as possible to their P&P version. It uses a system of 25 spheres and currently offers 53 profiles. Optional components allow you to assign them to recruitable NPCs from the game and mods.

Incompatible with: The Divine Remix, Faiths and Powers, Spell Revisions
Diablofication
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

m-architek

Diablofication is a modification of the Infinity Engine that aims to implement some of the well-known and fun mechanisms of the Diablo games in Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition. The aim is not to revolutionize the game, but to make it more attractive. Read the README carefully.

Only BGEE version 2.6 works, without SoD. Windows only.
Difficulty Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

jaypee

A series of options designed to make the game more difficult, such as reducing the number of items in stores, preventing players from changing areas during a fight, limiting rest to inns and enclosed buildings, etc...
Ding0 Experience Fixer - DEF JAM
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

SimDing0

You find Baldur's Gate II too easy, you'd like more difficulty but you're not satisfied with the difficulty slider or Tactics style mods? Try DEF JAM! This mod allows you to reduce the amount of initial XP received at character creation, reduce the XP received for lock picking and trap defusing, reduce or even cancel the XP received for learning spells, reduce quest XP and finally reduce the XP received for killed creatures. Each setting is independent and you can choose from 100% (unchanged) to 10%, or a division by 6 for solo play. The choice is yours!
Ding0 Tweak
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Team

SimDing0

CamDawg

the bigg

Ghreyfain

Avenger

Kensai Ryu

Jaysyn

Angel

This mod makes a few adjustments to the game. It comprises 15 components, including: reintroduction of the Dimension Door spell, changes to monster summoning spells to restore BG1 behavior, removal of the creature summoning limit, improved magic berry spell, ability to kill Cespenar, visual effects of Ionic Stones, restoration of Drows' innate abilities, improved sneak attack, defusing of traps by NPCs or summons, etc.
Disable EE NPCs, EE items available in shops
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Pecca

This mod lets you play EE versions without seeing the new NPCs. It provides two features:
The first makes certain new items introduced by BG:EE available in stores, so you don't have to recruit new NPCs to obtain them.
The second lets you delete new EE NPCs (each character can be selected individually via a component).

Please note that the first part is not a Weidu component, and you'll need to override the corresponding items and stores. The second is Weidu.
It is now obsolete and has been replaced by Convenient Enhanced Edition NPCs.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Discard Armor/Book Casting
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

temnix

Discard Armor adds a special "remove-remove armor" ability to heroes, so fighters/mages can easily switch and cast spells, even during combat.
Book casting allows wizards to cast spells directly from their spell book: the spell is not deleted from memory, but casting time is greatly increased.

Double XP On Insane Difficulty
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

IWD2

Baezlebub

Just add a small file (MONCRATE.2da modified) to the override folder, and the experience gained will double throughout the game. This is an imitation of IWD 1's Heart of Fury mode, which doubled all monster stats AND XP earned. In IWD 2's Heart of Fury mode, experience doesn't double. Except with this. NB: this makes it easier to start a level 1 game in Heart of Fury mode.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Please note: the order of installation is very important, so read the instructions carefully.
[EE Keeper]] allows you to do the same thing in a different way, without conflicts with other mods.

BGT

EET

Team

Blue the Immortal Bard

Jason Compton

This is a mod for those who've had enough of the Irenicus dungeon, and want to get out in the open air as soon as possible: it allows you to exit the dungeon directly. A guy will appear, you talk to him, and he'll take you out with the experience and items you'd have collected if you'd done the dungeon normally...

Prefer the Skip Chateau Irenicus mod, which is much more flexible and compatible with the other mods.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

Tioma

This mod simplifies the player's life by offering a bag with the same capacity as in Baldur's Gate II, by allowing larger stacks of items, by maximizing health points with each level gain, by making it easier to learn spells, by preventing characters from leaving because of reputation...

It is now obsolete, having been replaced by the mod The Tweaks Anthology.

âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

IWD

Duke Nightmare

Link
Easthaven+, a new mod aimming to extend the play of Icewind Dale. A lot of fun extras have been thrown into the game for fun, as well as some extra RP characters, that are following their own campaign to rid evil or good from Easthaven, and the world that makes Icewind Dale. Easthaven+ brings all this and more into the game. With this as well, there is a set of game rules, allowing the player to reach higher levels, and see skill progression reach a new level (literally).

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Enable conversations with charmed/dominated creatures
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Ascension64

Ascension64, the author of Baldur's Gate Trilogy, has made two fixes to defects in the Baldur's Gate II game engine. They required modifications to the game's executable, making them very special. The first concerns the ability to talk to characters under the effect of a charm, which was possible in BG, but had been removed by the developers in the second opus.

Prefer TobEx, which incorporates these fixes and more!
Endless BG1 Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

jastey

For EE games, the main purpose of this mod is to allow players to remain in the BG1 world after defeating Sarevok. To resume the game's original progression (or ending), you need to talk to Duke Belt inside the palace.
In EET, it also gives the option of skipping SoD and starting BG2 directly (note that some mods for BG2 expect SoD events to have occurred).
In BGT, the main mod component adds some praise for the player in dialogs with Duke Belt and removes some references to Sarevok after his death.
Optional components give the player more prestige and prepare for SoD events in all installations.
Enhanced BG2
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Nastian

Link Link
The content of this mod was originally intended to be part of a larger project, but was never completed. It brings several changes to the game, intended to make it more attractive. It contains several components:
- on the Waukeen's Promenade, the traveling merchant Alyoud sells 7 powerful magic items.
- addition and modification of character interactions.
- addition of tomes and manuals in empty or uninteresting containers.
- Irenicus dungeon: it is now possible to negotiate with the genie to obtain Balduran's cloak.
- addition of new portraits for your character.
- restoration of missing item descriptions (Plate Mail +3: 'The Practical Defense', Sling +3: 'Arla's Dragonbane').
- Item set bonuses: a character equipped with all Wormsor-forged draconic items or Balduran equipment receives additional bonuses. 5 new enemy races added: gnoll, skeleton, wiverne, yuan-ti and zombie.
- 10 new profiles have been added, including some from the AD&D3 prestige classes: fighter (Knight, Duelist, Gladiator, Legionnaire), ranger (Globe-trotter), paladin (Crusader, Lich Terror, Dragon Slayer), thief (Silent Slayer) and cleric (Priestess of Aurile).
- various minor changes to the Dungeon of Irenicus.

Fichier Enhanced_BG2_v1.1.rar.
Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
Enhanced Creatures
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

Aigleborgne

This mod adds more horror-style creatures to the game. More details in the README.
Epic-Thieving
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

Olvyn Churu

This mod extends the special abilities of thieves with the highest thief skills. It adds extra bonuses for thief specialization and significantly improves gameplay for thief characters:
- Picking certain game locks and detecting and defusing certain traps now require skills above 100%.
- It will also be possible to steal previously protected items (such as equipped helmets, shields, boots or armor), and shoplifting from certain stores will require a skill score above 100%. Each point spent above 100% in the Illusion Detection skill will give a 1% chance of automatic detection of illusions WITHOUT the need to activate the skill.
Finally, thieves will be able to use the new Poison Use skill if the EEex mod is installed.
In return, it will no longer be possible to cumulate the effects of the Master Thief's potions.
Experience cap remover and new High Level Ability pools for F/M/C and F/M/T
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

leeho730

This mod removes experience limits and makes HLA available to triclassed players.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Team

Within Amnesia

This mod adds around 10 new random encounters to BG1, as well as new magic and other items. Its aim is to make certain areas of the game empty of opposition "more interesting".

This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.

Heir to the abandoned Faiths of FaerÃ»n project, this mod adds dozens of priest, druid, lurker and paladin profiles, new class combinations, new spells, an optional divine sphere system to differentiate access to spells for different profiles and deities, and optional profile-specific armor and weapon restrictions.

Fake Import Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Almateria

Make no mistake, this mod doesn't simulate any character import from BG1, as it claims, but it does add items in the Irenicus dungeon: golden pants and feature tomes are behind the portrait, the party gains 65,455 XP, Illyich wears +3 chainmail.

Warning: this mod is buggy! The first cutscene freezes the game. While waiting for the mod to be updated, open the setup-fakeimport.weidu script.tp2 in a text editor and insert the line Continue() after lines 66 and 136, and before END.
Faster Baldur's Gate
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

Eirinjas

A lite version of the Firewalker mod, this mod is designed for those who want to play Baldur's Gate without suffering from slow character movement speed by modifying the movement speed of boot-equipped characters. It also incorporates some of the capabilities of the original (notably portraits, NPC recruitment levels, storage limits, etc.).

Unfortunately, it installs with IEES or IE Editor Pro, old modding tools (you'll find their download links in the GrondeMarteau Forge forum). Avoid it like the plague.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
FinnJO's Subrace
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

FinnJO

Link
This mod adds subraces to the game based partly on 3rd edition D&D rules, as in Icewind Dale II, and partly on 2nd edition AD&D rules. After you've created a character and started a new game (or loaded an old one), a dialog box will appear with the option of selecting a subrace for your character from the following: aasimar, tiefelin, genasi (air, water, fire and earth), dwarf (arctic, golden, mountain, duergar), elf (drow, lunar, wild, solar and sylvan) as well as the corresponding half-elves, rock gnome, svirfneblin, halfelin (stout, barefoot and ghostwise). A component also lets you change the sub-race of certain NPCs.

Fichier FinnjoBGII_Subrace.rar.
Firewalker
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

Jason Higgins

Link
This mod modifies several elements of the game: characters are all recruited at their lowest level (no adaptation to the main character's level), characteristic tomes are replaced by items specific to each class, jewels all offer bonuses (CA, resistance...), boots add movement speed bonuses. It also adds character portraits taken from BG2, and new items scattered all over the place (notably on opponents or in stores). Some opponents are enhanced to make combat more difficult. Finally, the mod increases ammunition storage capacity, raises the experience limit, and allows maximum hit points to be gained at level change. It also integrates the Baldurdash patch.

The mod can be installed with IEES or IE Editor Pro (links to these tools can be found in the GrondeMarteau Forge forum). Avoid it like the plague.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Flamewing's Tweaks
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

FlameWing

Formerly known as Convenience Tweaks and Glaicas Fix, this mod is a (small) collection of tweaks, cheats and fixes that make some things slightly more convenient than they were in the original game, especially if you're playing for the 100th time. It includes several components:
- Always win against Aesgareth
- Reduce the number of draws to get what you want from the Wonderful Card Game
- Make Lum the Fool's Machine easier to use
- Free Glaicas from his spell more easily
- Thrown Weapon do not gain Strength bonus to THAC0

Attention, le dernier composant est absent de la derniÃ¨re release du mod.
Flanks and Rear
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod allows players to use side and rear attacks in close combat. Fighters are considered to be flanking an enemy when they stay to his side or a little behind, and they benefit from the rear when they are almost directly at his back.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. Install at your own risk.
Follower_It
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Deratiseur

This mod lets you turn any companion into a follower (who doesn't count against the party limit). He loses all possibility of banters, discussion or quest. Several options make followers immortal, so you don't have to deal with their resurrection and all the inconvenience that goes with it.
Full Plate and Packing Steel
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

IWD

erik

This mod offers a complete overhaul of the defense system (armor, shields), and consequently of the combat system and tactics in general. Light, enchanted armor really helps you hide. Heavy, enchanted armor won't help you dodge much, but it will absorb perhaps half or more of the damage, while slowing you down and tiring you out. Stealth, flight and magic in heavy armor will be possible, but with difficulty. Its very nature makes it incompatible with other important mods.
Game Over Only on Party Dead
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Salk

CHARNAME is far from your strongest asset, and you're sick of having to reload every time it bites the dust? With this mod, your companions will continue the fight despite the corpse-like state of Bhaal's child. When the main protagonist is eliminated from combat (when his hit points are 1 or less), everything rests on the rest of the team: either they win the battle, allowing the hero to join them afterwards, or the game really does end. In the first case, it's not necessary to bring the main character back to life, but note that his physical condition will be critical!

A similar mod exists for EE versions: Protagonist can die.
GemRB Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

IWD

IWD2

PST

lynxlynxlynx

This mod is a collection of small GemRB tweaks and a user-friendly way to make the gameplay richer, different or both.

Requires: GemRB
Genwas Bestienmod BG2:EE
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGT

BG2EE

Genwa

Link
This mod allows you to acquire beasts (gnoll, troll, ghost troll, earth elemental) in Ust Natha: they can change region, be invited by dialog to wait or guard a location. A new trainer can increase their skills and offer special equipment: cattle cage (to store cattle), equipment packs (better equipment for creatures), Pomp's eye (to see through the eyes of the equipped beast)... You can also buy a ferret trained in pickpocketing from a boy in the Athkatla slums.

Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.
Genwas Werwolfmod BG:EE
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

Genwa

Link
At the end of Werewolf Island, the player is infected with lycanthropy. Up to now, this only had the effect of turning party members into enemy werewolves after twenty-five days, if the head wolf had not been killed in the meantime. With this mod, the player gains the ability to transform into a werewolf once a day at the end of the twenty-five days, until or if he kills the head wolf. Without the shapeshifter's intensive study and training to control lycanthropy, the player will suffer side effects.
A second component offers a peaceful outcome to the island of werewolves: Your reputation now increases when you complete secondary tasks. If you act against the village, your reputation decreases. With three secondary tasks completed, normal villagers will no longer attack you if prompted to do so during the game. With five or more tasks completed, enemy werewolves will no longer appear in the village. Enemies in the catacombs remain. Alternatively, if you reach the boat to the mainland peacefully, you'll receive an experience bonus to compensate for lost combat experience. Dialogues with Kaisha and the werewolf can also end peacefully. This depends on whether or not you've fought the village, your charisma level and whether or not you've accepted the curse.

Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.
Genwas Zum Freundlichen Arm BG:EE
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

SoD

Genwa

Link
This mod sends recruitable NPCs to the Friendly Arm inn, except for Rasaad who goes to Nashkel to fulfill his quest. An optional component allows the party to teleport once a day to the inn using a teleportation stone sold by Bentley Mirrorshade, as well as two others in Baldur's Gate and Nashkel. Another component offers the special ability to teleport back to one's place of origin. This lasts only one hour (real time) after using a teleportation stone.

Please note: This mod is not compatible with the components Send Bioware NPCs to an inn from The Tweaks Anthology and Possibility of sending NPCs to wait in an inn from Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification.
Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.
Ggib Eht Tweak Pack
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

Ggib Eht

This is a pornographic mod featuring several components, including a prostitution system, a few adult items...

Beware, the content is explicit.
Ghost
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Badgert

Link
During the final battle of ToB, this mod allows the protagonist to tap into the energy well to gain the special ability Focus, which can be used once per turn. For 5 rounds, this ability makes him immune to petrification, disintegration and time stoppage. It also protects against all level 1-3 spells.

Fichier Ghost_v2.1.zip.
Golem Construction for Spellcasters
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

This mod enables spellcasters to create their own golem. The golems have a limited lifespan, but follow their creator throughout the game. A small part of the mod is only accessible in BG2:EE.
Hard Times
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

Macready

Link
This mod corrects an aberration of the game, namely the proliferation of low-cost items, even lost in the wild, when we're in a time of crisis and the hero is supposed to feel alone and naked in this hostile world. Forget the opulence you're used to, and live like the poor penniless orphan you are. In almost all stores, prices will be considerably increased and the quantity of magic items reduced. Hotel rooms will cost more than just a few coins. Many unique or magical items scattered around the game world will be replaced by items of lesser value.
The second component adds a "boss" to the Ulcaster dungeon.

It exists a portage of this mod to BGT: Hard Times for BGT.
Hard Times for BGT
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

Ascension64

This mod is a BGT port of the Hard Times mod.

Warning: this mod is incompatible with one of Sword Coast Stratagems's components, which adjusts Ulcaster's ruins, and with certain dialogs in Ajantis BG1 Expansion Modification, which lose their meaning. In addition, it paradoxically introduces major inconsistencies in BGT by using the same item prices in the BG2 part, unaffected by the iron crisis. For example, Ribald offers a fire wand (20 charges maximum) for 61,000 po, while Vecna's dress (unaffected) costs 25,000 po! Given the impact of this mod on the BG2 game, it loses much of its appeal.
Heart of Fury mode emulator
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

Tisamon

This mod recreates the Heart of Fury rules in BGEE. Why use this mod when BGEE includes the Legacy of Bhaal difficulty mode? Firstly, because this mod allows you to change the difficulty in-game, which LOB does not. Secondly, the author has posted a "lite" mod in the same topic, in which monster hit points are halved.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Heart of Winter Ending Tweak
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

AionZ

A small mod to alter the ending of Heart of Winter expansion for IWD:EE (when playing from the main campaign) so that the expansion does not end immediately after defeating the final boss. You will be able to return to Lonelywood and complete any unfinished business, as well as play Trials of the Luremaster if you so desire, and finish the expansion when you desire by speaking with Hjollder.

Almateria

This mod allows you to obtain the bonuses earned in Hell when you start a ToB game. At the start of the game, you'll receive an item that lets you remember what you did six feet under.

Hoarders
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod allows party members to share earned gold and fill their own purses. Anyone in need of money must persuade or intimidate a party member to give it to them. It's not a hopeless proposition, but it's a tough one. From now on, you'll have to negotiate to gather the gold you need to cross to Spellhold, or to obtain the help of the Shadow Thieves...

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. Install at your own risk.
Homeward Bound
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

EET

berelinde

Link
This mod allows you to send your companions home or have them return to the Throne of Bhaal Pocket Plane, and to access the epilogue of all your companions, even those who are no longer part of your party... It also allows you to send them back to the mainland from the island of Brynnlaw, just before or after the Spellhold stage. A store is included (in Brynnlaw).

Use the link for the BG2/BGT version and the github link for the BG2EE/EET version.

Icewind Dale II Ease of Use Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Wes Weimer

It's a collection of useful IWD2 mods assembled by Wes Weimer.
iiKey Names
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

igi

This little mod allows you to change the name of game keys once you've used them. This means you can dispose of them without worrying about cluttering up your inventory.
iiLearn Through Use
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

igi

This little mod strives to add a little realism to the game by modifying the process of acquiring martial skill points. Players will no longer obtain them for weapons they have never seen, let alone used. From now on, they will no longer depend on the character's level, but on the weapon and the length of time they have been fighting (whereas skills will be limited by class limits). If you use certain weapons long enough, you'll learn to wield them better, even if you don't kill thousands of creatures or complete several quests.
A skill point is awarded after a set number of successful hits. The installation program lets you choose the number of moves required to obtain each of the 5 martial skill points. As an option, you can also choose to make training compulsory before validating your points, whether free of charge or not.

As the mod must detect all the weapons in the game, install it after all the mods that add weapons.
iiProjectile Retrieval
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

igi

This little mod allows players to recover projectiles they have launched and which have hit their target, the others being lost. Options allow you to customize the installation:
- Chance to recover projectiles.
- What type of projectile is recovered: only non-magical projectiles, all projectiles, all projectiles are recovered in their normal version (e.g.: you shoot an arrow +1 and recover a normal arrow), magical projectiles are recovered degraded (e.g.: you shoot an arrow +2 and recover an arrow +1, you shoot an arrow +1 and recover a normal arrow...).

This mod has a perverse effect that you'll discover if you have arrows larded...
This mod is only compatible with Easy Tutu, not BG1Tutu.
iiSpell System Adjustment
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

igi

This little mod changes the mechanics of spell casting, allowing profane and divine magic users to regain spells without needing to rest. It allows a new way of playing: mages and priests can be played as a more flexible wizard class, and new tactics are possible, as spells can become available in the middle of a battle.
You can customize the delay for recovering a spell, from recovering a spell only if the incantation has succeeded or even if it has failed (e.g. if it has been interrupted). All by spell level. Likewise, optional components allow you to determine in the same way how much XP you earn by casting spells.
Note that this mod can seriously affect the game and also applies to enemy spellcasters. With a mod like Sword Coast Stratagems, enemy mages will - unconsciously - use this spell recovery to their advantage.

Hence the final warning: as timers work even during the effect of a Stop Time spell, too short a delay can stop time forever! I would therefore warn you against delays of less than 40 for level 9 spells. A reasonable delay for them is between 5 minutes (240) and 40 minutes (1920), which should correspond to 8 hours of play.
iiTweak
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

IWD

IWD2

igi

This mod is a collection of adjustments for IE games. Only those relevant to your game will be available for installation. Don't forget that some of them may be considered unbalanced if you're not careful. For example, you can remove spell opposition schools, pre-requisite characteristics or alignments for choosing a class or pairing up, racial modifications, allow all merchants to buy stolen items...

Don't forget that this mod is really, really old, and outdated by most other Tweaks packs.

Requires: Improved Anvil
Improved Integration of tipun's IWD mods
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Subtledoctor

This mod is designed to work with tipun's IWD1-IWD2-EET mods. It allows you to play the mod more freely by letting you choose to influence the difficulty or experience gain during new campaigns, allowing you to start earlier in the game.

Please note that the order in which mods are installed is particularly important.
Improved movement speed outside of combat
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

This little comfort mod allows the party to move faster as long as they don't see any enemies, using an ability that can be switched on and off. Designed for EE games, it is also compatible with oBG2 provided you have installed TobEx.

It is now obsolete and has been integrated as the Increase party movement speed outside combat component of mod The Tweaks Anthology.
Improved Shamanic Dance
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

One of the most important features of the Shaman class is the Shamanic Dance, which allows the Shaman to summon allied spirits indefinitely to fight at his side. However, in the original version, the Shaman is practically disabled while dancing. This mod improves on this ability by allowing the Shaman to move at reduced speed while dancing, albeit with a few constraints. Shamanic Dance can be enhanced by several optional components. The last component scatters a few shamanic items around the game.
Improved Summons
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Wu Min

Are you the type to send an army of cannon fodder to attack your enemies? Looking for more powerful solar? Would you like to summon spectators instead of those ridiculous carrion worms? Do you prefer vampires to wivernes and wish your undead were a bit stronger? This mod is for you!

Warning: This mod overrides spells and is therefore incompatible with mods that modify vanilla spells.
Incompatible with: IWDification, Spell Revisions, Sword Coast Stratagems
Increased Rate of Banter
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

Tresset

For each character, banters have a 10% chance of being cast every 10 minutes. For some players, this is too rare. This mod corrects this by setting the probabilities to 100% every 7 minutes. Another mod on the same page offers an even faster setting.

This mod is obsolete, prefer the more efficient Banter Accelerator for Enhanced Edition games.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Infamy
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

wolpak

This mod improves the reputation system. Firstly, it's temporary and drops/rises regularly to 10.Secondly, charisma is much more important, and every 2 points above or below 10 increases/decreases average charisma by 1.Thirdly, bad reputation gives the same bonus in stores as good reputation.Fourthly, neutral companions won't like it if you're too good or too bad.
Fifthly, if companions want to leave you because you're too good/too bad, charisma comes into play: each bonus reputation point is subtracted from the maximum the companion can bear: with the charisma of a god, no companion will ever leave you, even if they grumble.Sixthly, the number of companions you can have also depends on your charisma: don't expect to have 5 companions if you have the charisma of a mussel.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Infinite Spells for BG2EE/EET
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

EET

evzhy

This book, to be given at the console or with EE Keeper, lets you cast any arcane or clerical spell at will, or give yourself permanent abilities such as Enchain, UAI or KaÃ¯.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Initiative
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

temnix

This mod introduces an initiative system adapted from the AD&D paper game to Infinity Engine games. It works as follows: 2 seconds after the start of a fight, a random range of bonuses and penalties is applied to the group, allies and enemies. They affect movement, weapon and casting speeds, speeding them up or slowing them down, sometimes slightly, sometimes radically. Changes last one round, followed by 2 seconds of "free time", and so on until the end of the fight.
Inns, Stores & Taverns (Tweaks)
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Jarl

Link
This is a collection of small adjustments for inns, stores and taverns:
- Adjustment of inn room categories and rates to the descriptions in "Volo's Guide to the Sword Coast".
- Restriction of the ability to identify magic items to certain specialized stores in BG:EE. Another component takes care of the SoD part.
- The merchant on the 2nd floor of the Song of the Elf tavern is a fence and now buys stolen items.
- Bandit merchants and fences ignore the group's low reputation (BG:EE/SoD only).
Instant Trap spells
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Tresset

Are you tired of your Skull Traps, Glyphs, and Symbols taking forever to explode? Do you ever place one of these traps where you know your enemy is going to walk only to have them walk right past it without it blowing up? Then after you kill your enemy do you have to disarm the trap that failed to blow up before you move on by sending your tank in to sit on it until if finally decides it will blow up? If you answered yes to any of these questions then this is the mod for you! With the Instant Trap Spells mod these problems are no more!

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

This mini mod converts invisibility rings into potions so that they can be activated from quick item slots. They recharge daily.

Interactive Tweaks

Item Randomiser
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Wisp

Tired of knowing (and therefore metagaming) that the Arcane Ring lies at the foot of Friendly Arm? Or that you can find a suit of ankheg armor warm in a field in Nashkel? Bring something new and unexpected to your games with this mod! It randomizes the position of the items you can find in BG1 and BG2 (up to several hundred in each opus).
It has two installation modes: mode 1 (randomize by scripts) lets you assign the position of items to each new game. Mode 2 (randomize by WeiDU) does this when the mod is installed, and is therefore less flexible, but it affects more items and is more reliable, so is recommended.
It must be installed AFTER all mods that move items or add new ones. For compatibility with other mods, please refer to readme.

Unlike other mods, all components in the random options group must be installed BEFORE the main component.
IWD Tweak Pack
ğŸŸ¥âğŸ˜€

IWD

Team

Idobek

CamDawg

Andyr

This mod allowed you to make a thousand and one small adjustments to the game. You could make purely aesthetic changes (such as masking helmets on avatars...) or rule changes (maximum HP at each level change, removing traps...) and make certain game mechanics more flexible (unlimited stacking of ammunition, gems, potions, scrolls, bottomless containers, automatic item identification...).

It is now obsolete and has been replaced by The Tweaks Anthology.
IWD Victor's Improvements Pack
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Victor Georgiev

This mod modifies several rules (race characteristics, weapons usable by all), increases the knowledge score of mages and raises the sneak attack multiplier to x6 at level 26.

Ã‰crase ABRACEAD.2DA, BACKSTAB.2DA et LORE.2DA.
IWD2 Tweak pack
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Team

the bigg

Andyr

Idobek

Adapted for IWD 2 from BG2's Tweak Pack, this mod allowed us to make a thousand and one small adjustments to the game: fixed bugs, cosmetic modifications, easier inventory management with capacity bags and unlimited ammunition stacks. For example, it allowed you to save or rest wherever you wanted, or automatically pause when a dialog was triggered... Most of these changes were aimed at removing the most annoying aspects of the game engine.

It is now obsolete and has been replaced by The Tweaks Anthology.
Jacob's Ladder
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod aims to penalize characters who transgress their ethics, such as paladins or lurkers. There's no question of slaughtering the innocent on pain of disgrace. A scale of degradation is applied, from the loss of certain powers to the loss of your status (you become a fighter, or even a black knight). Of course, there is a system of redemption...

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which is often not the case... This one is no exception: the game crashes when you start an IWD:EE game. For this game, you'll need to install it after creating your group. Install at your own risk.
Jarl's Tweak Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Jarl

Link
Formerly Jarl's BGT TweakPack, this mod offers a collection of tweaks for BGT, BG:EE and EET. It lets you give Bioware NPCs their BG2 portraits and sound sets in the BG part, change the color of their avatars, modify their stats, profiles or classes (BGT only), alignments and martial skills (BGT). In BGT, components can be used to give new equipment to certain NPCs, and to add new weapons to the game. Finally, you can make certain adjustments to the game, such as being able to enter the Nashkel cemetery, having to find a special skull for the MÃ©licamp quest...

The second link features a fix by Jastey.
Jastey's Tweaks for SoD and EET
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

jastey

This collection of tweaks is intended for the SoD part of BG:EE (except for the last component, which allows you to use Imoen's SoD portrait in BG2):
- Final judgment decision regardless of the PJ's answers: release is always favored over escape if the PJ's actions allow it.
- Trigger romance dialogs regardless of the areas you have to pass through. You can also put NPC interactions on hold if they are not in the party in the areas concerned. Skip the Korlasz dungeon and go straight to the ducal palace without breaking the fourth wall.
- Choose additional dialogs and prevent quest deadlocks.
- Restore the scripted combat from the kidnapping scene at the end of SoD.
- Choose character XP at the start of SoD (65,000, 90,000, 125,000 or 161,000).
- And much more...

Smeagolheart

This mod adds magical tomes to Baldur's Gate. These tomes can assign a kit to your character or an NPC. You can obtain these tomes either by purchasing them from the merchant Panver outside the Friendly Arm, or as a reward for a new quest (in this case, Panver will be in the Elf's Song inn at Baldur's Gate).

klatu Tweaks and Fixes
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

IWDEE

klatu

This mod offers a collection of adjustments. It is modular and contains content, gameplay and cosmetic fixes. Please read its readme carefully before installing its components.

The Github version corrects a few errors, so give it preference.

Installation of Generalized Biffing is highly recommended.
This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
Konalan's Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Konalan

This mod offers a collection of adjustments. It is modular and contains profile fixes, item fixes, fun additions and rule changes. Please read its readme carefully before installing its components.
It includes the old mods Butter Knife of Balduran, Rod of Refuge and Konalan's Wizard Slayer Enhancements, by the same author.

Some people have managed to install it on BG2:EE, but it wasn't coded for. So, if you try it on an EE game, do so at your own risk!
KontinuÃ¡lnÃ­ sesÃ­lÃ¡nÃ­ kouzel (really force casting)
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

drake127

Link
A mod that gives permanent chaining to party mages. Files to be copied into the override, then code to be typed at the console.

To apply the effect to the main character only: CLUAConsole:CreateCreature("cz_alcrp") To apply the effect to all spellcasters in the group: CLUAConsole:CreateCreature("cz_alcrx").
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2004. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

BGT

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Deratiseur

This mod lets you change the class xp table. You can grant the same xp table to all classes (your choice) AND/OR grant the xp table you want to the class you want.

If you install an infinite xp option from another mod after Levelling Changer, you will WRITE OUT and cancel the changes made by Levelling Changer.
Lichdom
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Daniel Valle

Across realms and planes, many have already become Liches or Half-Liches in one way or another. Perhaps they sought immortality. Perhaps they were tired of having to eat and breathe. Maybe they were tired of being frozen, stunned, sick, entangled, drained, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, polymorphing into a squirrel, stunned... Whatever their reasoning, with this mod, you too can become a Lich with the help of Gravetender Morris in the Athkatla Graveyard District (SoA) or in Saradush (ToB).
But wanting it isn't enough. You have to pay the price (120,000 PO), be at least level 12, have the right alignment, pass a series of quests and so on. To become a lich for good, you need to be physically immune to non-magical weapons, poison, cold and electricity... See the readme for more details.

The mod features a whole host of components for configuring the lich you want to be.
Life in Low Relief
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

This mod claims to make travel on maps more realistic, simulating the effects of topography and ground conditions on speed.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
Lol's RezMod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Lollorian

This pack brings together several older mods converted to WeiDU format and offered as stand-alone components:
- Masamune sword mini-mini-quest (from ShadowDaemon): a small quest that stretches all the way to ToB will allow you to forge a hellish sword.
- Improved Anarg (from knightlight): Anarg, leader of the Fallen Paladins, has a helmet that makes him immune to many effects, making him tougher to neutralize. But the reward will be worth the risks taken...
- Extended Ionic Stone animations (from WoRm): Ionic stones added by many mods will benefit from stone animations revolving around their owner's head.
- Plus other comfort components...

This little mod adds knowledge bonuses to your main character as you learn and adventure through the game. The bonuses (and the stimuli that provide them) are, by design, intended to be minor and to enhance the role-playing aspect of the game. You can customize the installation by modifying the customize.tpa file.

Macholy's Living-Mod
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BGT

Macholy

This is one of Macholy's three mods designed to make the game more realistic. It provides a system of rules allowing characters to eat and drink. Without this, their constitution will diminish over time.

It requires installation of the Kitchen component of the Macholy's Tweak Pack mod.

Made in Heaven - Meta-Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Angel

Meta-Mod is a rather personal mod used by its author that corrects files installed by other mods to fix known bugs and resolve inter-mod conflicts. It also contains a component that cleans up files left behind by mod unpacking, such as setup-xxx.exe files on a non-Windows system.
Made in Heaven: Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Angel

This mod offers a collection of small modifications for BG:EE and BG2:EE that should be compatible with the original BG2, BGT and EET. It allows you to apply alternative damage to large creatures (larger or smaller, depending on the weapon), limit the number of charges for wands (6) and scepters (12), apply level-dependent malus to spell saving throws, and modify tables depending on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution so that bonuses start at 12. This mod is part of the "Made in Heaven" series (with items, spells and quests).
Mages Can Specialize
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

temnix

Standard magicians can specialize afterwards (and keep in their spellbook any spells forbidden by their new specialization).
Magic Battles Revised
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Subtledoctor

A revision of the very old Mage Duel mod, this mod strives to shorten magical battles and make them more enjoyable and sensitive. It is aimed at those who find Sword Coast Stratagems battles far too long and complicated, as well as those who find unmodded battles too easy or a little incoherent. It therefore strives to make defenses against spells useful, preserving the idea that magic users can be very powerful, even temporarily invincible, while giving opposing mages effective tools to overcome this invincibility and allow magic battles to be resolved fairly quickly, decisively and satisfactorily.
Rest assured, the objective remains the same: attack the spell defenses until they disappear, then attack the mage.
This mod must be installed after spell mods such as Spell Revisions, IWDification and Sword Coast Stratagems.
Magic Store of Vergadain
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

The game contains a large number of stores to suit your needs. However, returning to a store can be time-consuming, or sometimes not even possible. This mod allows you to acquire a magical artifact that will give you the means to go to any store you've visited in the past. To get your hands on this unique artifact, you'll need to complete a short quest.

Mana Based Spell System
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

MaxTeamBG

Basically, this mod implements a mana-based system in BG2. You can store spells at any time by pressing the V key. You can see how many mana points you have left by pressing N. When your mana points drop below 0, you suffer a penalty and can't cast any more spells until you rest. Spells remove as many mana points as their casting level. The casting of very low-level spells is now allowed in Athkatla, as long as they do not cause enough disruption for the Council of Six to be alarmed.

C'est un mod qui date de 2004 qui Ã©crase de nombreux sorts ainsi que leurs descriptions.

Mod Hospitality
âš ï¸âŒğŸ˜€

BGT

Starn

This mod increases hostel prices by taking the following factors into account: location, size, competition, standing, security. As a result, it becomes much more difficult to spend the night in the cities, unless you want to sleep in the sewers. Room categories have also been redefined. An inn that looks like a cheap bar no longer offers the Noble or Royal room category. Other inns, which visually have no rooms at all, can no longer accommodate overnight stays and have been transformed into taverns.

This mod has disappeared from https://www.baldurs-gate.de/index.php?threads/mod-hospitality.40128/.
Available in ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª.
Mod Pregnancy
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Lassal

To become pregnant, players of both sexes must take part in 'love adventures' with male characters from the Romantic Encounters MOD for Baldur's Gate II mod. If the player becomes pregnant, the baby will be born after 9 months.

Party AI must be activated.
Requires: Romantic Encounters MOD for Baldur's Gate II

Monk Overhaul
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Kish

Prismo

Did you like the High-level monk abilities component of the Oversight mod? Then this mod is for you: it takes its content and makes it compatible with EE games. It replaces the monk's table of high-level abilities (which was that of fighters) with one inspired by those used by Balthazar in ToB: Shadowless Kick, Tiger Strike, Dracon Fist, Faster Than The Eye, Flip Resistances, Solar Stance, Lunar Stance, Shadow Stance, Feet of the Wind and Second Wind.

The "Monk's Fist Revision" component, which modifies their power progression table, only works on EE.
Only the last download link contains the French translation. Its version is also compatible with the original BG2 game.
Monk Tweak
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Ardanis

This mini-mod was to implement the D&D rule, unused by the game, whereby monks with great wisdom receive armor class bonuses. They were therefore to receive a bonus to AC identical to that conferred by the Dexterity table.

Unfortunately, the code is not optimized and has a few bugs.
Monsters Beat Enchantment
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This little mod modifies the protection system against monster weapons and what they can hit. From now on, depending on their level, monsters will be able to hit other creatures or characters protected against a certain level of weapon enchantment. For example, a dragon can hit a mage protected against magic weapons.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired... Install at your own risk.
Morrow Gate
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

aWoundedLion

This is a compilation of existing profiles and profile modifications, based largely on priest classes (lurkers, druids). It includes Natural Selection, which modifies druid profiles and adds a new one, the Sombrelian. The Arcanic Archer and Hellion Fighter profiles are also included in this mod, along with changes for fallen paladins and clerics, druids and a quest for the fortified tower of Kalah for evil characters. This list is not exhaustive, as this mod also includes adjustments to the old Twist Pack mod, so be sure to read the readme to familiarize yourself with all its components.

Multi-class Multikit Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Crevs Daak

FlameWing

Ever wanted to play an Anti-Paladin/Necromancer/Assassin? A Kensai/Transmutator/Bounty Hunter? A Berserker/Priest of Talos? Or perhaps even a Barbarian/Entropist/Adventurer? Well, now it's possible, and you can play a multi-class character with multiple kits.
Inherited from FlameWing's Multikit mod (SHS link), this mod creates as many multi-kits as you like from the kits you select during installation. Once in the game, activate Party AI and apply the multi-kit to your character by pressing the "K" key.
It should be installed after all mods that add new profiles or modify their abilities. This ensures that all the profiles you've installed can be used to create multi-kits, as well as ensuring that their abilities match.
The icing on the cake is that the multikits.tp2 file created during installation can be used by modders to add multi-kits to their mods.

Please note: Only the GitHub version is compatible with EE games.
Multistronghold components
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BG2EE

DavidW

This mod externalizes the Make all strongholds available component of Sword Coast Stratagems. In particular, it allows you to choose which stronghold is available instead of allowing all of them.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2013. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Natural Selection
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

aWoundedLion

Link
The aim of this mod is to improve the Druid's class and kits and make him a viable alternative to having a cleric in your party by adding new spells. Each part of the mod is optional to allow maximum flexibility.

Click on the second link to download the file.

Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.
New travel system between Baldur's Gate City areas
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

SoD

EET

Zed Nocear

Link
This mini-mod modifies the system of travel within the city of Baldur's Gate and between the two parts of Balduran Island, replacing the use of the world map with integrated accesses to each area (such as those inside dungeons or buildings). The new way of traveling is more natural. The party exits an area to appear at a parallel location to the nearest one, and not always at the same fixed point of entry as before. The other advantage of this system is access to two small areas of Baldur's Gate, which were otherwise inaccessible (an optional component allows you to install displacement only for these two areas).
Travel is instantaneous, without the use of the main map, and the party can only go to a bordering location. For example, if you want to go from the Elf's Song Tavern to the Hall of Wonders, you'll need to cross all the areas between the eastern and western sections of the town, via the inner town gate. The main map only appears if you pass through the eastern city gate.
ASTUCE: The route through the sewers can considerably speed up travel in Baldur's Gate.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
NMR-HAPPY Patch
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Macholy

This mod strives to make relationships between NPCs much easier to manage, and thus avoid conflicts.

Please note: It is now obsolete and has been replaced by the Party NPCs don't fight component from The Tweaks Anthology.
No Banter
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

igi

No Banter is a small mod for Baldur's Gate 2 that disables in-game banter. While banter can be immersive and revealing, it can also break immersion. How likely is it that party members will strike up a conversation while exploring a dark and forbidding dungeon? Or sneaking into an enemy fortress? Or disguising themselves in a drow fortress?
No Critical Misses
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

As its name suggests, this mini-mod removes all critical failures from the game. It's up to you to decide, but since EE games allow modders to create nice effects on critical failure, it would be a shame to do without it...

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.
No Fences
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

ikonomov

This mod disables the ability to sell stolen items (to merchants only) in BG2. Items pickpocketed from NPCs can still be sold as normal. The margin value of the Amkethran smugglers' store is also fixed.

ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BCaesar

This mod removes race restrictions for all classes.

Unfortunately, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. By his own admission, he's not proud of it. Prefer other mods, or simply the components of The Tweaks Anthology that remove racial restrictions.

Prefer more sophisticated mods such as The Tweaks Anthology.

Abel

This mod integrates and updates the "Restore Random Treasures" component of Unfinished Business for Icewind Dale so that it works on IWDEE and features a component that makes random treasures no longer random. Instead, the player gets all possible rewards and even more if the first component is installed.

EET

DymeDef

NPC Generator
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Argent77

Have you ever regretted that the game only lets you create an initial party consisting of the protagonist and (with some effort) a small number of additional characters? Not anymore! This mod lets you install pre-generated or exported characters as ordinary NPCs. You can meet them at predetermined locations, where you have the option of inviting them into your party or having them follow you without occupying a place in the party, at any time during the game. NPCs sent back can be instructed to wait or return to the original meeting place.
NPC Opine Again
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

temnix

This mod allows party characters to be heard more regularly when the group's reputation differs from their moral alignment, before the breaking point.
Olvyn's Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

PST

PSTEE

Olvyn Churu

This mod offers a collection of 24 adjustments for most EE games: dividing the total amount of quest XP by the number of party members, removing the two-point martial skill limit at character creation, allowing fighters to acquire martial skill points faster, allowing shamans to move when they dance, clerics and monks reach level 9 with only 160000 XP, paladins and lurkers cast spells at their level, use cursed scrolls against enemies, increase the movement speed of all creatures, access certain areas through previously forbidden passages, award 5 points in certain types of combat...

Although PsTEE compatible, most components do not install.
One-handed crossbows
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

temnix

This mod modifies light crossbows to make them usable one-handed, so they can be combined with a shield.

Choose the Functional Weapon Tweaks from SubtleD's Item Tweaks.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Oops the magician
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Deratiseur

Oops is a very special character: he has the ability to change a spell scroll into a special ability. In concrete terms, bring Oops the scroll of the spell you'd like to have as a special ability 1x/day, pay him 10,000 po per level of the desired spell, you lose the scroll but you gain a new ability. You'll find Oops next to the Watcher's keep, to the south-west. It is designed to be accessible in both SOA and TOB.
The mod also handles grimoires drawn from other mods like L'interplan, Semi Multi Clerics, Wild Mage Additions.
Out, Brief Candlekeep!
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

temnix

This little mod limits the time you can spend in Candlekeep to 1 hour before leaving. After that, you're in for a nasty surprise.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired.
Oversight
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Kish

This mod contains numerous components. It corrects errors in the way the alignments and classes of many of the game's characters have been coded (note that the BG2 FixPack already includes most of these alignment corrections). It replaces the monks' high-level ability table (which was that of fighters) by granting them Balthazar's instead. Monks can now access the Priest's quest instead of the Warrior's. It replaces the Sendai fight, the only fight not improved by Ascension, with a much more difficult one. Finally, a new paladin kit, the Sacred Liberator, is available.
P5Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

pro5

This mod is a small collection of various adjustments and modifications that prevent the destruction of items when petrified, disintegrated, imprisoned or frozen to death. Possessed items are no longer lost, but fall to the ground. It also restores the music during the fight between Irenicus and the Shadow Thieves on the Waukeen's Promenade (removed in ToB), and increases spear damage and range.
Parangon Mode

shadowlich

This mod gives you access to high difficulty level contents without the insanely damage increase and others non RPG effects.
Parting Ways
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BGT

berelinde

This little mod lets you re-recruit NPCs you've left out of your group. You can decide the conditions under which they'll leave forever: either if they're seriously unhappy, or if they've reached the point of no return. For modders, these are the variables SERIOUSLY_UNHAPPY and BREAKING_POINT.
Passive Warrior HLAs
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Thor Thunderfist

The high-level abilities (HLAs) introduced by Throne of Bhaal add a complexity and micromanagement that runs counter to the role of fighters, characters who have remained relatively passive participants in combat for the majority of the 2 games.
This mod aims to reduce the complexity of fighter HLAs by transforming them into passive bonuses.

Pathfinder Hit Dice
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWDEE

Reddbane

This mini-mod modifies the life dice of mages, wizards, thieves and bards to Pathfinder values: 1d6 for mages and wizards, 1d8 for thieves, bards and dragon disciples. Multi-class tables have also been adjusted. New tables here.
On installation, you have four options: Normal Rolls for unmodded games, Average Rolls if you have installed the component Higher HP on Level Up: Average Rolls from The Tweaks Anthology (average result of modified life dice), Maximum Rolls if you have installed the component Higher HP on Level Up: Maximum Rolls from The Tweaks Anthology (maximum roll of modified life dice) and Ideal Average Rolls, an option preferred by the mod author (average roll +1).

The last optional component Changing class descriptions is not compatible with IWD:EE and with games installed in French.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Perilous Streets
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

This mod brings great insecurity to the streets of major cities (mainly Baldur's Gate and Athkatla): during the day, pickpockets will rob you, and cutthroats will attack you at night.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of these mods leaves much to be desired. And this is the worst of them all. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk, as it undoubtedly breaks all compatibility with other mods.
Pick Up Your Bed and Go
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

temnix

All dormant npcs in the game will react to your interactions (attack, pickpocket, etc.) by shouting, leaving the room or attacking you. The mod also adds items or gold to the pockets of sleepers, so that skilled thieves will find it worthwhile to disturb them.

Planetouched Races
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

rapsam2003

PnP Free Action
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

Miloch

This mod guarantees that free-action effects will not prevent movement speed bonuses, and will only cancel the movement penalties of immobilization, webbing, entanglement and other effects. As a result, you'll be able to equip speed boots and the Free Action ring and still benefit from their effects, as intended by the paper rules. This mod also corrects various bugs and malfunctions in the effects of free action, haste and slowness, affecting items, spells and creatures in the game.
PnP Kit Requirements, Half-Orcs, Spells and Charisma
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

Felinoid

This small mod modifies the profile prerequisites, half-orc race, spell progression and Charisma score modification tables to bring them into line with the paper rules.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
PnP Potions
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Luke

This mod uses the potion accumulation system of the paper rules. When you drink a potion while another is still active, the following may happen:
- 1% chance of exploding (5d10 fire damage to the drinker, + 1d10 fire damage within 5').
- 2% chance of dying instantly from poisoning.
- 5% chance of losing 1 point of Strength and Dexterity.
- 7% chance of cancelling/removing all effects of the active potion.
- 10% chance of the potion doing nothing.
- 10% chance that the potion's effectiveness will be halved. 8% chance that the potion's effectiveness will be increased by 50%. 1% chance that the potion's effectiveness will be permanent or doubled. Permanent potions, such as healing potions, are considered to remain in effect for 1 turn (60 seconds) after consumption. Consequently, there is no risk in using 1 oil and 1 potion, since the oils are applied to the skin, not consumed, and therefore do not mix.

The translation has been automated, and requires at least a good proofreading.
PnPTweaks
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

BluePear

This little mod offers optional components that modify healing spells and potions according to AD&D rules. It also increases resurrection costs in temples and item identification in stores.

The last update was in 2017. It is unclear whether this mod will work with the latest patches.

BG2EE

kjeron

This fix prevents poisoned weapons from bypassing stone skins and mirror images.

Polytope

EET

temnix

This mod introduces the notion of private property to the Saga: most items you pick up from private homes or official buildings will be considered stolen and rejected by most merchants. Only fences will accept them, but there aren't many of them.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk.

CamDawg

Project Javelin introduces a new class of weaponry to the game in the form of javelins: one-handed spears that can be throw or used in melee. They use the existing spear proficiency, providing a boost to a somewhat neglected class of weapons.

This mod is still in progress.
Protagonist can die
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Blash2

Usually, the game ends when the protagonist dies. This mini-mod prevents this from happening, so the game won't end as long as a member of the party is still alive. Otherwise, the protagonist can be resurrected by the party.

Author's note: `Try to resurrect Charname as soon as possible, to avoid problems. Install at own risk.

Argent77

This mod removes the protagonist, so that Imoen can finally take his rightful place in the game. For this reason, the mod provides a "slightly" modified start to the BG1 and BG2 parts of the game series. The game expansions (ToB and SoD) have not been modified.

Author's note: It should not be installed for a serious walkthrough.

This mod adds 19 modifications and improvements that make PsT easier to use or correct certain problems that are not considered bugs: dialog gas pedal (HIGHLY recommended), BG2-style TAC0 display, stackable rings, charms, bracelets and scrolls, quick save/quick reload (not recommended), urban area exploration, Ladder of Souls, save Nordom!minimum stats disabled, life points gained per level maximized for Nameless and group, Friendship spell effect maximized, no battle music, widespread use of floating text font, identification of all items, Glabrezu appears at the start of the game, Power Action Leprechaun Annah, The Ultimate Easter Egg (Morte), rest in any area (not recommended), Tome o' Cheats (not recommended) and Dustman Robe.

bucketfulofsunshine

Rebalancing Vorpal effects
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Polytope

With this mini-mod, the vorpal effect of weapons will be triggered on a % of hits varying according to the weapon, but only affecting those at 50% hit points or less. This reduces the margin of safety you have when meleeing with a vorpal-armed enemy, compared to a creature of comparable damage without this ability, but does not make it a tactical impediment if your saving throw against death fails or if you risk being hit in one shot as was previously the case.
Recharge Wands
ğŸŸ¢âğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

Allbrother

This mod lets you recharge wands at any time with either gold (cheaper than buying/selling) or xp. To do so, right-click on the wand in the inventory and click on the "Recharge Wand" button. A dialog box will open with the cost displayed, allowing you to confirm.
Refinements
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

T.G.Maestro

Subtledoctor

the bigg

This mod was designed to bring various improvements to BG2 rules. Among the components: a profile (Sword Angel); a rebalancing of shapeshifters in a more reasonable way than Ease-of-Use Mod Collection; armor refinement with weight consideration, failure on profane spells and thief skills; and finally completely remodeled HLAs to make them more unique to each class and profile.

Originally published in the [Spellhold Studios] forum(https://www.shsforums.net/files/category/31-refinements/), this mod is now maintained on GitHub by an independent modder. However, this new version is no longer compatible with BG1Tutu.
Regain Rangerhood / Paladinhood Cheatmod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

jastey

This mod restores the PC's class/kit if he has fallen as a Ranger or Paladin. The reputation of the party is simultaneously raised to 10 if it is lower than 10.
This is a cheat mod to revers and unwanted oversight. It is meant not to be installed until you want to correct a fallen ranger/paladin PC in your game.
Relationship
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Macholy

This is one of three Macholy mods designed to make the game more realistic. It adds a new system that defines the relationship between the protagonist and the members of the group. At any time, you can start a friendship with any of the game's NPCs. In the original game, many enemies called on their allies for help. Now, if your relationship with the enemy's ally is good enough, he won't help your enemy attack you.
The mod also includes updated behavior for dragons, pets, bystanders and many other creatures.

EET

This mod makes the hlas inaccessible to heroes. Enemies can still use them. Just like in IWDEE.

Remove Specialist Restrictions mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PSTEE

Mirrorman95

This little mod aims to make PsT:EE's few items and dialog options with class specialization restrictions also available to players with sufficiently high levels in these classes. Thus, tattoos formerly reserved for double-specialized mages can be purchased by any player with a mage level of at least 12, and weapons reserved for single-specialized fighters can be purchased by any player with a fighter level of at least 7, and so on.

Allbrother

This mini-mod installs a new system for recovering spells and abilities inspired by PoE2. Spells and abilities are now retrieved every two rounds outside combat. It does, however, have one annoying side-effect: fatigue effects disappear completely!

Resurection mod
ğŸŸ¢âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

Yarpen

Link
This mod removes Resurrection from the game (spells like the scepter) and replaces it with a spell that has a 20-40% chance of working (depending on caster level) and a 10% chance of destroying the body. A component increases the price of resurrection services in temples by 1,000 gold coins per level of the deceased (ie: +15K for a lvl 15 character). Another fact is that elves cannot be resurrected (Aerie / Viconia / Haer'dalis).

Fichier ResurectionMod.zip.
Available in ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±.

Ribald's Genie
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

dragon_lord

Tired of slogging through half the adventure map and taking an hour to get back to the Adventurer Mart to spend your hard-earned pennies? From now on, once you've spoken to him five times, Ribald will give you a flute that allows you to summon a genie. He can teleport you directly to the Adventurer Mart (or summon Ribald) to trade, and return you to your original destination if you wish. Unfortunately, the genie cannot be summoned during chapter 5 (nor in Suldanessellar or Hell). Nor can he be summoned in the Haer'Dalis planar prison or in the demonic plane to which the Planar Sphere leads you.

For an EE game, use the second download link provided by Deratiseur.
Once the portal is open, you MUST use it in the opposite direction to deactivate it. If you don't do this and walk out of the area, the portal stays in place and you can't create another one.
Fichier Ribalds%20Genie%20V2.7.exe.
Riklaunim's Crazy Remixes (Szalone Remixy)
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Riklaunim

Link
This mod offers a whole collection of rule adjustments: it modifies spells protecting against magical weapons, replaces certain creature species with others (sand golem, vampires...), makes the fanatics who want to burn Viconia stronger, and adds recruitable NPCs (but without any dialog!).

Fichier Szalone_Remiksy_v2.5.zip.
Road to Discovery for SoD
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

EET

Team

jastey

Lauriel

Link
This mod is designed for the SoD campaign. It has two purposes:
- For players, it aims to make coalition forces aware of Caelar and Hephernaan's plans, focusing on the crusade's main project and the danger it represents, and to give response options with which the PJ can inform coalition forces of ongoing events. To this end, all the information the PJ can gather during the campaign is tracked and evaluated. The diary entries give an overview of the information the PJ has already gathered. Overall, this mod is meant to connect the dots so that the PJ is able to recount all the information he has gathered, and so that coalition officers recognize and react concretely to the real danger(s).
- For modders, it introduces a variable-based tracking system for the different levels of knowledge the PC and coalition officers acquire throughout the campaign, which could be used for their mods, for example to fine-tune their NPCs' reactions to the quality of information acquired about Caelar, Hephernaan, the crusade...
Among the SoD campaign information this mod takes into account: What is the main purpose of the crusade proclaimed by Caelar, and what is it really about? What truth lies behind Caelar's proclamation - and his crusaders' belief - that Caelar protects the crusade with the "divine powers of the pantheon"? What is the background to Caelar's life and family, and how does it influence his motivations? Is Caelar an offspring of Bhaal? What are Hephernaan's plans?
Rogue Rebalancing
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

aVENGER

This mod modifies the gameplay for Baldur's Gate 2: Throne of Bhaal and strives to bring the roublard classes (bards and thieves) and their respective profiles closer to their AD&D P&P counterparts. It comprises several components, all of which can be installed separately and are completely independent of each other.
RR updates the two-weapon combat skills of thieves and bards, revises/improves their profiles, revises their high-level abilities, restores the appropriate racial adjustments for thief abilities, as well as the PnP spell progression table specific to bards.
It also makes the confrontation with the Shadow Thieves guild in chapter 3 much more difficult, and adds additional items for thieves and bards (in the Thieves guild), as well as an encounter with Cyric worshippers in chapter 6.

No longer maintained for several years, it is based on an obsolete version of Detectable Spells that may create incompatibilities.
Incompatible with: Might & Guile
Rough World
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

elminster

The concept of this mod is to make the world more violent. Characters with low reputations are considered absolutely horrible human beings - so there's very little chance of them helping anyone. When they do, it's considered an exceptional act. As a result, they are now less likely to donate to improve their reputation than characters with a good reputation. Merchants are also inclined to give them discounts, if only to make sure they're not offended.
Similarly, because the world is a dark and merciless place, characters with high reputations are seen in a much more positive light. People are more willing to forgive them if they make a mistake (such as killing a town resident).
The mod also includes other components that significantly alter the way Chapter 7 is handled in the game, or increase the game's difficulty.

It must be installed before Enhanced Edition Trilogy.
This mod is still in progress.
Round counter
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

semiticgod

This little mod allows you to count the number of rounds elapsed during a fight. To do this, you need to drink a potion, and the "counter" will start the next time you see an enemy.

It requires console code to create the potion...
Sarevok57's Mega Icewind Dale Mod
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

IWDEE

Sarevok57

This mod adds voices for all npcs in the game, new music and new items. It modifies numerous rules and revises the items, spells and tactics used by monsters. It also adds a number of spicy new battles.

This is an override mod that modifies the majority of the game's files and is only compatible with version 1.4 of the game. It does not work with version 2.6+ and is incompatible with all other mods. What's more, its installation method is complicated. In short... avoid it.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Sequencer Memory
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€
