Cirerrek

CamDawg

This little script lets players remember what they've saved in their spell sequencers and triggers. Please see readme for more details.
Shadow Magic
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

AionZ

This mod adds a new magic school: the Shadow Web, created by Shar. You'll be able to play a Shadow Adapte with over 100 special spells. Remember that while shadow magic is more powerful than ordinary magic, it's also dangerous, draining the user's life force.
The main component installs the Shadow Adept (mage), Shadow Disciple (spellcaster) and Night Singer (bard) profiles, as well as magic school spells and exclusive pets.
He also has several optional components:
- Install Shadow Monk profile (physically weaker than an ordinary monk, he can stab in the back, drain hit points with melee attacks and cast a limited selection of Shadow Web spells).
- BG:EE: adds several encounters against Shadow Adepts and a new store selling items usable by Shadow Adepts. BG2:EE: modifies the Shadow Lord, who has a new ability for Shadow Adepts hungry for power and Shadow Web spells to make the encounter more difficult.
Shaman Hauler
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

In Baldur's Gate, Shamans can't move while dancing, and there are no beasts of burden in the game to carry them. However, there's nothing to prevent teammates from carrying them. To this end, the Shaman has access to a new ability that allows one of his teammates to carry the Shaman. The teammate in turn is given a new ability to drop the Shaman. Certain conditions must be met, such as the teammate's strength, proximity, etc.

Despite appearances, this mod looks well done.
This mod is included in Minor Kit Improvement by the same author.
Shield Bashing For Goodness
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

Allbrother

This mod makes all shields bash. In addition to whatever defensive bonuses they provide, now also do 1 attack per round as if you had a weapon in your offhand. They get strength bonus to damage, but not to thac0. And they have a chance to stun if the enemy fails a save vs death. Each type of shield gets different stats.
Shohy's customized adjustment platform
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

This mod modifies combat and spell casting. Enemies can now use innate abilities.
Shohy's Weapon Style Rebalance and Extra Ability Modifier
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

After studying numerous real-life armed battles, the author sought to rebalance the styles of two-handed weapons, sword and shield, single weapon and two-handed weapon, so that all weapon styles would be useful. Intelligence/Wisdom/Charisma also brings additional modifiers. All adjustments only take effect in combat. You can click on the mode change button on the protagonist's skill bar to activate or deactivate the mechanism. The button is obtained in the first battle.

This mod has disappeared from https://www.gibberlings3.net/forums/topic/37220-shohys-weapon-style-rebalance-and-extra-ability-modifier-v10/.

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Grammarsalad

This is a mod that adds a number of special abilities and thief-like skills to the game (for thieves and non-thieves). EEex is not required for most of the components in this mod, but it it generally recommended.
Skip Chateau Irenicus
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Argent77

Are you tired of running through the initial dungeon over and over again? Well, you won't need to! This mod allows you to avoid all the boring tasks of the Irenicus Dungeon. You can even collect all the items normally found there. Simply inspect the rubble of the destroyed building on the Waukeen's Promenade to collect them. As a bonus, you'll also earn experience points and maybe a little pocket money. "Skip Chateau Irenicus" has been designed as an alternative to the (infamous) Dungeon-Be-Gone mod, which offers a similar option, but in a way that is, to say the least, implausible.

Incompatible with: Dungeon-Be-Gone
Skitia's Romance Tweak for BG2:EE
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

Skitia

This mod adjusts BG2's original romances so that they're a little less harsh when you part with a romanced companion for a while. In particular, it makes changes to the romances of Aerie, Anomen, Viconia and Jaheira.
Slayer Revisions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

semiticgod

This mod creates a more balanced and interesting form of Slayer that all classes can benefit from (notably, you can now use any weapon while in Slayer Form). In addition, it modifies the abilities you get in BG1, making them more appropriate for a child of Bhaal. It also makes the bonuses of the nine hells more interesting and flexible: your alignment is no longer altered by your actions, and you get a more diverse range of bonuses... and penalties too. Blackrazor has also been revised: among other changes, it can now be used by any character, regardless of class.
Finally, if you have installed the Ascension mod, it also modifies the rewards of the Pocket Plane trials, which now strengthen the Slayer Form, making it increasingly frightening and powerful over time.

IWDEE

Grammarsalad

Smoke & Mirrors is a mod for IE engine games consisting of spells of the Divination and Illusion schools of magic for both arcane and divine casters. It's focusing on those two scools of magic because they are under represented in the IE games.

A small tweak to make traps laid by Thieves' Set Snare ability resistable by immunity to normal weapons.

Sniff
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

temnix

From now on, when you click on a dog or wolf, instead of ignoring or running away from you, it will move towards the nearest enemy. This also works with summoned dogs and wolves.
The second component modifies invisibility detection spells to a higher level, and makes invisibility more powerful: creatures whose invisibility is revealed become invisible again 3 seconds later.

SoD Banter Restoration
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

SoD

EET

Roxanne

This mod converts the main ongoing NPC banter during SoD into old-fashioned dialogs that interrupt the game and require player interaction. Around 80 longer conversations during SoD are thus restored and perhaps recognized by players for the first time.

This mod changes Siege of Dragonspear NPC banter (interaction) from the "on the fly" style used in SoD to the paused dialog format used in BG1 and BG2.

Please note: This mod is not compatible with EET.
This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
Solo with a Party!
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Zyraen

This mod allows you to play "solo" with up to 5 companions: every time a fight starts, all the companions are sent into a labyrinth. They are freed when the fight is over. Outside combat, you have access to dialogues, companion quests and romances.

You MUST have 5 companions for the mod script to work.
This mod is included in Zyraen's Miscellany, by the same author.

Spells & Magic
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Grammarsalad

Spontaneous Casting For Clerics and Druids
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Pecca

This mod allows clerics and druids to benefit from D&D 3e's spontaneous casting ability for healing, wounding and summoning spells. It works with BG:EE, BG2:EE, IWD:EE and EET. It should be compatible with other mods that add cleric and druid spells and profiles, provided it is installed after them.
Technically, it implements three innate abilities which, when activated, transform all the caster's memorized divine spells into healing, damaging or summoning spells of their respective levels. Good clerics receive spontaneous healing, bad clerics spontaneous wounding, and neutral clerics both. Druids receive spontaneous invocations. This lasts for 6 hours or until the chosen divine spell is cast, at which point all spells are retransformed.
Start to Finish
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod adds four new mechanisms to the game:
- A creature's weight affects the amount of time it can move once stopped.
- 3 rounds after stopping, most creatures begin to lose concentration and alertness. Their thac0, initiative for next attack, blast saving throw and visual range all decrease, depending on their Wisdom and Constitution.
- Halted creatures with at least 6 Intelligence points receive the "Jog" ability. When activated, they will move slightly faster for the next three turns. After this time, the "Run" ability allows you to spend one round preparing to go even faster, but only for two rounds. After that, the "Sprint" ability allows you to boost your speed for another round. Of course, at the end of a run or sprint, a certain amount of fatigue accumulates.
- Once a round, certain enemies will rush at the party at higher-than-normal speed, closing in faster and leaving less time to take them down.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. Install at your own risk.
Store Prices
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

IWD

IWD2

PST

Ardanis

Link
This mini-mod allows you to change the buying and selling prices of stores. Playing with several different mods in Baldur's Gate, you'll probably have noticed one unpleasant thing: virtually all mods add enemies with very expensive loot and/or areas littered with chests full of treasure. By playing a combination of mega-mods, you can own around 600,000 gold coins by Chapter 6! In the original game, it's hard to exceed 100,000 at this stage of the game.
Hence this mod, which allows you both to spend your fortune by raising prices in stores, and to eliminate the need to collect anything and everything by lowering redemption prices. And even better: by raising both buy and sell prices, you restore value to items while eliminating it as far as money is concerned. Or exactly the opposite, if you prefer: items cost nothing, and only cash rewards are of real interest.
You can therefore lower prices to 5, 10, 20, 25, 33, 50, 67, 75 or 80% of their initial value; and increase them by 125, 135, 155, 200, 300, 400, 500, 1000 or 2000%. By combining reductions and increases, you can customize these values. For example, reducing the purchase price by 67%, then increasing it by 2000% will produce an increase of 1333%.

Note that an enhanced version of this mod is included in a component of the Aurora's Shoes and Boots mod.
Fichier StorePrices.rar.
Store revisions
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2EE

DrAzTiK

Link
This file, to be copied into the override, gives an unlimited supply of potions and/or projectiles of all kinds to five in-game merchants.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Subrace mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Team

tipun

dark0dave

RoyalProtector

This mod adds the possibility of selecting a sub-race for the main character. At present, there are only 9: Aasimar, Tieffelin, Dark Elf, Wild Elf, Golden Dwarf (Hill Dwarf), Grey Dwarf (Duergar), Costaud and Sagespectre (Halfelins), and Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin).
It also gives subraces to Viconia (Dark Elf), Baeloth (Dark Elf), Haer'Dalis (Tieffelin) and Caelar (Aasimar).

This mod adds two new sub-races, the "sun and wood" elves (sun elves and wood elves), to the 6 sub-races already present (human, aasimar, tiefelin, moon elf, drow, wild elf).

IWDEE

Subtledoctor

This is a collection of small adjustments to spells, items and creatures for the EE games. Some, but very few, are retro-compatible with the original games (such as Add a saving throw for level absorption effects). Each component can be installed independently.

For greater consistency, the author has split the mod into two: SubtleD's Spell Tweaks and SubtleD's Item Tweaks.
Surprise
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This mod introduces a hybrid of two mechanisms from the AD&D Player's Handbook: surprise and ambush. Most creatures and characters can now be surprised if they suddenly run into an enemy, and neutrals can also be surprised. Party members can enter a waiting mode where they can surprise but not be surprised (ambush). In addition, thieves and bards have the ability to detect noises, which sometimes enables them to discern creatures beyond obstacles and prepare an ambush.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. Install at your own risk.
Sweet Pillows
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

temnix

This little mod aims to prevent players from overusing rest, which distorts the balance of the game and is unrealistic. It limits its use to once every 8 hours. Resting is interpreted here as sleeping. However, intense activity during this period (combat, etc.) reduces the time limit. The party can, however, "kill" an hour and lose one point of fatigue thanks to the special ability "stroll".

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which often proves to be false... Install at your own risk.
Talents of FaerÃ»n

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

DavidW

This very large mod is a collection of dozens of mods. It contains numerous optional adjustments to various parts of the game, focusing on expanding and rebalancing the player's abilities. It includes dozens of HLAs, an overhaul of existing kits, a sub-race system etc.

This mod is still in progress.

The 500 - The 1000
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

temnix

Baldur's Gate's economy is broken: as soon as you leave Candlekeep, money will cease to be a factor for the rest of the game. Attempts have been made to remedy this by balancing prices and items, but it's too difficult and subjective. This mod cuts the Gordian knot: with each dawn, the party will lose gold.

The first link allows you to lose 500 PO per day, the second 1000.
The Artisan's Corner: Shaman Tweaks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

AionZ

This mod seeks to make the Shaman's class more coherent by modelling his experience progression on that of the Cleric rather than that of the Sorcerer. It also adjusts his spell learning speed and number of daily casts to a more consistent pace.
The Bigg Tweaks Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

the bigg

This mod contains a number of tweaks and fixes, most of them designed to make the game less frustrating:
- Reduction in the duration of the blinding effect of the Beauty of Nature spell.
- Correction of the imprisonment spell: from now on, the imprisoned character will not be considered dead and will no longer leave the group. There will be no more GAME OVER for the main player, except in solo. His romances can continue...
- Removal of Drop Weapons in Panic.
- Unlimited Wishes and Limited Wishes.
- Wishes and Limited Wishes revisited to no longer take into account wisdom conditions.
- Improved difficulty system: you can adjust the difficulty of the scenario via a dialog, without modifying the damage inflicted as you would by using the difficulty bar.
- And much more...
The Divine Remix
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Andyr

NiGHTMARE

CamDawg

Originally called "Cleric Remix", this mod aims to rebalance and change certain aspects of the classes using divine magic (clerics, paladins, druids and lurkers) in BG (through BGT, BG1Tutu and BG:EE) and in BG2.
Firstly, it completely overhauls the spell system for priests, druids, lurkers and paladins. The list of spells to which clerics have access has been modified thanks to a more detailed system of divine spheres of influence; from now on, priests will have access to the spells of spheres related to the attributions of their divinity. Clerics of Lathander, for example, will have access to spells focusing on healing and fire, while those of Talos will have privileged access to spells of destruction. The same applies to Druids, Rangers and Paladins, who now have access to a more appropriate selection of spells for their class. A host of new divine spells have also been added, including wounding spells (as opposed to healing spells), detection of good and several spells straight out of Icewind Dale. Forget divine spellcasters who all look the same and whose spells reflect nothing of their personality, and add a slightly more tactical dimension to priests and druids!
Secondly, it adds 22 new profiles, mainly for lurkers and clerics, to give you a wider choice, such as Selune's Silver Star cleric profile, Shar's Cloak of Night, Red Rider's Divine Strategist, Tempus' War Chaplain, Ilmater's Noble Martyr, Kossuth's Adept of Flames, Iyachtu Xvim's Tyrant, Oghma's Guardian of Knowledge, Sunie's Heartguard, Corellon's Fairy Protector, Cyric's Master of Conflict; the druid profile of Master of Vases, and the ranger profiles of Sylvan Archer, Wild Ranger, Woods Runner, Avenger and Wild Runner.
Finally, it allows Viconia and Branwen to be assigned a class profile corresponding to their divinity: Priestess of Shar for the former, and of Tempus for the latter.

Incompatible with: Deities of FaerÃ»n, Spell Revisions
The Fields of the Dead
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BGT

BGEE

Echon

Fields of the Dead is a mod that extends and updates Baldur's Gate Tales of the Sword Coast. It takes many of the game's rules and makes them as close as possible to those of AD&D Second Edition, insofar as the Infinity Engine allows. This involves both modifications and additions. These include the characteristics of creatures and spells, as well as new elements in the same spirit, from creatures to spells and items, scattered throughout the game (opponents, stores). The AI has been completely overhauled, so that opponents can make the most of the game's possibilities (cooperation, better use of potions and spells).
The changes will also affect the artificial intelligence of all creatures: enemies and allies.
Finally, the mod adds a new area on the world map (Battle of Bones) that can be accessed at any time, but is best explored with an experienced group.

As of version 2.0, the mod is now compatible with BGT, BG1Tutu and BG:EE. Please note that this is a beta version. But on this occasion, compatibility with BG has disappeared. Use this direct link to download the previous BG-TotSC-compatible version.
This mod is still in progress.
The Power of Belief

PSTEE

aquadrizzt

This mod allows Nameless to become a priest while retaining his fighter, mage and thief levels.
The Tweaks Anthology
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

PST

PSTEE

Team

CamDawg

Idobek

This mod allows you to make a thousand and one small adjustments to the game. You can make purely aesthetic changes (such as masking helmets on avatars, using Icewind Dale's visual incantations, ...), make rule changes (removing the XP limit, changing experience tables, casting spells in armor) and relax certain game mechanics (unlimited ammo stacking, multi-romance, ...).It completely replaces the previous mods BG Tweaks, BG2 Tweaks Pack, G3 Tweaks, Tutu Tweak Pack, Ease-of-Use Mod Collection, IWD Tweak Pack, Icewind Dale II Tweak and Planescape: Torment Tweak.

aquadrizzt

Grammarsalad

Subtledoctor

This mod introduces a set of changes for mages/sorcerers/bards, as well as rules, spells and kits for them. It offers a host of components that can be grouped into three categories: spell modifications, profile additions or modifications, and gameplay modifications.
- Sorcerer profiles: Amorphous Disciple, Favored Soul, Magus, Revenant Disciple, Sylvan Disciple.
- Multi-classed sorcerer profiles: Arcanist, Mana Sorcerer.
Tome o' Cheats
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

PST

Platter

This is a book with which you can dialog to modify your characteristics, alignment, class, money, experience, hit points and so on. It can also give you many useful items, some of which were not included in the game, as well as all level 5 to 9 spell scrolls. Well, obviously, that's cheating!

Warning: As it's included in the Qwinn's Planescape: Torment Tweak Pack mod (the Cheatbook component), you might as well install the previous mod, which is also translated.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Transitions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Lauriel

This mod smoothes the transitions between campaigns in EET. It will provide a mechanism to remain in the BGI "world" after Sarevok is defeated and BG2 "world" after Irenicus is defeated. Progressing through to SoD or BGII areas of the game is accomplished by using a custom item provided by Duke Belt after the clean-up quests are finished or skipped. Progressing through to ToB is accomplished by using the Amulet of Selderine provided by Queen Ellesime.
In EET, you have the option of having your own personal dwelling which contains a chest that follows you to ToB: after Sarevok has been defeated, you can take up residence at the Ducal Palace (requires SoD), thanks to Duke Belt; if you've rescued Duke Eltan in EET, he will show his appreciation by awarding the keys to a home.
A number of new clean-up quests will be available, depending upon which of Sarevok's followers have been previously eliminated. BG and TotSC quests can be finished after Sarevok's death, giving you to control the order of events.
You can also choose whether to equip Sarevok with his equipment (including his sword) or leave it in his inventory.
Finally, after defeating Sarevok, you'll receive a new Child of Bhaal ability, different according to your alignment.
Trap Overhaul
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

kjeron

This mod allows your characters with the ability to detect traps to automatically reveal them as soon as they are in their field of vision. There's no longer that pesky delay that means you're always stepping on traps, even with a thief in trap detection mode on your team. Another component allows you to recover a trap when you've disarmed it, provided you're able to set it.

Please note: As it patches all areas, we recommend installing it at the end.
Choose the github link for the French version.
Trap Revisions
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Ardanis

This mod changes the trap-laying system. Successfully laying a trap no longer depends on chance; and the strength of traps depends on the ability to lay them, not on the character's level. In addition, setting a trap now costs money, and the limit of 7 active traps per area has been removed.
Traps Hurt Everyone
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

IWDEE

temnix

Ce mod permet aux piÃ¨ges d'Ãªtre activÃ©s par n'importe quel personnage, y compris des ennemis ou des invocations. Cela permet notamment de les utiliser Ã  des fins tactiques. Attention, certaines crÃ©atures ou des innocents errent naturellement et peuvent donc Ãªtre tuÃ©s.
Traps Rebalanced
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

N1

Traps Rebalanced strives to transform traps from a cheesy boss-deleter into a reliable, tactical tool for normal adventuring by making them stronger against large groups of enemies but weaker when stacked. Thieves gain two new abilities â€” Set Basic Traps and Set Advanced Traps â€” which allow them to deploy a total of six unique traps.

Tresset's Permanent Shapeshift Weapons
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

BG2EE

Tresset

The aim of this mod was to prevent the shifter druid's natural weapons from disappearing after 16 hours.

Use the first link for the BGEE version and the second link for the BG2EE version. For EET, use the BG2EE version.
This mod is obsolete, the mod The Tweaks Anthology offers a similar component that works on all versions of the game.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2014. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

BG2

BG2EE

EET

Multiple

With this mod, you can summon former allies who fell in the final battle for the throne (Dynaheir, Tiax, Khalid, Xzar, Yoshimo). You can even call your adoptive mother or father to your side.

Requires: Ascension
Incompatible with: The Reunion
Tutu Tweak Pack
ğŸŸ¥âğŸ˜€

Tutu

CamDawg

This mod allowed many adjustments to be made to the game rules.

It is now obsolete, having been included in the BG2 Tweaks Pack, itself replaced by The Tweaks Anthology.
Tweaks and Tricks
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

Magus

This mod allows you to make a thousand and one small adjustments to the game, and is the perfect complement to The Tweaks Anthology. You can make pets smarter, detect traps faster and allow your NPCs to "feel" their presence, modify the effects of certain items and spells to make them more consistent, make rule changes, sell your items without price depreciation in stores, disable autosaves in certain transitions, decrease the loading time of areas in the original games (by around 10-30% depending on the author), and many other things you'll find in the readme.
It works with any IE game, but not all its components are applicable to all games.

BGT

Link Link
This mod offered a whole collection of game rule adjustments.

It is now obsolete, having been included in the Morrow Gate mod. Click on the second link to download the file.

Ultimate Shapeshifting and Rebalancing Fix

BG2

BGT

No1

This mod offers another interpretation of metamorphosis.

This mod is still in progress.
Unarmed Adjustments
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Adul

This small mod modifies the unarmed attacks of monks and shapeshifters. The first component modifies the monk's fist attacks so that they are considered magic from level 6 instead of level 9. The second modifies the shifter druid's werewolf claws so that they inflict slashing damage instead of piercing damage. In addition, the large werewolf's claws are now considered to be +4 instead of +2. This only applies to their enchantment value, and will not change their damage or TAC0 bonuses.

This mod has since become obsolete.
Universal Clear Fog of War
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Hoppy

This mod is a modernization of the old Clear Fog of War mod. As its name suggests, it removes the fog of war from all areas.
Use Any NPC Item - Add-on for Use Any Item HLA.

Vampire World
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

EET

Lassal

This mod brings the undead into the Saga. You can become undead, welcome them into your party, hire Bodhi after killing her...

Requires: Enhanced Edition Trilogy
Virtue
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

SimDing0

Still puzzled by the game's inconsistency on reputation coding, which doesn't affect alignment? Well, this mod solves the problem in an original way by creating a third variable, "virtue" (the team's morality, to be distinguished from reputation, i.e. how the NPCs feel about you) which, if lowered, will logically modify your alignment. New dialogs have been added concerning your group's reactions to changes in your "virtue". Now all your actions will have consequences (fallen lurkers or paladins, abandonment by your NPCs...).

It must be installed last, and is not compatible with BGT.
W_Packmule
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Kwiat_W

This mod adds a pack mule that will accompany you everywhere, carrying your items without ever failing.

The github link shows the latest version compatible with versions 2.6 and EET.

Weapons Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Durendal

Link
This mod allows all classes to use all weapon types and to spend skill points on each weapon type (the rules regarding specialization remain unchanged - for example, a mage can still only spend one skill point on a given weapon type).

Although the mod is WeiDU-compatible, it is an override mod.

Weiss

This mod features three components: one for paying to rest, one for keeping your gold between games, and one that redefines the time-stopping mechanic.
Welverin's Subrace Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Welverin

Link
This mod adds the possibility of selecting a sub-race for the main character:
- Humans: Aasimar and Tiefelin.
- Elves: Lunar, Snow, Wild, Solar, Sylvan and Drow.
- Dwarves: Sewer, Golden, Uprooted, Derro, Mountain, Deep and Duergar.
- Gnomes: Tinker, Rock, Forest and Svirfneblin Halfelins: Stout, Foursine, Big Guy, Kender, Little People of Athas, Slenderfoot and Ghostwise Half-Elves: Lunar, Snow, Wild, Solar, Sylvan and Drow.

Fichier WelverinSubrace.rar.
Will to Power
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Subtledoctor

This mod strives to add a psionic system inspired by AD&D2 rules and four profiles that can use it: a psionic thief (Psionicist), a psionic warrior (Soublade), a psionic fighter (Psypher) and a psionic mage (Cerebremancer).
However, as the game engine wasn't designed for it, this mod is still experimental, even though it's being actively maintained. But it should enable you to play a character with new types of abilities. So don't hesitate to give it a try!
Wis, Chr, Int Saves
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

wolpak

This mod adds the 3rd edition rule that every two characteristic points above 10 gives a bonus to saving throws.
Wisdom improves saving throws against spells and petrification.
Intelligence improves saving throws against wands and breaths.
Charism improves saving throws against death and poison.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
WL House Rules

This mod adds many tweaks. It also adds two kits: the Grey Guard Paladin and the Chancer Bard. See the readme for more information.

Emeus

Wrist Scribers
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

This spell changes the way spellcasters learn to cast spells, as they now have to find scrolls to learn their spells. They can no longer cast spells from them, but can physically absorb the knowledge by engraving runes on their skin and rubbing blood into scars. When a spellcaster reads a scroll, he or she suffers from 1 to 9 points of damage. One of these points is permanently lost. This is the price to pay for learning. For reasons unknown, his skin begins to darken and take on a blue hue. The change is slight at first, but the more spells the sorcerer absorbs, the more pronounced it becomes, until he becomes a deep, fantastic midnight blue like this character.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. Install at your own risk.
WTP Familiars
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Rabain

FlameWing

Salk

This mod revises the Familiar spell, rebalancing it and making it more like its PnP counterpart. It adds additional sounds, portraits and dialog choices, as well as a level-up system. There are now nine pets (new entry: spider is absolute neutral, rabbit is lawful good) and mages can choose between 3 or 4 (depending on alignment) creatures (exception: absolute neutral mages are limited to spider). Violent death of the pet has serious consequences, and the little critters can't simply be used as a boost to hit points and then stuffed into the backpack. They'll be heard if you do! What's more, pets have totally different innate abilities inspired by the PnP rules.

Only the GitHub link is up to date and is also compatible with EE games.
www.urstuff2athkatla.com
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Crevs Daak

Lets you keep all of your items at the start of BG2. Replicates the exploit in the original game in which one could pause and drop their items at the start of a new game.
Wychowanek Goriona
âš ï¸âğŸ˜€

BG2

Picollo

This mod features a dozen tweaks for ToB. In particular, you can summon Cespenar to forge items without having to return to the Pocket Plane. The Spirit of Destiny no longer summons characters, but instead Charname travels to them, restoration of the Hand's cinematics...

This mod has disappeared from https://athkatla.cob-bg.pl/viewtopic.php?t=5139.
XPexchange
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2EE

EET

Shohy

For BGEETs that incorporate more campaigns, a single-class character can reach the level cap early and feel lonely in the face of teammates who level up later. When a teammate has enough experience points, cast a Wishing or Minor Wishing spell and new exchange options will appear. However, there are a few limitations:
1. the character must be single-class (component 2 removes this restriction)
2. the character must have over 6 million experience points (7.5 or 15 million for Legacy of Bhaal mode, depending on EXP cap).

IWDEE

RoyalProtector

This mod is a compilation of tweaks which, according to the author, improve things as they are in the vanilla game. The vast majority of tweaks are designed to be simple improvements to underpowered items or abilities. Some of them modify the game a little more deeply, but not radically.

Most components are not available on IWDEE.

Wes Weimer

Cuv

White Agnus

Miloch

agb1

This mod created by the ToB's main designer, assisted by enthusiasts from an American forum, which was then converted to WeiDU by Weimer, the latter ensuring compatibility. He changes many things in ToB: every battle with Bhaal's children is much more difficult, Bhaal's new powers are included too, Demogorgon has become a fearsome monster once more, and above all there's a completely remodeled final battle. You can enlist either Balthazar or Bodhi to fight AmÃ©lissane. AmÃ©lissane is a fearsome war machine. At her side, the Hand. Yes, the 5 children of Bhaal (except Balthazar, if you've recruited him), Yaga, Abazigal, Sendai and Illasera, are all here to fight alongside Amelyssane, and at a higher level than their original versions. Before this fight, you'll get a taste of the challenge when you take on Bohdi and Irenicus, who are fully boosted, of course, and will no doubt cause you quite a few problems.

Incompatible with: Wheels of Prophecy

BGEE Leveled Spawns
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

EET

Team

AstroBryGuy

Graion Dilach

Based on the Create random enemies according to level (Tutu style) component of the BGT Tweak Pack mod, this mod modifies the default system of randomly appearing creatures in areas on the Swordside by changing the difficulty according to the average level of the party. Each point of appearance will generate groups of 1 to 6 creatures, depending on party level and creature strength. The user can select the time interval between appearances (from 4 hours to 1000 days), as well as the probability that triggering a random encounter point will result in that point being populated.

If you plan to install this mod, do not install the BGT Tweak Pack component Change random enemy creation, nor the BGSpawn System mod, as they all change the same thing.
Please note: only the GitHub version is also EET-compatible. What's more, it's the latest update.
This mod has been archived by its author/maintainer, who does not seem to want to continue developing it.
BGSpawn System
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Melkor Morgoth75

This mod offers an alternative way of managing the random appearance of creatures in areas on the Swordside. It replaces random (but fixed area-by-area) creatures with a completely new system based on level and number of party members. You can choose the interval between creature appearances. As an option, you can also install a new creature, the Vampiric Wolf Lord (taken from the Ulcaster Wolf from Sword Coast Stratagems), among these random creatures.

Warning: Some players have reported that the combination of this mod and Sword Coast Stratagems (more intelligent monsters) could prove a formidable challenge!
If you're planning to install BGSpawn, don't install the BGT Tweak Pack component Modify random enemy creation, nor the BGEE Leveled Spawns, as they all modify the same thing.
Please note: only the GitHub version is also EET-compatible. What's more, it's the latest update.
Incompatible with: BGT Spawn Tweak
BP Series Party AI Scripts
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

Horred the Plague

This mod offers over a dozen new scripts for team characters. It can be installed on BGII, BGT, BG:EE and BG2:EE. It includes scripts for the Dark Knight and Shadow Master kits.
BuTcHeRy
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

DrAzTiK

Originally, DrAzTiK developed a small mod to make the fight against Tazok and Dig-Dag in Firkraag's lair more dynamic and challenging. Since then, it has grown considerably, adding numerous components and now aims to enable players to conduct "epic" battles in large spaces, bringing BG2 closer to a Dungeon crawler. Take a look at the readme to understand what each component brings.
Cirerrek's AI Scripts: eSeries
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

Cirerrek


This is a collection of AI scripts for Baldur's Gate II with or without the ToB extension, BG:EE, BG2:EE, and the Tutu, BGT, and EET conversions. It includes seven scripts: eArcher, eFighter, eMage, eMulti, ePriest, ePureF and eThief, tailored to specific character classes.
Please see readme for details.
Cirerrek's AI Scripts: iSeries
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Cirerrek

This is a collection of AI scripts in beta for Icewind Dale II. They use a limited number of spells. Use iBard for bards, iArcher for mages, iFighter for fighter types or clerics and iThief for thieves. Please see readme for more details.
Cirerrek's AI Scripts: tSeries
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

PST

PSTEE

Cirerrek

Like the eSeries for BG2, tSeries is a collection of AI scripts for Planescape: Torment, inspired by Gebhard Blucher's "Planescape: Torment Player AI Scripts" documentation.
i>Planescape: Torment Player AI Scripts". However, Planescape: Torment's scripting commands are very limited compared with those of more recent IE games, but they still allow the automation of certain tasks, such as casting spells, using items, attacking and hiding in the shadows. Scripts target the nearest enemy and attack it using whatever means they have at their disposal and deem appropriate, based on the nearest enemy's experience points.
Please see readme for more details.
Cirerrek's AI Scripts: uScript
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG2

BGT

Cirerrek

uScript or "Universal" Script is an AI fight script for BG2 SoA & ToB players. Please see readme for more details.

Warning: this mod has not been maintained for years and is considered obsolete by the modding and gaming community.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Convenience Script Mod
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

IWDEE

ManiacalFreak

This mod adds a script that provides basic attack functionality as well as shortcut keys to activate certain comfort functions. Comfort functions can only be activated outside combat. For example, the B key enables instant incantation for 1 round, notably to simplify preparations.

The Github link is for the BGEE/BG2EE version. The Beamdog link is for the IWDEE version.
D's Enemy Upgrade
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Duality

Tired of fighting wimps who die on the first try? Want strong, intelligent enemies? Then don't install this mod. If, on the other hand, you want enemies that are just as stupid as before, but last at least a little longer, then this is the mod for you.
You can choose from 3 options that modify their XP, their bonuses to TAC0, HP, AC and JS, as well as their damage resistances: Difficult, Very Difficult and "Do you really want to stick splinters in your eyes?" (reserved for masochists, in the author's own words). A fourth option lets you customize these settings.
Deeper Shadows of Amn
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Kensai Ryu

This mod makes certain encounters much more difficult. A new guard appears in Kangaxx's mausoleum, who in turn becomes a more dangerous opponent (much more so). The quest to free the Copper Coronet slaves becomes a little more difficult. The Crypt King becomes a much tougher opponent. The mod also adds new encounters: A new red dragon, Grothgar, appears. A gnome fighter/illusionist seeks out Valygar and will attack anyone in his path. A new Shadow Lord appears in Athkatla.
Difficulty and Tweaks mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

PST

PSTEE

Borsook

Formerly Mix Mod, this mod brings together a small collection of tweaks to either make the game easier to play, or to make enemies tougher.
- Components allow you to increase or reduce the stacking of ammunition, gems, jewels, potions and scrolls.
- A series of components allow you to boost enemies by granting them a bonus to AC, thac0 and saving throws (from 1 to 6).
- A series of components allow you to increase enemies' hit points from 25% to 300%.
- A component allows you to prohibit shapeshifters from wearing helmets.

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Ding0's Quest Pack
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Team

SimDing0

Wisp

This SimDing0 mod not only adds a multitude of small quests, but also modifies the AI of certain monsters, adding certain abilities (for example, mummies can now cast a kind of stun blast on you... gnark). You'll also be able to make other choices in existing quests, such as betraying Edwin, or even Renal Bloodscalp himself... at your peril.

Warning: the component New Fate for Dryad Acorns prevents access to the Firkraag dungeon until the quest has been resolved.
The latest versions include the old mod Kensai Ryu's Restored Drow Innates Abilities.

This mod modifies the default system of randomly appearing creatures in areas on the Swordside, making the difficulty of these creatures evolve according to the average level of the group. Enemy Randomizer
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

GuardianAnubite

Tired of fighting the same badgers every time you play Baldur's Gate? This mod randomizes the appearance of unimportant enemies (enemies without quests, dialogs) to offer a new experience every time you play. The author has endeavored to keep enemy encounters as difficult as possible, although it is possible to encounter enemies with special abilities or resistances sooner than expected, so be prepared for anything! It includes several groups of components that you can install independently of each other:
1. Random monster appearance: this component randomly selects new monsters for each appearance point in the game. This will be more visible in Baldur's Gate wilderness maps, but will also affect BG2. For BG:EE and EET, it is possible to include SoD monsters in the newly selected monsters.
2. Random encounters during rests: this component randomly selects new monsters for sleep interruptions, with the exception of city interior maps, which are supposed to be safe. For BG:EE and EET, it's possible to include SoD monsters in the new monsters selected. In BG2 and EET, you can include or exclude the starting dungeon from SoA.
3. Random monster replacement: this component randomly selects new monsters to replace those that are normally fixed, excluding all those affected by dialogs, critical items or linked to a quest. As enemies are generally replaced by creatures similar in power level, you shouldn't find any encounters impossible to beat. For BG:EE and EET, it's possible to include SoD monsters in newly selected monsters. Including SoD monsters will also make them random on SoD maps. In BG2 and EET, you can include or exclude the starting dungeon from SoA.
Enhanced Creatures for BG1Tutu
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

Aigleborgne

Still in alpha version, this mod was intended to make the game more difficult by increasing creature characteristics and equipping them with intelligent scripts.

Unfortunately, the author hasn't finalized it, and I strongly advise against installing it if you don't want to risk serious incompatibilities with other mods.
This mod is still in progress.
Everybody Is Just So Scary
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

temnix

This mod aims to make ordinary people or creatures more dangerous by endowing them with abilities or characteristics that will make them harder to defeat in combat.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all types of game, which often proves to be untrue... Install at your own risk.
Game Assistant Scripts
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

c4_angel

This mod adds three new automatic character scripts: a battle script, an automatic pause script and a semi-automatic pre-buff script.
gMinion
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Team

Cirerrek

CamDawg

This is a collection of AI scripts that enhance the intelligence of creatures summoned by spells and items, so that they behave more in line with the original intentions of Bioware and more D&D player purists. It includes:
BCS (Baldurs Character Script) files that replace in-game BCS files.
BCS scripts that replace allied summons.
Auxiliary files that correct problems with creatures and spells (CRE and SPL files).
Note: AI applies only to party monsters and does not increase the intelligence of "wild" or enemy creatures.
Please see readme for more details.
Grog's Custom AI Scripts
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD

Grog

A collection of smart scripts for IWD: Smart Mage Script, Smart Cleric Script, Smart Druid Script, Cleric/Mage Script, Smart Cleric/Ranger, Smart Paladin Script, Smart 'Generic' Script, Fighter, Anti-Caster, Cleric, Anti-Undead, Smart Bard Script, Singing Bard Script, Sneaking Thief Script.

This mod has disappeared from https://sorcerers.net/Games/IWD/index_mods.php.
Harder BG1 Patch
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BG

Master PooBaa

Link Link
This very old mod increases combat difficulty by multiplying opponents' hit points by 3. In compensation, they grant 2 times more experience. The mod also makes it possible to build larger stacks of items, so that you always get maximum hit points at level change. It works with Baldur's Gate and Tales of the Sword Coast and is compatible with Dark Side of the Sword Coast.

It has its own installation program. Prefer more recent mods such as Sword Coast Stratagems.
âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Heart of Fury
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG

Tioma

Inspired by Icewind Dale's Heart of Fury mode, this mod is very similar to Harder BG1 Patch. It makes opponents harder to kill by increasing their hit points (HP x 3 + 50), but also by making them harder to hit (-5 to AC) and more skilled in combat (-5 to TAC0). Even a simple crawler becomes dangerous!

Although WeiDU, this mod overrides the creatures concerned.
Improved Anvil
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

el.critto

Contrary to what its name might suggest, this is essentially a mod that drastically increases the difficulty of the base game. It also features new quests, new profiles (including the Auramaster Druid Kit and the RiskBreaker), a randomizer, a new recruitable character (Sibel), and the ability to forge many items that are big-budget, but necessary to defeat equally big-budget enemies.

The mod exists in two versions: one for the original versions, the other for the EE versions.
Incompatible with: BG2 FixPack
Improved Asylum

BG2

BGT

Rastor

This mod modifies Spellhold's dungeon to make it more fun, challenging and difficult for advanced players. It comprises three components that can be installed together or separately.
Improved Battles
ğŸŸ¥âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Team

Moonfruit

Tyrus

Link
This very old mod was designed to increase the difficulty of a number of battles (Drizzt, Firkraag, etc.). It also added four new fighter kits: if you really want to try it out, prefer its descendant Revised Battles.
Improved Heart of Fury Mode
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

Olvyn Churu

This mod provides a more interesting version of Icewind Dale's Heart of Fury mode. It offers a significantly more challenging game, but not simply by giving enemies large amounts of hit points or increasing their stats (as in the normal EE version), but by performing a major rebalancing of enemies and their abilities.
Enemies get new abilities, improved AI (inspired by Sword Coast Stratagems), enhancement of various stats and in some places, more of them. Many enemies have their basic abilities enhanced. Trolls regenerate more quickly, bomber beetles fire more often, saber spiders move and attack very quickly, etc. As in Icewind Dale 2's HoF mode, most of the game's items are reinforced. It also brings many interesting changes to classes and kits, many new tweaks to spells, items and various other things in the game.
Improved scripts for your BG/BG2 playing experience
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

BG2EE

Sarevok57

This mod features a collection of usable scripts for party members.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..

Kangaxx mejorado
âš ï¸âŒğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

Memnoch

The aim of this mod is to offer players a new epic battle against Kangaxx, enhanced in every aspect and endowed with powers much more in line with what he should have as a Lich of Netheril. The guardians who guard his parts (arms, trunk and legs) have also had their powers increased. In addition, three new enemies have been added to guard access to the tomb in the dock district, where the golden skull is located.

This mod has disappeared from http://corellon.clandlan.net/index.php?page=corellon/bgiwd/kangaxx_mejorado.

EET

Angel

This mod makes encounters in BG:EE and BG2:EE a little spicier, and should be compatible with the original BG2, BGT and EET. It modifies various encounters and quests, even adding new ones, and grants new P&P abilities to certain monsters (dragons, golems, liches, lycanthropes, vampires, incorporeal undead...). He also takes the opportunity to modify or extend certain quests. Part of the "Made in Heaven" series (with items, spells and tweaks).
Mercy
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWD

IWDEE

IWD2

temnix

This mod allows intelligent creatures to surrender when they have less than 30% of their hit points. It is also possible to acquire the ability "Propose Surrender" to propose surrender to eligible enemies (50% chance of acceptance). Similarly, the "Surrender" ability allows you to avoid being killed.

Unfortunately, as is often the case with this author's work, the quality of this mod leaves much to be desired. What's more, he tends to claim that these mods are compatible with all game types, which is often not the case... Install at your own risk.

auiwqi

Provides numerous options to improve the game's difficulty, best combined with Sword Coast Stratagems, in addition to numerous bug fixes and general AI improvements. In addition, many bugs have been fixed and the AI improved: Changes in arcane/divine spells, items revised, HLAs revised earlier, general changes in tables (knowledge, reputation, etc), reactive summons, LoB saves corrected, ranged weapon enchantments, and much more.

Give preference to Sword Coast Stratagems.

P&P Celestials
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Caedwyr

This mod makes the celestials (devas and planets) summoned by the player much closer to the paper version, i.e. mostly overpowered and frightening beings. In addition, the type of deva will depend on where it is summoned: astral deva, movanic deva or monadic deva.
Revised Battles
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Erebusant

A remix of Improved Battles, this mod increases the difficulty of a number of battles (Drizzt, Firkraag, etc.), as well as increasing drops. It also adds four new fighter kits:
Bastard: immune to sneak attacks, he gains skills that boost him temporarily.
Demon Knight: immune to fear and immobilization, he also has 40% resistance to fire and a resistance to magic that increases with level.
Weapon Master: improves Tac0, damage and AC over levels, can use Kai and has a slight movement speed bonus. Arcane Avenger: has a high Tac0 and damage bonus against mages and sorcerers, as well as to saving throws against spells. He also has two spells enabling him to dispel invisibility and deflect spells for several rounds.

The Enhanced Firkraag component is incompatible with the Super Firkraag mod, while the Enhanced Dungeon component is incompatible with the Enhanced Ilyich component from Tactics.
The EE version is available via the second link.

Slightly Improved Ilyich

BGT

BG2EE

EET

Razfallow

Link
Tired of fighting this group of duergars that are decidedly too easy for your strong arms or destructive spells - despite the fact that you only have a few at the start of the game? But has Weimer Tactics's Ilyich amÃ©liorÃ© component already made you pull out all the hair you had left - having already pulled out the first half while trying to properly install your endless list of mods? Then you'll probably love this mod! It improves the duergars in Irenicus prison, without making them invincible... Note that it also adds a few other little things; these are listed in the readme as usual.

Choose the github link for the BG2EE/EET version.
Stronger Creatures - Simple Difficulty Mod
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWDEE

ManiacalFreak

Inspired by the old Mix Mod for BG2, this mod makes enemies tougher: they get bonuses to HP, TAC0 and AC depending on their race (for example, humanoids get +3 in TAC0 and AC and a 50% HP bonus; while giants get +3 in TAC0, +1 in AC and tripled HP).

âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2015. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.

Sword Coast Stratagems
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

Tutu

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

DavidW

This mod adds a number of new challenges to the game by making opponents more intelligent, whether they be end-of-chapter bosses or just plain crawlers, notably by managing group intelligence. It also modifies the behavior of certain spells and includes a few cosmetic and comfort adjustments. This mod really does make the game more difficult, so get ready... Its many components are all optional.

Incompatible with: Subrace mod, The Vanishing of Skie Silvershield
Tactics
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BG2EE

Team

Wes Weimer

Musigny

This mod is based on combat and strategy, and practically nothing else. It compiles old mods for improving certain fights (such as the Slightly Improved Ilyich mod, the Ritual mod, and others) and adds its own, making the game very difficult and tactical. Note that you can install each component separately. It also adds two profiles (Archer for fighters and Anti-paladin). Please note that this mod is ideal for rebalancing the game, but adds very few quests - the aim is to increase the difficulty level, nothing else... it would take too long to list all the components of this mod... See the readme for more details.

For BG2:EE only, use the adaptation of the Beamdog link, the work of a new author, Musigny, who treats all the components of the original mod as you go along.
EET-compatible kits translated into French are available in Tactics kits.
âš ï¸ EE: The last update was in 2016. This mod may not work with the latest version of the game.
Tactics4IWD2
ğŸŸ¢âœ…ğŸ˜€

IWD2

Wu Min

This tactical mod is for those who like a challenge. The aim is to make the original game's battles more difficult and exciting, without turning players off; all opponents can be defeated without a cheat code. Around 90% of creatures have been improved (statistics, available spells, artificial intelligence, etc.). The mod also corrects a few bugs and imbalances in the original game.
The Big Picture
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BG2

BGT

BGEE

BG2EE

Horred the Plague

Originally, BP enabled the 3 major mods (The Darkest Day (EE-compatible), Shadows over Soubar and Tortured Souls-BP) to be played in a single package. Over time, all these mods were recoded in WeiDU format. BP's own additions having been so successful, its author converted it to WeiDU, and today BP allows you to significantly improve the AI of all your opponents, as well as your group, and to spice up many encounters. You'll notice that new (and naturally challenging) encounters have also been added: the lich on the docks, Orcus the demon prince... as well as the reworking of certain components from Tactics and the restoration of Ascension in David Gaider's version.

CamDawg

This mod includes small modifications designed to adjust the game's difficulty by brutally forcing the stats of creatures that are not part of the group. It modifies creature stats to make the game easier or harder. Everything can be modified via the _config.txt file.

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
Easthaven+
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

IWD

Duke Nightmare

Link
Easthaven+, a new mod aimming to extend the play of Icewind Dale. A lot of fun extras have been thrown into the game for fun, as well as some extra RP characters, that are following their own campaign to rid evil or good from Easthaven, and the world that makes Icewind Dale. Easthaven+ brings all this and more into the game. With this as well, there is a set of game rules, allowing the player to reach higher levels, and see skill progression reach a new level (literally).

âš ï¸ WeiDU: This mod overwrites files and cannot be uninstalled. Install it at your own risk..
EE Autoroller
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜€

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

EET

IWDEE

Freche

This little utility automatically rolls the dice to determine your character's characteristics at creation, and stores them until you're happy with the result. You can define minimum values for strength and exceptional strength.

A faster version is available, integrated directly into EEUITweaks.

Random Character Generation
âš ï¸âœ…ğŸ˜¡

BGEE

SoD

BG2EE

Mr2150

Tired of playing the same characters over and over again? This mini mod lets you generate a random character from all the available options. It pre-sets your characteristic score to a minimum of 85, and allocates these points for you. It even selects your martial skills, abilities and spells, and its installation requires manipulation of the UI.menu file described on the download page.

DreamingxAshley

For those who are tired of going through the full IWD 2 tutorial, here's a game save that lets you start with a level 3 group, outside the Palisade, with as much gold and experience as possible. The proposed group, La FraternitÃ© des Lames Errantes, is made up entirely of well-balanced female characters. As this is really just a game save, however, it doesn't add any banter. It is still possible to modify characters with Dale Keeper.

Grozzle
